Title: AI Intern
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: AI, Data Analysis, Python, Business Analysis, QA QC
Description: About the job About The Role We are seeking highly motivated interns to support our AI team in building and scaling robust evaluation pipelines for a variety of real-world AI use cases. This internship offers a unique opportunity to work at the intersection of AI, data analysis, and domain understanding , with room to grow into more technical tasks for those with programming skills. This role is ideal for students or recent graduates looking to gain hands-on experience in the AI/tech space, especially those aspiring to become Business Analysts, Quality Assurance Engineers, Developers, or Product Owners . Internship Objective The goal of this internship program is to accelerate the testing and validation of AI solutions by leveraging intern support to ensure outputs are accurate, reliable, and ready for production deployment . Internship Duration: Fixed term of 2-3 months Key Responsibilities As an AI Evaluation Intern, you will: Domain Analysis: Analyze business documents such as insurance policies, claim forms, and financial reports to understand structure, logic, and extract key information. Evaluation Data Creation: Design structured test datasets, define ground truth data for validation, and create Q&A pairs to evaluate AI models' reasoning and comprehension. AI Model Testing: Run systematic tests on various AI models, evaluate performance, and identify potential gaps and areas for improvement. Creative Problem Solving: Challenge AI systems with edge cases and complex scenarios to expose weaknesses and help refine model behavior. (Optional - for those with coding skills) Develop scripts to automate evaluation processes Assist in building evaluation pipelines Support data processing and basic model testing infrastructure Who We're Looking For Ideal candidates are: Analytical Thinkers: Able to think logically and critically, especially when designing test cases and analyzing results. Detail-Oriented: Careful and precise in handling data, validation tasks, and documentation. Curious About AI & Technology: Passionate about the potential of artificial intelligence and how it applies to real-world problems. Self-Motivated & Communicative: Comfortable working independently in a remote environment, yet proactive in seeking feedback and collaboration. Students or Recent Graduates: Preferably located within the Asia timezone for better coordination. Technical Requirements Coding skills are not required, but a strong plus. Candidates with programming knowledge (Python preferred) will have the opportunity to work on more technical and impactful components of the evaluation pipeline. What You'll Gain Hands-on experience in AI model validation and testing Exposure to real-world use cases and diverse datasets Practical skills in data analysis, structured evaluation design, and quality assurance Mentorship from experienced AI engineers and product team members Opportunity to contribute to production-ready AI infrastructure

Title: HCM – Data Analyst Intern
Company: Vexere.com - Vietnam's largest online bus ticketing platform
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Data Analysis, SQL, Power BI, Tableau, English
Description: About the job Data Analyst Intern Vexere is a technology company aiming to revolutionize the tourism and transportation industry in Vietnam. Today Vexere is the largest online bus ticketing platform empowering millions of travelers to make their life journey happier. As Vexere’s BI team member, you will work in a high-tech company (Google Cloud tech stack) environment with a golden chance to analyze data lakes with around 30 million Vietnam users and work with millions of daily records from our awesome users. Your Responsibilities Will Include Extract, manipulate, and analyze data to answer tactical questions using data techniques Develop dashboards to monitor business performance and produce actionable insights in terms of product capabilities and business direction Requirements Final year students Non-stop curiosity and hunger for learning Familiarity with visualization tools (Data Studio, Tableau, Power BI, etc) Strong knowledge of SQL (Bigquery, Microsoft SQL Server, Postgresql, etc.) Analytical mind with a problem-solving aptitude Teamwork spirit and proactive mindset BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Economics, Information Management, or Statistics,or a related profession is greatly appreciated Benefits Internship allowance (depending on ability) Support for commenting on reports and internships Hybrid Working Special discounted bus tickets for employees and their family members. Other perks to be discussed during the interview. What factors can help you trust Vexere? Currently, Vexere is the largest online bus ticketing platform in Vietnam with more than 1000 inter-city bus companies, covering over 3,000 domestic and cross-border routes to help users find bus information and buy tickets online easily. At the same time, Vexere also provides reviews of passengers who have traveled these buses. Passengers can simply select their favorite seats, pay online, or pay in cash at convenience stores across the country. Vexere Bus Management System (BMS) is used by more than 700 bus companies all over the country, helping bus companies to modernize management with effective management, optimized revenue, and costs. This is a revolution in the inter-city bus industry. Over 5,000 agents use Vexere Agent Management System to increase ticket sales and better serve their customers. Vexere’s efforts have been recognized and accompanied by famous institutional investors such as Woowa Brothers (the company owning Baemin), CyberAgent ventures (Japan), BonAngels (Korea), Pix Vine Capital (Singapore), Spiral Ventures (Japan), Access Ventures (Korea), NCore Ventures (Korea). Two investors of VeXeRe are Decacorns (>USD10B valuation) Review về Vexere For More Information, Please Contact Us Via Send your Resume to email: careers@vexere.com, with the title: Fullname – Applied Position Phone/ Zalo: 0909 86 54 71 (Trân) Office Location: Vexere Trading Service Co., Ltd – 2nd floor – Building H3, 384 Hoang Dieu, Khanh Hoi Ward, HCMC (District 4) Working Hours: Hybrid Working 8:30 am – 6:00 pm from Monday to Friday, and Saturday morning.

Title: AI Engineer
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Generative AI, LLM, Machine Learning, JavaScript, Python
Description: About the job Protecting the World’s Critical Infrastructure OPSWAT, a global leader in IT, OT, and ICS critical infrastructure cybersecurity, delivers an end-to-end platform that gives public and private sector organizations and enterprises the critical advantage needed to protect their complex networks, secure their devices, and ensure compliance. Over the last 20 years our commitment to innovative technology has earned the trust of more than 1,700 organizations, governments, and institutions globally, solidifying our role in protecting the world’s critical infrastructure and securing our way of life. The Position OPSWAT is committed to harnessing the power of AI to drive meaningful advancements across all areas of our business . We are currently seeking a highly skilled AI Engineer to lead and support the development of AI-driven projects, with a key focus on integrating our in-house AI Insights platform with various enterprise systems. In this role, you will work closely with the Digital Transformation Team, Customer Experience (CX) Team, and the Enterprise & Data Team to enhance system integrations between Salesforce Service Cloud and other critical business platforms. This is a unique opportunity to be at the forefront of AI innovation within a global cybersecurity company, delivering impactful solutions that improve efficiency, intelligence, and customer outcomes. What You Will Do Development and Evolution of the AI Insights Project: Participate in the development and continuous improvement and expansion of AI Insights - our in-house tool to analyze all go-to-market data. Initially, the project focuses on analyzing Salesforce data to extract meaningful insights that can inform strategic decision-making across the organization. Gradually, it will ingest more business data from JIRA, Hubspot, My OPSWAT to make it more useful. Work with Digital Transformation Team to integrate AI Insights feature with Salesforce and other CRM platform. Work closely with CX leaders to implement agent coaching tool and customer intelligence analysis. Create tools to suggest solutions to customer support engineers, analyze customer sentiments, writing knowledge base. Development of Chatbot Platform: Responsible for the development, continuous improvement and maintenance for chatbots deployed for customer support, academy, and various internal integrations on Botpress. Develop custom extensions for chatbot to expand its capabilities, such as file upload integration for our MFT product, extensions to integrate with AI Insights, extensions to leverage our data lake. Train and fine-tune a custom LLM model with deep understanding of OPSWAT products and cybersecurity world. Develop & Manage Custom Integrations with CRM platform Research & Propose Innovative Solutions: exploring and implementing novel AI techniques and automation solutions to increase CX operational efficiency rather than relying solely on off-the-shelf products. What We Need From You Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. 5+ years of experience in software engineering, with a focus on Generative AI, LLM, Machine Learning and web app development. Experience chatbot development platforms (Botpress, Microsoft Bot Framework, etc.) Experience in training custom LLMs Experience developing integrations for CRM Platforms like Salesforce, Hubspot, Netsuite Solid understanding of software development methodologies (Agile, Scrum, etc.). Good communication, collaboration, and interpersonal skills. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Proficiency in one or more of the following programming languages: React, Python, Javascript, Node.js. It Would Be Nice if You Have Certifications in AWS and Azure architecture Experience in front-end development Experience in data lake technologies (e.g., Azure Data Lake Storage, Azure Data Factory, Azure Databricks, Azure Synapse Analytics). Experience in designing customer support/customer service chatbots. OPSWAT is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to providing an environment where equal employment opportunities are extended to all employees and applicants, free of discrimination and harassment of any type. All employment decisions are based on individual qualifications, job requirements, and business needs without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other category protected by federal, state, or local laws. Recruiting Agencies: we do not accept unsolicited resumes from third party agencies for any of our open positions. To submit resumes for our jobs, there must be a recruiting contract approved by our legal team and endorsed by both parties. We are currently not accepting additional 3rd party agencies at this time.

Title: AI Engineer
Skills: AI, NLP, Python, Machine Learning, Deep Learning
Description: About the job Mô tả công việc *Xử lý dữ liệu và xây dựng mô hình: Tiền xử lý dữ liệu phục vụ huấn luyện và đánh giá mô hình AI (LLM, NLP, CV,…). Xây dựng và triển khai các mô hình deep learning / LLM phù hợp với từng bài toán cụ thể. *Theo dõi và tối ưu hóa mô hình: Theo dõi hiệu suất mô hình AI trong môi trường thực tế. Thực hiện các điều chỉnh, cải tiến để liên tục nâng cao chất lượng mô hình. *Phát triển và tích hợp AI: Tích hợp các mô hình AI vào ứng dụng, sản phẩm thực tế. Thiết kế, phát triển AI Agents sử dụng GPT models, tích hợp cùng các RAG frameworks. Triển khai mô hình Multi-Agent với phân tách nhiệm vụ rõ ràng và điều phối hiệu quả. *Nghiên cứu và cập nhật công nghệ: Nghiên cứu các phương pháp, kiến trúc, framework mới trong lĩnh vực AI/LLM. Thử nghiệm, đánh giá và áp dụng công nghệ mới vào sản phẩm/dự án. Yêu cầu công việc Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Trí tuệ nhân tạo, Khoa học máy tính, Công nghệ thông tin, Toán Tin hoặc tương đương. Có hiểu biết chắc chắn về Machine Learning, đặc biệt là NLP và các mô hình ngôn ngữ lớn (LLMs). Từ 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực AI Có kinh nghiệm xây dựng, tối ưu và triển khai các pipeline AI end-to-end Thành thạo Python, kỹ năng research tốt Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các thư viện và framework như: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face. Thành thạo trong việc xây dựng hệ thống RAG, làm việc với các Vector DB như FAISS, ChromaDB, Qdrant,… Hiểu rõ và có kinh nghiệm với các công cụ/framework: OpenAI API, LangChain, LlamaIndex, v.v. Hiểu biết về các giao thức tích hợp MCP, A2A, … + Có kinh nghiệm triển khai Agent / Multi-Agent frameworks như LangGraph, CrewAI, AutoGen,… Có hiểu biết hoặc từng triển khai MLOps/LLMOps là lợi thế. Có khả năng làm việc nhóm tốt, làm việc độc lập hiệu quả. Có khả năng giao tiếp tiếng anh trong công việc ở mức khá. Chế độ đãi ngộ Mức lương hấp dẫn: 20,000,000 – 30,000,000 đ/tháng. Thử việc 90% lương. Thời gian làm việc: Thứ 2 – thứ 6. Tháng lương thứ 13 Review lương 2 lần/năm Thưởng các dịp lễ Tết, thưởng quý, thưởng thâm niên Quà tặng dịp sinh nhật cá nhân Cơ hội được học hỏi, làm việc với công nghệ mới Được làm việc trong một môi trường chuyên nghiệp với các đối tác nước ngoài Du lịch, teambuilding 2-3 lần/năm Khám sức khỏe định kỳ cho nhân viên chính thức Hỗ trợ tham gia các khóa đào tạo nâng cao kiến thức và kỹ năng Cách thức ứng tuyển: Gửi CV về địa chỉ email hien.nt@adamosoft.com hoặc liên hệ contact Zalo: 0961 970 576

Title: MLOps Intern
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: MLOps, Docker, Kubernetes, Python, Git
Description: About the job We are looking for an enthusiastic and motivated MLOps Intern to join our growing AI Platform team. This is a fantastic opportunity to develop your skills in modern machine learning infrastructure and DevOps practices while making a real impact on our engineering and AI development workflows. You will help build and maintain the infrastructure and automation that power our machine learning systems. This includes working on CI/CD for ML models, containerized deployments, model monitoring, and collaboration with AI engineers to support production-grade pipelines. If you're excited about the intersection of ML and operations and want to learn in a real-world setting, this role is for you. What You Will Do ML Pipelines and CI/CD: Assist in building and maintaining ML model training and deployment pipelines using tools like MLflow, GitLab CI, or GitHub Actions. Containerization and Deployment: Help containerize ML services using Docker, and support deployment via Kubernetes under guidance. Cloud Infrastructure for AI: Collaborate with the AI team to provision and configure cloud resources (AWS, GCP, or Azure) for experimentation and model serving. Monitoring and Observability: Help set up monitoring and logging for ML systems using tools like Prometheus, Grafana, and OpenTelemetry. Data and Model Versioning: Assist with managing datasets and models using version control tools like DVC or Weights & Biases. Automation and Tooling: Contribute to internal tools that streamline AGI workflows and enhance productivity across AI infrastructure, especially in support of the AGI US and XPlatform projects What You Need To Have Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience. Strong knowledge of networking and Linux operating system fundamentals. Hands-on experience with Docker and Kubernetes (required). Exposure to one or more cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure). Programming or scripting skills in Python, Golang, or TypeScript. Interest in MLOps, automation, and infrastructure for machine learning. Comfort using the Linux command line. Nice-to-Have: Personal projects or internship experience in ML infrastructure, DevOps, or platform engineering. Familiarity with version control (Git) and collaborative coding workflows. An understanding of the ML lifecycle and tools like MLflow, Airflow, or DVC. Interest in scaling infrastructure for AI/ML applications and working on AGI-related initiatives. What You Will Get Strong mentorship from experienced MLOps and platform engineers. A welcoming environment that encourages learning and experimentation. Hands-on exposure to real-world ML infrastructure and DevOps tools. A clear growth path within the engineering team. Competitive salary and benefits. About Us We are an AI Fintech company specialized in assessing credit profiles of consumers in emerging markets combining pioneering AI with large alternative data sources. In 2020 we reached our ambitious milestone of credit profiling 1 billion consumers spanning 4 countries - Vietnam, Indonesia, India & the Philippines - and building a platform for the wider industry and the financial services industry, in particular, to provide the "un & under" served access to credit. At the core of this initiative has been our strict and unwavering adherence to the norms of consumer data privacy and consumer data rights. But we're not satisfied as we embark on the next leg of our journey to deliver 100 million credit lines to consumers in the markets where we operate. Although this goal is ambitious, we truly believe that by harnessing the power of AI & Big Data we can deliver financial access at an unprecedented scale. As a firm, we're audacious problem-solvers motivated by our impact on society. We deeply espouse the values of ownership - of our actions and initiatives, integrity in all we do, and agility in execution. We place great importance on doing what is right, what is best, and what is innovative. If you are smart, driven, and want to make a difference in the world with the most advance and fascinating technology, come join our team. We can satisfy your desire to explore new territory and give you the runway to really make an impact. Additional Info Learn more about us here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=inAEDGvOcL8&t=29s

Title: Middle AI Engineer (Data Science AI)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: AI, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Python, NLP
Description: About the job General Information As a Mid-Level AI Engineer, you will build upon foundational knowledge to independently design, develop, and maintain AI systems. You are adept at leveraging machine learning algorithms and deep learning frameworks, capable of taking a specific project, breaking it down into necessary steps, and executing them autonomously. You serve as a crucial bridge between high-level concepts and detailed implementation, ensuring the successful execution of AI initiatives. Key Responsibilities Work closely as a project team to lead in the entire lifecycle of data science projects, from gathering business requirements to solution delivery, and deliver project outcomes to internal stakeholders or external customers. Engages with clients to understand business needs, present findings, and align technical work with stakeholder goals. Owns planning of assigned modules, contributes to task breakdown, estimation, and milestone alignment, and supports backlog grooming discussions. Leads development of a complete module or sub-system (e.g., full model training pipeline or certain solution direction). Can propose solution design, test, and iterate independently. Coordinates with project lead to align with project needs. Provides structured feedback to junior members, supports onboarding, and contributes to skill-building within the project team. Proactive in contributing to the growth of internal capabilities (e.g., training, knowledge-sharing, framework design). Designing and implementing AI solutions for customer use cases, often leveraging core products and frameworks specific to the company (e.g., Google's TensorFlow, DataFlow, and Vertex AI). Developing scalable AI systems and designing/building algorithms that automate predictive data models. Creating and managing the AI development and production infrastructure, including automating AI infrastructures for data science teams. Building AI models from scratch and transforming machine learning models into APIs that can be seamlessly integrated with other applications. Leading software engineering efforts for AI systems, which involves writing production-ready code optimized for existing and upcoming architectures (e.g., Intel architectures). Participating in all phases of AI solutions development, from requirements definition and design to development, deployment, integration, maintenance, performance tuning, and monitoring. Collaborating extensively with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software engineers, and product managers, to define project requirements, ensure seamless progress, and facilitate AI adoption and best practices. Driving scalability improvements and introducing new capabilities in machine learning platforms, often working across the full stack on tools and infrastructure that empower machine learning teams. Conducting statistical analysis and interpreting results to guide and optimize organizational decision-making processes. Required Skills & Qualifications A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a closely related field is generally required; Master’s degree preferred. Generally at least 3 years of professional software development or AI/ML engineering experience. A deep understanding of ML algorithms and proficiency with various deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, Scikit-learn, Hugging Face, JAX, Ray). Knowledge of common model architectures, including encoders, decoders, and transformers, is also expected. Experience working with large-scale and real-world datasets. Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) is increasingly important. Hands-on experience with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes) and Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) flows is highly valued for production environments. Knowledge of backend infrastructure components such as databases, caching mechanisms, and message brokers is also beneficial. Experience in Generative AI models (LLMs, VLMs, Transformers), Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision, Reinforcement Learning, and Speech/Audio processing is frequently sought. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills are crucial for effective collaboration with cross-functional teams and stakeholders. The ability to work independently, troubleshoot complex issues, and mentor more junior team members is also expected. Strong problem-solving skills and a data-driven mindset are fundamental. Familiarity with agile delivery practices is a plus.

Title: Trainee
Skills: Not specified
Description: About the job Job Description About The Team Cloud and Network Services: As Nokia's growth engine, we create value for communication service providers and enterprise customers by leading the transition to cloud-native software and as-a-service delivery models. Our inclusive team of dreamers, doers and disruptors push the limits from impossible to possible. About The Role Join us as a Student Intern and be part of the team delivering next generation 4G/5G Core network solutions. You’ll assist with the end-to-end implementation of telecom projects and gain firsthand knowledge of technologies behind VoLTE and Packet Core services. This internship is ideal for students eager to explore the telecom domain and develop core technical and project skills in a supportive, team-driven environment. How You Will Contribute And What You Will Learn How You Will Contribute and What You Will Learn Support the development of automation frameworks to streamline 4G/5G Core network deliveries Gain hands-on experience in telecom delivery processes, with a focus on VoLTE and Packet Core solutions Explore the application of AI concepts in telecom network operations and automation Learn and assist in the integration, deployment, and testing of Core Network components Strengthen your understanding of telecom infrastructure and develop key technical and problem-solving skills Key Skills And Experience Key Skills and Experience You have: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Effective interpersonal skills and clear communication, both written and verbal Basic understanding of networking concepts, including TCP/IP Foundational knowledge of telecom networks, especially 4G and 5G technologies Familiarity with Linux/Unix environments Awareness of virtualization technologies and cloud computing fundamentals Understanding of relational databases (RDBMS) and basic database management Exposure to at least one programming or scripting language (e.g., JavaScript or Python) Basic awareness of AI/ML concepts and their applications It would be nice if you also had: Passion for the telecom industry and eagerness to learn in a fast-paced environment Previous academic or project experience related to networking, telecom, or cloud infrastructure Ability to work collaboratively in a team and adapt to new challenges quickly About Us Come create the technology that helps the world act together Nokia is committed to innovation and technology leadership across mobile, fixed and cloud networks. Your career here will have a positive impact on people’s lives and will help us build the capabilities needed for a more productive, sustainable, and inclusive world. We challenge ourselves to create an inclusive way of working where we are open to new ideas, empowered to take risks and fearless to bring our authentic selves to work What we offer Nokia offers continuous learning opportunities, well-being programs to support you mentally and physically, opportunities to join and get supported by employee resource groups, mentoring programs and highly diverse teams with an inclusive culture where people thrive and are empowered. Nokia is committed to inclusion and is an equal opportunity employer Nokia has received the following recognitions for its commitment to inclusion & equality: One of the World’s Most Ethical Companies by Ethisphere Gender-Equality Index by Bloomberg Workplace Pride Global Benchmark At Nokia, we act inclusively and respect the uniqueness of people. Nokia’s employment decisions are made regardless of race, color, national or ethnic origin, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital status, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law. We are committed to a culture of inclusion built upon our core value of respect. Join us and be part of a company where you will feel included and empowered to succeed.

Title: Data Analyst
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Data Analysis, SQL, Python, Data Visualization, English
Description: About the job Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam Workplace Type: Onsite About The Role We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Data Analyst to join our growing team in Ho Chi Minh City. As a Data Analyst with one year of experience, you will play a crucial role in collecting, analyzing, and interpreting data to provide actionable insights that drive business decisions. You will work closely with various departments to understand their data needs and develop solutions to improve efficiency and effectiveness. This is an excellent opportunity to enhance your analytical skills and contribute to the success of a dynamic organization. The ideal candidate will possess a strong analytical mindset, excellent communication skills, and a passion for data-driven problem-solving. You will be responsible for maintaining data integrity, creating insightful reports, and presenting findings to stakeholders. This role requires a proactive individual who is eager to learn and contribute to a collaborative environment. You will be involved in the entire data lifecycle, from data collection and cleaning to analysis and visualization. Your work will directly impact our strategic initiatives and help us make informed decisions. We are looking for someone who is not only proficient in data analysis techniques but also has a strong understanding of business principles. If you are a data enthusiast with a desire to make a real difference, we encourage you to apply. Key Responsibilities Collect and analyze data from various sources to identify trends and patterns Develop and maintain data reports and dashboards to track key performance indicators (KPIs) Collaborate with stakeholders to understand their data needs and provide data-driven insights Clean and validate data to ensure accuracy and consistency Perform statistical analysis and data mining to uncover hidden insights Present data findings to stakeholders in a clear and concise manner Assist in the development of data strategies and initiatives Monitor data quality and identify areas for improvement Document data processes and procedures Stay up-to-date with the latest data analysis techniques and tools Required Skills & Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or a related field 1 year of experience in data analysis or a related role Proficiency in data analysis tools such as Excel, SQL, and Python Strong analytical and problem-solving skills Excellent communication and presentation skills Ability to work independently and as part of a team Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI is a plus Knowledge of statistical methods and techniques Familiarity with data warehousing concepts Strong attention to detail and accuracy Additional Information This is a full-time position based in our Ho Chi Minh City office. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, including health insurance, paid time off, and opportunities for professional development. We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. The successful candidate will be expected to adhere to our company's code of conduct and ethics. We encourage all qualified individuals to apply. Please submit your resume and cover letter for consideration. We will review applications on a rolling basis and contact candidates who meet our qualifications for an interview. Thank you for your interest in joining our team!

Title: DevOps Fresher
Skills: DevOps, CI/CD, Git, Kubernetes, Linux
Description: About the job VSI là một đơn vị cung cấp các giải pháp về công nghệ thông tin cho khối khách hàng Tài chính - Ngân hàng tại thị trường Việt Nam. Các giải pháp công ty tập trung đó là DevSecOps, Observability, Kubernetes/Openshift, API Management... Khách hàng của VSI là các enterprise trong lĩnh vực Tài chính - Ngân hàng như: Vietinbank, BIDV, Napas, Agribank,... Vị trí DevOps Fresher này sẽ tham gia vào các dự án triển khai DevSecOps cho các khách hàng lớn (enterprise), phạm vi công việc như sau: Tham gia trực tiếp vào các dự án tư vấn giải pháp và triển khai DevSecOps cho khách hàng; Triển khai, cài đặt và cấu hình các công cụ liên quan DevSecOps, CI/CD như Container Orchestration (Kubernetes/OpenShift), Source Code Management (GitLab, GitHub), Automation Tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, ...), Artifact Management Tools (Nexus, JFrog), Code Scanning Tools (Sonarqube, Semgrep, BlackDuck, Coverity, ...); Triển khai, cài đặt, cấu hình các giải pháp Observability (Logging, Monitoring, Tracing); Xây dựng CI/CD pipeline cho các ứng dụng; Hỗ trợ vận hành, quản trị các giải pháp và công cụ nêu trên cho khách hàng. Yêu cầu Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Công nghệ Thông tin, Khoa học Máy tính hoặc các ngành liên quan; Sinh viên mới ra trường hoặc có kinh nghiệm dưới 1 năm; Có định hướng phát triển sự nghiệp theo hướng DevOps, DevSecOps; Thành thạo ít nhất một ngôn ngữ lập trình backend (Java, Python, Node.js, Go,.NET, ...); Có hiểu biết về Kubernetes (K8s), Openshift; Có hiểu biết về các hệ quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu như MySQL, PostgreSQL,MongoDB, Redis, Elasticsearch ...; Có hiểu biết về RESTful API hoặc GraphQL; Có hiểu biết về Git và các workflow cơ bản; Có hiểu biết OS Linux, thành thạo các linux command line cơ bản; Ưu tiên có hiểu biết về các giải pháp sau : - Hiểu biết về Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions hoặc các công cụ tương tự; - Kinh nghiệm với Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, hoặc các công cụ giám sát khác; - Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Ansible); Đam mê công nghệ, khả năng tư duy logic tốt và có khả năng giải quyết vấn đề; Trình độ tiếng Anh: giao tiếp cơ bản, có khả năng nghiên cứu, đọc hiểu và viết tài liệu chuyên môn bằng tiếng Anh. Chế độ đãi ngộ Lương: 10.000.000- 14.000.000 (tùy theo năng lực) Thời gian làm việc: Thứ 2- Thứ 6 (giờ checkin linh hoạt) Môi trường làm việc hướng đến sự phát triển, ổn thỏa, hài lòng và có ý nghĩa của toàn thể công ty và các thành viên. Trong đó đề cao các giá trị tôn trọng và công bằng, trung thực và tử tế, chuyên nghiệp và chu đáo; Các chế độ BHXH theo luật lao động Chế độ chăm sóc sức khỏe: Khám sức khỏe định kì, Bảo hiểm sức khỏe toàn diện Lương tháng thứ 13 và thưởng hiệu suất kinh doanh Thưởng các dịp lễ, Tết; ghi nhận thành tích cá nhân, tập thể Chính sách đào tạo và phát triển: đào tạo kĩ năng mềm, kĩ năng chuyên môn, tư vấn lộ trình phát triển cá nhân; Tài trợ thi chứng chỉ công nghệ, tham gia các hội thảo công nghệ chuyên sâu và công nghệ mới Các hoạt động teambuilding, du lịch hàng quý, năm.

Title: Data Scientist
Skills: Data Science, Deep Learning, Data Analysis, Python, Machine Learning
Description: About the job We are seeking a skilled Mid/Senior Data Scientist with solid expertise in embedding technologies, deep learning, data analytics, and model deployment. The ideal candidate will contribute to the development of AI solutions, collaborate with senior team members, and support the delivery of high-quality AI projects for clients across Southeast Asia. Key Responsibilities Develop and implement search systems using embeddings, hybrid search, and reranking techniques under guidance. Build and fine-tuned deep learning models, applying custom loss functions for specific use cases with support from senior team members. Assist in creating and managing datasets for model training and evaluation. Support the deployment and optimization of Large Language Models (LLMs) and Vision-Language Models (VLMs) in production environments. Build interactive dashboards using Streamlit, Power BI, or Superset to visualize model performance and business insights. Conduct model performance evaluations using established metrics and testing methodologies. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into AI solutions. Contribute to team knowledge-sharing and support Vietnam Silicon’s AI initiatives in the region. Requirements Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related technical field. Proficiency in mathematics, statistics, machine learning, and predictive modeling. 3 - 5+ years of professional experience in machine learning engineering or applied AI research. Experience with embedding technologies, vector search, and reranking systems. Familiarity with statistical analysis, hypothesis testing, and leveraging open-source resources or research papers. Ability to implement deep learning architectures and apply custom loss functions with guidance. Experience in dataset creation and management for AI applications. Familiarity with deploying and optimizing LLMs or VLMs in production environments. Experience building interactive dashboards with Streamlit or similar tools. Strong Python skills and proficiency with ML frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face). Good problem-solving and communication skills. Ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams. Prefer Experience with GPU-based AI training environments. Familiarity with fine-tuning large language models for specific applications. Knowledge of Southeast Asian languages or regional business contexts. Contributions to open-source ML/AI projects. Exposure to implementing AI solutions in enterprise settings. Familiarity with MLOps practices for model deployment and monitoring.

Title: Artificial Intelligence (AI) Engineer Intern

Develop and refine prompts to effectively retrieve desired results from the NLP model. Assist in validating AI models to ensure accuracy and reliability, including preventing issues like data hallucinations. Record and document development processes, experiments, and findings. Work closely with cross-functional teams to align AI solutions with project goals and timelines. YOUR PROFILE AND YOUR PERSONALITY Enrollment in an undergraduate or graduate program in Artificial Intelligence (AI), Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field Demonstrated interest in AI, ML, LLMS technologies, and innovation, evidenced by previous projects or coursework (e.g., academic projects, internship experiences, or personal hobby projects,..) A foundational understanding of algorithms, data structures, and software design principles Basic understanding of programming languages such as Python, Java, or JavaScript, … Experience with development tools and technologies (e.g., Git, version control systems) Strong problem-solving skills and a keen attention to detail. Eager to learn new technologies and frameworks. Proactively reach out to people, communicate, ask for help, and get things done Proficiency in the English (IELTS above 6.5 or CEFR B2+) Nice to have Previous internship experience in software development is a plus Benefits Await You At Code Leap Real-world experience in software development within a fast-paced industry. Mentorship from seasoned software engineers Allowance will be provided Enjoy a stress-free and comfortable commute to and from work with our Grab Services sponsorship Enjoy an endless selection of delicious refreshments, including gourmet coffee, beverages, snacks, and fresh fruits, all complimentary Focused on individual development: Unlimited access to Udemy and other recommendation courses Sponsored Professional certificates such as AWS (Certified Machine Learning – Specialty, Machine Learning Fundamentals,..), Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Fundamentals, IBM Applied AI Professional Certificate, etc Sharing session every Friday, come along with lunch provided by CODE LEAP Offers days off to align with personal university schedules and commitments Dynamic, fun, and agile environment, perfect for sharing and creativity Open-minded, kind & humble colleagues CONTACT About Us With our expert teams spread across two continents, CODE LEAP provides innovative software solutions for venture-backed companies and leading enterprise businesses in Germany. Our teams in Germany and Ho Chi Minh City (Vietnam) work hand in hand to develop state-of-the-art solutions of the highest quality. Because collaborating with the right people is the secret to our successful growth. We future-proof organizations - be part of it!

You will analyze data sets to identify patterns, create frameworks and develop predictive algorithmic models to deliver intelligent systems that are capable of performing tasks that usually require human cognition in order to solve complex business problems and for faster business processing. Specifically, you are expected to: Design, develop, optimize, and implement AI systems to meet business requirements. Monitor the performance of deployed scalable AI models and frameworks, making necessary adjustments or updates to improve accuracy and reliability, and address any issues or bugs that arise during the system's operation. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze the business needs and define problems to identify the goals and requirements of AI systems. Work closely with the development team to ensure seamless AI development and integration, and define APIs and protocols for communication between AI systems and external services. Document AI models and infrastructure, processes, and practices for reference, and present progress to the leadership team and stakeholders. Implement strong data security and privacy measures for data handled in AI applications. Stay current with emerging AI research and technologies, and initiate innovative solutions & improvements to advance our AI capabilities. Conduct training and share knowledge & expertise in AI to the team. Your profile: Bachelors degree in Computer Science, IT, Data Science, or any related field. 2 years of experience with AI development, Natural Language Processing, and Large Language Models. Proven track record of deploying AI models in production. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, or C++. Knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases Experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries (TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, Scikit-learn) Familiarity with machine learning models & algorithms, cloud computing platforms (AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform), containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), deep learning and concepts of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and/or Natural Language Generation (NLG) Eagerness to learn and continuously expand knowledge in emerging fields. Has strong interpersonal and communication skills with a willingness to collaborate with different teams. Others: This is for a hybrid work setup. Successful completion of background check and NBI clearance will be required.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer – CAD Data
Skills: Machine Learning, Python, Git, CI/CD, English
Description: About the job We are hiring a Machine Learning Engineer for a fast-growing tech company revolutionizing the manufacturing sector through AI and automation. This role sits at the intersection of CAD engineering and machine learning, and you'll work on cutting-edge R&D projects with real-world impact on how industrial products are designed, analyzed, and produced. If you have a background in structural or mechanical engineering and have transitioned into the AI/ML field What You'll Work On CAD Data Analysis & Feature Extraction Analyze 3D/2D CAD drawings to automatically extract elements such as holes, bends, and dimensions. 2D-3D Multimodal Embedding Build models that connect and compare CAD drawings and 2D schematics using deep learning. Generative CAD Modeling Develop ML models that can generate CAD commands or components from user prompts or design rules. CAD Integration & APIs Work on connecting ML models directly with CAD software (e.g. SolidWorks, NX), allowing seamless use of AI tools inside engineers’ design environments. What We’re Looking For Must-Have Qualifications: Strong knowledge of machine learning fundamentals (e.g. ANN, CNN, SVM, KNN) Experience working with 3D or engineering-related data Proficient in Python and ML frameworks (e.g. TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn) Understanding of CAD software such as Revit, SAP2000, or ETABS Experience with Git, Docker, and CI/CD workflows Strong communication skills in English (B1+ equivalent) Based in Vietnam or willing to relocate (work permit support available for foreign nationals) Nice-to-Have: Experience developing plugins or integrations for CAD tools (SolidWorks, NX) Familiarity with graphics libraries (OpenGL, WebGL, Vulkan) Experience deploying ML models into production Exposure to cloud platforms like AWS or GCP

Title: AI Engineer

Research and Experimentation: Experimenting with state-of-the-art AI model architectures and approaches to enhance the performance and accuracy of existing products. Integration: Developing API interfaces for model interaction, closely collaborating with software engineering teams to integrate and deploy generalized AI models into real-world applications and systems. This will enhance customer interaction, automate processes, and improve decision-making capabilities. Mentorship: Providing technical guidance and mentorship to junior members of the AI team. Job requirement Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field. Proven experience in developing and fine-tuning machine learning models for computer vision and natural language processing. Proficiency in frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar. Strong programming skills in Python. Hands-on experience with AWS services for at least 2 years , particularly in deploying and managing AI models. Must hold an AWS certification , such as AWS Certified Developer , AWS Certified Data Analytics , or AWS Certified Machine Learning Specialty . A track record of contributing to AI projects is a plus. Excellent problem-solving and communication skills. Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, innovative environment. Why You’ll Love Working Here 1. Workplace Work at the heart of cloud innovation and transformation across Vietnam and the region. Collaborate with world-class cloud engineers and business leaders. Join a young and dynamic team with awesome projects applying the latest technology Working with specialists worldwide provides you with a fantastic opportunity to expand your skill set. Culture of openness and honesty in which individuals are respected and encouraged to achieve their full potential 2. Benefits comprise 13th-month salary and attractive performance bonuses. Premium Healthcare and Accident insurance. Free parking and allowances: Lunch, Marriage, Newborn baby and others are applied. A spacious pantry fully equipped with a coffee maker, fridge, microwave, snacks, milk , tea and more A wide range of sports and social activities: badminton, tech clubs, etc. Chance to be honored quarterly and annually with recognition awards for individuals, teams, long-term service, etc. Engaging events: annual company trips, team buildings, internal events, Company’s Year-end party. Training programs including AWS certification support. Apply today and grow with one of Vietnam’s top cloud-native companies

Title: Software Engineer (Vietnam)
Location: Phường Chí Minh, Hai Duong, Vietnam
Skills: Java, AWS, AI, Software Architecture, English
Description: About the job About Copado Copado is the #1 DevOps Platform for Salesforce and the Cloud. We harness the power of native CI/CD and Robotic Testing to drive digital transformation for 1,000+ of the most innovative brands on the planet — from Coca-Cola to eBay to Volkswagen. Our low-code platform unites non-technical admins and pro-code developers on the same system and empowers enterprises to scale end-to-end software delivery across multi-cloud environments. The impact on your business? 20X faster releases, 94% fewer production bugs and 46% more Salesforce ROI. The impact on your team? No more late nights, weekend war rooms or stressful release days. Brief Summary Of Role This role will be an individual contributor to be part of the development squad for Copado’s Essential’s DevOps application for the Salesforce platform. Copado Essentials has a rapidly growing global user base of over 10,000 enthusiastic users. We like to say that Salesforce DevOps starts with Copado Essentials. Essentials provides a simple, fast way for Salesforce developers to select and deploy Salesforce metadata between orgs. The premium edition, called Essentials+, adds version control to provide small development teams with the ability to detect merge conflicts, roll back changes, and a record for audit purposes. What You’ll Be Doing Design & engineer elegant, yet scalable DevOps solutions that delight our users. Bring an “AI first” mindset to product development and product features. Ensure quality assurance by setting standards for unit tests, security tests and automated UI tests. Support and maintain Essentials software releases and AWS infrastructure. Work with the development team to ensure system reliability & performance. Partner with the Product team to align on features, build plan and product roadmap. We Are Looking For Someone With Passionate about software engineering craftsmanship. Demonstrated ability to write secured, modular, clean and well tested code. Strong understanding of object-oriented design patterns. Fast learner with an interest to solve challenging problems at scale. 2+ years of software engineering experience at innovative and fast-paced organizations. Fluency in Java and the related ecosystem. Salesforce experience is a plus. Experience with modern Javascript framework (ie. Angular, React) is a plus. Experience using and developing AI solutions is a plus. Experience with building scalable web-based Saas products is a plus. Experience with AWS infrastructure and scaling operations is a plus. Open source contribution is a plus. Proficient in both verbal and written English communication skills Disclaimer: Copado is Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. Copado does not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. Copado will not pay any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Copado.

Title: Data Engineer
Skills: Python, AWS, SQL, Docker, Apache Airflow
Description: About the job Job description: Role Summary: As a Data Engineer at GFT, you will play a pivotal role in designing, maintaining, and enhancing various analytical and operational services and infrastructure crucial for the organization's functions. You'll collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure the seamless flow of data for critical decision-making processes. Key Activities: Data Infrastructure Design and Maintenance: Architect, maintain, and enhance analytical and operational services and infrastructure, including data lakes, databases, data pipelines, and metadata repositories, to ensure accurate and timely delivery of actionable insights. Collaboration: Work closely with data science teams to design and implement data schemas and models, integrate new data sources with product teams, and collaborate with other data engineers to implement cutting-edge technologies in the data space. Data Processing: Develop and optimize large-scale batch and real-time data processing systems to support the organization's growth and improvement initiatives. Workflow Management: Utilize workflow scheduling and monitoring tools like Apache Airflow and AWS Batch to ensure efficient data processing and management. Quality Assurance: Implement robust testing strategies to ensure the reliability and usability of data processing systems. Continuous Improvement: Stay abreast of emerging technologies and best practices in data engineering, and propose and implement optimizations to enhance development efficiency. Required Skills: 4-6 years of experience as a Data Engineer. Technical Expertise: Proficient in Unix environments, distributed and cloud computing, Python frameworks (e.g., pandas, pyspark), version control systems (e.g., git), and workflow scheduling tools (e.g., Apache Airflow). Database Proficiency: Experience with columnar and big data databases like Athena, Redshift, Vertica, and Hive/Hadoop. Cloud Services: Familiarity with AWS or other cloud services like Glue, EMR, EC2, S3, Lambda, etc. Containerization: Experience with container management and orchestration tools like Docker, ECS, and Kubernetes. CI/CD: Knowledge of CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, CircleCI, or AWS CodePipeline. Nice-to-have requirements: Programming Languages: Familiarity with JVM languages like Java or Scala. Database Technologies: Experience with RDBMS (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (e.g., DynamoDB, Redis). BI Tools: Exposure to enterprise BI tools like Tableau, Looker, or PowerBI. Data Science Environments: Understanding of data science environments like AWS Sagemaker or Databricks. We need a passionate, hard-working, expert and creative individual to help us pursue the many opportunities in this region. This individual should become a trusted technical advisor to our customers, with a strong focus on innovative, scalable designs. A Solution Architect is the first line of technical expertise between NVIDIA and our customers, as well as our partners. Your duties will vary from solutions design, industry and marketing speaking engagements, training delivery, troubleshooting, project coordination, customer relationship management and more. In this role you will primarily support Vietnam, but will need to support the wider South East Asia region if required. What You'll Be Doing Identify new opportunities for NVIDIA technology and solutions, by effectively communicating and positioning the product portfolio and analysing customer requirements. Independently lead technical sales activities in collaboration with the extended team, with the goal of providing total solutions. Identify customer requirements and develop complete generative AI solutions designs using NVIDIA and our ecosystem partners' products. Work closely with ISVs, Solution Integrators and OEMs in solution development and delivery, including proof of concepts. Collaborate with sales and business development teams to support pre-sales activities, including technical presentations and demonstrations of LLM and RAG capabilities. Provide feedback to NVIDIA's product management teams, contributing to the evolution of generative AI technologies. Lead workshops and trainings on NVIDIA's technologies Develop cloud native, multi-agent designs leveraging LLM and RAGs for specific use cases. Help customers to optimise training and inference performance runtime, at scale. What We Need To See A passion for customer success and innovative AI solutions. Someone motivated, able to work independently, proactively with minimal direction. Exceptional communication skills, good interpersonal skills, and enjoy collaborative work. BSc or Master in Data Science, Computer Science or related subjects. 5+ years of hands-on experience in a technical role, specifically focusing on generative AI, with emphasis on training Large Language Models (LLMs). Proven track record of deploying and optimizing LLM models in production environments. Expertise in training and fine-tuning LLMs using popular frameworks such as TensorFlow and PyTorch. Superb communication and collaboration skills with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences. Experience leading workshops, training sessions, and presenting technical solutions to diverse audiences. Professional or Native language proficiency in English and Vietnamese Ability to travel up to 30% of the time to support customer in Vietnam and South East Asia. Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd Hands-on experience with NVIDIA's NeMo SDKs and Triton Inference Server Demonstrable ability to optimize LLM models for inference speed, memory efficiency, and resource utilization. Familiarity with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker) and orchestration tools (e.g., Kubernetes) for scalable and efficient model deployment. Professional fluency in one of these languages: Mandarin Widely considered to be one of the technology world’s most desirable employers, NVIDIA offers highly competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package. Description: About the job About GFT GFT Technologies is driving the digital transformation of the world’s leading financial institutions. Other sectors, such as industry and insurance, also leverage GFT’s strong consulting and implementation skills across all aspects of pioneering technologies, such as cloud engineering, artificial intelligence, the Internet of Things for Industry 4.0, and blockchain. With its in-depth technological expertise, strong partnerships and scalable IT solutions, GFT increases productivity in software development. This provides clients with faster access to new IT applications and innovative business models, while also reducing risk. We’ve been a pioneer of near-shore delivery since 2001 and now offer an international team spanning 16 countries with a global workforce of over 9,000 people around the world. GFT is recognised by industry analysts, such as Everest Group, as a leader amongst the global mid-sized Service Integrators and ranked in the Top 20 leading global Service Integrators in many of the exponential technologies such as Open Banking, Blockchain, Digital Banking, and Apps Services. Role Summary: As a Data Engineer at GFT, you will play a pivotal role in designing, maintaining, and enhancing various analytical and operational services and infrastructure crucial for the organization's functions. You'll collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure the seamless flow of data for critical decision-making processes. Key Activities: Data Infrastructure Design and Maintenance: Architect, maintain, and enhance analytical and operational services and infrastructure, including data lakes, databases, data pipelines, and metadata repositories, to ensure accurate and timely delivery of actionable insights. Collaboration: Work closely with data science teams to design and implement data schemas and models, integrate new data sources with product teams, and collaborate with other data engineers to implement cutting-edge technologies in the data space. Data Processing: Develop and optimize large-scale batch and real-time data processing systems to support the organization's growth and improvement initiatives. Workflow Management: Utilize workflow scheduling and monitoring tools like Apache Airflow and AWS Batch to ensure efficient data processing and management. Quality Assurance: Implement robust testing strategies to ensure the reliability and usability of data processing systems. Continuous Improvement: Stay abreast of emerging technologies and best practices in data engineering, and propose and implement optimizations to enhance development efficiency. Required Skills: 4-6 years of experience as a Data Engineer. Technical Expertise: Proficient in Unix environments, distributed and cloud computing, Python frameworks (e.g., pandas, pyspark), version control systems (e.g., git), and workflow scheduling tools (e.g., Apache Airflow). Database Proficiency: Experience with columnar and big data databases like Athena, Redshift, Vertica, and Hive/Hadoop. Cloud Services: Familiarity with AWS or other cloud services like Glue, EMR, EC2, S3, Lambda, etc. Containerization: Experience with container management and orchestration tools like Docker, ECS, and Kubernetes. CI/CD: Knowledge of CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, CircleCI, or AWS CodePipeline. Nice-to-have requirements: Programming Languages: Familiarity with JVM languages like Java or Scala. Database Technologies: Experience with RDBMS (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (e.g., DynamoDB, Redis). BI Tools: Exposure to enterprise BI tools like Tableau, Looker, or PowerBI. Data Science Environments: Understanding of data science environments like AWS Sagemaker or Databricks. Monitoring and Logging: Knowledge of log ingestion and monitoring tools like ELK stack or Datadog. Data Privacy and Security: Understanding of data privacy and security tools and concepts. Messaging Systems: Familiarity with distributed messaging and event streaming systems like Kafka or RabbitMQ. The NVIDIA Solution Architecture team is the first line of technical expertise between NVIDIA and our customers. Your duties will vary from inventing proof-of-concept demonstrations, to driving relationships with key executives and managers in order to evangelize accelerated computing to leverage AI. What You’ll Be Doing Working with our Gen AI (NeMo) Deep Learning and HPC customers to help them leverage NVIDIA Software Development Kits (SDK/s) and GPU based infrastructure to best advantage for their business. Develop and demonstrate solutions based on NVIDIA’s state-of-the-art ML/DL, data science software and hardware technologies to customers especially on NVIDIA DGX and virtualized solutions such as VMware + Tanzu and Open Source Perform in-depth analysis and optimization to ensure the best performance on GPU architecture systems Running NVIDIA Deep Learning Institute and Skills Transfer sessions with Customers, OEM’s and partners around NVIDIA & others HW and SW solutions. Partner with APAC Regional and HQ Engineering, Product and Sales teams to develop, plan best suitable solutions for customers. Enable development and growth of product features through customer feedback and proof-of-concept evaluations Build industry expertise and become a contributor in integrating NVIDIA technology into Enterprise Computing architectures. Work closely with customer's data science, ML/DL developers and IT teams What We Need To See Professional, long term experience as a Data Scientist (focus on AI/DL/ML) developing/supporting customer facing projects experience on computer vision, Conversional AI, or data analytics technologies, especially LLM and Gen AI projects. Familiarity deploying NVIDIA AI/HPC Software frameworks such as NeMo & NGC. At least 5 years experience in commercial AI and Data Science. BS/MS/PhD or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Data Science, Electrical/Computer Engineering, Physics, Mathematics, other Engineering fields with at least 8 years work or research experience with Python/ C++ / other software development. AI/Data Science project management, liaising with multiple stakeholders to drive projects, and coordinating resources inside (and outside if relevant) the organization. Strong customer or presales and technical experience and skills with AI/ML/Big Data frameworks assisting them with. Good planning and long term strategic engagement and orchestration with a broad ecosystem of stakeholders from customer, to internal and external parties. You are excited to work with multiple levels and teams across organizations (Engineering, Product, Sales and Marketing team) Excellent presentation skills and demonstrated capacity to deliver complex messaging to customers and partners with excellent verbal and written communication. Able to work remotely, planning well with strong partnering with a small team with an attitude for growth, passion for continuous learning and sharing findings across the team Excited to partner with multiple levels and teams across organizations (Engineering, Product, Sales and Marketing team) Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd Python coding skills and automation/orchestration tools, C++ software development Experience working in or with Consulting, Business partners and OEM’s, managing AI/DL technical aspects of deals and accounts. Development background with NVIDIA software libraries and GPUs, and OpenACC, CUDA optimization experience. Design and Deployment technical skills across a variety of OEM infrastructure (Compute, Network and Storage). NVIDIA is widely considered to be one of the technology world’s most desirable employers. Description: About the job Jitsu is a Silicon Valley based company which provides e-commerce and traditional businesses with a logistics service to deliver their products directly to customers’ doorsteps within a day, without the typical cost and complexity of expedited shipping. Our proprietary technology and processes provide scalable same-day and next-day delivery services to some of the world’s fastest growing brands. Jitsu’s services are live in eight major metropolitan areas with many more on the way. We are looking for a Data Analyst/ Analytics Engineer working in our Hanoi office, who will create, optimize Jitsu tools to solve the last mile challenges and help define and drive the next iteration of Jitsu products. The data analyst is part of the product team that is focused on delivering exceptional experiences to our drivers, clients, internal teams and end customers. What you will do: You will develop standard and custom Jitsu dashboards, tools, processes, and capabilities to equip internal and external users with data and insights. You will collaborate with non-data stakeholders ex. Marketing, Sales, Operations, Customer Success, etc. to understand their requirements and translate them into data products, dashboards and reports. You will interact with clients to understand their needs and provide end-to-end data solutions. Manage analytics dashboards and standard reporting, including requirement gathering, prototyping, development, testing, and rollout. Create engaging and interactive business and data insights using Looker, focusing on the user experience. Maintain, manage, and optimize security, data access models, and performance for dashboards (preferably Looker). Implement best practices for LookML, SQL coding and data model design. Leverage new tech like ML/AI into dashboards and data analysis to solve business problems. What you need: 1. Experience Minimum 3+ years of experience in analytics engineering, data engineering, or BI development roles, including the design and development of scalable and performant BI dashboards using tools like Looker. Solid experience in designing and maintaining ELT/ETL pipelines and orchestration workflows using modern tools such as dbt, Dataform, Airflow, or similar. Proven ability to partner with product, engineering, operations, and business stakeholders to build robust data solutions that drive decision-making in a fast-paced, high-growth startup environment. Strong understanding of cloud data platforms (e.g., BigQuery, Snowflake, Redshift) and data warehousing best practices. Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaborative data development workflows. Good-to-have: Experience developing and maintaining semantic layers and data models in LookML or comparable tools. Experience designing, executing, and analyzing A/B tests and controlled experiments. 2. Knowledge, Skills & Abilities: Advanced proficiency in SQL, with the ability to write optimized, maintainable, and modular queries for large-scale datasets. Experience with data modeling techniques (dimensional modeling, star/snowflake schemas) to design scalable data products. Deep expertise in BigQuery and Looker, including LookML development, dashboard optimization, and performance tuning. Ability to architect and document data pipelines from ingestion to visualization, ensuring data quality and reliability throughout. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Proven track record of discovering insights through data exploration and analysis. The Opportunity: Become a key part of the core global team developing insightful data to help drive actionable decisions for internal and external users. Build real-time dashboards and reports that support thousands of drivers, clients and connect with the Jitsu team. Create sophisticated graphical interfaces and visualizations for all Jitsu’s network activities. Contribute to team development standards, conventions, and processes. Collaborate with data with peers in development, transportation, operations, and client success to solve business problems. Title: Physics Specialist – AI Trainer
Skills: AI, Python, Prompt Engineering, Technical Writing, English
Description: About the job Are you a physics expert eager to shape the future of AI? Large‑scale language models are evolving from clever chatbots into powerful engines of scientific discovery. With high‑quality training data, tomorrow’s AI can democratize world‑class education, keep pace with cutting‑edge research, and streamline lab work for scientists everywhere. That training data begins with you—we need your expertise to help power the next generation of AI. We’re looking for physics specialists who live and breathe classical mechanics, electromagnetism, quantum physics, statistical mechanics, relativity, thermodynamics, condensed matter, particle physics, nuclear physics, astrophysics, and computational physics. You’ll challenge advanced language models on topics like Schrödinger equations, Maxwell’s laws, quantum field theory, thermodynamic cycles, Lagrangian mechanics, cosmological models, and numerical simulations—documenting every failure mode so we can harden model reasoning. On a typical day, you will converse with the model on problem-solving strategies and theoretical physics questions, verify factual accuracy and logical soundness, capture reproducible error traces, and suggest improvements to our prompt engineering and evaluation metrics. A master’s or PhD in physics or a closely related physical science field is ideal; peer‑reviewed publications, laboratory or theoretical research, or hands‑on computational modeling projects signal fit. Clear, metacognitive communication—“showing your work”—is essential. Ready to turn your physics expertise into the knowledge base for tomorrow’s AI? Apply today and start teaching the model that will teach the world. We offer a pay range of $8‑to‑$65 per hour, with the exact rate determined after evaluating your experience, expertise, and geographic location. Final offer amounts may vary from the pay range listed above. As a contractor you’ll supply a secure computer and high‑speed internet; company‑sponsored benefits such as health insurance and PTO do not apply. Job title: Physics Specialist – AI Trainer Employment type: Contract Workplace type: Remote Seniority level: Mid‑Senior Level

Title: Software Engineering Intern
Skills: JavaScript, HTML, PostgreSql, Redis, Ruby on Rails
Description: About the job We’re the team behind projects like BI tool Holistics, database diagram tool dbdiagram.io, and open-source project dbml.org. We’re looking for another software engineer to help us build more awesome tools for data teams and developers. This is a position based in Ho Chi Minh City with flexible, hybrid WFH/WFO setup. ‍ Our application’s architecture To get a taste of how working with us is like, here are some insights into how our application has been built so far. The Holistics app works by allowing data analysts to connect to their data warehouses and develop reusable “data models”. This allows non-technical users to use a friendly drag-and-drop interface to explore the data and build dashboards, without the need to bother their technical colleagues. On the backend side, Holistics is built using Ruby on Rails as the main web framework. Unlike standard Rails project structure, we modularize the code base into local gems and engines to improve maintainability and extensibility, following modular monolith pattern. This also follows the pattern of "Functional core, imperative shell" with the gems being mostly functional/stateless code and engines handle the imperative/stateful part of the app. By using Sorbet to add static typing on top of Ruby, we ensure that most of our Ruby code has annotated type signature . This not only reduces a whole swath of common bugs that plagues Ruby codebases but also significantly improves developer productivity through IDE/editor integrations. We use PostgreSQL for our main production database due to its reliability and rich feature-set. We have built a custom job queue system on top of Postgres, which are then executed using Sidekiq on top of Redis. Vue.js 3.0 with TypeScript is our framework of choice for front-end development. To deal with displaying huge amount of data, we build sophisticated, custom Vue components that lazily render the data. Since many complex computation are done on the front-end, we also use Web workers to decouple those computation from the main rendering thread. This enables smoother user experience while also decouples computation from rendering logic. ‍ Job Scope You’ll be working on all aspects of our products, for example: front-end & backend development, implementing new features, website development, customer support... Implement necessary back-end features & APIs to extend the platform’s functionality Build complex and interactive data analysis interface using HTML5, JavaScript (AngularJS); build reusable front-end JS/HTML components. Translate wireframes and sketches into working prototypes and features. Develop and improve our website experience. Build and maintain front-end/back-end libraries and frameworks. Support our customers with trouble shootings. ‍ The way we work We follow Spotify squad model. Our team is split into 4 squads, each (5-7 members) consists of engineers, product managers & designers working closely together. How We Work On a New Feature Product & Design Team spends time research the problem, talk to customers and prepare Product Discovery Doc (PDD) and Product Requirement Doc (PRD). Engineering Team then performs a Technical Research. When we have a fairly good picture of the complexity and impact, we’ll start with the implementation. We avoid being a feature factory . We’re aware more features do not equal better product. We do not compromise product and code quality for artificial deadline. We refactor and think about code optimization regularly. We understand the good and bad of technical debt and use them to our advantages. We employ “pair programming” practices regularly where two team members work on a task together in one workstation. This brings a great deal of benefits, among which are faster knowledge transfer, reduced bus factor, better team cohesion and improved code quality. We have a strong writing culture : Almost everything is communicated through written documents. Just as our developers write reusable codes, we write evergreen notes. We maintain a problem-solving culture . Everyone is strongly encouraged to have rigorous understanding of a problem, separating Problem Space vs Solution Space as well as using Eigenquestions to find the most important dimensions of a problem. Solutions are deliberated over with trade-offs explicitly listed in discussion documentation. Watch this talk about problem-solving for engineers that our cofounder gave (in Vietnamese) Our Culture Stimulates Continuous Learning We let team members rotate every 3-6 months. This allows them to try new things and learn different aspects of the business. We have a weekly TED talk program where team members present topics they are interested in. Engineering Team organizes weekly technical talks as well as monthly technical workshops. Product Team has regular AMA events with external product experts ‍ Requirements Strong problem solving (most important) Currently pursuing Computer Science or related fields in Universities in Vietnam/overseas. ‍ What We Look For In You Problem Solving: You don’t just write code based on requirements, you debate the requirements with us. Coding: You write good code, you’ve written code that handles a lot of loads, and you enjoy optimizing and refactoring your code to make it faster Culture & Mindset: You’re a team player; you understand how it’s like working for a startup – doing anything and everything needed (from writing blog posts, to help customers with their data problem) Tech Stack: we use Ruby, PostgreSQL, Redis, Vue.js, ES6 and a lot of SQLs. It’s great if you know these, but it’s not a big deal. We’re confident you’ll pick these up quickly on the job. Basically you will not just implement features based on a task list. We need your original ideas, creativity, and critical thinking skills to help us build a great data platform. ‍ Interview Process Round 1: Technical interview with the Engineering team Round 2: Do take-home assignment (offline - deadline 3days, will be sent after Round 2) Round 3: Culture & Behavior Interview ‍ Why You'll Love Working 👨🏼‍💼 Training & career developments Weekly TED talks to expand skills and knowledge. 💕 Awesome company policies A flexible work culture, Remote policy. Weekly happy hours andcompany-organized events. 🏢 Workstations provided for maximum productivity Mechanical Keyboard + Razer Mouse Big-screen monitor(s) 🌐 Working time: From Monday – Friday, from 9.00 a.m. to 6.00 p.m. 🌐 Work Location: 457 Nguyen Dinh Chieu, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City Apply now
