Title: Software Developer Intern (C++)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: C++, C language, Linux, Git, English
Description: About the job Company Description Technology is our how. And people are our why. For over two decades, we have been harnessing technology to drive meaningful change. By combining world-class engineering, industry expertise and a people-centric mindset, we consult and partner with leading brands from various industries to create dynamic platforms and intelligent digital experiences that drive innovation and transform businesses. From prototype to real-world impact - be part of a global shift by doing work that matters. Job Description Development is the largest discipline at Endava. Our developers design, build, and deliver software products using modern languages, frameworks, and architectural patterns. As part of our collaborative cross-functional teams, they apply strong problem-solving skills and a passion for building impactful systems. As a CSCF Software Intern, you will gain deep exposure to technologies powering the IP Multimedia Subsystem (IMS), specifically working with the Call Session Control Function (CSCF) — a virtualized, SIP-based core component in modern telecom networks. You will learn the foundations of session signalling, network virtualization, and protocol stacks (SIP, Diameter), and contribute to internal simulation tools and diagnostics projects that emulate or support IMS behavior. The internship is focused on learning, practice, and contributions toward: Developing simulation or diagnostic tools for CSCF components such as SIP stack, or Service Invocation Modules. Understanding component-based architecture and interaction with Application Servers (AS), Home Subscriber Server (HSS), and other IMS nodes. Implementing or extending utilities for message parsing, session tracing, failover testing, or service triggering. Agile and DevOps practices are used throughout the development lifecycle. Qualifications If you are currently pursuing or have recently completed a degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Electronics & Telecommunications, or a related field, and you bring: An understanding of C/C++ development, Curiosity and enthusiasm for telecommunication systems and network protocols (SIP, Diameter), Familiarity or interest in Linux, shell scripting, Git, and debugging tools like GDB, High team spirit and collaborative attitude, Basic communication skills in English, …then we would love to hear from you. Knowledge of IMS architecture, SIP protocol, Diameter interfaces, or familiarity with networking concepts (e.g., DNS, TCP/UDP, SCTP) is a plus. Additional Information Internship allowance Opportunities to become Endavan after the internship An excellent working environment in developing tomorrow's features Open and honest culture where people are valued, treated fairly, trusted and empowered Training and career development opportunities Free English classes Good working facilities Other company activities At Endava, we’re committed to creating an open, inclusive, and respectful environment where everyone feels safe, valued, and empowered to be their best. We welcome applications from people of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives—because we know that inclusive teams help us deliver smarter, more innovative solutions for our customers. Hiring decisions are based on merit, skills, qualifications, and potential. If you need adjustments or support during the recruitment process, please let us know.

Title: [SFA/CRM] Back End Developer (Python)
Skills: Python, CRM, AWS, GCP, Agile
Description: About the job Job description: Use Python 3 to develop back-end for a CRM service application: Geniee SFA/CRM (Sales Force Automation, Customer Relationship Management) Develop or implement a new feature for local product based on business team’s request Monitor network and system to prevent the system from threat or system fault Optimize the web application for maximum speed and scalability Stay current with the latest technology trends and adopt new tools and practices to improve the product development process Other tasks as assigned by supervisors Job requirements: Must have: At least 3 years of experience in developing web applications (regardless of language) At least 2 years of experience in backend development using Python Experience in product development based on cloud computing Experience in architecture design using cloud services such as AWS/GCP Good communication skills Ability to work independently, take the initiative rather than waiting for instructions Nice-to-have: Experience in frontend development using Vue.js/AngularJS and React Domain knowledge in the sales support system (Sales Force Automation) Experience in building a customer management system (CRM or ERP) (architecture, technology selection, design review, etc.) Experience in building large-scale data infrastructure that handles a large amount of data and distributed processing. Agile/Scrum development experience Japanese communication skills Employment benefit package: Laptop Mac pro provided Social, public health and unemployment insurance as defined in the Labor Code PVI insurance for staff and 1 family member 12 days’ annual leave and 1 birthday leave Salary review: twice per financial year Half-year bonus: up to 100% of monthly gross salary Most valuable person/team awards per half-year Annual company trip, annual health check Club Allowance, chance to join club activities with cost bearing up to $20/month

Title: Vietnamese to English Translator
Skills: AI, English, Vietnamese, Technical Writing, Research
Description: About the job DataAnnotation is committed to creating quality AI. Join our team to help train AI chatbots while gaining the flexibility of remote work and choosing your own schedule. We are looking for a bilingual professional to join our team and teach AI chatbots. You will have conversations in both Vietnamese and English with chatbots in order to measure their progress, as well as write novel conversations in order to teach them what to say. Benefits: This is a full-time or part-time REMOTE position You’ll be able to choose which projects you want to work on You can work on your own schedule Projects are paid hourly, starting at $20+ USD per hour, with bonuses for high-quality and high-volume work Responsibilities (both in Vietnamese and English): Come up with diverse conversations over a range of topics Write high-quality answers when given specific prompts Compare the performance of different AI models Research and fact-check AI responses Qualifications: Fluent in Vietnamese + English A bachelor's degree (completed or in progress) Excellent writing and grammar skills Strong research and fact-checking skills to ensure accuracy and originality Note: Payment is made via PayPal. We will never ask for any money from you. PayPal will handle any currency conversions from USD.

Title: AI Engineer
Skills: AI, NLP, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Python
Description: About the job MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC: Nghiên cứu và xây dựng các mô hình AI/ML phục vụ xử lý hồ sơ bảo hiểm (OCR, NLP, GenAI, đánh giá rủi ro, phát hiện gian lận…). Thiết kế và triển khai các thuật toán học máy, học sâu phù hợp với bài toán bảo hiểm sức khỏe, nhân thọ, tài sản. Tối ưu hóa mô hình AI về độ chính xác, tốc độ xử lý và khả năng mở rộng. Phối hợp chặt chẽ với Data Scientist, BA nghiệp vụ và Developer để tích hợp giải pháp AI vào hệ thống hiện tại. Thử nghiệm, đánh giá và triển khai mô hình AI vào môi trường production (MLOps, CI/CD pipeline). Tham gia thu thập, xử lý và chuẩn hóa dữ liệu đầu vào (claim documents, invoices, medical records…). Giám sát hoạt động mô hình sau triển khai, xử lý lỗi và nâng cấp hiệu quả theo thời gian. Viết tài liệu kỹ thuật, mô tả mô hình, giải pháp và tham gia trình bày với khách hàng hoặc nội bộ. Phối hợp cùng các bộ phận khác để đóng góp vào chiến lược chuyển đổi số trong lĩnh vực bảo hiểm. YÊU CẦU ỨNG VIÊN: Kiến thức chuyên môn: Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên, ngành Khoa học Máy tính, Toán ứng dụng, Kỹ thuật hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan. Có kinh nghiệm từ 3 năm trở lên ở vị trí AI/ML Engineer , ưu tiên ứng viên từng làm trong lĩnh vực tài chính, bảo hiểm, y tế. Hiểu rõ các thuật toán học máy (Machine learning), học sâu (Deep learning), đặc biệt thành thạo các kỹ thuật về NLP, Computer Vision và Generative AI (LLMs, Transformers). Thành thạo một hoặc nhiều ngôn ngữ: Python (ưu tiên), R, Java. Có kinh nghiệm với các thư viện và framework AI như: TensorFlow, PyTorch, HuggingFace Transformers, Scikit-learn, Keras. Có hiểu biết về xử lý dữ liệu phi cấu trúc (hình ảnh, văn bản) và tiền xử lý dữ liệu bảo hiểm (invoice, biểu mẫu, phiếu khám…). Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm với OCR, NLP, fraud detection, rules-based scoring. Ưu tiên: Hiểu biết quy trình phát triển phần mềm và MLOps (CI/CD, model deployment, monitoring). Có kinh nghiệm triển khai mô hình AI trên nền tảng cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure) là một lợi thế. Tư duy logic tốt, có khả năng phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề thực tế từ nghiệp vụ. Kỹ năng giao tiếp hiệu quả, có khả năng trình bày giải pháp AI với stakeholder không chuyên môn kỹ thuật. QUYỀN LỢI VÀ CHẾ ĐỘ: Thu nhập cạnh tranh theo năng lực ứng viên. Lương tháng 13 và thưởng KPI; Tham gia đào tạo nâng cao chuyên môn và kỹ năng dành cho công việc. Tham gia thi chứng chỉ chuyên môn quốc tế do Công ty tài trợ; Tham gia các hoạt động teambuilding, mừng công và nghỉ mát hàng năm; 15 ngày phép/năm và các ngày nghỉ Lễ theo quy định; Bảo hiểm sức khỏe FPTCare cho bản thân và cơ hội mua ưu đãi cho người thân. Khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm; Môi trường trẻ trung, năng động, hoạt động văn hóa tổng hội phong phú. Điều kiện làm việc hiện đại, văn minh; công cụ phần mềm về quản lý và tác nghiệp tiên tiến nhất; Tham gia các hoạt động văn hoá, sự kiện hấp dẫn của Công ty FPT IS và Tập đoàn FPT; Xem xét tăng lương hàng năm; Chế độ hỗ trợ mua nhà, mua xe cho cán bộ nhân viên công nghệ.

Title: AI Engineer
Skills: NLP, Python, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, English
Description: About the job 1. Job Description: - Chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm một kỹ sư AI có kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực Xử lý Ngôn ngữ Tự nhiên (NLP) để: - Tham gia phát triển các dự án AI nội bộ, đặc biệt là các sản phẩm/dịch vụ ứng dụng NLP - Hỗ trợ team kinh doanh và presale trong việc tư vấn kỹ thuật, chuẩn bị giải pháp và trình bày demo AI cho khách hàng - Nghiên cứu và triển khai các mô hình học máy/học sâu phục vụ các bài toán thực tế như: phân tích văn bản, chatbot, trích xuất thông tin, tổng hợp văn bản,... - Tự chủ trong nghiên cứu, thiết kế giải pháp kỹ thuật và triển khai - Đóng góp vào việc cải tiến quy trình, công cụ và sản phẩm AI hiện tại 2. Job Requirements: - Tối thiểu 3 năm kinh nghiệm trong việc phát triển các ứng dụng liên quan đến NLP - Thành thạo Python và các thư viện xử lý dữ liệu như numpy, pandas - Có tư duy giải thuật và phân tích tốt - Sử dụng được các framework học máy/học sâu như: scikit-learn, PyTorch, hoặc TensorFlow - Nắm vững kiến thức cơ bản về Machine Learning, Deep Learning, và các kiến trúc mô hình phổ biến (RNN, LSTM, Transformer, BERT...) - Chủ động, có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao, có khả năng tự học và thích ứng nhanh với công nghệ mới - Có khả năng đọc hiểu tài liệu kỹ thuật tiếng Anh tốt. - Có thể tự triển khai một bài toán NLP từ A-Z (thu thập dữ liệu → tiền xử lý → huấn luyện mô hình → đánh giá → triển khai demo) Địa chỉ làm việc : 315 Trường Chinh, Thanh Xuân, HN 3. Thông tin về môi trường làm việc: - Thời gian làm việc: Thứ 2 - Thứ 6. Flexible time: 7:30 - 20:00. Core time: 10:00 - 16:00 - Chuyên nghiệp, cởi mở, khuyến khích học tập - Tự do với tinh thần trách nhiệm - Đồng nghiệp thân thiện, tinh thần giúp đỡ nhau vì mục đích chung - Thẳng thắn, coi trọng ý kiến cá nhân - Giờ làm việc linh động * Quyền lợi: - Lương: trao đổi - 2 tháng thử việc 100% lương - Lương tháng 13 - Nghỉ phép 12 ngày/năm - Review lương 2 lần/năm - Du lịch, khám sức khỏe hàng năm - Thưởng các dịp lễ tết …

Title: Full Stack Software Engineer - HCMC
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Fullstack, JavaScript, NodeJS, ReactJS, AngularJS
Description: About the job This position is onsite at our office in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. Are you a talented engineer with passion to build beautiful, easy to use apps for users? Combine not only technical knowledge in Full-Stack JavaScript, Node.js, React.js but also your business acumen in learning and understanding how your apps add value to users. Join us to continue expanding our unique B2B SaaS app portfolios with already over 30,500 customers. About Us At OptiSigns, we believe technology should be accessible and valuable to everyone, including non-technical users. Our mission is to create beautiful, user-friendly B2B SaaS applications that add real value to society. By helping businesses connect better with their customers and employees, we aim to drive revenue growth and enhance operational efficiency. Responsibilities: Work on the design and development of apps from concept to production. Develop and maintain front-end components using modern JavaScript, TypeScript frameworks such as React.js or Angular. Implement server-side logic and APIs using Node.js, Express.js, Nest.js or other back-end technologies. Design and optimize database schemas and queries using relational and/or NoSQL databases. Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code adhering to coding standards and best practices. Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to define and prioritize features. Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends, and advocate for their adoption when appropriate. Requirements 2-5+ years of experience in full-stack web development, with a strong focus on both front-end and back-end technologies. Proficiency in front-end frameworks such as React.js, AngularJS. Proficiency in back-end technologies such as Node.js, Express.js, Nest.js. Experience with database systems such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or Redis. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with a track record of delivering scalable and reliable solutions. Excellent communication and teamwork skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Benefits Opportunity to travel and work at our U.S. office in Houston, TX Latest Macbook Pro Competitive Pay Company Trip Paid time off Insurance Our VN Office address: DC Tower, 111D Ly Chinh Thang, Vo Thi Sau Ward, District 3 Ho Chi Minh City

Title: Data Engineer
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Data Engineering, ETL, SQL, Python, Database
Description: About the job We are a fast-growing SaaS company in the EduTech space, operating mainly in Singapore, Vietnam, and Malaysia. With almost 2000 schools as customers, our mission is to revolutionize early childhood education through technology and provide innovative solutions to our customers. We are committed to transforming the way education is delivered in the Southeast Asian region and beyond. About the Role: We are looking for an experienced Data Migration Engineer to lead and execute complex, large-scale data migration from a legacy system to our new platform. This role requires a deep understanding of data structures, transformations, and migration strategies to ensure accuracy, consistency, and minimal business disruption. This is a mission-critical role for ensuring data quality and integrity in our transformation journey. Key Responsibilities: Design, implement, and manage large-scale data migration projects from legacy to modern systems. Analyze complex relational data models and create clear data mapping documentation. Develop and optimize robust ETL/ELT pipelines using appropriate tools and technologies. Cleanse, transform, and validate large datasets to ensure accuracy and consistency pre- and post-migration. Identify and resolve data inconsistencies, gaps, and performance bottlenecks during migration. Work cross-functionally with product, engineering, QA, and business stakeholders to gather requirements and validate results. Build migration audit trails and rollback procedures to support safe and traceable data transitions. Provide post-migration support, including monitoring, validation, and issue resolution. Document migration processes, scripts, mapping logic, and QA procedures clearly. Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field. Experience in data engineering, ETL development, or data migration projects. Proven experience with large data migrations involving complex schema relationships and business rules. Proficient in SQL and scripting languages (e.g., Python, Bash). Experience with ETL tools such as Talend, Informatica, Apache NiFi, or custom scripting frameworks. Solid understanding of relational and non-relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB) Comfortable working with millions of records and optimizing performance in data pipelines. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to data quality, completeness, and integrity. Excellent communication and documentation skills. Good to have Experience in educational systems, ERP/CRM migration Familiarity with API-based data extraction/integration. Knowledge of data governance, compliance, and privacy standards (e.g., PDPA, GDPR). Familiarity with cloud services like AWS, GCP, or Azure for data storage and migration. What We Offer: Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunity to lead impactful, high-visibility projects. A supportive and collaborative team environment. Flexible work arrangements (depending on location and role).

Title: Freelance Software Developer (Python Engineer) - AI Trainer
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Python, CI/CD, AI, English, LLM
Description: About the job This opportunity is only for candidates currently residing in the specified country. Your location may affect eligibility and rates. At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI. What We Do The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe. About The Role We are looking for an experienced Python developer who enjoys building tools, environments, and infrastructure for working with LLM-based agents. You'll help create sandboxes, task systems, and CI/CD pipelines to support testing and development of AI agents. You'll also work closely with researchers and domain experts, helping them set up and use these tools effectively. Although every project is unique, you might typically: Sandboxes for running and testing AI agents safely Tools for writing tasks and test cases for agents CI/CD pipelines to run checks and evaluate agents Dev environments for experts creating these tasks Repo templates and scripts to help new contributors Interfaces for tracking task input and agent results Example Tasks How To Get Started Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone. Requirements You have a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Software Development, Computer Science, or other related fields. You have 5+ years of experience writing Python code Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge Benefits Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you? Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments. Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio. Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

Title: Data Analyst
Skills: Data Analysis, SQL, Power BI, Tableau, Agile
Description: About the job Công ty Cổ phần Đầu tư Công nghệ Tiên Phong (ATI) là doanh nghiệp phát triển sản phẩm phần mềm với phần khúc ngân hàng, đối tác chính là MBBank. ATI hiện có số nhân viên gần 100 người và ngày càng mở rộng phát triển nhằm hướng tới sự hoàn thiện cho từng sản phẩm dựa trên mong muốn và nhu cầu của khách hàng. Vị trí tuyển dụng: DATA ANALYST Mức thu nhập: 20 – 28 triệu 1. Mô tả công việc: - Phân tích yêu cầu dữ liệu trên các hệ thống nguồn. - Đề xuất và tư vấn các giải pháp Công nghệ để đáp ứng hoạt động Dữ liệu & Báo cáo của Ngân hàng, thực hiện ánh xạ dữ liệu trực tiếp từ dữ liệu khai thác lên báo cáo. - Đào tạo, hướng dẫn các đơn vị nghiệp vụ sử dụng sản phẩm Công nghệ Dữ liệu trong quá trình kiểm thử người sử dụng cuối đối với màn nghiệp vụ được phân giao triển khai. - Kiểm soát quy trình hoạt động và tuân thủ quy trình quy định trong mạng phát triển phần mềm để đảm bảo chất lượng trong việc phát triển phần mềm đáp ứng yêu cầu phát triển. 2. Yêu cầu ứng viên: - Tốt nghiệp đại học các chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Toán tin, Điện tử viễn thông, Kế toán, Tài chính Ngân hàng hoặc các chứng chỉ tương đương được công nhận bởi các tổ chức uy tín. - Ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí BA. - Có kinh nghiệm hiểu biết về hệ thống nguồn như W4, T24, BPM, CRM, ECM, LOS là lợi thế. - Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các công cụ báo cáo (Power BI, Tableau, BI Publisher). - Có kinh nghiệm triển khai DWH, Datamart là lợi thế. - Có hiểu biết về các hệ thống Bigdata, Data Lake, Data warehouse. - Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu Oracle, SQL, các công cụ phân tích dữ liệu. - Có kinh nghiệm kiểm soát chất lượng và tiến độ triển khai cho các yêu cầu. - Có kinh nghiệm phân tích dữ liệu và kiến thức/chứng chỉ về SQL là lợi thế. - Có hiểu biết về kiến trúc 1 hệ quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu. - Ưu tiên kinh nghiệm tham gia triển khai các dự án theo mô hình Agile/Scrum. 3. Quyền lợi: - Hỗ trợ đầy đủ trang thiết bị làm việc/ Hướng trợ cấp hàng tháng nếu sử dụng thiết bị cá nhân. - Được hưởng đầy đủ chế độ bảo hiểm theo quy định BHXH, BHYT, BHTN. - Được hưởng chế độ nghỉ phép 12 ngày/năm, các ngày nghỉ phép khác theo quy định của Luật. - Thưởng các ngày lễ lớn trong năm như: Tết Dương lịch, 30/4, Trung Thu, 2/9, Tết Âm lịch. - Chế độ thăm hỏi ốm, đau, hiếu, hỉ. - Tháng lương thứ 13. - Khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm. - Bảo hiểm sức khỏe cao cấp hàng năm. - Được đào tạo chuyên môn, kỹ năng thường xuyên. - Xét điều chỉnh lương, đánh giá theo năng lực định kỳ, 2 lần/năm. - Có các khóa đào tạo kỹ năng chuyên môn. - Được tham gia các hoạt động du lịch, teambuilding (3 tháng/lần). - Làm việc từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6; nghỉ thứ 7, CN. 4. Địa điểm làm việc: Hội sở MB Bank 18 Lê Văn Lương, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội. 5. Cách thức ứng tuyển: Ứng viên gửi mail qua địa chỉ: maintn@ati.vn hoặc liên hệ qua số điện thoại: 0352695151 để được hỗ trợ tốt nhất.

Title: AI Researcher
Skills: AI, Machine Learning, Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch
Description: About the job Application Deadline: 31 August 2025 Department: dreem.ai Location: Hanoi, Vietnam Description We are seeking a Junior AI Researcher to join our team to research AI solutions to solve business problems. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AI and machine learning and be able to quickly learn and understand our business to identify potential areas for AI applications. Responsibilities - Study and understand our current business to identify potential areas where AI can be applied. - Research and analyze existing AI solutions on the market, evaluate the feasibility of integrating with existing solutions, and identify areas for customization. - Evaluate, customize, and fine-tune Generative AI models for specific use cases. - Develop end-to-end AI demos to showcase the capabilities of the customized solutions. - Communicate results and progress clearly to technical and non-technical stakeholders. - Stay up-to-date with the latest developments in AI and machine learning. Requirements - Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science, artificial intelligence, or related field. - 1+ years of experience in AI and machine learning research. - Strong Python programming skills. - Experience with fine-tuning Generative AI, RAG, SLM models. - Experience with AI tools and technologies, such as LangChain, TensorFlow, PyTorch, MCP, and scikit-learn. - Demonstrated ability to develop and implement AI demos and POC. - Demonstrated ability to evaluate AI models, benchmarking accuracy & quality of AI services/models. - Demonstrated ability to collect and analyze data from feedback loop to improve the AI quality. - Be able to apply AI into your daily work. - Being able to develop a front-end app for demo is a plus. - Ability to quickly learn and understand new business domains and identify potential areas for AI applications. - Excellent communication and collaboration skills. - Fluent in English. What we offer - Attractive salary package. - Building large-scale SaaS for global. - Healthcare: Annual health check-up, Premium Healthcare Insurance for you and your loved ones. - International working environment, flat and transparent organization. - Working & growing with Young, Ambitious & Talented Team. - Flexible working time, from Monday to Friday. - Work hard, rest well: Enjoy 15 days of annual leave. - Prioritizing a work-life balance with the flexible work-from-home policy. - Various training on hot-trend technologies, best practices, and soft skills. - Social – Health – Insurance paid fully. - Free in-house entertainment facilities, coffee, and snack. - Company trip, big annual year-end party every year, team building, etc. And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!

Title: Manual/Automation Tester - Quality Analyst (QA QC)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Agile, English, Technical Writing, Automation Test, Tester
Description: About the job Job Description Responsible for testing complex Structural Engineering, CAD, visualization, manufacturing, Engineered Services or Business Management software. Including the design, creation, documentation of, and execution of complex software test cases in a manual or automated method. Also includes verification of bug fixes and enhancements, researching bug reports, verification of software requirements, and may provide Technical Support. Is an active and critical member of an Agile Development team within software development process and is a part of the decision-making group to assess risk of various projects alongside software developers and product managers. Role, Responsibilities & Typical Activities · Design, develop, document, train and execute complex software test cases used for functional and regression testing cycle. · Perform functional testing of new and modified features. · Perform regression testing of existing features and functionality for each new software release. · Researching bug reports from various stakeholders and provide Technical Support. · Act as a part of the decision-making group to assess risk of certain projects to determine appropriate timing and placement of development effort. · Collaborate and contribute with Software Product Management and other development teams on software requirements to ensure that solutions are efficient, consistent, and fulfill business needs. · Work in an Agile software development environment, participating in commitment meetings, retrospectives, and planning meetings. Required Qualifications: · Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Software Engineering, Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or a related technical discipline. · Minimum of 2+ years of relevant work experience on manual window application testing · Ability to work in a dynamic and continuously changing environment. · Knowledge of testing methodologies covering and testing process · Be able to carry testing independently in a cross-functional team following Agile process. · Attention to detail and Analytical thinking · Curiosity and persistence in finding edge cases and inconsistencies · Good verbal and written communication skills in English and the ability to communicate in technical. (English level B1 - CEFR or equivalent) Preferred Qualifications: Experience in the steel/wood construction industry. Experience in automated testing of desktop applications. We offer the successful candidates benefits as follows: · Extremely competitive salary. · 13th month & productivity Bonus. · Yearly salary review. · Healthcare insurance package. · 24/24 Personal accident insurance. · State-of-the-art office environment. · Yearly outing. · Detailed induction, training and on-going career development. · Opportunity for overseas training and travel. · English training programs. · 5-day week. · Flexible start-times. · Free lunch. · Free parking. · Full Social Club including gym, zumba, yoga, football, badminton, swimming.

Why Binance Shape the future with the world’s leading blockchain ecosystem Collaborate with world-class talent in a user-centric global organization with a flat structure Tackle unique, fast-paced projects with autonomy in an innovative environment Thrive in a results-driven workplace with opportunities for career growth and continuous learning Competitive salary and company benefits Work-from-home arrangement (the arrangement may vary depending on the work nature of the business team) Binance is committed to being an equal opportunity employer. We believe that having a diverse workforce is fundamental to our success. By submitting a job application, you confirm that you have read and agree to our Candidate Privacy Notice .

Software Engineering & Development: Development of software using the C++ language. About Us We’re a global, team of innovators. We turn organizations into data-driven leaders that can make a positive impact on their industries and society. If you believe that innovation can bring a better tomorrow closer to today, this is the place for you. We want you to be you, with all the ideas, lived experience, and fresh perspective that brings. We’re always looking for new ways of working that bring out our best, which leads to unexpected ideas. So here, you’ll experience a sense of belonging, and discover autonomy, freedom, and ownership as you work alongside talented people you enjoy sharing knowledge with. We’re proud to say we’re an equal opportunity employer and welcome all applicants for employment without attention to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, age, disability status or any other protected characteristic. Title: FPT Centre for Applied Data Science - Data & AI Professionals

CADS (Centre for Applied Data Science) is FPT's leading hub for applied data science, and we're rapidly expanding our team of talented professionals! We are constantly seeking highly motivated and skilled individuals across various data-centric roles to contribute to our exciting projects and push the boundaries of what's possible with data. If you're a Senior Expert in Data Scientist , AI Engineer, Data Engineer or Data Analyst, or looking for your next challenge, we want to hear from you! Why CADS? Cutting-Edge Technology: Get hands-on with the latest tools, technologies, and methodologies in AI, machine learning, big data, and analytics. Excellent problem-solving and communication skills. How to Express Your Interest: Even if you don't see a specific opening that perfectly matches your profile right now, we encourage you to connect with us! We are always on the lookout for exceptional talent. Send us your CV and a brief cover letter (optional) outlining your interests, experience, and what you're looking for in your next role. Connect with our Talent Acquisition team on LinkedIn to stay updated on future opportunities. Join CADS and be a part of FPT's exciting journey in shaping the future with data! #AIEngineer #DataEngineer #DataAnalyst #DataScientist #DataScience #MachineLearning #BigData #Analytics #FPT #CADS #Hiring #CareerOpportunities #FPT #Happyworkplace

Title: Technical Support Engineer
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: VMware, Active Directory, English, Microsoft, Troubleshooting
Description: About the job About the job Overall job purpose: Deliver basic technical support for Data Center and Enterprise level infrastructure, including, but not limited to: virtualization (VMware and Hyper-V) , Email service, Active Directory , Anti-Virus, patching tasks, etc. Liaise with other team and follow the processes to complete assigned task on time. Manage incidents and Problem Investigation ensure they will be resolved within SLA Raise and follow up Infrastructure Change Request. Join CAB meetings and represent proposed change…. Review, follow up, and implement requested tasks. Main duties of job: Monitoring and maintaining Infrastructure environments to agreed service levels Managing incidents and problems appropriately within agreed service levels Creating and performing authorized changes to customer environments, attending CABs where necessary Perform root cause analysis on reoccurring incidents Ensure technical documentation is completed and updated to professional standards Scheduled maintenance and patching of Infrastructure environments as necessary Contribute to the continuous improvement programs of all technology platforms across the datacenter Call logging and escalation with third party vendors (such as Microsoft, VMware, Mimecast or Citrix) Contributing to delivering team performance Adhere to all company policies and processes as communicated by line management in accordance with corporate ISO accreditation levels Troubleshooting infrastructure related technologies for Data center customers May be required to occasionally to fill in single shifts on managed services shift roster Skills, Knowledge & Experience: Essential requirements: Able to work as a member of a team but also manage up, across and down where required Ability to troubleshoot technical problems and incidents Ability to use the Service Desk tool to manage incidents/changes/problems tickets Good English communications skills , both oral and written. Ideally, experience of working for an international company with travel to and from Vietnam Basic technical knowledge of virtualization technologies (VMware, Hyper-V) Basic technical Knowledge and hands on experience in the below technologies or variants of in an enterprise level support environment: Microsoft server products Microsoft Active Directory and integrated elements/technologies such as DNS, GPO, DHCP, AD DS Anti-Virus solutions with key products being McAfee Good English communication 🌟 Why Join SCC Vietnam? Competitive salary & performance-based bonus Comprehensive healthcare & family coverage Annual leave, sick leave, and health checkups International UK/French working environment Company trips, team events & year-end parties Travel insurance & onsite opportunities

Title: FULLSTACK AI/CV ENGINEER
Salary: Competitive monthly salary with project-performance-based bonuses
Skills: AI, ReactJS, VueJS, FastAPI, Docker
Description: About the job Company Description TNI Tech (https://www.tnitech.co) is a leading AI-camera software solution provider in Vietnam. Our mission is to transform traditional CCTV systems into smart, AI-powered solutions that enable real-time responses and reduce repetitive tasks. With our slogan "Vision Beyond Limits," we are expanding our impact across Vietnam and into the global markets of APAC. As a Fullstack AI Engineer at TNI Tech, you'll have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge AI camera solutions that revolutionize industries such as retail, transportation, and security. Role Description Work as a fullstack engineer: model training, model serving, backend, database, frontend. Collaborate with the engineering team to design, develop, and deploy AI-powered camera software. Work on video analytics, image processing, and real-time data integration for smart camera systems. Assist in optimizing AI models for performance on edge devices and cloud environments. Participate in debugging, troubleshooting, and improving system performance. Contribute to testing and deployment pipelines for AI-powered solutions. Document development processes and provide regular progress updates to the team. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in IT, Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or related fields. Proficiency in English reading and writing (technical documents). English certificate: at least 700 TOEIC or equivalent. At least 3 years working in Software development, AI, and Computer Vision fields. Familiarity with relational database , know how to design and implement linked database tables. Familiarity with backend API frameworks like Fast API. Familiarity with model-optimized inference frameworks like ONNX, TensorRT, and OpenVINO. Familiarity with Docker and Docker Compose. Familiarity with Frontend frameworks like ReactJS, VueJS, or NextJS. Experience with video processing frameworks like FFmpeg or GStreamer. Experience in complex and microservice backend systems. Experience with deployment to Cloud, Mobile (Android, IOS), or Embedded devices (Raspberry, Jetson). What we offer Competitive monthly salary with project-performance-based bonuses. Social, health, and unemployment insurance. 14 paid leave days per year. Immediate involvement in real projects. Direct mentorship from technically skilled supervisors. Work with overseas customers and chances to go abroad for short business trips. An open environment to work, learn new technologies, and build your experience. Workplace Location: TNI Building, No. 22, 8B Street, An Phu Ward, Thu Duc City, HCMC. Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8 am to 5 pm (lunch from 12 pm to 1 pm). Application method Send your CVs to the email address job@tnitech.co Join us at TNI Tech and be part of a team that’s sharpening the future of AI cameras!

Title: Software Engineering Specialist - Human Data
Skills: Python, JavaScript, Java, SQL, English
Description: About the job About xAI xAI's mission is to create AI systems that can accurately understand the universe and aid humanity in its pursuit of knowledge. Our team is small, highly motivated, and focused on engineering excellence. This organization is for individuals who appreciate challenging themselves and thrive on curiosity. We operate with a flat organizational structure. All employees are expected to be hands-on and to contribute directly to the company's mission. Leadership is given to those who show initiative and consistently deliver excellence. Work ethic and strong prioritization skills are important. All engineers and researchers are expected to have strong communication skills. They should be able to concisely and accurately share knowledge with their teammates. About the Role As a Software Engineering Specialist on the Human Data team, you will be responsible for creating cutting-edge data to facilitate the training of large language models. Collaborating closely with technical staff, you will contribute to datasets for model training, benchmarking, and overall advancement. The Software Engineering Specialist - Human Data role is a full-time remote position. Part-time may be offered on a case-by-case basis but full-time is strongly preferred (please see the bottom of this job description for more details). Responsibilities AI model training initiatives by curating code examples, offering precise solutions, and meticulous corrections in Python, JavaScript (including ReactJS), C/C++, and Java. Evaluate and refine AI-generated code, ensuring it adheres to industry standards for efficiency, scalability, and reliability. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to enhance AI-driven coding solutions, ensuring they meet enterprise-level quality and performance benchmarks. Key Qualifications Advanced proficiency in English, both verbal and written. Strong experience in either Python or JavaScript, with a solid foundation in software development practices. Please note that for those with experience in only JavaScript, experience with ReactJS is preferred but not required. Knowledge of other languages is a strong plus.Strong grasp of computer science fundamentals like data structures, algorithms, and debugging skills. A minimum of 2 years of hands-on industry experience with a proven track record in software development and/or public proof of work (such as on GitHub). Extensive experience with a wide array of tools and systems such as Databases, SQL, Kubernetes, Spark, Kafka, gRPC, and AWS. Preferred Qualifications The ideal candidate for this role is adaptable, possesses strong logical reasoning skills, is detail-oriented, and thrives in a fast-paced work environment. Evidence of meaningful contributions to open source projects or high reputation on platforms like Stack Overflow or evidence of strong performance in programming competitions. Enthusiasm to collaboratively build the best truth-seeking AI out there! Additional Requirements Demonstrates a strong capacity to quickly adapt by learning new skills and unlearning outdated ones, thriving in dynamic and changing environments. For those who will be working from a personal device, please note your computer must be capable of running Windows 10 or macOS BigSur 11.0 or later. Location, Hourly, and Other Expectations This position is fully remote. We are unable to provide visa sponsorship. If you are based in the US, please note we are unable to hire in the states of Wyoming and Illinois at this time. You must own and have reliable access to a smartphone. Please indicate your interest in either full-time, part-time, or either in the application. Note that: Full-Time (40 hours per week): Full-time schedules are 9-5:30pm in your local time zone. The first week will be 9-5:30pm PST for onboarding. Part-Time (20-29 hours per week): While hours are flexible around your schedule, you must be committed to working at least 20 hours per week (with at least 10 of these hours worked on weekdays) and no more than 29 hours per week. Compensation and Benefits The pay for this role may range from $55/hour - $65/hour. Your actual pay will be determined on a case-by-case basis and may vary based on the following considerations: job-related knowledge and skills, education, and experience. For full-time roles, specific benefits vary by country, depending on your country of residence you may have access to medical benefits. We do not offer benefits for part-time roles. xAI is an equal opportunity employer and does not unlawfully discriminate based on race, color, religion, ethnicity, ancestry, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age, disability, medical conditions, genetic information, marital status, military or veteran status, or any other applicable legally protected characteristics. Qualified applicants with arrest or conviction records will be considered for employment in accordance with all applicable federal, state, and local laws, including the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, Los Angeles County Fair Chance Ordinance for Employers, and the California Fair Chance Act. For Los Angeles County (unincorporated) Candidates: xAI reasonably believes that criminal history may have a direct, adverse and negative relationship on the following job duties, potentially resulting in the withdrawal of a conditional offer of employment: Access to information technology systems and confidential information, including proprietary and trade secret information, and/or user data; Interacting with internal and/or external clients and colleagues; and Exercising sound judgment. California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) Notice

Title: AI Engineer
Skills: AI, Computer Vision, Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow
Description: About the job AI engineer 📌 Vị trí: Kỹ sư AI (Computer Vision – Object Detection)📍 Địa điểm: Tòa nhà Handico, Đường Phạm Hùng, Quận Nam Từ Liêm, Hà Nội⏰ Hình thức: Toàn thời gian (Thứ Hai – Thứ Sáu, 8h30 – 17h30)🧠 Kinh nghiệm: Khoảng 2.5 – 3 năm💬 Tiếng Anh: Giao tiếp tốt qua chat🌐 Khách hàng: Hàn Quốc Responsibility: Nghiên cứu và Phát triển: Nghiên cứu và áp dụng YOLO cho bài toán nhận dạng đối tượng, tập trung vào khói. Huấn luyện và Tối ưu hóa Mô hình: Huấn luyện các mô hình YOLO, tinh chỉnh siêu tham số (hyperparameters), và áp dụng các kỹ thuật tối ưu hóa để cải thiện độ chính xác Triển khai: Hỗ trợ triển khai các mô hình AI vào môi trường sản phẩm thực tế, đảm bảo hiệu suất và độ ổn định. Xử lý Dữ liệu: Thu thập, làm sạch, gán nhãn và tiền xử lý các tập dữ liệu hình ảnh và video chất lượng cao cho việc huấn luyện mô hình. Khả năng thu thập, gán nhãn và quản lý các tập dữ liệu lớn một cách hiệu quả. Object Detection (Phát hiện đối tượng): Kinh nghiệm thực tế với các kiến trúc phát hiện đối tượng, đặc biệt là YOLO . Hiểu rõ ưu nhược điểm và cách tối ưu hóa các mô hình này. Huấn luyện Mô hình: Kinh nghiệm huấn luyện, debug và tối ưu hóa các mô hình học sâu trên GPU. Requirement : Tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực AI engineer Thành thạo Python và các thư viện như PyTorch hoặc TensorFlow Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các mô hình YOLO (YOLOv5, YOLOv8, v.v.) Nắm vững quy trình huấn luyện mô hình, xử lý dữ liệu, và debug trên GPU Kỹ năng xử lý và quản lý tập dữ liệu lớn, bao gồm labeling, augmentation Giao tiếp tiếng Anh tốt qua chat, có thể đọc hiểu tài liệu kỹ thuật Quyền lợi Mức lương 25-35M gross (Level middle) HD contractor 3 - 6 tháng Phỏng vấn 1 vòng với client Hàn Quốc Ưu tiên có thể làm việc độc lập Thời gian làm việc: 8h30 -17h30 – Thứ Hai đến Thứ Sáu. (ca làm việc linh hoạt 8h-17h hoặc 9h - 18h) Địa chỉ: Handico, Mễ Trì, Nam Từ Liêm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam Thông tin liên hệ: - Email gửi CV: thoatran.work@gmail.com - SĐT/Zalo: 0966 870 964 ( thoatran)

Title: English to Vietnamese Translator

You will have conversations in both Vietnamese and English with chatbots in order to measure their progress, as well as write novel conversations in order to teach them what to say. Benefits: This is a full-time or part-time REMOTE position You’ll be able to choose which projects you want to work on You can work on your own schedule Projects are paid hourly, starting at $20+ USD per hour, with bonuses for high-quality and high-volume work Responsibilities (both in Vietnamese and English): Come up with diverse conversations over a range of topics Write high-quality answers when given specific prompts Compare the performance of different AI models Research and fact-check AI responses Qualifications: Fluent in Vietnamese + English A bachelor's degree (completed or in progress) Excellent writing and grammar skills Strong research and fact-checking skills to ensure accuracy and originality Note: Payment is made via PayPal. We will never ask for any money from you. PayPal will handle any currency conversions from USD.

Title: AI Engineer
Skills: Python, AI, LLM, Prompt Engineering, English
Description: About the job Verysell AI is an AI adviser and solution provider operated as part of the Verysell Group of companies. With a team of 25 professionals across sales, delivery, and operations, including 13 skilled AI/ML engineers, we have been delivering impactful AI solutions for almost 2 years both internally to the group companies and to external clients. As an NVIDIA AI Consulting Partner, we leverage NVIDIA technologies to deliver high-performance AI solutions. We also support sales of SmartDev – a Vietnam-based ITO company with over 5 million USD turnover as an AI competence and delivery center. Applied AI Lab's commercial team, located in London, is focused on the European market. If you are eager to learn, work on real-world AI projects, and be mentored by top AI experts, this is your chance! Overview We are hiring an AI Engineer to join our applied AI team focused on Large Language Models (LLMs), chatbots, and intelligent agents. You will be responsible for implementing AI workflows under the guidance of tech leads, contributing to commercial projects involving agentic systems, goal-oriented dialogue, and prompt engineering. Responsibilities: Follow and implement AI solutions as defined by technical leadership. Develop agent workflows and LLM/prompting systems for conversational and goal-directed behavior. Integrate LLM/agent services into production environments. Monitor system performance and reliability. Contribute to client-facing commercial AI projects and be a good team player. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, AI/ML, or a related field. At least 3 years of experience in AI Engineering Strong proficiency in Python. Practical experience with PyTorch, LangChain, LangGraph, or similar frameworks. Solid understanding of LLMs, and agentic design. Experience working with LLMs, prompt engineering, RAG pipelines and vector databases. A good teamplayer and problem solver. Preferred qualifications: Strong command of English (verbal and written). 5+ years of experience in NLP/CV. Familiarity with Vision-Language Models (VLMs). Experience with serving local LLMs and LLM fine-tuning techniques. Backend development skills including: FastAPI, SQL/NoSQL, Docker, Git, AWS. Benefits 20 annual leave days Premium Health Care MIC Cutting-edge technologies methodology/Agile development Great activities (Team Building, Company Trip, Weekly Happy Friday, …) Work with high-profile multinational companies Hybrid working policy

Title: Fresher/ Junior Business Analyst
Skills: Business Analysis, SQL, UI-UX, UML, English
Description: About the job Job summary: - The IT Business Analyst is responsible for implementing and continuously improving business processes and performance for projects and platforms as assigned. - Proactively work with stakeholders to define, analyze, and document enhancement requirements and identify opportunities for new/improved processes. - Become a trusted partner in the relationships with internal clients. - Depending on the scope, assume project management and business analyst roles on project engagements as needed, as agreed upon with the IT Team Leader. - Manages or participates in multiple projects at one time. Shows leadership in ensuring alignment of business processes and technology. Core responsibilities: - Report directly to the supervisor(s) and project manager if required. - Responsible for working closely with client/product owner to clear up the business requirements; - Analyze and provide a solution. - Advise the client if requirements don't make sense, and provide suggestions and short-term/long-term solutions. - Design the application mock-up/wireframe. - Conduct a meeting with business analysts and users to clarify requirements. - Be responsible for writing documents on user requirements, functional specifications, etc. - Define the quality attributes, external interfaces, constraints, and other non-functional requirements - Participate in peer reviews of work products derived from requirements specifications to ensure the requirements are correctly understood. - Serve as an internal point of contact for the development team whenever requirements need to be clarified. - Work closely with the IT development team and third parties to design, validate, and manage the implementation solutions to requirements. - Support in testing and verifying bugs/issues with Customers. - Provide guidance and training services for employees to use the new application. Job Requirement - For Junior: At least 2 years of work experience in the IT Business Analyst role. - Proficient in English communication, writing, and reading skills. - Bachelor of IT software or Information Systems or Business. - Work on at least one project in full SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle). - Have profound knowledge of the software development process, especially software requirement analysis. - Have experience working with some databases (SQL/ MySQL/ Oracle), basic queries, database concepts, data modeling, etc. - Good skills at using tools such as Draw.io, Visio, Balsamiq, and Figma for business drawing, flows, diagrams, creating mockups, etc. - Gain experience in UML design. - Have basic knowledge of UI/UX. - Proficient in using Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. - Good organizational and analytical skills. - Good presentation and client relationship skills. Can Tho office: Working place: 11B Hoa Binh Avenue, Ninh Kieu ward, Can Tho City Working time: From Monday to Friday, 08h00 - 17h00

Title: Python Developer - Odoo
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Python, Odoo, REST API, SQL, English
Description: About the job This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More Trách Nhiệm Phát triển và tối ưu hóa các module nội bộ sử dụng ngôn ngữ Python. Tham gia học và làm quen với kiến trúc Odoo, ORM và quy trình tích hợp hệ thống. Phối hợp với team để thu thập yêu cầu, phân tích quy trình nghiệp vụ, từ đó triển khai module tương ứng trên Odoo. Hỗ trợ tích hợp hệ thống với các dịch vụ bên ngoài thông qua API. Viết code sạch, rõ ràng, dễ bảo trì và có unit test. Tham gia bảo trì, sửa lỗi và tối ưu hiệu suất hệ thống hiện có. Yêu Cầu Có bằng ĐẠI HỌC chính quy về Công nghệ thông tin. Sử dụng tiếng anh cơ bản 4 kỹ năng, đặc biệt là đọc, viết. Có 1–3 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc với Python (backend, data hoặc automation). Có hiểu biết cơ bản hoặc kinh nghiệm làm việc với RESTful API, SQL, Git. Có tư duy logic, kỹ năng phân tích và khả năng đọc hiểu quy trình nghiệp vụ. Có tinh thần học hỏi, sẵn sàng tìm hiểu sâu về Odoo ERP và các nghiệp vụ như Sales, Kế toán, Kho vận, Nhân sự... Giao tiếp tốt, có khả năng làm việc nhóm và chủ động trong công việc. Điểm cộng (không bắt buộc): Đã từng làm việc hoặc tìm hiểu về Odoo. Biết sử dụng XML, PostgreSQL, hoặc có kiến thức về MVC framework. Biết thêm JavaScript, HTML/CSS (để hỗ trợ chỉnh sửa giao diện Odoo). Có kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực ERP, CRM hoặc hệ thống nghiệp vụ nội bộ. Quyền Lợi Được tham gia đầy đủ bảo hiểm xã hội và bảo hiểm thất nghiệp theo quy định của Luật Lao động Việt Nam; có thêm bảo hiểm Bảo Việt. Nghỉ phép hằng năm theo đúng quy định của pháp luật. Thưởng tháng 13 và xét tăng lương định kỳ hằng năm. Thưởng vào các dịp lễ, Tết. Hoạt động team-building hàng tháng. Cơ hội phát triển kỹ năng thông qua các khóa học e-learning, hội thảo và chương trình đào tạo khác. Các tiện ích tại văn phòng: trái cây, trà, cà phê, quà sinh nhật, tủ sách... Phòng giải trí với máy chơi game PlayStation 5 tại văn phòng. Desired Skills and Experience English Language, Odoo, REST API

Title: Freelance Software Developer (Python Engineer) - AI Trainer
Skills: Python, CI/CD, LLM, AI, English
Description: About the job This opportunity is only for candidates currently residing in the specified country. Your location may affect eligibility and rates. At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI. What We Do The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe. About The Role We are looking for an experienced Python developer who enjoys building tools, environments, and infrastructure for working with LLM-based agents. You'll help create sandboxes, task systems, and CI/CD pipelines to support testing and development of AI agents. You'll also work closely with researchers and domain experts, helping them set up and use these tools effectively. Although every project is unique, you might typically: Sandboxes for running and testing AI agents safely Tools for writing tasks and test cases for agents CI/CD pipelines to run checks and evaluate agents Dev environments for experts creating these tasks Repo templates and scripts to help new contributors Interfaces for tracking task input and agent results Example Tasks How To Get Started Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone. Requirements You have a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Software Development, Computer Science, or other related fields. You have 5+ years of experience writing Python code Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge Benefits Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you? Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments. Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio. Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

Title: Engineering Specialist – AI Trainer
Skills: AI, Software Engineering, Prompt Engineering, Data Analysis, English
Description: About the job Are you an engineering expert eager to shape the future of AI? Large‑scale language models are evolving from clever chatbots into powerful engines of scientific discovery. With high‑quality training data, tomorrow’s AI can democratize world‑class education, keep pace with cutting‑edge research, and streamline engineering design and analysis for professionals everywhere. That training data begins with you—we need your expertise to help power the next generation of AI. We’re looking for engineering specialists who live and breathe mechanical engineering, civil engineering, electrical engineering, aerospace engineering, chemical engineering, software engineering, industrial engineering, systems engineering, structural engineering, and materials science. You’ll challenge advanced language models on topics like thermodynamics, fluid dynamics, structural integrity, control systems, robotics, circuit design, heat transfer, material properties, process optimization, and engineering simulations—documenting every failure mode so we can harden model reasoning. On a typical day, you will converse with the model on real-world engineering scenarios, verify factual accuracy and logical soundness, capture reproducible error traces, and suggest improvements to our prompt engineering and evaluation metrics. A master’s or PhD in engineering or a closely related engineering field is ideal; peer‑reviewed publications, industry experience, or hands-on engineering projects signal fit. Clear, metacognitive communication—“showing your work”—is essential. Ready to turn your engineering expertise into the knowledge base for tomorrow’s AI? Apply today and start teaching the model that will teach the world. We offer a pay range of $8-to- $65 per hour, with the exact rate determined after evaluating your experience, expertise, and geographic location. Final offer amounts may vary from the pay range listed above. As a contractor, you’ll supply a secure computer and high‑speed internet; company‑sponsored benefits such as health insurance and PTO do not apply. Job title: Engineering Science Specialist – AI Trainer Employment type: Contract Workplace type: Remote Seniority level: Mid‑Senior Level

Title: PYTHON ENGINEER

Experience with version control (Git). Title: DevOps Engineer

Position Description As a critical role in Science’s success, we are looking for DevOps Engineers to join our team. Devops engineers are expected to build, scale, optimize and deploy highly complex system architecture. The position is the backbone of our product development. This is an exciting opportunity for those who enjoy R&D and be challenged and grow in the field of AI-First software / product development. Along the way this role will contribute to game-changing products for the multi-trillion-dollar industry. Responsibilities and Performance Objectives: Contribute to developing continuous delivery, automation and build pipelines to create an excellent experience for developers and customers Identify and develop opportunities to improve our processes and tools for automation Explore new technical trends, continuously improve current workflows for a more flexible, stable and scalable system Monitoring & Logging: Complete our monitoring and alerting systems Skills and Experience Required +3 years of experience with Linux, CentOS and Windows operating systems +3 years of experience with Containers and Container orchestration platforms such as Docker/Kubernetes/Openshift +3 years of experience in implementing CI/CD pipelines using tools such as CircleCI, GitHub Actions, Jenkins. Strong experience with cloud based environments like AWS, Azure, GCP, good understanding of Cloud-native applications. Understanding of Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, …). Strong experience in setup monitoring/observation systems using some tools such as: Prometheus, Loki, Grafana, ELK, Newrelic. Having experience on AI applications is a big plus. Why you'll love working here: Visible Impact: We have a track record of partnering with 100+ businesses in Japan and providing practical solutions in Insurance, Manufacturing & Logistic industries. Flexible & Inclusive Culture: Hybrid working environment lets you tailor your schedule to suit your lifestyle while nurturing an inclusive atmosphere for collaboration. Attractive Package: We offer a highly competitive salary range that reflects your skills and experience. Salary review twice annually. A wide range of well-being promotion initiatives for your work-life balance. Our Cinnamon Values #Collaboration with Humanity: We prioritize “The happiness of interacting with people” throughout the entire organization, going beyond ‘Transactional Interaction’ and strive for the ultimate comfort in collaboration with others. This makes our workplace become the driving force towards achieving high goals. #Impact at Scale : By keeping technical scalability at core of our innovation, we do not stop at “Making things slightly better”. We aim to “Create huge impacts” by transforming large companies’ operations with versatile and scalable technology. #Ultimate Value for Partners: By understanding partners’ unique needs, complex challenges, and ambitious vision, we go beyond fulfilling contractual obligations to exceed expectations, co-creating solutions that deliver true sustainable value for their long-term growth. **For more information Website: https://cinnamon.ai/ Facebook Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/cinnamonai/ Privacy Notice: When sending your job application to us, you are acknowledging that you have read, understood, and fully agreed with Cinnamon Lab’s Privacy Policy and Privacy Notice for Applicants . By doing so, you are allowing us to collect, store, use, and transfer the personal data received from you to the extent it is necessary and following the applicable law.

Title: Quality Control Fresher / Junior
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Software testing, Jira, Selenium, Playwright, English
Description: About the job About Kegmil Kegmil is revolutionizing the way mission-critical assets are repaired and maintained – by transforming complex systems of people and processes into streamlined, intelligent operations. Our mission is to empower millions of deskless field service professionals across Asia’s asset-centric industries with superior technology to elevate service excellence, operational insight, and profitable growth. Our cloud-based, mobile-first, and AI-powered platform automates and optimizes every aspect of field service from job scheduling and dispatch to execution and reporting. Kegmil is trusted by leading organizations across mission-critical sectors – including elevator, fire protection, data center, medical equipment, and aerospace – to build the next-generation digital backbone that unifies FSM, modular ERP, and AI agents into one seamless platform for simpler, smarter, field service. We are a curious and collaborative team that finds purpose in solving real problems for our customers. We learn and grow together in a high-trust, inclusive culture – where ideas are heard, ownership is encouraged, and customer success is everyone’s priority. Job Type: Full-time Responsibilities Learn to Assess and Support Product Quality Support the assessment of product quality across the development lifecycle. Learn to identify gaps or issues in testing processes, and contribute ideas to improve them. Participate in efforts to ensure consistent delivery of high-quality software. Collaborate on Quality from Day One Work alongside the product and development team to understand new features, suggest edge cases, and ensure quality from the planning stage. Assist in writing and maintaining test plans, test cases, and test scripts. Help identify which test cases could be automated in future phases. Support Testing Activities Contribute to the execution of manual and (eventually) automated test cases. Learn to perform different types of testing like regression, smoke testing, and exploratory testing under the guidance of QA leads. Assist in setting up and running automated tests (training provided). Participate in Bug and Incident Handling Help review and reproduce bugs reported by users or QA Collaborate with teammates and stakeholders to gather information and align on next steps. Learn how to document and manage bugs using internal tools (e.g. Jira). Be Part of the Team Actively join team activities such as daily standups, sprint planning, refinements and retrospectives. Bring curiosity, questions, and a willingness to learn from others on the team. Requirements Are a final-year student or recent graduate in Computer Science, IT, or related fields. Are curious about how software works and love breaking things (in a good way). Have basic knowledge of software testing, especially in testing techniques and test methodologies Have basic knowledge of software testing tools (e.g., Playwrite, Postman, Appium, Selenium) – or are eager to learn. Skill in programming in some following Javascript, Typescript are a plus Team Collaboration: Ability to work effectively within a team and contribute to a collaborative environment. Critical Thinking: analyzing the issue, features and use case Have a growth mindset and enjoy solving problems. Communicate clearly in both English and Vietnamese. What We Offer Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package. Dynamic and innovative work environment with opportunities for personal and professional growth. Access to cutting-edge tools and technologies.

Title: Language Data and Quality Reviewer for Vietnamese (Freelance/Task-based)
Skills: Data Analysis, Quality Assurance, English, AI, Vietnamese
Description: About the job Job description Volga Partners, a U.S.-based company, specializes in Artificial Intelligence and machine learning, catering to top technology giants and multinational corporations. Beyond that, we offer a spectrum of services including IT, business process outsourcing, advanced professional services, and crowd sourcing in both established and emerging markets. Our client is seeking candidates interested in Freelance/Task-based work for an ongoing project. The hours will align with the IST time zone. PLEASE REVIEW THE MANDATORY REQUIREMENT BEFORE APPLYING: Must be able to read and write in Vietnamese AND English. Must be comfortable and understand this is a task-based role. Task-Based Project Scope: This is a freelance, task-based role designed for those seeking supplemental income. It’s essential to understand the nature of freelance work—tasks will be assigned as they become available, and work may be irregular or intermittent. Notifications will be sent via WhatsApp, email, or Slack (after onboarding through the client’s portal). All tasks are offered on a first-come, first-served basis, making this role ideal for individuals who are comfortable with flexible, on-demand work. Mandatory Requirements: Must have reliable high-speed internet and a functioning device (laptop, desktop, etc.) to ensure seamless communication and productivity. Urgency : Due to the nature of the role, it is essential that all candidates have these resources in place from day one to avoid any delays in onboarding or task completion. POSITION We are looking for a Language Data and Quality Reviewer with proficiency in Vietnamese language to join our team. This role is critical in researching and analyzing data for various entities, tools, and datasets that will be introduced through on-the-job training. The ideal candidate should have a background in technology, with strong logical and analytical skills to assess data and provide valuable insights. While prior experience in similar roles is beneficial, we encourage candidates with some experience in data analysis, quality assurance, or related fields to apply, especially those looking to grow their skills in a global, dynamic work environment. Key Responsibilities: Data Interpretation: Analyze datasets, translating raw data into actionable insights that can support business improvement strategies. Quality Assurance: Oversee the quality of training data, identify issues or anomalies, and implement corrective measures to maintain data integrity. Language Translations: Provide translations and contextual understanding where necessary to ensure data is aligned with language and cultural nuances. Recommendations: Offer suggestions aimed at improving business processes and outcomes based on your data analysis. Desired Qualifications: Some experience in data labeling, manipulation, or quality assurance, particularly in technology or related fields. A proactive attitude towards continuous improvement, staying updated with new advancements in AI technologies and data analysis techniques. Logical and analytical skills to ensure data accuracy and support project goals. This is a freelancer role, designed for those who are looking for supplemental income. The project does not have a specific end date, as work availability is sporadic and varies. It's important to understand that the work may be sporadic and not always consistent. Tasks will be uploaded as they become available, and you’ll be notified via WhatsApp, email, or Slack (once onboarded through client’s portal). Work is offered on a first-come, first-served basis, so while it’s an excellent opportunity to earn additional income, it’s best suited for individuals who are flexible and can manage sporadic work availability. Required Skills: Proficient in both Vietnamese and English Language Excellent logical reasoning and analytical skills, with the ability to interpret complex datasets and derive meaningful insights. Experience with data labeling and manipulation techniques, ensuring accuracy and reliability in data processing. Strong attention to detail and a proactive approach to identifying and addressing data quality issues. Required Qualifications: Proficiency (reading, writing, and/or speaking) in both English and Vietnamese language. Strong computer skills, particularly in typing and writing. Meticulous attention to detail. Proactive attitude with a commitment to fostering positive experiences for others. If you are certified as a Linguist, it is considered a plus! Interview Process: Submissions are reviewed by a recruiter. Selected candidates will be invited to complete an Applicant Response Form and may be invited to a first and final interview. Please read the additional requirements thoroughly before applying: Must have own device (laptop/device). Currently hiring for Freelance/Task-based (Ranging from 0 to 20 hours a week!) The candidate must be available in IST. (Preferred 8am IST onwards). Having access to good Wi-Fi connection during working hours. This role is a 1099 independent contractor position. Please note that this classification may vary based on your location and local regulations. We encourage applicants outside of the US to familiarize themselves with their country's tax laws and regulations regarding independent contracting. For most candidates outside of the US, a W-8 BEN form is provided. Onboarding & Compliance Requirements: All global contractors will be onboarded through our platform, Deel.com, to ensure alignment with international compliance standards. Successful completion of onboarding is required to begin work, which includes submitting the necessary documentation within the specified timeline. Candidates should be prepared to provide accurate and compliant documents according to the requirements of their region. Compensation : USD $3 - $4 per hour This is an exciting opportunity for a remote freelance position! Please kindly note that hours are dependent on the volume of tasks given by the client. Perfect for a supplemental income opportunity. We look forward to receiving your application!

Title: Business Analyst
Skills: Business Analysis, Functional specifications, Jira, Scrum, English
Description: About the job Should have 6+ Yrs of experience as a Business Analyst. Acting as a liaison between Software and various other functions. Should be proficient in writing detailed functional requirements documents, business requirements documents, and Data Flow Diagrams for various business processes. Applicant must have cross-functional knowledge in operations of HR and take end-to-end responsibility of business process flows and translate them into functional specifications documents for the software team. Ability to interact with Clients/ stakeholders and users to gather all the requirements, understanding why the requirements are made, do the feasibility study and formulating that to the Software team. Getting the timeline and post completion of development work with the developers ensuring the developed product is as per the gathered requirement and help users with the acceptance testing. Documenting the requirements and extend existing operational documentation and in case of any changes in the business process, the change should be maintained, approved & documented. Ability to keep track of all changes and maintain the versions of various documents in case any change occurs to any pre-documented processes. To make sure deliverables are of the highest quality, matching with the requirements provided, and yielding the output which was expected at the time of requirement gathering. Good written, verbal communication skills, strong analytical ability, and good interpersonal skills Strong experience in requirement gathering, FRD, BRD, Wireframes, drafting of User Stories and Acceptance Criteria with different scenarios. Domain Knowledge of HRMS is a must. Should be able to prepare functional specifications with User stories with Acceptance Criteria, use cases for development and explain the same to developers. Knowledge of Tools like MS Visio and Team foundation Server (TFS) or JIRA, would be an added advantage. SCRUM methodology is added advantage

Title: DevOps / CloudOps (HN/HCM)
Skills: AWS, DevOps, CI/CD, ITIL Foundation, English
Description: About the job About the Role We are seeking a skilled DevOps / CloudOps Engineer with a solid understanding of cloud infrastructure and system reliability practices. In this role, you will be responsible for maintaining and optimizing the availability, performance, and scalability of our systems and services. Responsibilities Design, build, and maintain scalable and highly available systems on AWS. Implement and manage service-level objectives (SLOs) and service-level agreements (SLAs) to ensure system reliability. Improve observability through effective logging, metrics collection, and tracing. Establish and refine incident management processes aligned with industry standards (e.g., ITIL, NIST). Collaborate with development, QA, and infrastructure teams to drive system improvements. Participate in on-call rotations and help ensure quick incident resolution. Requirements 3 years of experience DevOps / CloudOps Good in English and good communicate with client Hands-on experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS), CI/CD Familiarity with key reliability concepts such as SLA, SLO, and observability. Strong understanding of high availability architecture, system redundancy, and incident response frameworks (e.g., ITIL, NIST). Solid troubleshooting and root-cause analysis skills. Preferred Qualifications (Optional) Experience in scripting or automation (e.g., Python, Bash, Terraform). Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure-as-code tools. AWS or ITIL certifications are a plus.
