Tham gia các dự án phần mềm của công ty & đối tác Triển khai công việc lập trình theo kế hoạch đã được phân công và đảm bảo hoàn thành đúng tiến độ và chất lượng yêu cầu Thời gian làm việc: T2 – T6, từ 8h30 – 17h30 YÊU CẦU Yêu cầu chuyên môn: thành thạo ngôn ngữ lập trình Java Yêu cầu về kỹ năng lập trình, có khả năng sử dụng một trong các nền tảng sau: Frontend: Angular 6+, Backend: Một trong các Java-based framework sau: Spring Boot, Hibernate/MyBatis, JPA.. DB: MySQL/Oracle Sử dụng thành thạo các tool: Intellij, SQL developer/ PLSQL, Git Hiểu biết hoặc đã làm việc về Elastic search, Redis là một lợi thế Hiểu biết hoặc đã làm việc với Docker là một lợi thế Kinh nghiệm: tối thiểu 1 năm lập trình các nền tảng nêu trên QUYỀN LỢI Mức thu nhập cạnh tranh 12 – 20M, deal theo năng lực Tháng lương thứ 13, Review lương 2 lần/ năm tùy vào kết quả công việc. Thưởng lễ, tết, thưởng dự án Được hưởng đầy đủ 12 ngày nghỉ phép/năm theo quy định của nhà nước “NMS care” bảo hiểm dành riêng cho nhân viên NMS. Nghỉ mát: Theo chính sách của công ty (Tháng 5/6 hàng năm) Môi trường làm việc hiện đại, thân thiện, có nhiều cơ hội phát triển bản thân. Chính sách cho người lao động tuân theo “Bộ luật lao động” tại Việt Nam.

Title: Systems Architect (Hybrid/Fully Remote)
Skills: System Architecture, API, SQL, NoSQL, English
Description: About the job Please note: This position offers hybrid and fully remote work options. Expats are welcome to apply. Our Company – playSTUDIOS VIETNAM Come join an ambitious mobile entertainment company which committed to leveraging the best technology we can to create fun experiences. We have big plans and would be thrilled for you to consider us. playSTUDIOS Vietnam is a Vietnam subsidiary of the United States-based leading mobile & social games company playSTUDIOS Inc. We are backed by dominant, multi-billion-dollar market leaders in the leisure and video game industries and a collection of powerhouse venture capital firms. Our founding team has over a century of collective gaming experience. We are building a best-of-breed development and operations group and are looking for top-tier talent who can help us create and optimize high-quality games in the rapidly evolving social and mobile gaming markets. Our company has high growth rates, with an established company's stability and financial security. We guarantee high-quality work, AAA entertainment brand exposure, competitive compensation, and great benefits. We're thrilled to share: Our website and portfolio game: https://www.playstudios.com/ Our core game, let's try: https://www.myvegas.com/ Our Vietnam's Facebook page: https://bom.so/A6A5VO Our Vietnam's LinkedIn page: https://bom.so/04caqr RESPONSIBILITIES playSTUDIOS is seeking a Systems Architect to design and implement robust technical solutions that support our suite of web applications to ensure seamless integration with third-party games and apps. You will work closely with product managers, engineering teams, and other stakeholders to align business requirements with technical strategy, ensuring scalability, reliability, and performance of our systems. We have a deep passion for quality, and expect someone with a high personal bar. The Systems Architect will report to the Technical Director with duties including: Define and evolve the system architecture across backend services, internal platforms, and operational tooling. Work closely with engineering teams to ensure the architecture is translated effectively into development work Collaborate with internal teams and other architects to integrate systems across the organization Provide technical leadership and guidance to development teams in implementing the proposed architecture and solutions Stay up to date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices to continuously improve solutions. Contribute to the development of internal tooling and processes to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the development team. Evaluate new technologies and make recommendations to evolve and future-proof our systems. Identify potential risks and proactively propose mitigation strategies. QUALIFICATIONS 5+ years of experience in system architecture, with a proven track record in architecting web applications, tooling solutions, and integrations. Good command of English - written and spoken. Strong background in designing scalable, high-performance systems. Extensive experience with web technologies (e.g., Node.js, React, Angular, Python, Java, etc.). Familiarity with API design and integration (REST, GraphQL, SOAP, etc.). Expertise in database technologies (e.g., SQL, NoSQL, distributed databases). Strong understanding of microservices, containers, and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes, etc.). Experience with authentication, security protocols, and identity management (OAuth, JWT, etc.). Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and development practices (Git, Jenkins, etc.). Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Ability to collaborate in a fast-paced, cross-functional environment. Familiar and comfortable with agile methodologies Additional Notes You may be expected to complete a test as part of the interviewing procedure. BENEFITS AND PERKS Work directly with a global team of young and talented playMAKERS regardless of gender, age or experience. Unlimited growth opportunities and continuous improvement with English classes, workshops and other technical training courses by highly-skilled members from all over the world Bao Viet Premium healthcare coverage is 1.2 billion VND/person/year (including you and ALL your dependents). A company of fulfillment : 100 % salary on probation, 100% covered Social insurance, Health insurance and Unemployment insurance since probation. Moreover , Compulsory insurance for employees is also filled by the company. You only need to bear PIT. 13 months salary/year. Discretionary bonus. Employee referral bonus program (Very attractive bonus range: from 300USD to 1000USD). Flexible working time: 5 working days/ week - from Monday to Friday (Time won't be your fear, because productivity is what we care about). Annual leave: 15 days in 1st year, 17 days in 2nd year, and 20 days each year thereafter Sick leave: 5 days/year Delicious, fresh and free meals are served daily! High-end workstation laptop and screens (For Artist: optional Wacom Intuos Pro or Cintiq). Equipment Allowance: 4,500,000 VND to pick your keyboard/ mouse/ headphone... in your own style. Team building activities, staff trips, and company events across the year. Other benefits: Sickness, funeral: support up to 2,000,000 VND/person ; marriage, childbirth, and public holidays: up to 500,000 VND/person .

Leading skills to meet defined items & milestones Logical Thinking, problem solving GPA >= 3.0/4 Proficiency in using Proficiency in design software such as Figma, Adobe XD Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop and 3D tools like Maya, Blender; Experience in building themes and coding UI on Angular, React, Vue.js, MUI, and creating independent multi-theme systems; Familiarity with software development processes, and ability to assist in coding, testing, and debugging UI/UX components; Proficiency in front-end development technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript; Good English / JP communication is a plus About Us We’re a global, team of innovators. We turn organizations into data-driven leaders that can make a positive impact on their industries and society. So here, you’ll experience a sense of belonging, and discover autonomy, freedom, and ownership as you work alongside talented people you enjoy sharing knowledge with. Title: Quản lý ngành hàng, YouTube Shopping (tiếng Anh, tiếng Việt)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Business Analysis, Project Management, Stakeholder management, English, Market research
Description: About the job Please visit this Google Careers posting for the English-translated version of this role. Minimum qualifications: Bằng cử nhân hoặc kinh nghiệm thực tế tương đương. 4 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực phát triển kinh doanh, quan hệ đối tác, tư vấn quản lý hoặc ngân hàng đầu tư cho các ngành Điện tử tiêu dùng, Ô tô, Sản xuất thiết bị gốc (OEM), Viễn thông, Thương mại điện tử/Bán lẻ, Ứng dụng, Quảng cáo, Trò chơi hoặc Công nghệ. Kinh nghiệm làm việc với các quản lý cấp cao và phòng ban liên ngành ở mọi cấp quản lý. Kinh nghiệm quản lý các thoả thuận hoặc quan hệ đối tác. Khả năng giao tiếp lưu loát bằng cả tiếng Anh và tiếng Việt để hỗ trợ việc quản lý quan hệ khách hàng trong khu vực. Preferred qualifications: 3 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực thương mại điện tử, công ty tư vấn hoặc chiến lược Internet, nghiên cứu chuyên ngành hoặc nghiên cứu thị trường và phân tích kinh doanh kết hợp kinh nghiệm liên quan đến thương mại điện tử. Kiến thức về quản lý dự án và cộng tác liên ngành. Kỹ năng tư duy logic và giải quyết vấn đề xuất sắc, chú trọng từng chi tiết nhỏ. Kỹ năng giao tiếp xuất sắc nhằm soạn thảo và truyền đạt các điểm liên quan đến hợp đồng, kỹ thuật, tài chính và giá trị với đối tác và các nhóm nội bộ của Google. About The Job Google luôn nỗ lực phát triển các dòng sản phẩm và dịch vụ của mình. Nhóm Phát triển quan hệ đối tác có trách nhiệm tìm kiếm và khám phá cơ hội mới với các đối tác của Google. Với sự nhạy bén trong kinh doanh và kiến thức sâu rộng về sản phẩm, bạn sẽ là người trực tiếp làm việc với các đối tác của chúng tôi, giúp họ tìm ra cách tăng trưởng thông qua các dịch vụ và sản phẩm mới nhất của Google. Kiến thức của bạn về những lĩnh vực có liên quan và mối quan hệ với các bên chủ chốt trong ngành sẽ góp phần định hình các ứng dụng và nội dung chất lượng cao của chúng tôi cho các sản phẩm như YouTube, Google TV và Commerce. Tại YouTube, chúng tôi tin rằng mọi người đều xứng đáng được cất lên tiếng nói, và thế giới sẽ trở nên tốt đẹp hơn khi chúng ta lắng nghe, chia sẻ và xây dựng cộng đồng qua những câu chuyện của mình. Chúng tôi cùng nhau nỗ lực để mọi người đều có thể chia sẻ câu chuyện riêng, khám phá những điều họ yêu thích và kết nối với nhau trong quá trình này. Là nền tảng hội tụ cả công nghệ tiên tiến và sự sáng tạo không giới hạn, chúng tôi phát triển theo dòng chảy văn hoá với mục tiêu chung là giúp mọi người thấy thế giới. Chúng tôi cùng nhau khám phá những ý tưởng mới, giải quyết các vấn đề thực tiễn và tận hưởng niềm vui. Responsibilities Thúc đẩy việc sử dụng YouTube Shopping ở Việt Nam bằng cách tập trung vào các chỉ số kinh doanh quan trọng. Phân tích hiệu suất chiến dịch, dữ liệu kinh doanh, báo cáo thị trường về hình thức thương mại qua video và các chỉ số KPI để đưa ra chiến lược mua sắm phù hợp cho thị trường. Cộng tác với nhiều phòng ban liên ngành để mang những giá trị tốt nhất của YouTube đến cho đối tác và cập nhật cho các phòng ban liên ngành của chúng tôi về những diễn biến phía đối tác và trên thị trường để hỗ trợ quá trình đưa ra quyết định Hỗ trợ phát triển chiến lược đưa sản phẩm ra thị trường và các chiến lược ngành hàng theo đúng các mục tiêu kinh doanh tổng thể. Nâng cao hiểu biết về phân khúc thị trường và các xu hướng/sự kiện toàn cầu, đồng thời liên tục theo dõi nỗ lực của những người làm nội dung, thiết lập và xây dựng mối quan hệ với các công ty tập trung vào thương mại để giúp họ thành công trên YouTube, đồng thời mở rộng các cơ hội kinh doanh mới. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

Title: Senior Applied/Data Scientist
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Data Science, Machine Learning, AI, Python, Statistical Analysis
Description: About the job Would you be excited to drive major changes to a scale service that is critical to the company? Substrate is the data and intelligence platform that enables internal partner teams at Microsoft to build, deploy, and maintain compliant productivity apps and services with reduced effort and faster time to market. We work closely with partners across M365 to enable critical suite-wide scenarios. The Substrate Core Substrate team powers the infrastructure that underpins Microsoft 365’s most critical services and Copilot. We are a high-impact, forward-looking team focused on building intelligent, scalable, and cost-efficient platforms that enable Microsoft to deliver world-class productivity experiences to billions of users. Our mission is to drive operational excellence and innovation across the M365 fleet by leveraging AI, automation, and deep platform integration. We are looking for a passionate and growth-oriented Senior Applied Scientist to join our team. As an Applied Scientist, you will play a pivotal role in transforming how Copilot features are delivered across Microsoft 365. You’ll be part of the team building the Substrate platform that powers M365 Copilot, developing scalable algorithms and machine learning pipelines that drive innovation across Copilot Search, BizChat, Connectors, and Agents (DAs). This is a unique opportunity to work at the intersection of platform engineering and applied science, helping shape the future of AI-powered productivity. Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond. Responsibilities Drive data exploration and analysis by collecting initial datasets, selecting appropriate analytical techniques, and applying foundational statistical methods to extract insights. Build and evaluate ML models by running modeling tools on prepared datasets, analyzing performance, and incorporating customer feedback to improve outcomes. Contribute to AI development by writing production-quality code for features or models, applying debugging best practices, and staying current with industry trends and methodologies. Champion customer-centric solutions by understanding business goals, identifying growth opportunities, and managing expectations throughout the project lifecycle. Collaborate cross-functionally with engineering and product teams to define success metrics, improve AI quality at scale, and shape how performance is measured across Copilot technologies. Qualifications Required Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree in Statistics, Econometrics, Computer Science, Electrical or Computer Engineering, or related field AND 4+ years related experience (e.g., statistics predictive analytics, research) OR Master's Degree in Statistics, Econometrics, Computer Science, Electrical or Computer Engineering, or related field AND 3+ years related experience (e.g., statistics, predictive analytics, research) OR Doctorate in Statistics, Econometrics, Computer Science, Electrical or Computer Engineering, or related field AND 1+ year(s) related experience (e.g., statistics, predictive analytics, research) OR equivalent experience. 4+ years of applied science or data science experience Other Requirements Ability to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role. These requirements include but are not limited to the following specialized security screenings: Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud background check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter. Preferred Qualifications Master's Degree in Data Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Econometrics, Economics, Operations Research, Computer Science, OR related field OR Bachelor's Degree in Data Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Econometrics, Economics, Operations Research, Computer Science, OR related field AND 6+ years data-science or applied science experience (e.g., managing structured and unstructured data, applying statistical techniques and reporting results) OR equivalent experience. #M365CORE Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations .

Title: Junior Cloud Support Engineer L1 (M365&Azure)
Skills: Microsoft Office 365, Active Directory, Networking, Security, Azure
Description: About the job Junior Support Engineer - Hanoi Noventiq is hiring! Noventiq’s story is one of change. We grew, expanded, and adapted, learning more at each step. Now effecting change is at the heart of everything we do. And that doesn't just apply to our customers, it’s how we feel about everyone who works with us. Noventiq (the brand name of Cyprus-registered Softline Holding plc) is a leading global solutions and services provider in digital transformation and cybersecurity, headquartered and listed in London. The company enables, facilitates and accelerates digital transformation for its customers’ businesses, connecting 75,000+ organizations from all sectors with hundreds of best-in-class IT vendors, alongside its own services and solutions. With a turnover of US$ 1.1 billion in the fiscal year of 2021, Noventiq is currently one of the fastest growing companies in the sector. In October 2021, company "Softline Holding plc" got its primary listing on the London Stock Exchange (LSE:SFTL). Noventiq’s growth is underpinned by its three-dimensional strategy to expand its geography, portfolio and sales channels. The strategy is supported by Noventiq's active approach to M&As, enabling the company to take advantage of the ongoing consolidation in the industry. Noventiq's 3900 employees work in almost 60 countries throughout Asia, Latin America, Eastern Europe and Africa—markets with significant growth potential. We’re looking for Junior Support Engineer L1 to bring your talent to Noventiq Vietnam . You’ll be a part of our Services Delivery team. JOB FUNCTIONS: The Junior Support Engineer will be responsible for implementing all the processes and activities related to Managed Services which can support to customers or partners based on Microsoft technologies. ESSENTIAL POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES Participation in managed service projects based on Active Directory Domain service, Microsoft Office 365, Exchange hybrid, Microsoft Entra ID and SSO; Participation in security managed service projects mostly based on Microsoft technology such as: Entra ID conditional access, Microsoft Intune, Microsoft Purview (Microsoft Information Protection), Microsoft Defender for Endpoint, Microsoft Defender for Identity Writing KB documentation and user\admin guides; Strong understanding of networking and security principles, including firewalls, VPNs, and network protocols. Collaboration with other teams (another engineers, service managers, APAC colleagues); Can participate in delivering projects with around 20% workload POSITION QUALIFICATIONS At least 1 year of experience in managing and administering M365 environments. Experience in Office 365 configuring (Microsoft 365 Tenant, Exchange Online, Teams, Sharepoint Online) Experience in hybrid scenarios with Entra ID Hybrid, Exchange Hybrid and migrations; Experience in Microsoft 365 security such as Intune, Microsoft Purview, Microsoft Defender for Endpoint Good knowledge in core infrastructure (Microsoft Windows Server, Active Directory, DNS, System Center Configuration Manager) will be the privilege; Basic knownledges and experience in Azure Cloud Platform English language – basic level (reading, technical documentation). Colloquial level will be the privilege. Ability to work on a globally dispersed team in a 24*7*365 environemnt Noventiq OFFERS: Working time: Mond-Fri, flexible working time, 9:00am - 6:00pm Attractive salary with 100% salary during probation Full-pay insurance, Compliance fully to Vietnam Labor code Attractive Bonus, & Allowances for mobile, transportation, parking Opportunities to work with global colleagues from different cultures Premium Healthcare insurance for employees Annual Health check-up Birthday paid day-off & Birthday gift Recognition program, Referral program Working device provided or reimbursement on personal device Other activities: annual company trip, year-end dinner, exciting engagement events, Coaching opportunities, etc. Annual Salary Review & Promotion Don’t forget to include your CV and cover letter. We receive a lot of applications, but we try to notice each of our potential candidates. BECOME A PART OF NOVENTIQ!

Title: Software Engineering Specialist - Human Data
Skills: Python, JavaScript, ReactJS, C++, Java
Description: About the job About xAI xAI's mission is to create AI systems that can accurately understand the universe and aid humanity in its pursuit of knowledge. Our team is small, highly motivated, and focused on engineering excellence. This organization is for individuals who appreciate challenging themselves and thrive on curiosity. We operate with a flat organizational structure. All employees are expected to be hands-on and to contribute directly to the company's mission. Leadership is given to those who show initiative and consistently deliver excellence. Work ethic and strong prioritization skills are important. All engineers and researchers are expected to have strong communication skills. They should be able to concisely and accurately share knowledge with their teammates. About the Role As a Software Engineering Specialist on the Human Data team, you will be responsible for creating cutting-edge data to facilitate the training of large language models. Collaborating closely with technical staff, you will contribute to datasets for model training, benchmarking, and overall advancement. The Software Engineering Specialist - Human Data role is a full-time remote position. Part-time may be offered on a case-by-case basis but full-time is strongly preferred (please see the bottom of this job description for more details). Responsibilities AI model training initiatives by curating code examples, offering precise solutions, and meticulous corrections in Python, JavaScript (including ReactJS), C/C++, and Java. Evaluate and refine AI-generated code, ensuring it adheres to industry standards for efficiency, scalability, and reliability. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to enhance AI-driven coding solutions, ensuring they meet enterprise-level quality and performance benchmarks. Key Qualifications Advanced proficiency in English, both verbal and written. Strong experience in either Python or JavaScript, with a solid foundation in software development practices. Please note that for those with experience in only JavaScript, experience with ReactJS is preferred but not required. Knowledge of other languages is a strong plus.Strong grasp of computer science fundamentals like data structures, algorithms, and debugging skills. A minimum of 2 years of hands-on industry experience with a proven track record in software development and/or public proof of work (such as on GitHub). Extensive experience with a wide array of tools and systems such as Databases, SQL, Kubernetes, Spark, Kafka, gRPC, and AWS. Preferred Qualifications The ideal candidate for this role is adaptable, possesses strong logical reasoning skills, is detail-oriented, and thrives in a fast-paced work environment. Evidence of meaningful contributions to open source projects or high reputation on platforms like Stack Overflow or evidence of strong performance in programming competitions. Enthusiasm to collaboratively build the best truth-seeking AI out there! Additional Requirements Demonstrates a strong capacity to quickly adapt by learning new skills and unlearning outdated ones, thriving in dynamic and changing environments. For those who will be working from a personal device, please note your computer must be capable of running Windows 10 or macOS BigSur 11.0 or later. Location, Hourly, and Other Expectations This position is fully remote. We are unable to provide visa sponsorship. If you are based in the US, please note we are unable to hire in the states of Wyoming and Illinois at this time. You must own and have reliable access to a smartphone. Please indicate your interest in either full-time, part-time, or either in the application. Note that: Full-Time (40 hours per week): Full-time schedules are 9-5:30pm in your local time zone. The first week will be 9-5:30pm PST for onboarding. Part-Time (20-29 hours per week): While hours are flexible around your schedule, you must be committed to working at least 20 hours per week (with at least 10 of these hours worked on weekdays) and no more than 29 hours per week. Compensation and Benefits The pay for this role may range from $55/hour - $65/hour. Your actual pay will be determined on a case-by-case basis and may vary based on the following considerations: job-related knowledge and skills, education, and experience. For full-time roles, specific benefits vary by country, depending on your country of residence you may have access to medical benefits. We do not offer benefits for part-time roles. xAI is an equal opportunity employer and does not unlawfully discriminate based on race, color, religion, ethnicity, ancestry, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age, disability, medical conditions, genetic information, marital status, military or veteran status, or any other applicable legally protected characteristics. Qualified applicants with arrest or conviction records will be considered for employment in accordance with all applicable federal, state, and local laws, including the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, Los Angeles County Fair Chance Ordinance for Employers, and the California Fair Chance Act. For Los Angeles County (unincorporated) Candidates: xAI reasonably believes that criminal history may have a direct, adverse and negative relationship on the following job duties, potentially resulting in the withdrawal of a conditional offer of employment: Access to information technology systems and confidential information, including proprietary and trade secret information, and/or user data; Interacting with internal and/or external clients and colleagues; and Exercising sound judgment. California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) Notice

Title: Structural Simulation Intern
Skills: Python, API, FEA meshing, 3ds Max, English
Description: About the job Akselos is a rapidly growing digital technology company with headquarters in Europe and operations in Southeast Asia and the USA. The company has created the world’s most advanced engineering modeling, and fastest simulation technology, to protect the world’s critical infrastructure today and tomorrow. Currently focused on the Energy market, technology has the power to revolutionize how we build and manage our critical infrastructure and push the boundaries of what modern engineering and data analytics can achieve. Position Summary Interns work with Akselos engineers to contribute their work on ongoing projects to create high-quality 3D CAD models and FEA mesh models. Learn practical solutions in simulation processes (pre- and post-processing) Contribute to advancing Akselos’ technological frontier through automatic model building Intern’s Role Create or modify 3D CAD models for the project. Perform meshing for 3D CAD models Build simulation models using Akselos software Implement workflows for automated CAD and FEA model creation or parameterization Desired Skills and Requirements: Must-have skills: 3D CAD Modeling process (Ansys Space Claim is preferred) FEA meshing (Ansys meshing / CoreForm Cubit engines) Coding in Python Good communication in English (work with foreign experts) Nice-to-Have skills: Ability to read 2D drawings Executing assigned tasks promptly with an unwavering commitment to excellence Ensuring timely delivery and active collaboration within a dynamic team environment Ability to work with Software APIs to automate and speed up work processes (e.g., scripting, API integration). Understanding of ML/AI based workflows (data generation, training, inference) Benefits of working here Opportunities for professional growth and development Collaborative and dynamic work international environment Akselos’ certificate of internship completion, an appendix of project completion and preferences Knowledge sharing and training of live and past projects from Akselos Production Engineers Sporting time for Football, Badminton, and Table Tennis. Free Tea and Coffee every day Internship Duration: 6 months How to apply: Please visit our Career Page: https://akselos.com/about/careers/ Application from: July 18, 2025 Contact information if you have any questions: Mr. Trong-Luong - Email: trong.luong@akselos.com Mrs. Minh-Ha Vu - Email: minhha.vu@akselos.com Please provide a cover letter to describe relevant projects that you have led or been involved in.

Business & Financial Services 3. preferred, Tableau, or similar) Experience with Databricks 6-7 years of experience in analytics engineering, with 2+ years experience in financial services, fintech, or banking environment Judgment: Ability to make strategic and operational decisions using data Problem-Solving: Tackle complex problems involving business, regulatory, and operational variables Communication: Exceptional ability to influence stakeholders and present data convincingly Collaboration: Experience working cross-functionally with non-technical teams Bachelor's degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, or related quantitative field Experience with big data technologies and cloud platforms Machine learning and AI knowledge Previous experience in high-growth startup environments probation Insurances as Vietnamese labor law and premium health care for you and your family Performance bonus up to 2 months 13th month salary pro-rata 15-day annual leave+ 3-day sick leave + 1 birthday leave + 1 Christmas leave SMART goals and clear career opportunities (technical seminar, conference, and career talk) Values-driven, international working environment, and agile culture Conversational English Benefits: Panasonic R&D Center Vietnam is one of the leading R&D Centers with professional and friendly global working environment. We offered flexible and diversified benefits package that ensure the best things to the employees. 1. Career Path Development Clearly defined long-term multi-career roadmap. Unlimited development & training opportunities (Language Training, Technical Training, Soft-skill Training, On-job Training, etc.) Oversea business trips (Japan, China, Singapore, US, EU, etc.) 2. Work-life Balance Flexible working time that supports work-life balance (Core time: 9:00-16:00; 5 days from Monday - Friday/ week) Flexible lunch time. Additional special holiday 3. Wellness Well-protected with 24/7 personal accident and medical care insurance. Well-designed Annual Health Check-up program. 4. Activities Team-building activities; Birthday Party; Year-end party; Sport Day/ Family Day Summer Vacation (Trip to famous tourist spots domestic/ overseas…) 5. Cash Benefits Attractive and competitive salary & bonus package depend on abilities, performance and competencies Diversified allowance scheme 6. Title: Penetration Testers
Skills: Penetration Testing, Vulnerability Assessment, OWASP, Cybersecurity, English
Description: About the job Who are we? Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success. At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like: Brief Call : Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you! Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities! Case study : Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc. As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience. We look forward to meeting you! Job Description ABOUT THE JOB Perform black-box, grey-box and white-box penetration tests across various applications and infrastructures. Conduct vulnerability assessments using automated tools and manual techniques. Document and present findings with actionable remediation guidance to technical and non-technical audiences. Review source code and analyze software design to identify security weaknesses. Simulate real-world attacks to identify system weaknesses and recommend improvements. Support clients with post-assessment remediation efforts and technical consulting. Stay current with latest security vulnerabilities, trends, tools, and techniques. Assist in developing internal cybersecurity guidelines and knowledge sharing. About You Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or a related field. Experience with penetration testing tools (e.g., Burp Suite, Metasploit, Nmap, Nessus). Knowledge of web application security, OWASP Top 10, and secure coding principles. Understanding of network protocols, system architecture, and cybersecurity frameworks. Fluent in English communication. Ability to analyze deeply and think like an attacker. WHY AMARIS? At Amaris Consulting, we believe in creating a thriving, positive workplace where every team member can grow, connect, and make a real impact. Here’s what you can expect when you join our dynamic community: Global Diversity: Be part of an international team of 110+ nationalities, celebrating diverse perspectives and collaboration. Trust and Growth: With 70% of our leaders starting at entry-level, we’re committed to nurturing talent and empowering you to reach new heights. Continuous Learning: Unlock your full potential with our internal Academy and over 250 training modules designed for your professional growth. Vibrant Culture: Enjoy a workplace where energy, fun, and camaraderie come together through regular afterworks, team-building events, and more. Meaningful Impact: Join us in making a difference through our CSR initiatives, including the WeCare Together program, and be part of something bigger. Equal opportunity Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability or other characteristics. Desired Skills and Experience Security, Penetration testing, Cyber Threat Intelligence (CTI)

Title: Customer Success Intern (System & Operations-Oriented)
Skills: AI, English, Automation Test, Product Management, Technical Writing
Description: About the job Why Join Filum? Filum is a fast-growing B2B startup in AI, focused on Customer Service and Customer Experience – a booming space in Vietnam and the region. At Filum, you’ll get to: Work directly with the founding team in a dynamic, open-minded, and growth-focused environment Gain hands-on experience in a modern Customer Success team that goes beyond “support” to co-owning customer outcomes Learn about AI, SaaS, and customer operations – a solid foundation for anyone pursuing a career in tech or startups Grow into the next generation of AI-native operators What You’ll Learn and Do We don’t view Customer Success as just “support.” Your journey at Filum will be split into two stages: Stage 1: Kickoff – Learn & Set Up Understand how a B2B AI product operates and supports enterprise clients Learn how to design and operate a modern CS workflow: onboarding, solution mapping, support automation Shadow CS Managers and get hands-on with tools like N8n, Lark, Notion, Anthropic... Improve documentation and process clarity – including internal guides, client tutorials (slides, videos, email flows...) Stage 2: Acceleration – Operate & Optimize Take ownership of tool-based CS operations and support for a portfolio of clients Become a point of contact to help clients adopt features and optimize usage Coordinate cross-functionally with AM and Tech teams to solve customer pain points Propose improvements and participate in internal ops projects Learn to think in systems and automate repetitive workflows Who You Are Must-haves Structured & curious mindset : You don’t need to know everything upfront, but you love figuring out how systems work Clear communication : Able to express ideas well in both Vietnamese and English, especially in writing Self-starter in fast-paced settings : You take ownership and don’t wait to be told what to do Team player : You collaborate well, avoid blame, and help others succeed Value-first thinking : You always ask, "Is this delivering value to the customer?" Nice-to-haves Experience with automation tools, no-code/low-code workflows, or process mapping Familiarity with SaaS, AI, or technical product environments Prior startup experience or ability to adapt quickly and learn on the fly Strong documentation/visualization skills (slides, Notion, video explainers) Perks Internship allowance: 3.5M – 5M VND/month 1:1 mentoring with experienced B2B product & customer operators Path to full-time conversion Explore and learn across functions – from AI product testing to setting up CS systems Friendly, young team culture at our office in District 2 Transparent, feedback-driven learning environment How to Apply We believe that clarity from the start leads to stronger long-term collaboration. Before we begin, we’d love to hear your thoughts on these two questions: Why do you want to pursue a career in Customer Success? In your opinion, what is the most important thing for Filum’s CS team at this stage? 📩 Send your answers along with your CV to: careers@filum.ai 📥 Please CC: minh.le@filum.ai

Title: Vietnamese to English Translator
Skills: AI, English, Prompt Engineering, Technical Writing, Vietnamese
Description: About the job DataAnnotation is committed to creating quality AI. Join our team to help train AI chatbots while gaining the flexibility of remote work and choosing your own schedule. We are looking for a bilingual professional to join our team and teach AI chatbots. You will have conversations in both Vietnamese and English with chatbots in order to measure their progress, as well as write novel conversations in order to teach them what to say. Benefits: This is a full-time or part-time REMOTE position You’ll be able to choose which projects you want to work on You can work on your own schedule Projects are paid hourly, starting at $20+ USD per hour, with bonuses for high-quality and high-volume work Responsibilities (both in Vietnamese and English): Come up with diverse conversations over a range of topics Write high-quality answers when given specific prompts Compare the performance of different AI models Research and fact-check AI responses Qualifications: Fluent in Vietnamese + English A bachelor's degree (completed or in progress) Excellent writing and grammar skills Strong research and fact-checking skills to ensure accuracy and originality Note: Payment is made via PayPal. We will never ask for any money from you. PayPal will handle any currency conversions from USD. #vietnamese

Title: Junior Marketing Specialist - HCMC

Are you a data-driven, creative marketer eager to launch campaigns that reach thousands of businesses worldwide? Join OptiSigns and help us accelerate the growth of our B2B SaaS platform—already trusted by more than 30,500 customers —by crafting high-impact, measurable marketing initiatives. About Us At OptiSigns , we make technology accessible and valuable to everyone, including non-technical users. Our mission is to build beautiful, intuitive B2B SaaS tools that help organizations connect with their customers and employees, driving revenue growth and operational efficiency. Headquartered in Houston, TX, with an expanding team in Ho Chi Minh City, we’re scaling fast and looking for passionate people to grow with us. Key Responsibilities Plan, launch, and manage paid campaigns on Google Ads, Bing Ads, and major social platforms Track, analyze, and optimize campaign performance—turning data into actionable insights Conduct A/B tests, refine ad copy, and improve landing pages to maximize ROI Maintain campaign assets: creative, keywords, budgets, ad copy, and audience settings Perform keyword research, competitor analysis, and trend monitoring to uncover new opportunities Optimize Google Business Profiles to improve local SEO visibility Prepare clear performance reports, highlighting wins and next-step recommendations for stakeholders Assist in planning and executing email marketing initiatives Create, schedule, and manage engaging social media content Support Marketing Managers with additional tasks as needed Requirements 0–1 year of marketing experience or a relevant degree with strong passion for digital marketing Strong verbal and written English communication skills Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment Positive, proactive attitude and eagerness to learn new tools and tactics Excellent teamwork and interpersonal skills Preferred Skills Foundational understanding of PPC concepts: keyword research, ad copy, landing-page optimization, bidding strategies Solid analytical/problem-solving mindset Basic knowledge of SEO best practices Familiarity with Google Analytics or similar analytics platforms Experience with marketing automation (e.g., Customer.io, Zapier, HubSpot) Comfort with SQL and data-visualization tools Benefits 13th-month salary bonus 16 days annual leave Comprehensive healthcare insurance MacBook / Windows laptop, external monitor, and all necessary equipment Yearly team outings, company trips, and internal clubs Structured onboarding, continuous training, and clear career-growth paths Opportunities for overseas travel and training (Houston HQ) English-language training programs Flexible working hours (Monday–Friday) Free drinks, snacks, parking

Title: AI Developer
Location: Hải Châu district, Da Nang City, Vietnam
Skills: ai, generative ai, github, docker, sql
Description: About the job This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More ★ Mô Tả Công Việc Phát triển và triển khai chatbot có khả năng tìm kiếm thông tin và tạo ra nội dung từ các mô hình ngôn ngữ lớn. Tích hợp các mô hình AI vào ứng dụng di động (Android/iOS). Thiết kế và tối ưu hóa pipeline xử lý dữ liệu cho chatbot và các tính năng AI khác. Phân tích và cải thiện hiệu suất của hệ thống chatbot cũng như các hệ thống tích hợp mô hình AI khác. Cập nhật và triển khai các công nghệ mới nhất trong AI và Machine Learning vào dự án. Phối hợp để đảm bảo sự tương thích và hiệu suất của các mô hình AI ★ Yêu Cầu Hiểu khái niệm cơ bản về các mô hình Generative AI như GANs, VAEs, và mô hình Diffusion. Hiểu cơ bản về các công cụ lưu trữ và quản lý dữ liệu như cơ sở dữ liệu SQL/NoSQL và lưu trữ đám mây. Có kiến thức về việc sử dụng các nền tảng AI cloud như AWS, Azure, Google Cloud. Hiểu các cấu trúc dữ liệu cơ bản như mảng, danh sách liên kết. Nắm các thuật toán cơ bản như sắp xếp (Bubble Sort, Insertion Sort), tìm kiếm tuần tự. Hiểu biết về các mô hình phát triển phần mềm cơ bản như Waterfall, Agile. Áp dụng các mô hình có sẵn từ các thư viện để giải quyết vấn đề cụ thể. Sử dụng các mô hình AI có sẵn từ thư viện và triển khai vào môi trường thử nghiệm đơn giản. -Fine-tune các mô hình đơn giản cho các ứng dụng cụ thể (ví dụ: điều chỉnh mô hình GPT-3 cho bài toán cụ thể). Xác định và sửa lỗi đơn giản trong mã nguồn với sự hướng dẫn. Sử dụng các kỹ thuật debug cơ bản để tìm nguyên nhân vấn đề. Biết cách sử dụng GitHub để quản lý mã nguồn, tạo pull request, merge code và cơ bản về workflow CI/CD với Jenkins. Làm việc được với Docker ở cấp độ cơ bản (Ví dụ: build, push, run). Có khả năng tham gia thảo luận nhóm, lắng nghe và đưa ra ý kiến cơ bản. Đảm bảo hoàn thành công việc được giao đúng hạn với sự hướng dẫn từ người khác. Desired Skills and Experience Software Development, Generative Ai, Artificial Intelligence

Title: Machine Learning
Skills: AI, Python, Scala, Golang, Linux
Description: About the job MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC Tham gia các dự án ứng dụng trí tuệ nhân tạo trong lĩnh vực an ninh mạng, xây dựng các giải pháp bảo mật nhằm phát hiện tấn công mạng. Cùng team tham gia vào các cuộc thi hấp dẫn về AI trên Kaggle. YÊU CẦU Thành thạo một trong các ngôn ngữ sau: Golang, Scala, Python Có trên 1 năm kinh nghiệp lập trình 2 trong những công nghệ sau: MapReduce (Hadoop, Spark, Flink), Queue processing (Kafka, Redis,ReditMQ, …), Workflow (Oozie, …), Concurrent programming (Akka, Go channel, …) Có trên 1 năm kinh nghiệm làm dự án liên quan đến một trong các công nghệ học máy sau: SVM, Decision tree, Deep learning for computer vision, Reinforcement learning Có trên 1 năm kinh nghiệm về xử lý dữ liệu văn bản, xử lý sâu, các thuật toán xử lý dữ liệu trích chọn đặc trưng trong NLP Có trên 1 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc với dữ liệu lớn: trên 60k event per seconds hoặc trên 10GB per day. Sử dụng thành thạo các cấu trúc dữ liệu: Array, Set, HashMap, Linked List,… ; Và giải thuật cơ bản: sắp xếp, tìm kiếm, Nắm được quy trình phát triển phần mềm, có kỹ năng code tốt, nắm được coding convention, (Behavior Test & Integration test là một lợi thế) Làm việc thành thạo trên môi trường Linux Sử dụng thành thạo git Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các dự án MicroServices, CICD, Docker là một lợi thế Có kinh nghiệm làm việc trong các dự án theo mô hình Agile là một lợi thế QUYỀN LỢI Mức thu nhập cạnh tranh: 600$ – 1000$ “NMS care” bảo hiểm dành riêng cho nhân viên NMS. Nghỉ mát: Theo chính sách của công ty (vào tháng 5-6 hàng năm). Có cơ hội được xem xét nâng lương 2 lần 01 năm, tùy vào kết quả công việc. Môi trường làm việc hiện đại, thân thiện. Chính sách cho người lao động tuân theo “Bộ luật lao động” tại Việt Nam

Title: Solutions Architect, MLOps
Skills: AI, Cloud, Kubernetes, English, CI/CD
Description: About the job NVIDIA has been transforming computer graphics, PC gaming, and accelerated computing for more than 25 years. It’s a unique legacy of innovation that’s fueled by great technology—and amazing people. Today, we’re tapping into the unlimited potential of AI to define the next era of computing. An era in which our GPU acts as the brains of computers, robots, and self-driving cars that can understand the world. Doing what’s never been done before takes vision, innovation, and the world’s best talent. As an NVIDIAN, you’ll be immersed in a diverse, supportive environment where everyone is inspired to do their best work. Come join the team and see how you can make a lasting impact on the world. We are looking for a Solutions Architect with experience in large scale cloud native application development and experience with AI applications. A Solution Architect is the first line of technical expertise between NVIDIA and our customers, as well as our partners. Your duties will vary from solutions design and development, industry and marketing speaking engagements, training delivery, troubleshooting, project coordination, customer relationship management and more. In this role you will provide support for customers in the South East Asia region. What You'll Be Doing Identify new opportunities for NVIDIA technology and solutions, by optimally communicating and positioning the product portfolio and analysing customer requirements. Independently lead technical sales activities in collaboration with the extended team. Support customers in packaging custom microservices and workflows and develop cloud native Agentic AI leveraging NVIDIA’s NIMs microservices and Blueprints. Work with NVIDIA's rich portfolio of tools such as Dynamo, AI-Q, NIMs, Blueprints, Triton Inference Server, GPU and Network Operators, Run:AI, Lepton, NVCF, Base Command Manager and our many use case and industry specific SDKs (I.e. NeMo) Advise on distributed cloud native inferencing, including load balancing and network requirements. Services performance and availability optimisations to meet requirements and SLAs. Provide customer feedback to internal engineering and product management teams to improve and refine existing products – and develop new ones ! Closely collaborate with internal teams (professional services, product development, enterprise support) and ecosystem partners (ISVs, Solution Integrators) to deliver solutions to our customers. Setup and run demos, proof of concepts and benchmarks as required. Deliver technical training and workshops to customers and partners. Present at industry and marketing events. What We Need To See A passion for customer success and innovative AI solutions. Someone motivated, able to work independently, proactively with minimal direction. 5+ years of experience with cloud native applications development and packaging BSc or Master in Computer Science, Engineering or related subjects. Experience with MLOps CI/CD pipelines and related tools. Deep understanding of Kubernetes, Cloud native networking, Ingress controllers and load balancers for HTTP and gRPC. Understanding of methodologies for application and workflows performance tuning. Outstanding communication skills, strong interpersonal skills and love to work as part of a team. Ability to travel up to 30% of the time to support customer in South East Asia and beyond. Native or Professional language proficiency in English. Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd Hands-on experience with production deployments of Triton Inference Server on Kubernetes. Exposure to RAG and vector databases. CKA or CKAD certifications or equivalents. Professional fluency in one of these languages: Mandarin. Widely considered to be one of the technology world’s most desirable employers, NVIDIA offers highly competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package. As you plan your future, see what we can offer to you and your family www.nvidiabenefits.com/ NVIDIA is committed to fostering a diverse work environment and proud to be an equal opportunity employer. As we highly value diversity in our current and future employees, we do not discriminate (including in our hiring and promotion practices) on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status or any other characteristic protected by law. JR1998757

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Skills: Python, JavaScript, ReactJS, VueJS, API
Description: About the job At Amplify , we’re building the future of the creator economy. We’re creating a tool to revolutionise how creators and brands connect and collaborate. Our mission is to simplify campaign management, provide actionable insights, and unlock new opportunities for creators and brands alike. We’re looking for a talented Engineer to join our team and play a key role in developing the Minimum Viable Product (MVP) for our creator shortlisting and campaign management tool. About the Role: As an Engineer , you’ll work alongside our product team and external partners to bring our vision to life. You’ll be instrumental in building the core features of our product. Key Responsibilities: MVP Development: Build and implement features. Technical Collaboration: Collaborate with product managers and designers to transform wireframes and mockups into functional code. Backend & Frontend Development: Contribute to both backend systems and frontend interfaces to ensure a seamless user experience. Data Integration: Help integrate AI-driven insights and data to improve creator discovery and campaign tracking. Scalability: Write clean, scalable, and maintainable code to support future iterations of the product. Problem-Solving: Identify and resolve technical challenges to ensure timely delivery of the MVP. What We’re Looking For: Experience: 3+ years in software engineering, with experience developing web applications or MVPs. Technical Skills: Proficiency in backend and frontend technologies (e.g., Python, JavaScript, React, Vue, or similar frameworks). Experience with APIs and database management. AI Interest: Basic understanding of AI/ML tools or enthusiasm for integrating AI into products. Creator Economy Enthusiasm: A strong interest in the creator economy, including platforms like TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube. Team Player: Excellent collaboration skills with a focus on delivering results in a team environment. Startup Mindset: Comfortable in a dynamic environment, with a proactive approach to problem-solving. What We Offer: A chance to work on a high-impact project in the rapidly growing creator economy. Opportunities for professional growth and learning in a supportive team. Competitive salary and benefits. Flexible work arrangements, including remote options.

Title: Sports Statistician (Data Collection)
Skills: English
Description: About the job JOIN OUR TEAM AT GENIUS SPORTS! WHO ARE WE? Genius Sports is the official data, technology, and commercial partner driving the connection between sports, betting, and media on a global scale. Our mission is to create a more sustainable sports data network powered by rich, official live data. To achieve this, we're seeking enthusiastic Statisticians to join our team and collect match data while attending live sporting events. ARE YOU PASSIONATE ABOUT FOOTBALL? If you love football and want to be part of the action while getting paid, this is your opportunity! We are looking for individuals in the Gia Lai area to collect official live data from football events. As a Statistician, you will use our user-friendly smartphone-enabled software to report live events, including every shot, goal, tackle, and save. Don’t worry if you lack previous reporting experience - we provide comprehensive e-learning courses and practical training to ensure you’re fully prepared to cover live games. This is the perfect chance for sports enthusiasts to earn extra income while doing something they love. WHAT WE OFFER: Guaranteed base pay of €35 per game A performance-based reward system Coverage of travel expenses If you’re eager to immerse yourself in the world of sports and want to be part of our global network of statisticians, we want to hear from you! JOB REQUIREMENTS: Basic level in English Regular availability for a few hours on weekends and weekday evenings Familiarity with using a smartphone Willingness to travel A strong knowledge of football Reliability, commitment, organization, and integrity Exceptional attention to detail GET TO KNOW US: For more information about our mission and values, visit: Genius Sports ARE YOU READY TO JOIN THE GENIUS SPORTS TEAM? If you’re excited about this opportunity, we’d love to hear from you! Apply now and become a vital part of our team!

Title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
Skills: AI, Machine Learning, NLP, Computer Vision, Python
Description: About the job WORK LOCATION: Hoa Lac (with company shuttle bus) DEPARTMENT: AI/ Software Engineering ABOUT FPT SOFTWARE FPT Software, a subsidiary of FPT Group, is a leading global IT service provider headquartered in Vietnam. With 33,000+ employees in 88 offices across 30 countries, we serve 1,100+ clients, including 96 Fortune 500 companies. We believe diversity fuels innovation and strive to create an inclusive workplace where talents of all backgrounds thrive. We welcome expatriates and international professionals to bring fresh perspectives and help shape the future of technology. JOB OVERVIEW • We are looking for a talented AI Engineer to join our AI Team and contribute to cutting-edge projects in the automotive domain. You will be responsible for researching and developing AI models focused on generating test cases from specifications and solving image comparison challenges. This role offers the opportunity to work with a dynamic, innovation-driven team on real-world AI applications. RESPONSIBILITIES • Research, design, and develop machine learning models tailored for natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision tasks. • Focus on building models for test case generation from technical specifications and image comparison in automotive contexts. • Collaborate with AI engineers, software developers, and domain experts to ensure effective implementation and deployment of AI solutions. • Evaluate, fine-tune, and optimize model performance to meet project goals. • Contribute to technical documentation and, optionally, research publications. REQUIREMENTS • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or a related field. • Solid experience in building and fine-tuning machine learning models, especially in NLP and computer vision. • Proficient in Python and common ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar. • Experience with version control tools (e.g., Git) and collaborative development environments. • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. • Excellent communication and teamwork skills. • Prior experience or publications in AI research is a strong plus. WHAT COMPANY OFFERS • FPT Care insurance plan tailored for FPT employees • Attractive annual summer vacation allowance • Sponsored training courses for personal growth and up to 100% coverage for certification costs • Global and inclusive workplace with monthly cross-cultural events • International exposure and career growth across global locations • Work-life balance benefits with a flexible leave policy and annual health check-ups to support employee well-being • Work on impactful AI projects in the automotive industry. • Join a collaborative and fast-paced environment with strong support for innovation and growth. • Access to modern tools, infrastructure, and R&D opportunities. CONTACT Name: Nguyen Thi Nga (Helen) (Ms.) – Talent Acquisition Specialist Department: North Talent Acquisition – FPT Software Workforce Assurance – FPT Software Ha Noi Company Limited Email: NgaNT40@fpt.com/ Zalo: 0388.747.888 Website: www.career.fpt-software.com

Title: Business Analyst
Skills: Business Analysis, Data Analysis, English, AI, Data-driven
Description: About the job BUSINESS ANALYST Location: Hanoi At Palexy, we develop a pioneering AI-powered SaaS platform that can turn existing retail data, including CCTV footage, POS data, staff scheduling data, promotional calendar data, etc. into actionable intelligence. Recognized as one of the top 10 Indoor Mapping Analytics Vendors by CBInsights in 2021 & 2023, we have deployed our AI solutions to 100+ enterprise & mid-market retailers in APAC such as Central Retail, Supersports, CMG, Powerbuy, Guardian, Aldo, Sony, etc. We are seeking Business Analyst for our Hanoi Office to help customers maximize values of our data platform, successfully adopt our product and assist them with technical problems. Ultimately, you will help establish our reputation as a company that offers excellent consulting service. You will report to the Customer Success Managers and will support the adoption, retention and growth of our customer base. Responsibilities Assist Customer Success Manager in analyzing retail metrics, finding rooms to improve store performance, packaging business use cases, and quantifying project’s ROI with the provided frameworks. Identify and resolve challenges with product adoption encountered by the end users throughout the customer’s life cycle: onboarding and training, adoption, and retention. Consult customers on frameworks and processes to maximize values of Palexy products with knowledge of the Solution and Retail Industry. Identify opportunities for product improvement and revenue growth by proactively connecting with customers and understanding their needs Qualifications and skills: 1-2 years experience as a Business Analyst, Customer Success Executive or similar role; Good at data analysis, communication and problem-solving skills; Planning & Good organization skills, honesty, and attention to detail; A quick learner in new technology tool; Eagerness to learn, develop, and get involved in a wide range of tasks; Proficient in English (minimum IELTS 7.0 or equivalent) Benefits from working with Palexy team and our customers: Competitive salary Training programs on Retail Industry, SaaS, and Data Analysis Annual company trip & team-building activities Palexy team: We are a fast-paced, always learning, open-minded, diverse-background team that is up for competing globally in a rapidly growing field. Palexy’s customers: Our customers are data-driven and top-tier retailers in APAC & Middle East, who are looking to improve their process and optimize their operations. If you enjoy working with different teams from different businesses as their technology partner, helping them use Palexy’s tool and data to make better and faster decisions, you will enjoy this.

Title: Data Analyst

Quyền lợi OFFER UPTO 28M Không thử việc; ký hợp đồng chính thức và đóng BHXH luôn; Hỗ trợ đầy đủ trang thiết bị làm việc/ Hưởng trợ cấp hàng tháng nếu dùng thiết bị cá nhân; Được hưởng đầy đủ chế độ bảo hiểm theo quy định BHXH, BHYT, BHTN; Được hưởng chế độ nghỉ phép 12 ngày/năm, các ngày nghỉ phép khác theo quy định của Luật; Thưởng các ngày Lễ lớn trong năm như: Tết Dương lịch, 30/4, Trung Thu, 2/9, Tết Âm lịch… Khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm; Bảo hiểm sức khỏe cao cấp hàng năm; Được đào tạo chuyên môn, kỹ năng thường xuyên; Xét điều chỉnh lương, đánh giá theo năng lực định kỳ, 2 lần/năm ( định kỳ tháng 6 và tháng 12 hàng năm); Lương tháng 13; Thưởng doanh thu cuối năm ( tuỳ theo tình hình kinh doanh của Công ty); Được làm việc trong môi trường năng động, nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến; Đội ngũ kĩ sư, nhân viên tài năng, giàu kinh nghiệm; Làm việc với các đối tác lớn: MB Bank… Tham gia các hoạt động du lịch và teambuilding ( 3 tháng/lần), sinh nhật hàng tháng,… do Công ty tổ chức; Làm việc từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6; nghỉ thứ 7, CN. Title: Data Engineer
