Title: Frontend Software Engineer (For AI-driven Platform)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: JavaScript, Angular, Git, UI-UX, English
Description: About the job At Klaara, we're building an AI platform so advanced, even our code has code. We're a fast-paced startup turning complex algorithms into elegant solutions-one line of code at a time. We are looking for highly skilled Frontend Software Engineer to join our dynamic engineering team. You will be responsible for developing and implementing user interface components using modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries such as React, Vue.js, or Angular. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works. You will take part of important software implementation and be responsible for, and not limited to: Develop new user-facing feature. Build and implement top-notch user interfaces using JavaScript and Angular framework. Write clean, scalable, and reusable code and libraries following industry best practices and future use as well. Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs. Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability. Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end. Collaborate with other cross-functional teams and stakeholders to ensure high-performance of applications. Requirements Master's/Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Software Engineering , or related field. Proficient understanding of Angular. Other platforms such as ReactJS and VueJS are an asset. Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks. Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them. Proficient understanding of GIT for versioning. Familiarity with database management, such as MySQL, Oracle, and MongoDB. Ability to solve technical challenges and solutions with a strong customer focus. Strong debugging, problem-solving, and optimization skills. Startup Spirit: Self-motivated, comfortable in a dynamic, evolving environment Good command of spoken & written English. A fast learner and able to work independently. Desired Skills and Experience Angular, ReactJS, Git, OOP, Fintech, English, Trading, Machine Learning, CSS, Frontend, Software Development.

Title: Automation Tester
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Selenium, Automation Test, Java, Python, C#
Description: About the job Who are we? Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success. At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like: Brief Call : Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you! Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities! Case study : Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc. As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience. We look forward to meeting you! Job Description ABOUT THE JOB Design and maintain automation frameworks (e.g., Selenium, TestNG, Cypress) Write and execute test scripts for web, mobile, or API testing Integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab) Analyze test results and report defects Collaborate with developers to reproduce and resolve issues Optimize test for efficiency and coverage Document test cases and update based on evolving features Participate in Agile/Scrum ceremonies and contribute to QA strategy. About You Bachelor’s degree in information technology or related fields 2+ years in automation testing or software development Experience with programming languages: Java, Python, C# Experience with automation tools: Selenium, Appium, Rest Assured Knowledge of CI/CD tools and version control systems such as Git Experience with BDD frameworks such as Cucumber is a plus Understanding of performance testing tools: JMeter, LoadRunner Knowledge of cloud testing platforms such as AWS Device Farm, Azure Test Plans Familiarity with containerization tools: Docker, Kubernetes Good English communication skills. WHY AMARIS? Competitive salary and 13th-month salary 14+ annual leaves per year Premium healthcare insurance, starting from your probation period Project reviews and yearly performance appraisals Annual company trips Teambuilding activities: Team lunch/dinner, events, and celebrations, sports clubs (football, yoga, badminton, etc.) International team with flexible working time Tailor-made career path Technical workshops and training courses Mobility: Opportunities to be on-site abroad in our offices in over 60+ countries Equal Opportunity Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics. Desired Skills and Experience Selenium, Test Automation, Automated Testing

Title: Cyber Threat Intelligence Analyst
Skills: Cybersecurity, Information Security, Threat Intelligence, English, Information Technology
Description: About the job Founded in 2003 and headquartered in Singapore, Group-IB is a leading creator of cybersecurity technologies to investigate, prevent, and fight digital crime. Combating cybercrime is in the company’s DNA, shaping its technological capabilities to defend businesses, and citizens, and support law enforcement operations. Group-IB’s Digital Crime Resistance Centers (DCRCs) are located in the Middle East, Europe, Central Asia, and Asia-Pacific to help critically analyze and promptly mitigate regional and country-specific threats. These mission-critical units help Group-IB strengthen its contribution to global cybercrime prevention and continually expand its threat-hunting capabilities. Each of us can help make the world a safer place. Join us! ABOUT THE ROLE: The selected candidate will be responsible for generating comprehensive cyber threat reports for both internal stakeholders and clients/partners. The reports will cover Dark web, cybercriminal and Advanced Persistent Threat (APT) activities, intrusion tactics, techniques and procedures (TTP), as well as targeted entities. The role will involve leveraging internal and external resources to investigate threats and vulnerabilities, while also analyzing different threat actors and their attack infrastructure. TASKS TO SOLVE: Analyzing Threat Intelligence Alerts and Reports on IOCs and TTPs. Analyzing detected cyber threats including data breaches, DDoS, fraud, phishing, and ransomware attacks. Craft, maintain, and document detection opportunities within the Threat Intelligence platform. Perform necessary correlation and research to create useful, compelling, and context-rich alerts for customers. Pursue research into current threats and industry trends to be aware of the most up-to-date threats affecting the environments under vigilance. Drive initiatives to create detection content based on findings stemming from threat hunts and ad hoc detection opportunities. Develop mitigation and countermeasure strategies from collected threat intelligence. Leveraging MITRE ATT&CK categorization to align observed threat actor activity to Tactics, Techniques, and Procedures (TTPs). APPLY FOR THIS VACANCY IF YOU HAVE THE FOLLOWING QUALIFICATIONS: Graduated or final year student in the field of information security or information technology (or have equivalent experience). Knowledge of network technologies and principles of functioning of data networks, understanding of the features of the most common data transfer protocols. Knowledge of OS architecture and operating principles. Passion for cybersecurity, learning and knowledge sharing. Ready to work with large datasets with attention to detail. Good interpersonal skills, as well as the ability to communicate effectively orally and in writing. Fluency in English is highly appreciated. WHAT ELSE WE APPRECIATE IN OUR TEAM: Understanding of Threat Intelligence/Threat Hunting. Understanding of security principles such as attack structures, threat landscapes, TTP of attackers, etc. Excellent OSINT and analytical skills. Ability to recognize patterns and trends, connect the dots, and draw reasonable conclusions. Understanding OPSEC (Operations Security) principles. WHY CHOOSE GROUP-IB Your happiness is important to us. We want every single team member to be happy. Continuing professional development. At Group-IB, you can choose from various paths to growth: progress as an expert, advance to a management position, try your hand in another department, relocate abroad, or launch a new business area at Group-IB. A team with extensive international expertise. Do you have experience but are looking for exciting challenges? By choosing us, you will be choosing complex tasks and continuously improving your skills in a fast-growing international company. Globally recognized technologies. Group-IB's members are located in 25 countries and our products and services are sold in 60 countries. What’s more, Gartner, IDC, and Forrester have ranked our technologies among the best in their class. We work with over 450 international partners and about 500 clients. A culture created by each of us. Group-IB’s employees speak many different languages and understand one another. We respect each other's beliefs, share common values, and strive toward the happiness of every employee. Economic stability. Group-IB's sustainable growth helps rapidly develop careers that would take years to progress as far as most other companies. WHAT ELSE YOU SHOULD KNOW Flexible schedule. Group-IB does not have fixed working hours. You choose your own schedule. We adhere to the principle advocated by Steve Jobs: “We have to work not 12 hours, and head.” Health. If anything goes wrong, don’t worry — we offer health insurance. Certificates and training courses. Group-IB specialists hold over 1,000 professional certificates, including CEH, CISSP, OSCP, GIAC, MCFE, BSI, as well as some rare ones that would be a source of pride for experts in forensics, penetration testing, and reverse engineering worldwide. We have an incentive program that helps employees achieve certifications at the company's expense. Challenges. A wide selection of GIB programs helps you improve soft skills, gain new competencies, and receive monetary rewards. The initiative is rewarded. At Group-IB, you can bring your most daring ideas to life. The company encourages technical blogging, writing articles, building sports teams, and other creative activities.

Title: Network Engineer
Skills: Networking, English, Linux, Security, System Admin
Description: About the job Servers.com is an international hosting provider with data centers in the US, Europe and Asia. We provide reliable business solutions: dedicated servers, cloud technologies, load balancer, firewall, Kubernetes and monitoring services. Clients use our services to deploy game servers, payment gateways, streaming services and other high-load systems. We are looking for a Network Engineer to join us. Key tasks: providing network equipment administration at multiple data centers; performing the routine and emergency maintenance works on network equipment; dealing with requests from external and internal clients; directly participating in internal projects (developing network, connecting new locations, implementing new equipment, automation). Requirements: proficiency in LAN/WAN principles; strong understanding of dynamic network protocols (BGP/OSPF); understanding L2-networking: VLANs, xSTP family, LACP, Redundancy (LACP/VRRP/etc); ability to perform basic network troubleshooting; English level sufficient for reading technical documentation and communicating with customers (Intermediate at least); ability to learn, communication skills, willingness to take in and analyze large amounts of new information (mostly technical in English). Will be a plus: experience with network equipment from Extreme, Juniper or Nokia; EVPN and/or MPLS knowledge; certifications from network equipment and software vendors; experience in telecom and/or datacenter networking. What do we offer: work in a team of professionals at international level; comfortable working conditions: schedule without night shifts, no overtime, no phone support, smooth integration into the workflow; mentor assistance, learning modern IT technologies; opportunity to practice and improve your English; сompetitive salary and all necessary equipment; support of legalization in Vietnam.

Title: Intern (QA, Platform)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: QA QC, Android, iOS, Python, AI
Description: About the job Summary of Role V-Key is one of the world’s leading deep-tech companies in mobile cybersecurity. Our patented technology V-OS has been deployed by top banks, mobile payment providers, and governments to secure software solutions and protect more than 500 million application installation globally. We are rapidly expanding into new markets and new customer segments. Apart from securing digital transactions for everyone, we are also enabling new generation technology by providing the cybersecurity infrastructure for banking, government and smart homes, among many others. At V-Key, we are building towards a future where technology users can enjoy unprecedented security and convenience. We are looking for a QA Intern to join our AI development team with a focus on mobile application testing. You will help validate the quality of AI-powered mobile features, ensuring a seamless and reliable user experience. This role blends AI model validation, data analysis, and mobile QA, offering you hands-on experience in testing intelligent systems used in real-world applications. Duties and Responsibilities Test and validate AI-powered features integrated into Android/iOS mobile apps (e.g., chatbots, recommendation systems, camera-based AI tools). Design and execute test cases across multiple devices and OS versions. Evaluate AI model outputs in mobile environments for accuracy, bias, and latency. Perform manual and exploratory testing of mobile app functionalities. Identify and document bugs, performance issues, and UX inconsistencies. Collaborate with developers, designers, and AI engineers to define and refine QA processes. Use tools like Android Studio, Xcode, or emulators for app testing. Assist in automating test flows where applicable. Requirements Must have: 3rd or 4th-year student, or recent graduate in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Artificial Intelligence or a related field. Basic understanding of software testing principles and QA methodologies. Familiarity with mobile platforms (Android and/or iOS). Basic scripting or coding knowledge (preferably Python). Interest in AI/ML concepts and applications. Strong attention to detail and analytical thinking. Good written and verbal communication skills. Nice To Have Experience with mobile testing tools (e.g., Appium, Espresso, XCUITest). Familiarity with REST APIs, Postman, or Firebase tools. Exposure to AI platforms like TensorFlow Lite, Core ML, or on-device AI SDKs. Understanding of CI/CD pipelines for mobile testing. Data processing skills using Python (Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, etc.). Experience analyzing AI model outputs, logs, or performance metrics (Accuracy, Precision, Recall, F1-Score, etc.). Ability to create simple dashboards or reports to track bugs, model accuracy, or app usage. Familiarity with tools like Excel, SQL, or Jupyter Notebooks for exploratory data work. What You’ll Gain Hands-on experience in both AI validation and mobile app testing. Opportunity to work on real-world AI-powered mobile applications. Learn from experienced QA engineers, AI developers, and product teams. Boost your skills in mobile testing, AI output validation, and data-driven QA processes.

Title: AI Engineer (AI Agent) - Min 2 YOE
Skills: AI, MLOps, NLP, Python, SQL
Description: About the job 1.Mô tả công việc • Tham gia phát triển các sản phẩm về Chatbot, CV, OCR, Voice2Text ... bằng ứng dụng AI từ các kỹ thuật ML, DL, Transformer, LLM/ Prompt/ Multi agent. • Đảm bảo chất lượng dữ liệu, kết quả mô hình, báo cáo định kỳ tự động. • Chịu trách nhiệm bảo trì, cải thiện, làm sạch và thao tác dữ liệu, khắc phục các sự cố tồn tại. • Thiết kế API giao tiếp với các hệ thống nội bộ, hợp tác với các nhóm khác để tích hợp giải pháp xây dựng sản phẩm hoàn thiện. • Đóng gói và triển khai trên môi trường Product với docker và docker-compose. • Xây dựng các tài liệu Thiết kế tổng thể, giải pháp, Thiết kế chi tiết, tài liệu Giám sát, theo quy trình DS/AI. 2.Yêu cầu công việc • Có kinh nghiệm từ 2 năm trở lên với vị trí tương đương (level Junior-Middle, level Junior từ 2 năm KN, level Middle từ 4 năm KN) • Tốt nghiệp ĐH chuyên ngành: Khoa học dữ liệu, Khoa học máy tính, CNTT, Toán học ứng dụng, Điện tử viễn thông hoặc chuyên ngành khác liên quan. • Kiến thức về lập trình, cấu trúc dữ liệu và giải thuật, lý thuyết đồ thị. • Kiến thức về xác suất thống kê, đại số tuyến tính, giải tích. • Kiến thức về các loại CSDL (RDBMS, Graph Databases, NoSQL Products, ...). • Kiến thức về học máy (Machine Learning), học sâu (Deep Learning), về xử lý ngôn ngữ tự nhiên (NLP), xử lý hình ảnh; • Sử dụng thành thạo một trong các thư viện học máy: Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch; • Kỹ năng lập trình thành thạo Python, SQL. • Kỹ năng đọc bài báo khoa học và lập trình lại các thuật toán, giải pháp đề xuất trong bài báo khoa học. • Kỹ năng trực quan hóa dữ liệu. • Kỹ năng với các nhiệm vụ trong CV: OpenCV và các thuật toán xử lý ảnh cơ bản, Augmentation, Classification, Object Detection, Segmentation, Multiple training, Object Tracking, Transformer,, MultiModal, Multiple Training, GAN, Diffusion Model • Kỹ năng với các nhiệm vụ trong MLOps: Linux, Docker, MLFlow, Git, Base Script, AirFlow, WebAPI, CI/CD, Kubernetes, Observable System, Jenkin, Argo, Triron Inference Server, TensorRT, KubeFlow, MinIO, Cert, Proxy, Network, Ansible, Cloud, VM • Kỹ năng triển khai với các nền tảng containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) là một điểm cộng. • Có kiến thức với NLP: conversational AI, information extraction, text summarization, text completion, sentiment analysis,... (có kinh nghiệm thực tế là điểm cộng) • Kỹ năng với các nhiệm vụ trong LLM: LangChain, vector embeddings, NLTK, GPT-3, GPT-4, ChatGPT, Claude, Mistral, LLaMA, spaCy, Stanford CoreNLP, word2vec, Alpaca , FastText, BERT, VectorDB, BERT, LLM/Prompt, LangGraph • Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các thư viện python: numpy, matplotlib/seaborn, pandas, scikit learn, Jupyter notebook, v.v. • Có kinh nghiệm trong xây dựng kiến trúc, phát triển, triển khai các giải pháp phân tích dữ liệu là một điểm cộng. 3.Quyền lợi *Chế độ lương, thưởng, thu nhập: • Thu nhập cạnh tranh thỏa thuận theo kinh nghiệm và năng lực • Lương tháng 13, Thưởng quý, Thưởng dự án, Thưởng năng suất. • Nghỉ mát, thưởng ngày lễ và các ngày chỉ có ở Viettel như Ngày Sáng Tạo - 1/6, 22/12, quà Tết Dương, Tết Âm tri ân Gia đình, người sinh thành (25-30 triệu/năm) • 16 ngày nghỉ phép/năm hưởng nguyên lương • Bảo hiểm sức khỏe Pijico, bảo hiểm sức khỏe cho người thân, bảo hiểm nhân thọ,... • Hưởng các Chính sách đãi ngộ toàn diện của "Người Viettel" *Cơ hội phát triển bản thân • Cơ hội thăng tiến không giới hạn, trở thành quản lý của các dự án mới • Được thử sức với các công nghêm mới, dự án hấp dẫn, thử thách đủ lớn trong và ngoài nước • Cơ hội học hỏi từ các chuyên gia hàng đầu, lãnh đạo và đồng nghiệp ưu tú. • Cơ hội được đào tạo, trau dồi kĩ năng, chuyên môn để phát triển toàn diện. • Nơi hội tụ của các Data Engineer, AI Engineer, Software Engineer hàng đầu với nhiều năm kinh nghiệm trong các lĩnh vực khác nhau, các kỹ sư thiết kế, phát triển phần mềm mới tốt nghiệp xuất sắc từ các trường Đại học top đầu với khát vọng đánh dấu vị thế của CNTT Viettel nói riêng và Việt Nam nói chung trên bản đồ CNTT thế giới. *Môi trường làm việc • Được làm việc trong Tập đoàn toàn cầu, tiên phong thực hiện sứ mệnh kiến tạo xã hội số. • Môi trường mở, trẻ trung, năng động, trân trọng, yêu thương, tương hỗ & lắng nghe mỗi người từ những ý tưởng nhỏ nhất. 4. Địa điểm làm việc • Tòa nhà Viettel Software, 36A Dịch Vọng Hậu, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội • Thời gian làm việc: Thứ 2 đến thứ 6, nghỉ T7 CN Gửi CV ứng tuyển qua: • Email: thaont135@viettelsoftware.com • Contact: 0965794083 (Zalo: Thu Thảo)

Title: Binance Accelerator Program - Blockchain / Smart Contract Security
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Security, Python, Solidity, Blockchain, Git
Description: About the job Binance is the global blockchain company behind the world’s largest digital asset exchange by trading volume and users, serving a greater mission to accelerate cryptocurrency adoption and increase the freedom of money. Are you looking to be a part of the most influential company in the blockchain industry and contribute to the crypto-currency revolution that is changing the world? About Binance Accelerator Program Binance Accelerator Program is a concise fixed-term program designed for Early Career Talent to have an immersive experience in the rapidly expanding Web3 space. You will be given the opportunity to experience life at Binance and understand what goes on behind the scenes of the worlds’ leading blockchain ecosystem. Alongside your job, there will also be a focus on networking and development, which will expand your professional network and build transferable skills to propel you forward in your career. Learn about BAP Program HERE Who May Apply Current university students who can work at least 4 days per week for 3-6 months Responsibilities Perform a review analysis on newly disclosed vulnerabilities for smart contracts and summarize the root cause behind the exploits for early detection in the future Conduct security audits on both smart contracts and blockchains, and write high-quality audit reports Develop automated scanning and monitoring tools for smart contracts and blockchains Utilize scanning tools to detect vulnerabilities in online contracts and promptly issue risk warnings Conduct post-mortem analyses on various hacking incidents, examining the causes, processes, and basic fund tracing Proactively identify on-chain risks, monitor and model emerging on-chain attack vector trends, and possess a solid understanding of on-chain security risks such as fraud and phishing Demonstrate a strong understanding of EVM-compatible blockchains and layer 2 solutions, and be familiar with DeFi design patterns Requirements Currently enrolled or holding a bachelor's degree (or higher) in Computer Science or a related field Proficient in Smart Contract programming languages, such as Solidity, among others Basic understanding of common Smart Contract security vulnerabilities Basic understanding of blockchain and smart contract principles, experienced with reading Blockchain explorers. Well versed with the different types of hacks on smart contracts, and its common attack vectors Well versed with the different types of scams such as Wallet Drainers in the space and how to identify them Familiar with smart contract development testing, transaction analysis, and other tools Experienced in using VSCode, Git, or other version control applications Proficient in Python or another object-oriented programming language Fundamental knowledge of code analysis and program debugging Additional Beneficial Skills Passionate about cryptocurrency / DeFi / smart contract / blockchain Basic knowledge of fuzz testing or static analysis Basic knowledge of detection, exploitation, and prevention of security vulnerabilities Experience in smart contracts development (e.g Foundry, HardHat, etc.) Experience in CTF or bug bounty programs (e.g. Hack The Box, WebGoat, etc.) Experience in Front-end development (React, Javascript, Typescript) Experience in data mining and data analysis of on-chain data Have great interest in Binance, high work enthusiasm and responsibility, good and humble work attitude

Title: English Teacher
Skills: AI, English, Technical Writing, Vietnamese, NLP
Description: About the job DataAnnotation is committed to creating quality AI. Join our team to help train AI chatbots while gaining the flexibility of remote work and choosing your own schedule. We are looking for a bilingual professional to join our team and teach AI chatbots. You will have conversations in both Vietnamese and English with chatbots in order to measure their progress, as well as write novel conversations in order to teach them what to say. Benefits: This is a full-time or part-time REMOTE position You’ll be able to choose which projects you want to work on You can work on your own schedule Projects are paid hourly, starting at $20+ USD per hour, with bonuses for high-quality and high-volume work Responsibilities (both in Vietnamese and English): Come up with diverse conversations over a range of topics Write high-quality answers when given specific prompts Compare the performance of different AI models Research and fact-check AI responses Qualifications: Fluent in Vietnamese + English A bachelor's degree (completed or in progress) Excellent writing and grammar skills Strong research and fact-checking skills to ensure accuracy and originality Note: Payment is made via PayPal. We will never ask for any money from you. PayPal will handle any currency conversions from USD. #vietnamese

Title: AI Engineer
Skills: AI, Python, PyTorch, NLP, FastAPI
Description: About the job Company Description Verysell AI is an AI adviser and solution provider operated as part of the Verysell Group of companies. With a team of 25 professionals across sales, delivery, and operations, including 13 skilled AI/ML engineers, we have been delivering impactful AI solutions for almost 2 years both internally to the group companies and to external clients. As an NVIDIA AI Consulting Partner, we leverage NVIDIA technologies to deliver high-performance AI solutions. We also support sales of SmartDev – a Vietnam-based ITO company with over 5 million USD turnover as an AI competence and delivery center. Applied AI Lab's commercial team, located in London, is focused on the European market. If you are eager to learn, work on real-world AI projects , and be mentored by top AI experts , this is your chance! Job Description Overview: We are hiring an AI Engineer to join our applied AI team focused on Large Language Models (LLMs), chatbots, and intelligent agents. You will be responsible for implementing AI workflows under the guidance of tech leads, contributing to commercial projects involving agentic systems, goal-oriented dialogue, and prompt engineering. Responsibilities: Follow and implement AI solutions as defined by technical leadership. Develop agent workflows and LLM/prompting systems for conversational and goal-directed behavior. Integrate LLM/agent services into production environments. Monitor system performance and reliability. Contribute to client-facing commercial AI projects and be a good team player. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, AI/ML, or a related field. At least 3 years of experience in AI Engineering Strong proficiency in Python. Practical experience with PyTorch, LangChain, LangGraph, or similar frameworks. Solid understanding of LLMs, and agentic design. Experience working with LLMs, prompt engineering, RAG pipelines and vector databases. A good teamplayer and problem solver. Preferred qualifications: Strong command of English (verbal and written). 3+ years of experience in NLP/CV. Familiarity with Vision-Language Models (VLMs). Experience with serving local LLMs and LLM fine-tuning techniques. Backend development skills including: FastAPI, SQL/NoSQL, Docker, Git, AWS. Additional Information 20 annual leave days Premium Health Care MIC Cutting-edge technologies methodology/Agile development Great activities (Team Building, Company Trip, Weekly Happy Friday, …) Work with high-profile multinational companies Hybrid working policy

Title: Software Engineer (Ho Chi Minh)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Python, C#, Java, C++, Agile
Description: About the job As a Software Engineer at Caladan you will be part of a team responsible for owning a business area or application end to end. You’ll be surrounded by smart and motivated colleagues with complimentary skillsets. You’ll have variety in your work and see your code contribute directly to the success of the team. Previous experience in trading on blockchain can be useful, but what really makes our Software Engineers successful is conscientiousness, logic, openness to new ideas and the curiosity to pull on a thread and see where it leads. Be part of an exciting opportunity to build from the ground up. What you'll be doing Design, build, test and deploy proprietary software such as: Trading simulator optimised for distributed computations Large-scale data collection, management and visualisation systems Analytics tools to enable advanced mathematical modelling Post-trade analysis and reconciliation to support efficient operations Document development phases and monitor systems Automate tasks through appropriate tools and scripting The Ideal Candidate 3-8 years of software development experience in small, fast-moving technology-driven companies; some interest or experience in trading or blockchain would be an advantage Fluent with imperative and object-oriented languages; Python, C#, Java or C++ preferred Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, and object-oriented programming Familiarity with network and asynchronous programming, websockets & REST interfaces, agile development Curious, likes problem solving and going down rabbit holes to find answers About Caladan Caladan makes digital asset markets more efficient and fair. We support exchanges, tokens, and institutional investors with on-exchange liquidity, DeFi expertise, treasury solutions, and investments. Since 2017 we've been a pioneer in crypto market-making, powering over $50B in annual transactions across 1000+ assets.

Title: Cybersecurity Research - Fellowship Program (11 August - 3 October)
Salary: Monthly allowance (for 3 day working week ): gross VND 6,000,000
Skills: Cybersecurity, Vulnerability Assessment, Penetration Testing, Networking, English
Description: About the job OPSWAT, a global leader in IT, OT, and ICS critical infrastructure cybersecurity , delivers an end-to-end platform that gives public and private sector organizations and enterprises the critical advantage needed to protect their complex networks, secure their devices, and ensure compliance. Over the last 20 years our commitment to innovative technology has earned the trust of more than 1,700 organizations, governments, and institutions globally, solidifying our role in protecting the world’s critical infrastructure and securing our way of life. OPSWAT’s Critical Infrastructure Cybersecurity - Graduate Fellowship Program 2025 SWAT 3: From 11 August - 3 October OVERVIEW This immersive and hands-on program provides a unique opportunity for graduate students to study and mitigate real-world cybersecurity vulnerabilities affecting critical infrastructure systems. As a participant, you will: Identify and replicate known vulnerabilities in a controlled lab environment, leveraging our OPSWAT Critical Infrastructure Lab's resources. Develop and test exploits related to these vulnerabilities, gaining insight into hacker tactics and methods. Produce comprehensive written reports and visual content (video and images) detailing the vulnerabilities, the reasons behind their occurrence, and their potential impact on critical infrastructure. Scan identified malware and vulnerabilities using OPSWAT's suite of tools, such as the MultiScanner, Deep CDR, Proactive DP, Sandbox, Neuralyzer, and Vulnerability Scanners, and document your findings. Create a defense strategy that outlines protective measures against identified vulnerabilities and similar future threats, backed by your hands-on experience and testing results. PROGRAM STRUCTURE The program consists of 6 modules as below: Module 1: Vulnerability Identification and Replication Start with a known vulnerability (to be provided during the program). Replicate the vulnerability in the OPSWAT Critical Infrastructure Lab. Module 2: Exploit Development Develop an exploit for the identified vulnerability. Test and refine the exploit. Module 3: Analysis and Documentation Investigate and document the reasons the vulnerability occurred and its potential effects on critical infrastructure. Capture your process and findings through video/images, and written reports. Module 4: Scanning and Identification Use OPSWAT's MultiScanner, Sandbox, Neuralyzer, and Vulnerability Scanners to scan and identify the malware and vulnerabilities. Document your scanning results and analysis. Module 5: Defense Strategy Based on your findings, formulate a strategy to defend against the identified vulnerabilities and similar future threats. Write a detailed report and create visual content (diagrams, flowcharts, etc.) to illustrate the defense strategy. Module 6: Final Presentation Compile all your findings, reports, and strategies into a comprehensive document and presentation. Present your work to a panel of cybersecurity experts from OPSWAT for feedback and further learning. Create a video and online material to be published on OPSWAT’s and your university’s website. WHAT WE OFFER YOU By the end of this program, you will gain an in-depth understanding of vulnerability analysis , exploit development , and cybersecurity defense strategies within the context of critical infrastructure. This hands-on, hands-on experience will be invaluable in helping you build and develop your future career in Cybersecurity. You can include this practical exercise in future Master’s and Doctoral Research projects. You will have the opportunity to expose and work on OPSWAT’s Critical Infrastructure Labs . Opportunities to become Intern/FTE of OPSWAT after the program. Other benefits: Monthly allowance (for 3 day working week ): gross VND 6,000,000. Award for individual/team with excellence performance. Parking at the office building. Enjoy full office facilities, with breakfast & afternoon snacks, as well as other people activities. WHAT WE NEEED FROM YOU Final year student or fresh graduate , major in Computer Science who have special interest in Cybersecurity, or Cybersecurity, IT or relevant. Good English communication Strong understanding of any programming languages (OOP, Java, C#, Python, C/C++, ....) Good knowledge of IT & Networking (Active Directory, web security, cloud security, ....) Familiarity with system & database (nice to have OS hardening, SQL security, ....) Nice to have: Cybersecurity knowledge (IAM, authentication security, privilege escalation, ....) Nice to have: Experience with security tools (Metasploit, Burp Suite, BloodHound, Mimikatz,....) Nice to have: Highlight any research, projects, or self-learning efforts related to security topics, OTHERS Quantity: 4 members/swat. Ability to work in the office at least 3 days/week (Mon-Wed-Fri) for a period of 6 weeks in a row. Work location: OPSWAT Vietnam Office, 17th Floor, Saigon Giai Phong Building, 436-438 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai Street, Ward 5, District 3, HCMC. Registration time Application is open from now Please send your application to recvietnam@opswat.com or via our career website Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Title: Solution Architect (Vietnam region)
Skills: API, SDK, JavaScript, Java, Kotlin
Description: About the job Join Airbridge as a Solution Architect, and be part of a fast-growing global B2B SaaS company with a talented team and a cutting-edge product. *We are looking for the candidates who are based on Hanoi or Ho Chi Minh. Recognized as the only official measurement partner in Asia for platforms like Meta, Google, and TikTok, Airbridge is expanding rapidly from our HQ in Korea to North America, Europe, and Southeast Asia. *See our customers Customer Success Team helps clients succeed at every stage—from onboarding to activation—by offering hands-on guidance and long-term support. As part of this team, Solution Architects work closely with clients to help them understand and integrate Airbridge products effectively. You’ll lead technical onboarding, run product demos, provide training and consulting, and create tools and content to support learning. You’ll also share client feedback with the product team to help shape better features. If you're passionate about solving problems, working with people, and making a real impact—Airbridge is looking for you. *Airbridge official web page: https://www.airbridge.io ❖ Opportunities as a Solution Architect Lead Airbridge’s Expansion at the Forefront of the Vietnam Market Airbridge has identified Vietnam as a key strategic hub in the Asian digital advertising landscape, driving aggressive marketing, sales, and customer support initiatives to rapidly scale its presence. As a Solution Architect, you will take the lead in helping customers successfully adopt and activate Airbridge solutions, playing a critical role in accelerating our market dominance. By working closely with local clients to create success stories and channeling field insights back into product improvements, you will help position Airbridge as the top MarTech solution in the Vietnam market. Experience the Core Role of Connecting Product and Market You will work closely with the product team by sharing insights and feedback gathered from the field, contributing directly to the evolution of Airbridge’s offerings. By working with customers across a wide range of industries and scales, you will deepen your understanding of the B2B SaaS landscape and gain valuable experience in global markets. We are looking for Solution Architects who are eager to drive customer success and product innovation at a rapidly growing global SaaS company. ❖ As a Solution Architect, you will: Guide customers through the onboarding process to ensure they can efficiently integrate Airbridge into their services. Enable customers for product usage by identifying how Airbridge can help meet their business objectives and resolve pain points. Assist with event taxonomy and data pipeline based on a solid understanding of SDKs, APIs, and third-party integrations. Become a reliable partner trusted by customers in not only marketing technology but also digital growth. Provide customer feedback to the relevant team internally to help improve Airbridge itself. ❖ We’re looking for talents with: Excellent English communication skills (business professional level) Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Information Technology, Systems Analysis, or a related field 2+ years of experience as a Solution Architect, Solutions Engineer, or in a related role Proficiency in at least one programming language such as Kotlin, Swift, Java, or JavaScript Hands-on experience with SDK or S2S API integration in mobile or web analytics platforms Strong communication skills with the ability to clearly and simply explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders ❖ Optional qualifications are: In-depth understanding of the digital advertising ecosystem (e.g., DSPs, SSPs, Ad Exchanges) and practical experience or strong knowledge of data flow and postback mechanisms across major ad platforms such as Google Ads, Meta, Apple Search Ads, and TikTok Ads Technical ability to understand and design complex data flows and system interactions related to performance tracking, event-based attribution, and cohort analysis Strong collaboration and communication skills with internal and external stakeholders, along with a proactive, execution-oriented mindset to independently define and solve problems Proven project management skills with the ability to handle multiple client projects simultaneously while maintaining quality and meeting deadlines ❖ Hiring process Application submission Review your submitted resume. Pre-assignment After passing the resume screening, you will receive a pre-assignment designed to assess your technical understanding and troubleshooting skills. 1st Interview (English) Once submit the pre-assignment, you will proceed to the first interview discussing the pre-assignment and answer related questions. Also, applicants will be asked questions and converse about the skillset and capacity based on the resume and the pre-assignment. 2nd Interview (English) Interview with the management. For the final round, interviewers will assess the potential and culture fit. -- Airbridge tìm kiếm một Solution Architect tại Việt Nam để mang giá trị kỹ thuật đến gần hơn với khách hàng – đồng hành cùng một sản phẩm toàn cầu, đội ngũ tài năng và thị trường đầy tiềm năng đang phát triển nhanh chóng. *Thông báo tuyển dụng này dành cho các ứng viên sinh sống và làm việc tại Hà Nội hoặc TP. Hồ Chí Minh. Airbridge là đối tác đo lường hiệu suất duy nhất tại châu Á của các nền tảng toàn cầu như Meta, Google, TikTok. Là một startup SaaS B2B với trụ sở chính tại Hàn Quốc, Airbridge đang phát triển nhanh chóng sang các thị trường như Bắc Mỹ, châu Âu và Đông Nam Á. *Tham khảo các khách hàng đang đồng hành cùng Airbridge Đội ngũ Customer Success của Airbridge đóng vai trò then chốt trong việc đảm bảo thành công cho khách hàng – trong suốt hành trình từ onboarding, triển khai đến sử dụng sản phẩm. Với vai trò là một Solution Architect, bạn sẽ hỗ trợ khách hàng về mặt kỹ thuật, giúp họ tích hợp hiệu quả Airbridge thông qua đào tạo, tư vấn, demo sản phẩm và xây dựng các chiến lược. Bạn cũng sẽ thiết kế tài liệu và công cụ hỗ trợ khách hàng tự tìm hướng giải quyết các vấn đề về sản phẩm, đồng thời hợp tác cùng Product team để khai thác phản hồi từ khách hàng nhằm cải tiến và phát triển sản phẩm. *Trang web chính thức Airbridge: https://www.airbridge.io ❖ Cơ hội với vị trí Solution Architect Dẫn dắt sự mở rộng thị trường Việt Nam của Airbridge Airbridge xác định Việt Nam là thị trường chiến lược trọng điểm tại châu Á – trung tâm của quảng cáo số. Chúng tôi đang phát triển nhanh chóng trong thị trường Việt Nam, thông qua đội ngũ về marketing, sales và customer success. Với vai trò là Solution Architect, bạn sẽ đồng hành cùng khách hàng tại Việt Nam để tích hợp sản phẩm thành công và góp phần mở rộng thị phần nhanh chóng. Thông qua sự hợp tác chặt chẽ với các doanh nghiệp địa phương, bạn sẽ tạo nên những case study thành công và giúp Airbridge định hình vị thế là giải pháp MarTech hàng đầu tại Việt Nam. Đóng vai trò then chốt kết nối sản phẩm với thị trường Bạn sẽ làm việc trực tiếp với khách hàng, thu thập feedback và hợp tác với team sản phẩm nhằm cải tiến và phát triển sản phẩm. Bằng cách tiếp xúc với nhiều khách hàng thuộc các lĩnh vực và quy mô khác nhau, bạn sẽ tích lũy được kinh nghiệm đa dạng trong lĩnh vực SaaS B2B và phát triển trong môi trường toàn cầu. ❖ Nhiệm vụ chính: Tư vấn và đồng hành cùng khách hàng Hỗ trợ giải quyết các vấn đề kỹ thuật Xây dựng tài liệu và hỗ trợ khách hàng tự học Cải thiện hệ thống hỗ trợ và chia sẻ kiến thức nội bộ Góp phần hoàn thiện sản phẩm từ góc nhìn người dùng ❖ Yêu cầu ứng viên: Có từ 2 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí liên quan như Solution Architect hoặc Solution Engineer Tốt nghiệp đại học hoặc bậc cao hơn trong các ngành Khoa học máy tính, Công nghệ thông tin, Phân tích hệ thống hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan Kỹ năng giao tiếp tiếng Anh tốt (Business professional level) Thành thạo ít nhất một trong các ngôn ngữ lập trình: Kotlin, Swift, Java, Javascript Có kinh nghiệm tích hợp SDK hoặc S2S API trong các nền tảng phân tích mobile/web Có khả năng truyền đạt khái niệm kỹ thuật một cách rõ ràng, dễ hiểu với các bên không chuyên môn ❖ Ưu tiên: Hiểu biết sâu về hệ sinh thái quảng cáo số (DSP, SSP, Ad Exchange...) và kinh nghiệm thực tế hoặc kiến thức liên quan đến cơ chế dữ liệu/postback của Google Ads, Meta, Apple Search Ads, TikTok Ads Có khả năng phân tích và thiết kế luồng dữ liệu phức tạp như performance tracking, phân bổ theo sự kiện, phân tích cohort Kỹ năng giao tiếp và hợp tác hiệu quả với nhiều bên liên quan, có tinh thần chủ động giải quyết vấn đề Có khả năng quản lý nhiều dự án song song, đảm bảo tiến độ và chất lượng ❖ Quy trình tuyển dụng Phỏng vấn sau khi nộp test (tiếng Anh) Sau khi hồ sơ của bạn vượt qua vòng sàng lọc, bạn sẽ nhận được một bài test nhằm đánh giá kiến thức về mặt kỹ thuật và kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề. Vòng phỏng vấn đầu tiên sau khi nộp bài test sẽ được thực hiện với các thành viên trong team mà bạn có thể sẽ làm việc cùng. Trong buổi phỏng vấn này, bạn sẽ được hỏi về bài test đã nộp và trả lời các câu hỏi liên quan. Dựa trên nội dung CV, bài test, và kinh nghiệm Phỏng vấn 2 (tiếng Anh) Đánh giá mức độ phù hợp với văn hóa công ty. Thỏa thuận hợp đồng Thống nhất điều kiện làm việc và xác nhận thời gian vào công ty.

Title: [HN] Software Engineer (Full-stack,Junior)
Skills: PHP, JavaScript, MySQL, HTML5, CSS3
Description: About the job Mô tả công việc About Us Base.vn is a B2B SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) Company providing technology management solutions for SMEs enterprises. Base will bring to your business the smartest, most modern technology products, based on three main components: Data & Artificial Intelligence (Data & AI), Interaction (Interaction), and Platform platform (Open Platform). And imagination knows no bounds: With whatever application you have or need, Base can help you integrate into a common platform. With a strong belief in young Vietnamese engineers, we are looking for talented Software Engineer for the Platform Team to pursue Base’s mission together: Build great enterprise software for Asia. What You Do From the beginning, you will be guided by Senior Engineer or Team Lead to: Understand the products we‘re passionately building and know what to improve yourself to build them better in the future Understand and respect all the working principles Efficiently work with all the materials Get your very first products - “Starter Project" done, reviewed, and improved Then, you will join a full-cycle buildup apps/features in our platform: Analyze product & Planning Design Database Develop & Test Demo & Launch Maintain & Update new features Who You Are We‘re looking for talented Software Engineers (Junior) to join our team with below traits: Solid knowledge in Algorithms & Data structures Strong knowledge and experience in using any programming language (PHP/Javascript is an advantage) Knowledge or experience in using Restful API, MySQL, HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, AJAX, JSON Understanding of performance optimization or experience in real applications in production, serving large amounts of users and data - is an advantage Desire to participate in building the product "B2B SaaS - Make in Vietnam" Special Benefits WHAT YOU CAN GET Attractive salary package up to 1600$ plus bonus based on performance Flexible evaluation of salary increase (1-2 times/year) commensurate with work results Opportunity to receive ESOP shares (employee stock ownership plan) for outstanding contributors High performance computer and screen Team building, vacation in a year, and other engagement activities Other benefits as prescribed by the Labor Law Personal Development Fast-track career: Join a full cycle of building real products for market and continuously grow with the scalability of products. Unlimited learning opportunities: Enhance your expertise through a comprehensive training program, guidelines from mentors, buddies, and product development challenges. Visible values & impacts: Build world-class and high-performance products that solve pain points for millions of enterprises. Talented colleagues: Work with a team of enthusiastic and professional Product Builders who have already built a highly large-scale system serving 60+ millions of pageviews, hundreds of thousands users each month, and 10,000+ enterprises; and graduated from top universities in Vietnam & the world (Stanford, UCLA, HUST, etc.). GET READY TO BE OUR SOFTWARE ENGINEER! Round 1: CV Application Round 2: Interview Address Office: 16th floor, HUD Building, 37 Le Van Luong, Thanh Xuan, Hanoi.

Title: MLOPS Engineer
Skills: Python, JavaScript, SQL, Kafka, Kubernetes
Description: About the job About Us: Temus is a vision-to-value company based in Singapore. We have strategic consultants, software engineers, human-centric designers, and a cutting-edge AI and Data Team. We help our clients succeed in their digital transformation projects, focusing on sustainability, health, and personal development. Ambitious in the public and private sectors, we have a growing team in Vietnam to support these meaningful initiatives. During Your Working Week, You Will: Collaborate within a cross-functional team to gather requirements, ensure seamless ML flows, and deliver impactful solutions Design, implement, and maintain ML pipelines for LLM-powered products and applications Deploy and monitor machine learning models in production environments using containerization (K8S) and orchestration tools Collaborate with data scientists and engineers to operationalize ML workflows and ensure scalable model deployment Implement MLOps best practices including model versioning, A/B testing, and performance monitoring Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines specifically for ML model deployment and updates Optimize model inference performance and manage model lifecycle from development to production Receive mentorship from your manager to foster your professional growth. Your Profile: Required Qualities: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Proven experience (at least 3 years) in software engineering, architecture design, or a related role. Have complex system design or architecture building experience, and interested in building LLM-powered products. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Javascript, Proficient with SQL & managing data pipelines using Airflow. Experience with common tech components, e.g Redis, Kafka, RDS, K8S, etc. Remote cross-functional collaboration with proven delivery track record Experience with ML platform tools (MLflow, Weights & Biases, or similar) Familiarity with model serving frameworks (TensorFlow Serving, TorchServe, or similar) Desired Experience: Have an understanding of machine learning concepts, search systems and RAG products. Hands-on experience setting up CI/CD pipelines. Personal Attributes: Passionate about GenAI/ML and automation, with a growth mindset Proactive team player who takes initiative to solve problems What We Offer Join a team of 50+ skilled AI/Data Engineers Structured learning and growth opportunities Flexible work-from-home arrangement Competitive compensation package Voice of Your Future Project Lead Bram Desoete : We prioritize good engineering practices above fast and loose types of work. You will work with quality and precision on projects that will impact to Singapore society. Be ready to embrace newer approaches like LLM’s to speed up our combined delivery & productivity. Equal Opportunities Temus welcomes everyone. We do not treat people differently because of their race, religion, age, disability, gender, or any other reason. We value the diversity of our team and work hard to keep it that way.

Title: Data Scientist ( Banking/Fintech )
Skills: Data Analysis, Machine Learning, Python, R, MLOps
Description: About the job Địa điểm làm việc : 98Hoàng Quốc Việt, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội Loại hình công việc : Toàn thời gian cố định (Từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6) Mức đãi ngộ : 20- 40 triệu Mô tả công việc : - Phân tích, khai phá dữ liệu lớn từ các đối tác. - Xây dựng mô hình chuyên biệt cho từng nhóm sản phẩm (vay, thẻ tín dụng) phục vụ cho khách hàng cá nhân và hộ kinh doanh, doanh nghiệp. - Xây dựng các mô hình tìm kiếm khách hàng, mô hình chấm điểm gian lân/tín nhiệm, các mô hình cảnh báo sớm phục vụ cho các sản phẩm tài chính. - Xây dựng pipeline, triển khai công cụ MLOPs. - Phân tích và diễn giải các mô hình học máy. - Monitor và liên tục tối ưu chất lượng của các mô hình. Yêu cầu công việc : - Có background trong khoa học máy tính, trí tuệ nhân tạo, thông kê, toán tin hoặc các lĩnh vực có liên quan. - Có kỹ năng phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề tốt. - Có khẳ năng tự học, tự nghiên cứu, làm việc độc lập. - Có kỹ năng trình bày kết quả cho người nghe là kỹ thuật và kinh doanh. - Thành thạo một trong các ngôn ngữ/ công cụ: Python, R. Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng spark/pyspark là một điểm cộng.

Title: Standard Cell Designer
Skills: Design, Simulation, Scripting, Automation Test, English
Description: About the job Who we are: At UST, we help the world’s best organizations grow and succeed through transformation. Bringing together the right talent, tools, and ideas, we work with our client to co-create lasting change. Together, with over 30,000 employees in 25 countries, we build for boundless impact—touching billions of lives in the process. Visit us at www.UST.com We are looking for a talented and detail-oriented Standard Cell Design Engineer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and optimizing logic cells to enable efficient, high-performance System-on-Chips (SoCs). This is a remote position open to candidates with 3 to 7 years of relevant experience. Working location: Malaysia/ Vietnam, working remotely Key Responsibilities Responsible for developing and optimizing logic cells including combinational and sequential cells for efficient and high performance SoCs. Design and simulate standard cells for deep sub-micron CMOS / FinFET technologies. Logic libraries and cells should be tuned in accordance with performance, power and manufacturing requirements. Familiarity with scripting and automations is a plus. Requirements 3 – 7 years of experience in standard cell design and optimization. Why Join Us? Flexible remote working environment. Opportunity to work on cutting-edge semiconductor technologies. Collaborative and supportive team culture. Competitive compensation and career growth opportunities. Contact Ms. Anna - Whatsapp: +84 935059669 Email: anh.thivannguyen@ ust.com

Title: Sports Statistician (Data Collection)
Skills: English
Description: About the job JOIN OUR TEAM AT GENIUS SPORTS! WHO ARE WE? Genius Sports is the official data, technology, and commercial partner driving the connection between sports, betting, and media on a global scale. Our mission is to create a more sustainable sports data network powered by rich, official live data. To achieve this, we're seeking enthusiastic Statisticians to join our team and collect match data while attending live sporting events. ARE YOU PASSIONATE ABOUT FOOTBALL? If you love football and want to be part of the action while getting paid, this is your opportunity! We are looking for individuals in the Ninh Binh area to collect official live data from football events. As a Statistician, you will use our user-friendly smartphone-enabled software to report live events, including every shot, goal, tackle, and save. Don’t worry if you lack previous reporting experience - we provide comprehensive e-learning courses and practical training to ensure you’re fully prepared to cover live games. This is the perfect chance for sports enthusiasts to earn extra income while doing something they love. WHAT WE OFFER: Guaranteed base pay of €35 per game A performance-based reward system Coverage of travel expenses If you’re eager to immerse yourself in the world of sports and want to be part of our global network of statisticians, we want to hear from you! JOB REQUIREMENTS: Basic level in English Regular availability for a few hours on weekends and weekday evenings Familiarity with using a smartphone Willingness to travel A strong knowledge of football Reliability, commitment, organization, and integrity Exceptional attention to detail GET TO KNOW US: For more information about our mission and values, visit: Genius Sports ARE YOU READY TO JOIN THE GENIUS SPORTS TEAM? If you’re excited about this opportunity, we’d love to hear from you! Apply now and become a vital part of our team!

Title: Senior Data Engineer, Flink
Skills: Kafka, AWS, Kubernetes, Java, Scala
Description: About the job Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team The Streaming Data team (a.k.a. "Coban") strives to ensure seamless and secure real-time access to the continuous events or "streams", serving as Grab's unified, common access pattern for real-time data. We build the infrastructure and platform for writing, consuming real-time data, and provide a cost-effective, managed "NoOps" service for all product teams to leverage. We work with our sister teams in DataTech to provide integrated data platforms that ensure everyday opportunities with big data innovation. Get to Know the Role As a Data Engineer, your role calls for being able to work across our stack, from Flink and Kafka to AWS cloud infrastructure, Kubernetes, observability and SRE, not only in practical hands-on building of systems and code, but also driving higher-level discussions around architecture and design. You will work onsite at Grab Vietnam office, either CMC Creative Space, D7 (HCMC) or PVI Building (Hanoi) and report to Senior Data Engineering Manager, who is based in Singapore. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform Work with a team of cross functional engineers to make Stream Processing easy, reliable, efficient and secure across Grab, via self-served capabilities baked in our platform. Create the abstractions, modules and libraries to lower the barrier of entry to Stream Processing in Grab and shift the maintenance and security toil away from our users. Improve the automation and self-served capabilities that enable our small team to support 1000+ Stream Processing applications in Grab. Weigh in on design questions around platformization, infrastructure, observability and security, and work with (and build over the platforms provided by) our infrastructure team. Contribute to the use of Stream Processing across Grab, by evangelizing for our platform and products, and by directly helping our internal users design and build the next game-changing real-time application for Grab. Participate in and evolve on-call and incident response procedures for the team. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need 4+ years of experience in software engineering, data engineering, or information security disciplines. Worked and operated Stream Processing pipelines in production (Flink or Spark Streaming). Hands-on competencies with Kafka and programming experience with Scala or Java. (This role does involve being able to be in the trenches!). You are excited to learn and apply new technologies. The Nice-to-haves Experience with Kafka Connect, Kubernetes, Go, Gitlab CI, AWS, Terraform. Experience with a data warehouse like Spark Additional Information Life at Grab We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer: We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges. Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours What We Stand For At Grab We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Title: Chuyên gia giải pháp tìm kiếm, Nhóm Giải pháp quảng cáo gTech
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Data Analysis, English, Business Intelligence, Stakeholder management, CRM
Description: About the job Please visit this Google Careers posting for the English-translated version of this role. Minimum qualifications: Bằng cử nhân hoặc kinh nghiệm thực tế tương đương. 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực truyền thông kỹ thuật số hoặc giải pháp tiếp thị/quảng cáo kỹ thuật số, triển khai và đo lường hiệu quả của các chiến dịch, cũng như cung cấp giải pháp cho khách hàng. Preferred qualifications: Có kinh nghiệm phân tích dữ liệu, diễn giải các tập dữ liệu phức tạp, xác định xu hướng và trình bày kết quả tìm được theo cách lôi cuốn, thuyết phục. Có kinh nghiệm về đo lường hiệu quả tiếp thị. Có kiến thức về các sản phẩm Tìm kiếm, thị trường quảng cáo dựa trên hiệu suất hoặc bối cảnh quảng cáo trực tuyến. Nắm rõ các kỹ thuật đo lường hiệu quả tiếp thị, bao gồm cả kiểm tra mức độ gia tăng, lập mô hình truyền thông hỗn hợp và lập mô hình phân bổ. Có kỹ năng xuất sắc trong việc xây dựng mối quan hệ, cộng tác, thương lượng và tạo ảnh hưởng, cùng khả năng làm việc liên ngành với nhiều nhóm và bên liên quan. Khả năng giao tiếp lưu loát bằng cả tiếng Việt và tiếng Anh vì vai trò này yêu cầu bạn phải làm việc với khách hàng tại Việt Nam. About The Job Bộ phận Quảng cáo gTech chịu trách nhiệm cung cấp tất cả dịch vụ hỗ trợ, truyền thông và kỹ thuật cho khách hàng thuộc mọi quy mô đối với toàn bộ các sản phẩm Quảng cáo của Google. Chúng tôi giúp khách hàng khai thác triệt để các sản phẩm Quảng cáo và sản phẩm dành cho Nhà xuất bản, đồng thời hướng dẫn khách hàng khi họ cần trợ giúp. Chúng tôi cung cấp một loạt các dịch vụ, từ việc giúp khách hàng tự giải quyết vấn đề hiệu quả hơn và hỗ trợ ngay trong sản phẩm, cho đến nâng cao chất lượng hỗ trợ thông qua việc tương tác, thiết lập tài khoản và triển khai chiến dịch quảng cáo, cung cấp giải pháp truyền thông theo nhu cầu kinh doanh và tiếp thị của khách hàng, cũng như giải pháp kỹ thuật và đo lường phức tạp, đồng thời hỗ trợ tư vấn cho các khách hàng lớn. Các giải pháp này có thể được thiết kế riêng và điều chỉnh phù hợp với từng khách hàng, hoặc có thể mở rộng cho hàng triệu khách hàng trên toàn thế giới. Dựa trên nhu cầu ngày càng tăng của khách hàng đối với dịch vụ quảng cáo, chúng tôi hợp tác với nhóm Bán hàng, nhóm Sản phẩm và Kỹ thuật tại Google để phát triển những giải pháp, công cụ và dịch vụ tốt hơn, nhằm cải thiện sản phẩm và nâng cao trải nghiệm cho khách hàng. Là một bộ phận liên ngành và hoạt động trên toàn cầu, chúng tôi đảm bảo khách hàng nhận được lợi tức đầu tư tối ưu từ Google và chúng tôi sẽ luôn là một đối tác đáng tin cậy. Nhóm Giải pháp quảng cáo gTech phối hợp với Khối Khách hàng chiến lược (LCS) để cung cấp kiến thức chuyên môn dựa trên sản phẩm và dữ liệu nhằm hỗ trợ những khách hàng lớn nhất và phức tạp nhất của chúng tôi đạt được mục tiêu quảng cáo. Khối Khách hàng chiến lược hợp tác chặt chẽ với các nhà quảng cáo và công ty quảng cáo lớn nhất thế giới để phát triển các giải pháp kỹ thuật số, giúp xây dựng doanh nghiệp và thương hiệu vững mạnh. Nhóm chúng tôi sẽ chứng kiến những sự thay đổi mạnh mẽ khi quảng cáo chuyển sang các nền tảng trực tuyến và di động, đồng thời có vị thế đặc biệt để giúp các công ty định hình cách phát triển hoạt động kinh doanh trong thời đại số Google tạo ra các dịch vụ và sản phẩm để giúp thế giới trở thành một nơi tốt đẹp hơn, còn gTech có vai trò triển khai những dịch vụ, sản phẩm đó. Đội ngũ cố vấn đáng tin cậy của chúng tôi hỗ trợ khách hàng trên toàn cầu. Chúng tôi đưa ra các giải pháp dựa trên năng lực kỹ thuật, chuyên môn về sản phẩm và việc hiểu rõ nhu cầu phức tạp của khách hàng. Dù đó là giải pháp riêng cho một vấn đề đặc biệt hay một công cụ mới có thể được sử dụng trên toàn Google, thì mọi việc chúng tôi làm đều nhằm đảm bảo lợi ích cho khách hàng từ toàn bộ tiềm năng của các sản phẩm mà Google cung cấp. Để tìm hiểu thêm về gTech, vui lòng xem video của chúng tôi. Responsibilities Trở thành một chuyên viên tư vấn đáng tin cậy cho khách hàng Google Ads qua việc hiểu rõ cách mà các giải pháp công nghệ và tiếp thị kỹ thuật số có thể giải quyết những vấn đề kinh doanh của họ, cũng như thiết kế kế hoạch truyền thông và triển khai các giải pháp kỹ thuật. Xây dựng mối quan hệ và hợp tác một cách hiệu quả với các nhà quảng cáo bên ngoài để đạt được kết quả kinh doanh bằng cách sử dụng các chiến dịch trên Google Ads, thúc đẩy việc sử dụng sản phẩm và tăng trưởng kinh doanh trong suốt vòng đời của doanh nghiệp. Cộng tác một cách hiệu quả với các nhà cung cấp và nhóm bán hàng để thúc đẩy kế hoạch tăng trưởng cho khách hàng. Nâng cao kiến thức về thị trường cũng như môi trường hoạt động liên quan cho ngành dọc và ngành dọc phụ, đồng thời ứng dụng kiến thức đó vào việc cung cấp giải pháp. Đóng vai trò là chuyên gia sản phẩm Tìm kiếm của khách hàng bằng cách tư vấn và cung cấp các giải pháp tiếp thị kỹ thuật số, đồng thời giúp khách hàng nâng cao kiến thức, kỹ năng và sự trưởng thành về mặt kỹ thuật số. Đề xuất các tính năng sản phẩm mới mang lại lợi ích cho khách hàng, cũng như hỗ trợ khách hàng sử dụng các sản phẩm mới thông qua quá trình thiết lập/triển khai, nâng cấp và di chuyển dữ liệu. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

Title: [BGSV] Senior AI Engineer / Data Scientist
Skills: Python, Machine Learning, NLP, Azure, Docker
Description: About the job COMPANY INFORMATION Bosch Global Software Technologies Vietnam (BGSV) i s 100% owned subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH - one of the world’s leading global suppliers of technology and services, offering end-to-end Engineering, IT, and Business Solutions. Starting its operation from 2010 at Etown 2 in HCMC, BGSV is the first software development center of Bosch in Southeast Asia. BGSV nowadays have over 4,000 associates, with a global footprint and presence in the US, Europe, and the Asia Pacific region. With our unique ability to offer end-to-end solutions that connect sensors, software, and services, we enable businesses to move from the traditional to digital or improve businesses by introducing a digital element in their products and processes. JOB DESCRIPTION We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior AI Engineer / Data Scientist to join our dynamic group. In this pivotal role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing cutting-edge (Generative) AI solutions leveraging Python, Machine Learning, Large Language Models (LLMs), and classical Natural Language Processing (NLP) methodologies. You will collaborate closely with two expert teams to analyze large datasets, build robust models, and create innovative solutions. Additionally, you will play a key role in guiding junior colleagues and may take on topic leadership for specific areas. This position demands a high degree of adaptability and willingness to contribute to both short-term, agile projects and longer-term strategic developments, such as an in-house developed chat system. Your contribution will be crucial in ensuring we always have up-to-date and demonstrable solutions readily available for pre-sales activities and rapid prototyping. Location: This position is open for talents in Ho Chi Minh City & Hanoi Key Responsibilities: • Design & Development: Design, develop, and implement advanced machine learning algorithms, models, and LLM-based pipelines. • Data Analysis & Insights: Analyze large datasets to extract meaningful insights and patterns. • Software Engineering: Write production-quality code in Python, adhering to standard software engineering best practices (Git, testing, etc.). A strong focus will be on backend development using FastAPI and leveraging Azure SDKs. Support basic front-end development tasks. • Collaboration & Problem Solving: Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams to identify, understand, and solve complex business problems. • Technology Adoption: Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI, GenAI, and data science, actively integrating new technologies where beneficial. • Integration & Deployment: Work closely with software engineers to integrate AI models into production systems and package AI components for reusability. • Mentorship & Leadership: Provide guidance and mentorship to junior data scientists and engineers, potentially leading specific topics or initiatives. • MLOps & Infrastructure: Contribute to the development of robust MLOps pipelines (CI/CD for ML) and apply strong skills in Docker and container orchestration. • Strategic Evaluation: Research and evaluate external AI services versus in-house development ("Make or Buy") in a global context, assessing feasibility and ROI. • Agile Contribution: Support highly volatile projects on demand and contribute to rapid prototyping and continuous improvement. Develop use cases and demos for pre-sales purposes, ensuring consistently updated versions. Requirements Academic Background: • At least a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field. Technical Skillset (Mandatory): • Experience: Minimum of 5 years of experience in data science and AI engineering. • Software development: o Strong proficiency in Python (backend development with FastAPI, Azure SDKs/Libraries/APIs). o Proficiency in NodeJS. o Basic skills in front-end development. • Machine Learning & Deep Learning: o In-depth knowledge of machine learning algorithms and techniques. o Proficiency in common machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch). • LLMs & NLP: o Extensive experience with Large Language Models (LLMs) like GPT, BERT, Claude. o Experience with RAG or agent frameworks (e.g., Langchain, LLamaIndex). o Proficiency in Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques and libraries. • Cloud Environment: o Familiarity with Azure & Enterprise IaaS / PaaS, with a strong focus on the Azure EcoSystem. o Ability to adapt to other cloud platforms (AWS, GCP) if needed. o Basic experience in infrastructure automation (e.g., Terraform) is a plus. • Data Storage & Vector Stores: o Interaction with Azure Tables and Qdrant Vector Store. • DevOps/MLOps: o Strong Docker skills and experience with container orchestration. o Experience with MLOps (CI/CD for ML). o Ability to package AI components for reusability. Soft Skills (Mandatory): • Problem-Solving & Analytical: Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. • Communication: o Excellent communication and collaboration abilities. o Clear and proactive communication skills, emphasizing transparency. o Fluent in English (written and verbal). o Ability to convey complex technical topics to non-technical stakeholders. • Teamwork & Initiative: o Ability to work independently and strong motivation to integrate into and shape an international team environment. o Experience working with distributed teams and adapting to time zone differences. o Proven experience with remote collaboration tools. • Work Ethic: o Strong attention to detail and ability to plan and prioritize tasks. o Constructive feedback culture. o Iterative development, rapid prototyping, continuous improvement. o Flexibility to adapt to changing requirements. • Intercultural Competence: Respect for cultural differences and international business protocols. • Continuous Learning: Openness to continuous learning and integration into company structures. • Business Acumen: Ability to quick assessment of feasibility and ROI. WHY BOSCH? Because we do not just follow trends, we create them. Together we turn ideas into reality, working every day to make the world of tomorrow a better place. Do you have high standards when it comes to your job? So do we. At Bosch, you will discover more than just work. Benefits and Career Opportunities Working in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam and Top 30 of the Most Innovative Companies all over the world Join in a dynamic and fast-growing global company ( English-speaking environment), with opportunity to work in global projects and being a part of innovation team contributing initiative ideas to the hi-tech world Onsite opportunities : short-term and long-term assignments in worldwide offices Engage in our diverse training programs which surely help strengthen both your personal and professionalism 13th-month salary bonus + attractive performance bonus (you'll love it!) + annual performance appraisal 100% offered salary and mandatory social insurances in 2-month probation 15++ days of annual leave + 1-day of birthday leave Premium health insurance for employee and 02 family members Flexible working time Lunch and parking allowance Good benefits of company activities such as: football, badminton, yoga, Aerobic, team building…

Title: Back End Developer
Skills: AWS, API, Python, NodeJS, PostgreSql
Description: About the job We’re building a platform of autonomous AI agents for data collection, labeling, and intelligent analysis — and we’re looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to power this system. You will architect and implement core services that interface with LangGraph-based workflows, manage data access from structured and unstructured sources, and support seamless orchestration between our AI layers and data infrastructure. The ideal candidate is comfortable working with AWS Bedrock, vector databases, and building APIs optimized for AI-scale interaction. Responsibilities Build performant, production-grade backend APIs and services using AWS Lambda, EC2, and RDS. Integrate structured and unstructured data access layers with LangGraph and LangSmith agents. Architect retrieval pipelines using vector databases to enable semantic search for AI agents. Coordinate with data engineers to support RAG workflows across a shared data lake. Develop and maintain task routing, memory management, and agent orchestration logic. Contribute to platform-level observability, metrics, logging, and diagnostics for agentic tasks. Deploy and manage MCP servers to wrap scraping, proxy, and JS-rendering tooling as standardized Model Context Protocol (MCP) services. Requirements 4+ years of backend development experience, with strong programming skills (Python, Node.js). Deep experience with serverless architectures, microservices, and AWS (Lambda, EC2, RDS). Familiarity with LangGraph, LangChain, or equivalent AI orchestration frameworks. Working knowledge of vector databases (Chroma, Pinecone) and semantic search. Solid database and API design expertise, particularly with PostgreSQL. Experience building scalable, low-latency backend systems for AI or data platforms. Preferred Qualifications Experience with agentic AI systems or orchestration of multi-agent workflows. Understanding of RAG patterns in production. Comfortable with Databricks and Unity Catalog data integration strategies. Exposure to AWS Bedrock and large model orchestration in cloud-native environments. About ActiveFence ActiveFence is the leading provider of security and safety solutions for online experiences, safeguarding more than 3 billion users, top foundation models, and the world’s largest enterprises and tech platforms every day. As a trusted ally to major technology firms and Fortune 500 brands that build user-generated and GenAI products, ActiveFence empowers security, AI, and policy teams with low-latency Real-Time Guardrails and a continuous Red Teaming program that pressure-tests systems with adversarial prompts and emerging threat techniques. Powered by deep threat intelligence, unmatched harmful-content detection, and coverage of 117+ languages, ActiveFence enables organizations to deliver engaging and trustworthy experiences at global scale while operating safely and responsibly across all threat landscapes.
