We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

Title: Lead Software Engineer, Customer Data Platform
Skills: Python, Golang, AWS, Apache Spark, Apache Flink
Description: About the job Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team Clickstream Intelligence Platform (Scribe) is Grab's in-house app instrumentation and insights platform that captures and analyzes user clickstream activity across all Grab apps. It supports observability, real-time personalization, and business analytics by processing tens of billions of events per hour at petabyte scale. The platform is built on a high-throughput backend leveraging event gateways, Kafka, Flink, and Spark pipelines, along with in-house tooling for schema validation and instrumentation testing to ensure high-quality data at source. Customer Data Platform (CDP) enables Grab Teams to onboard and register Grab's customer data and make it available for Online Serving, ML Models, Segmentation, and Real Time targeting to power personalization use cases across the company. Our platform is leveraged across many mission critical Grab services such as app personalization, experimentation, ads serving, and marketing. Get to Know the Role We are looking for a Technical Lead for either Scribe or CDP team that has a strong breadth of a wide range of technical stacks Web Portal: React.JS and Golang Backend. Online Serving: Golang Backend, AWS infrastructure, MySQL, Redis, AWS Dynamo DB, Scylla DB. Data Processing / Storage: Apache Flink, Apache Spark, Trino, StarRocks, Hive, Delta Lake. Applied AI / ML: LLM, Python Backend, Vector DB. The role will report to Engineering Manager in Singapore and work onsite at Grab Vietnam office (CMC CREATIVE SPACE, D.7, HCMC). The Critical Tasks You Will Perform Building platform capabilities to facilitate scalable onboarding of user data that can be easily re-used across the company. Improving the serving capabilities of CDP's user data. Building out scalable real-time data pipelines and architecture that is cost efficient, while enabling non-technical teams to leverage these real time capabilities. Leading and mentoring an engineering team with diverse technical stacks. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need Software Engineering, Computer Science, or related undergraduate degree. You have 5+ years of experience in Software Engineering with experience leading an engineering team with diverse skillsets. Proficient in at least one of the following: Python, Go, or Scala and strong appetite to learn other programming languages. Experience building software leveraging AI / ML to drive business impact or outcomes. Experience developing large scale backend systems and has good understanding of technical trade offs and evaluations needed to enable high load, low latency systems, while maintaining system reliability and cost efficiency. Good understanding of data modelling (i.e. fact vs dimension data). Strong English communications with prior work experience in regional & global environment Desirable Experience Experience with data processing technologies such as Apache Flink (for real-time processing) and Apache Spark (for batch processing). Proficiency in CI/CD tools and good understanding of AWS, Terraform, and Kubernetes. Additional Information Life at Grab We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer: We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges. Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours What We Stand For At Grab We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Discover new ISV workflows, identify blockers to ISV adoption, and share with product teams. Drive early adoption of new products and support launch and go-to-market activities. Collaborate with NVDIA partner managers, solution architects, industry business development managers, sales and marketing. We make heavy use of conferencing tools, but some travel is required. You are empowered to find the best way to get your job done and do what it takes to make our partners successful. Experience with NVIDIA products and SDKs (e.g. NIMs, NeMo, CUDA, CUDA-X Libraries) Strong curiosity about understanding new technologies and adept at conveying their value to business executives and software development leaders. Demonstrated experience working across multiple countries in the region Excellent written and oral communication skills in English Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd Experience with deep learning and/or other AI technologies Experience working with AI companies (startups and solution delivery partners) serving solutions for the public sector PhD in a technical field Experience working for a company based in the US Able to converse in multiple regional languages NVIDIA is widely considered to be one of the technology world’s most desirable employers! We have some of the most forward-thinking and hardworking people in the world working for us. If you're creative and autonomous, we want to hear from you! JR1998498

Title: OPSWAT’s Critical Infrastructure Cybersecurity - Graduate Fellowship Program 2025
Skills: cybersecurity, vulnerability assessment, exploit development, information security, english
Description: About the job OPSWAT’s Critical Infrastructure Cybersecurity - Graduate Fellowship Program 2025 Program Overview This immersive and hands-on program provides a unique opportunity for graduate students to study and mitigate real-world cybersecurity vulnerabilities affecting critical infrastructure systems. As a participant, you will: Identify and replicate known vulnerabilities in a controlled lab environment, leveraging our OPSWAT Critical Infrastructure Lab's resources. Develop and test exploits related to these vulnerabilities, gaining insight into hacker tactics and methods. Produce comprehensive written reports and visual content (video and images) detailing the vulnerabilities, the reasons behind their occurrence, and their potential impact on critical infrastructure. Scan identified malware and vulnerabilities using OPSWAT's suite of tools, such as the MultiScanner, Deep CDR, Proactive DP, Sandbox, Neuralyzer, and Vulnerability Scanners, and document your findings. Create a defense strategy that outlines protective measures against identified vulnerabilities and similar future threats, backed by your hands-on experience and testing results. Program Structure The program consists of 6 modules as below: Module 1: Vulnerability Identification and Replication Start with a known vulnerability (to be provided during the program). Replicate the vulnerability in the OPSWAT Critical Infrastructure Lab. Module 2: Exploit Development Develop an exploit for the identified vulnerability. Test and refine the exploit. Module 3: Analysis and Documentation Investigate and document the reasons the vulnerability occurred and its potential effects on critical infrastructure. Capture your process and findings through video/images, and written reports. Module 4: Scanning and Identification Use OPSWAT's MultiScanner, Sandbox, Neuralyzer, and Vulnerability Scanners to scan and identify the malware and vulnerabilities. Document your scanning results and analysis. Module 5: Defense Strategy Based on your findings, formulate a strategy to defend against the identified vulnerabilities and similar future threats. Write a detailed report and create visual content (diagrams, flowcharts, etc.) to illustrate the defense strategy. Module 6: Final Presentation Compile all your findings, reports, and strategies into a comprehensive document and presentation. Present your work to a panel of cybersecurity experts from OPSWAT for feedback and further learning. Create a video and online material to be published on OPSWAT’s and your university’s website. What we offer you? By the end of this program, you will gain an in-depth understanding of vulnerability analysis, exploit development, and cybersecurity defense strategies within the context of critical infrastructure. This hands-on, hands-on experience will be invaluable in helping you build and develop your future career in Cybersecurity. You can include this practical exercise in future Master’s and Doctoral Research projects. You will have the opportunity to expose and work on OPSWAT’s Critical Infrastructure Labs. Opportunities to become Intern/FTE of OPSWAT after the program. Other benefits: Monthly allowance (for 3 day working week): gross VND 6,000,000. Award for individual/team with excellence performance. Parking at the office building. Enjoy full office facilities, with breakfast & afternoon snacks, as well as other people activities. What we need from you? Final year student or fresh graduate, major in Cybersecurity, IT or Computer Science who have special interest in Cybersecurity. Good English communication Quantity: 4 members/swat. Ability to work in the office at least 3 days/week (Mon-Wed-Fri) for a period of 6 weeks in a row. Starting from Aug 11th, 2025 Work location OPSWAT Vietnam Office, 17th Floor, Saigon Giai Phong Building, 436-438 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai Street, Ward 5, District 3, HCMC. Registration time Application is open from now Please send your application to thao.nguyen@opswat.com Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Title: Data Engineer
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Data Engineer, Python, SQL, Big Data, Cloud
Description: About the job Founded in Switzerland in 1968, Zühlke is owned by its partners and located across Europe and Asia. We are a global transformation partner, with engineering and innovation in our DNA. We're trusted to help clients envision and build their businesses for the future – to run smarter today while adapting for tomorrow’s markets, customers, and communities. Our multidisciplinary teams specialise in tech strategy and business innovation, digital solutions and applications, and device and systems engineering. We excel in complex, regulated spaces including health and finance, connecting strategy, tech implementation, and operational services to help clients become more effective, resilient businesses. If you share our values and want to do the best work, for the right reasons, we can offer you the chance to do it on a global scale and play a real role in shaping our exciting journey. What Working At Zuhlke Is All About. We work on Projects for purpose , making it our mission to give our work a deeper meaning, ensuring we are focused on creating positive change through technology and digital innovation. We are Flexible, offering a variety of working options to cater to our people’s needs. We pride ourselves on having a Growth mindset with a strong learning culture and we invest in learning and development but also believe strongly in learning on the job and through mentorship and coaching. Sustainability is one of our top strategic goals. We are carbon neutral as a business, and we are strategically positioning our business offerings in decarbonisation, healthcare and green energy to help clients develop sustainable digital solutions. We care about the work we do. Diversity and inclusion are also high on the agenda. We are constantly looking to improve and develop, increasing diversity and developing a more inclusive workplace for all. Your Role Includes Being a trusted advisor, guiding our customers towards a successful technical solution to their data challenges. Communicating the what, why and how of proposed solutions to technical and non-technical stakeholders. Underatanding the big data world whilst developing, testing, and monitoring distributed data processing pipelines. Extrapolating versatile data sets and sources to produce high quality, reproducible datasets in a scalable and maintainable way. Collaborating with different data roles such as Architects, Software Engineers and Data Scientists with ease. Understanding the needs of multiple types of producers and consumers for our data services, ensuring our products meet their requirements. Delivering projects in an Agile way, building iteratively to produce value from data early and frequently. Keeping yourself technically sharp, being open to learning new concepts and technologies. Working collaboratively with colleagues and clients, be it onsite, in the Zuhlke office, or from home. We would love to hear from you if you have ANY of the following: Skills We encourage our data engineers to be open to learn new technology on a project-by-project basis. We are looking for Data Engineers who have a sample of the following skills and experience: At least 4 years of experience in total at Data Engineer or at a similar role Experience of designing, building and maintaining data products that meet the needs of data consumers. An understanding of common approaches to data analysis, machine learning and data visualisation so you can produce the right data for data consumers. Experience with a variety of approaches to data architectures (e.g. Data Lake, Data Mesh, Data Warehouse, streaming, batch processing) Hands-on experience with databases both relational and NoSQL. Familiarity with big data infrastructures and concepts for storing and processing large and/or heterogeneous data volumes. Practical knowledge of handling varied types of structured and unstructured data (text, tabular, graph, time-series, geospatial, image, etc.). Working knowledge of containerisation and public and private Cloud environments. Knowledgeable about information security and data governance. Excellent and practical data programming skills with experience in different programming languages like Java or Python. You have experience delivering projects to deadlines, with an emphasis on quality, ideally in client facing contexts. You would have the opportunity to work with a variety of technologies and tools, including: Programming Languages – Java, Python, SQL. Cloud environments – AWS/GCP/Azure Big Data Frameworks – Hadoop, Spark, Kafka Databases - PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Hive Orchestration and Containerisation – Airflow, Docker Behaviours You’re open, proactive, responding to changes quickly and with agility while learning in the process You maximise benefit as simply as possible but as complexly as needed You recognise and seize opportunities confidently and take an entrepreneurial approach You focus on the customer and guide them from the concept phase through to market success You’re able to persuade people through clear communication, negotiation skills, empathy and an ability to see things from others’ perspective You establish long-term, partnership-oriented relationships and develop and maintain them You think and act in the interests of the organisation as a whole and utilise synergies You take personal initiative in confronting obstacles and failures, have an optimistic overall attitude and take measures to ensure performance in the long term Learn more about a career in Data Engineering at Zuhlke. Even if you feel you don't meet all the requirements yet, we are still happy to get to know you, learn more about your ambitions and ideas and look forward to receiving your application! We are Stonewall Diversity Champions. Stonewall is an organisation who is committed to LGBTQ+ inclusion and provides guidance to companies who are members and share the same values. We welcome people from all backgrounds, regardless of their gender, personality, national origin, race, religion, colour, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, marital status, disability or veteran status. If you feel you don't meet all the requirements, we are still happy to get to know you, learn more about your ambitions and ideas and look forward to receiving your application! We welcome people from all backgrounds, regardless of their gender, personality, national origin, race, religion, colour, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, marital status, disability or veteran status.

Description: About the job MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC: Thiết kế và phát triển các hệ thống web/app ứng dụng tích hợp AI theo yêu cầu . Tích hợp và phát triển các mô hình AI/ML thông qua Vertex AI để giải quyết các bài toán nghiệp vụ theo yêu cầu khách hàng. Phát triển các API backend mạnh mẽ và có khả năng mở rộng bằng cách sử dụng các ngôn ngữ lập trình như Node.js hoặc Python, và triển khai chúng trên các dịch vụ Cloud của GCP như Cloud Run, Cloud Functions hoặc App Engine. Làm việc với các hệ quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu (SQL và NoSQL) như Cloud SQL (PostgreSQL/MySQL), Firestore, MongoDB để thiết kế schema, tối ưu hóa truy vấn và quản lý dữ liệu cho các ứng dụng AI. Tham gia vào toàn bộ vòng đời phát triển phần mềm, từ phân tích yêu cầu, thiết kế kiến trúc AI-driven, phát triển, kiểm thử, triển khai đến bảo trì các giải pháp. Tham gia vào tự động hóa việc triển khai ứng dụng trên Cloud (CI/CD). Nghiên cứu và áp dụng các công nghệ AI và Cloud mới nhất để liên tục cải thiện và đổi mới sản phẩm. YÊU CẦU: Bằng cấp Đại học Công nghệ Thông tin hoặc tương đương.. Có chứng chỉ Google Cloud Professional Certified là điểm cộng. Tối thiểu 3 năm kinh nghiệm lập trình web Thành thạo Python (Flask hoặc FastAPI), biết cách tổ chức backend đơn giản Có kinh nghiệm React: đủ để xây dựng UI mới hoặc chỉnh sửa theo yêu cầu Đã từng triển khai project thực tế (demo, POC hoặc MVP) cho khách hàng Có khả năng deploy local/test/prod: dùng GCP, Firebase, Docker hoặc các nền tảng tương đương Kỹ năng debug, đọc log, xử lý lỗi kết nối, API, môi trường Ưu tiên từng làm việc ở các đội R&D, startup, hoặc sản phẩm AI/Cloud QUYỀN LỢI: Thu nhập thương lượng và cạnh tranh căn cứ theo năng lực. Các khoản hỗ trợ: ăn trưa, máy tính, điện thoại, gửi xe,... Thưởng: Thưởng Lễ, Tết, Thưởng kinh doanh, Thưởng lợi nhuận, Thưởng dự án, Thưởng KPI, Commission,...tùy theo mỗi vị trí Chế độ nâng lương: đánh giá, điều chỉnh 1 lần/ năm. Được tham gia BHXH, BHYT, BHTN đầy đủ theo quy định của pháp luật Phúc lợi khác: Bảo hiểm sức khỏe GMS-care; Khám sức khỏe định kỳ; Du lịch; Teambuilding, ... Thời gian làm việc: Thứ 2 đến thứ 6 hàng tuần. Nghỉ phép: tối thiểu 12 ngày phép/năm, chính sách nghỉ phép tăng thêm theo level Phát triển nghề nghiệp: Cơ hội tham gia các khóa đào tạo chuyên môn được cấp chứng chỉ CNTT Quốc tế miễn phí; tiếp cận những công nghệ mới nhất; Cơ hội tham gia các dự án với các đối tác lớn và cộng tác với những chuyên gia hàng đầu; Cơ hội khẳng định năng lực bản thân và thăng tiến trong sự nghiệp. Được làm việc trong môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, năng động, sáng tạo, cởi mở và tôn trọng.

Title: Senior Data Engineer (Hanoi)
Skills: Python, Scala, SQL, Spark, CI/CD
Description: About the job A. Job Responsibilities: Lead the team technically in improving scalability, stability and efficiency of our Data platform Design, build and deploy new libraries and frameworks for our core systems while keeping highest standards of code quality Cooperate with other engineers and Product owners to identify and build incremental products through Scrum sprint Understand the following technologies and navigate them properly: Python, Scala, Spark, SQL etc. Collaborate with the Data Architect team on regular basic to design/review data models, and application architectures Maintain software clean architecture, clean code, and high quality. Participate in code reviews, pair programming, mob programming, and coaching other members B. Job Requirements: 1. Must have: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology, or a related technical field English is required Have 5+ years of experience as a Data Engineer or Software Engineer Have experience in Cloud (AWS/Azure/GCP) Extremely proficient in at least 1 programming language (Python/Scala/Java) Strong experience in systems architecture – particularly in complex, scalable, and fault-tolerant distributed systems Good at multi-threading, atomic operations, computation framework: Spark (DataFrame, SQL, ...), distributed storage, distributed computing Understand designs of resilience, fault-tolerance, high availability, and high scalability, ... Tools: CI/CD, Gitlab, ... Good at communication & team working Being open-minded, willing to learn new things 2. Nice to have: Databricks is a plus Experience in performance tuning/optimizing Big Data programs

Title: Fullstack Engineer (Typescript/English Fluency)
Salary: Negotiable + competitive allowance (lunch, living allowance, beauty care, Japanese and IT certificates, etc.)
Skills: ReactJS, NextJS, TypeScript, API, PostgreSql
Description: About the job WHAT WE DO At Sun Asterisk, we build cutting-edge, high-performance systems to tackle complex challenges. As a developer, you will: Develop frontend and backend features using React, Next.js, and tRPC. Build responsive UI components and seamless user experiences for AI tool creation. Design and implement backend business logic and API layers with tRPC. Integrate and optimize database queries using Prisma and Kysely. Collaborate with Product and AI teams to ensure feature completeness and performance.Ensure quality via code reviews, testing (unit/integration), and observability. WHO YOU ARE #Experience Requirements Mandatory Skills 3+ years of experience as a Full Stack or Frontend/Backend Engineer. Proficiency with TypeScript and React. Experience building apps with Next.js (preferably using App Router). Solid backend experience with tRPC or similar RPC/GraphQL APIs. Familiarity with PostgreSQL and query performance optimization. Experience using Prisma, Kysely, or any modern query builders. Good communication skills, team-oriented, and comfortable in startup-paced environments. Desired Skills Familiarity with AI tools or LLM-powered platforms. Experience with Neon PostgreSQL or serverless databases. Experience with Tailwind CSS, Zod, Vercel, or PlanetScale. Understanding of Edge Functions or Serverless API patterns. #Skill requirements Excellent English communication skills Outstanding teamwork abilities Proven ability to prioritize and allocate work Sharp critical thinking and logical reasoning Effective problem-solving skills #Attitude Requirements Customer-centric mindset Adaptability to change Commitment to continuous learning and growth BENEFITS AND PERKS Professional, open-minded, and creative environment: Work with colleagues who embrace ideas to change the society Respect different perspectives within a team Strong learning culture that promotes individual development The culture of taking risks to experience and thrive Focus on individual development Be consulted, accompanied, and supported in career development with the career path system (developing in expertise or management direction) that has been studied and tested for many years. Be oriented for individual, group, and organizational goals Be empowered Be supported to define a 3-month or 6-month goal (Goal Define Support) Get access to company Learning Hub online library with various courses provided by Udemy, LinkedIn,… Special care for employees Salary: Negotiable + competitive allowance (lunch, living allowance, beauty care, Japanese and IT certificates, etc.) 13th-month salary bonus Performance review: Twice/a year Hybrid working policy; flexible check-in, check-out Comprehensive health insurance Sun* Care Seniority Allowance Women care allowance: Women’s physiological leave: 2.5 hours/month; Postpartum leave for female employees with under 1-year-old children: 1 hour/day Policies supporting learning activities, knowledge sharing, and cultural exchange (Technology Seminar – Tech Expert, Club: Reading, Japanese, Music Club, …) Annual company trip and quarterly team-building activities CONTACT: Email: chu.thi.hong.ngoc@sun-asterisk.com

Title: DATA ENGINEER
Salary: Thu nhập cạnh tranh, thỏa thuận theo năng lực.
Skills: Data Engineer, SQL, Python, ETL, Data Modeling
Description: About the job This job is sourced from a job board. Learn More Tổng quan: Viettel Software cung cấp dịch vụ gia công phần mềm, dịch vụ nhân sự Công nghệ Thông tin chất lượng cao, cung cấp các sản phẩm CNTT theo nhu cầu khách hàng, thị trường,…thuộc tập đoàn Viettel. Tham Gia Cùng Chúng Tôi Để Cùng Thực Hiện Sứ Mệnh Tiên Phong Kiến Tạo Xã Hội Số Tại Việt Nam Và Có Cơ Hội Thử thách và phát triển cùng các dự án Công nghệ thực tiễn với quy mô lớn trong và ngoài nước Sự nghiệp thăng tiến không giới hạn Thu nhập hấp dẫn, đãi ngộ toàn diện Mô tả công việc Tham gia thiết kế và phát triển các data pipeline xử lý dữ liệu phục vụ nhu cầu phân tích, báo cáo và các hệ thống dữ liệu nội bộ của công ty và khách hàng. Phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan(Business Analyst, DevOps, Stakeholder…) để triển khai, vận hành và tối ưu hệ thống dữ liệu trên môi trường thực tế. Chuẩn hoá chất lượng, độ tin cậy và tính bảo mật của dữ liệu. Thiết kế và triển khai các mô hình dữ liệu theo kiến trúc Dimensional Modeling. Nghiên cứu và ứng dụng các công nghệ mới trong xử lý dữ liệu như streaming, data lake house, distributed system, ... Thực hiện các công việc chuyên môn khác theo yêu cầu của quản lý. Yêu cầu Ít nhất 3 năm kinh nghiệm Data Engineer, đã thiết kế và triển khai ít nhất 1 dự án Data Warehouse từ đầu đến cuối. Thiết kế cấu trúc dữ liệu theo mô hình Dimensional Modeling (bắt buộc) Thành thạo Python & SQL trong xử lý và chuyển đổi dữ liệu. Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các hệ thống phân tán trên hạ tầng on-prems như: Apache Spark, Hadoop, … Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ Orchestration như: Airflow, Mage, Dragster,... Hiểu rõ và có kinh nghiệm làm việc thực tế với các hệ thống OLTP và OLAP. Có kinh nghiệm thiết kế, triển khai và bảo trì các luồng ETL. Có khả năng nắm bắt các kiến thức nghiệp vụ nhanh chóng. Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các công cụ BI (Power BI, Tableau,...) Chế độ Chế Độ Lương, Thưởng, Thu Nhập Thu nhập cạnh tranh, thỏa thuận theo năng lực. Phúc lợi: Tối thiểu 13 tháng lương/năm; Thưởng Bonus, Hỗ trợ ăn trưa, điện thoại… upto 2M Nghỉ mát, thưởng ngày lễ và các ngày chỉ có ở Viettel như Ngày Sáng Tạo - 1/6, 22/12, quà Tết Dương, Tết Âm tri ân Gia đình, người sinh thành (PACKAGE 20-30M/năm). Nghỉ phép năm: 16 ngày/năm Đánh giá xét tăng lương 2 lần/năm Được đóng đầy đủ bảo hiểm xã hội, bảo hiểm y tế + bảo hiểm sức khỏe ABIC. Môi trường làm việc Được làm việc trong Tập đoàn toàn cầu, tiên phong thực hiện sứ mệnh kiến tạo xã hội số. Môi trường mở, trẻ trung, năng động, trân trọng, yêu thương, tương hỗ & lắng nghe mỗi người từ những ý tưởng nhỏ nhất. Không gian làm việc xanh, mở, hiện đại. Cơ hội phát triển bản thân Có cơ hội thử sức trong lĩnh vực công nghệ tiên tiến, hiện đại nhất. Được thử sức với các dự án hấp dẫn, thử thách đủ lớn trong và ngoài nước để trưởng thành. Được trao quyền sáng tạo với đam mê của tuổi trẻ. Cơ hội học hỏi từ các chuyên gia hàng đầu, lãnh đạo và đồng nghiệp ưu tú. Cơ hội được đào tạo, trau dồi kỹ năng, chuyên môn để phát triển toàn diện. Desired Skills and Experience PostgreSQL, Data Engineering, SQL, Python, Hadoop

Title: ESL Teacher
Skills: AI, English, Vietnamese, Technical Writing, Research
Description: About the job DataAnnotation is committed to creating quality AI. Join our team to help train AI chatbots while gaining the flexibility of remote work and choosing your own schedule. We are looking for a bilingual professional to join our team and teach AI chatbots. You will have conversations in both Vietnamese and English with chatbots in order to measure their progress, as well as write novel conversations in order to teach them what to say. Benefits: This is a full-time or part-time REMOTE position You’ll be able to choose which projects you want to work on You can work on your own schedule Projects are paid hourly, starting at $20+ USD per hour, with bonuses for high-quality and high-volume work Responsibilities (both in Vietnamese and English): Come up with diverse conversations over a range of topics Write high-quality answers when given specific prompts Compare the performance of different AI models Research and fact-check AI responses Qualifications: Fluent in Vietnamese + English A bachelor's degree (completed or in progress) Excellent writing and grammar skills Strong research and fact-checking skills to ensure accuracy and originality Note: Payment is made via PayPal. We will never ask for any money from you. PayPal will handle any currency conversions from USD.

Title: Performance Test Engineer
Skills: Performance testing, Gatling, Jmeter, SQL, Java
Description: About the job Location: Ho Chi Minh (hybrid working, 2 day office/week) Main Responsibilities Analyse test results, liaise with technical teams, manage corrective actions, and assist with root cause analysis of performance issues Assess the performance of microservices to non-functional requirements and plan the approach for how they will be performance benchmarked Implement defined performance monitoring configuration, ensuring that all necessary system metrics are captured during test execution Provide consultancy to performance improvements for the new features entering production Undertake testing activities (e.g. stress, soak, load, break) as required in relation to software solutions ensuring they meet agreed non-functional specifications Coach, mentor & guidance of other team members & continuous skill uplift across the asset Lead performance engineering, end-to-end performance testing automation and Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) implementation In conjunction with Service Reliability Engineering and developers to ensure the coding & software solutions meet agreed non-functional requirements and improve, enhance test environments as necessary Have the ability to lead Agile team - collaborating with Product Owners (POs)/Business Analysts (BAs) and developers to understand/translate into Non-Functional Requirements (NFRs) Have the ability to develop or influence NFRs at early stages and modelling appropriate performance scenarios for simulation Fulfil other tasks as assigned by your People Leader and/or authorized representative of NAB Vietnam from time to time Your skills and experience Must-have skills: Performance testing/engineering experience - risk assessment, planning, scripting, execution, reporting Performance tools – Gatling, Jmeter, K6 and other tools Stubbing with tools such as WireMock Monitoring tooling – AppDynamics/New Relic/Dynatrace/Introscope, Splunk/AWS Log Insights, Cloudwatch Experience with programming – Java (springboot), Scala, Node.js, GraphQL, Python, SQL. Use of workflow management tools such as Jira, Rally Nice-to-have ISTQB – Certified Experience in the Banking or Financial Services industry Exposure to AWS and cloud-native architecture Experienced testing on a Microservice-based system (Restful API, Event/ Message driven, Logging) Familiar with CI/CD process and tools: Jenkins, Docker, AWS, Azure, … Why you'll love working here 1. Generous compensation and benefit package Attractive salary and benefits 20-day annual leave and 7-day sick leave, etc. 13th month salary and Annual Performance Bonus Premium healthcare for yourself and family members 2. Exciting career and development opportunities Large scale products with modern technologies in banking domain Clear roadmap for career advancement in both technical and leadership pathways Sponsored certificates in both IT and banking/finance Premium accounts on Udemy/A Cloud Guru/Coursera/LinkedIn, etc. English learning with native teachers 3. Professional and engaging working environment Hybrid working model and excellent work-life balance Well-equipped & modern Agile office with fully-stocked pantry Annual company trip and events A DIVERSE AND INCLUSIVE WORKPLACE WORKS BETTER FOR EVERYONE NAB is a place where colleagues of all genders, sexualities and ages, carers and colleagues with disability, and colleagues from all cultures, races and religions have the opportunity to thrive, connect and grow. If this excites you, let's have a chat over a cup of coffee!

Title: Database Administrator (Middle/Senior)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Database, PL/SQL, Linux, Unix, Oracle
Description: About the job Who are we? Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success. At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like: Brief Call : Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you! Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities! Case study : Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc. As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience. We look forward to meeting you! Job Description ABOUT THE JOB Perform daily database system administration tasks. Implement and manage backup and recovery processes for database systems. Collaborate with relevant teams for issue resolution and project coordination. Configure and monitor disaster recovery systems (DC-DR) using Oracle Data Guard. Support system failover and switchover between data centers (DC-DR). Install, configure, patch, and upgrade database systems. Troubleshoot incidents, review logs, resolve system alerts, and handle other database-related issues. Prepare regular reports on system health, performance, and capacity planning. About You Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or related technical fields. From 3-5 years of experience in database administration. Proficient in Oracle 10g, 11g, and 19c, including OCI. Strong understanding of Linux/Unix environments. Skilled in scripting with Shell and PL/SQL for task automation. Possess Oracle Certified Professional (OCP) certification. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work collaboratively. WHY AMARIS? Competitive salary and 13th-month salary 14+ annual leaves per year Premium healthcare insurance, starting from your probation period Project reviews and yearly performance appraisals Annual company trips Teambuilding activities: Team lunch/dinner, events, and celebrations, sports clubs (football, yoga, badminton, etc.) International team with flexible working time + hybrid working Tailor-made career path Technical workshops and training courses Mobility: Opportunities to be on-site abroad in our offices in over 60+ countries Equal Opportunity Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics. Desired Skills and Experience Linux, Unix, Oracle Cloud, PL/SQL

Title: [Vietnamese only] Fullstack Developer (TypeScript, Python, NextJS) remote - Vietnamese Candidate with Strong English Skills
Skills: typescript, python, nextjs, postgresql, terraform
Description: About the job Fullstack Developer (TypeScript, Python, NextJS) remote - Vietnamese candidate with strong English skills Working hours : Mon – Fri, 8:30am – 12:00pm and 1:00pm – 05:30pm - UTC+7 (Vietnam time) I. Responsibility Develop and maintain web applications using TypeScript and Python Build and optimize user interfaces with Next.js Work with PostgreSQL for data storage and management Deploy infrastructure using Terraform Use GitHub Actions for CI/CD pipelines Host and manage services on Azure Integrate OpenAI and ComfyUI into product features Implement authentication using Supertokens Integrate payment systems with Adyen Track and analyze user behavior using Segment, MixPanel, and Snowflake Use VS Code, GitHub Copilot, and Cursor for daily development II. Requirement Minimum 4 years of experience working with: TypeScript, Python, Next.js, PostgreSQL, Terraform, Azure, related tools as listed above Strong experience in fullstack development and modern web technologies Proficient in English communication (both written and spoken) III. Benefit Salary: $1400 - $1600 Remote 100% - long term contract Support from PM and teammate

Title: Quản lý đối tác chiến lược, Bộ phận Ứng dụng T1 (tiếng Anh, tiếng Việt)
Location: Củ Chi, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: English, Vietnamese, Business Development, Data Analysis, Firebase
Description: About the job Chúng tôi hiện đang tuyển vị trí này cho 2 địa điểm: Việt Nam và Singapore. Tuy nhiên, xin lưu ý rằng kể từ quý 1 năm 2026, vị trí này sẽ làm việc tại Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh (Việt Nam). Ứng viên ở Singapore: Google sẽ ưu tiên những ứng viên hiện có quyền làm việc ở Singapore và không cần Google bảo lãnh thị thực. Please visit this Google Careers posting for the English-translated version of this role. Note: By applying to this position you will have an opportunity to share your preferred working location from the following: Singapore; Ho Chi Minh, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam . Minimum qualifications: Bằng cử nhân hoặc kinh nghiệm thực tế tương đương. 4 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực quảng cáo kỹ thuật số, tư vấn bán hàng, phát triển kinh doanh hoặc tiếp thị kỹ thuật số. Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các Nhà phát triển ứng dụng, Nhà xuất bản, Nhà quảng cáo, Công ty quảng cáo hoặc khách hàng. Khả năng giao tiếp lưu loát bằng cả tiếng Anh và tiếng Việt để hỗ trợ việc quản lý quan hệ khách hàng ở khu vực này. Preferred qualifications: Có kinh nghiệm về quảng cáo trực tuyến hoặc các giải pháp giúp doanh nghiệp tạo doanh thu từ quảng cáo (ví dụ: Google Ad Manager, AdMob) và hiểu biết về lĩnh vực quảng cáo có lập trình. Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ điều tra (ví dụ: Google Analytics, Firebase) và công cụ tự động (ví dụ: bảng tính, bảng tổng hợp, phần mềm, cơ sở dữ liệu và các công cụ khác). Có kinh nghiệm xây dựng mối quan hệ với các quản lý cấp cao. Dày dạn kinh nghiệm về quản lý quy trình kinh doanh và các ngành dọc: Ứng dụng trò chơi di động, Ứng dụng lối sống và Ứng dụng tiện ích. Có khả năng sắp xếp, phân tích và giải quyết các vấn đề kinh doanh, chú ý đến chi tiết và đạt được mục tiêu kinh doanh. About The Job Google luôn nỗ lực phát triển các dòng sản phẩm và dịch vụ của mình. Nhóm Phát triển quan hệ đối tác có trách nhiệm tìm kiếm và khám phá cơ hội mới với các đối tác của Google. Với sự nhạy bén trong kinh doanh và kiến thức sâu rộng về sản phẩm, bạn sẽ là người trực tiếp làm việc với các đối tác của chúng tôi, giúp họ tìm ra cách tăng trưởng thông qua các dịch vụ và sản phẩm mới nhất của Google. Kiến thức của bạn về những ngành dọc có liên quan và mối quan hệ với các bên chủ chốt trong ngành sẽ góp phần tạo nên các ứng dụng và nội dung tuyệt vời của chúng tôi cho các sản phẩm như YouTube, Google TV và Commerce. Ở vai trò Quản lý đối tác chiến lược, bạn sẽ thúc đẩy mối quan hệ đối tác với các nhà phát triển ứng dụng trên khắp Đông Nam Á (SEAS), đặc biệt tập trung vào Việt Nam. Bạn sẽ giúp các đối tác này phát triển mạnh hoạt động kinh doanh thông qua các giải pháp kinh doanh đầu ngành của chúng tôi, trong đó AdMob là giải pháp cốt lõi. Trọng tâm của bạn sẽ là các nhà phát triển ứng dụng di động trong môi trường không ngừng thay đổi tại Việt Nam. Nhóm Quan hệ đối tác toàn cầu chịu trách nhiệm khám phá cơ hội mới với các đối tác của Google. Đội ngũ Quan hệ đối tác toàn cầu của chúng tôi làm việc với nhiều đối tác để thúc đẩy hoạt động kinh doanh của họ bằng những sản phẩm và dịch vụ tốt nhất của Google. Nhóm Quan hệ đối tác toàn cầu hỗ trợ các nhóm Sản phẩm trong nội bộ Google qua các mối quan hệ đối tác cần thiết để nâng cao trải nghiệm người dùng của chúng tôi trên các sản phẩm quảng cáo, Tìm kiếm, Trợ lý, Maps, Du lịch, Mua sắm, Thanh toán và nhiều sản phẩm khác. Các nhóm tạo quan hệ đối tác cho mục đích hỗ trợ sản phẩm, xây dựng chiến lược đưa ra thị trường và thúc đẩy tăng trưởng kinh doanh cho nhiều sản phẩm. Responsibilities Phát triển và mở rộng các mối quan hệ đối tác kinh doanh với các nhà phát triển ứng dụng, xác định và tối đa hoá cơ hội kinh doanh trong cộng đồng người Việt. Xây dựng quy trình kinh doanh mới thông qua việc tương tác trực tiếp và các chiến lược, đặc biệt tập trung vào các ngành dọc như Ứng dụng trò chơi và Ứng dụng tiện ích. Phối hợp với các nhóm nội bộ để giải quyết các vấn đề của đối tác và đảm bảo việc chuyển giao trơn tru cho Nhóm Quản lý tài khoản. Tiến hành phân tích dựa trên dữ liệu để xác định cơ hội kinh doanh và phát triển sản phẩm, góp phần vào sự tăng trưởng của nền tảng và hoạt động kinh doanh của Google. Cung cấp các giải pháp tạo doanh thu và nền tảng kinh doanh. Xác định các cơ hội mới để giúp đối tác đạt được mục tiêu kinh doanh của họ. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

Title: Freelance Illustrator
Skills: Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, InDesign, Motion Design, English
Description: About the job Position Summary: We are seeking an Illustrator to join our team and help us execute new and innovative content creation projects within TransPerfect ContentLabs. This person will play a vital role in corporate and product marketing and must demonstrate exceptional knowledge and experience in Illustration, graphic design, and working with Adobe Creative Suite. Create complex illustration, graphics, animation and live video content for a diverse array of media, including smartphones, handheld electronic devices, the web and television, among others. Other projects can include title and post-production work, as well as multimedia campaigns, promotional products, technical illustrations and computer artwork for use in a variety of materials. Position responsibilities: Design and create graphics and illustrations for presentations, videos, motion graphics, brand, social media and more. Brainstorming and developing of concepts and ideas. Collaborate with internal teams to define design styles, approach and conceptualization. Working together with animator and illustrators, Content Managers and Scriptwriters. Painting by hand and using drawing/design applications to design original graphics. Assisting with video editing when needed. Ensuring company branding standards are met in all areas of production operations. Maintain and follow best practices for versioning control, naming convention and organization of graphic files. Preferred but not essential: Develop videos from beginning to end (illustration, design and animation). Essential skills and experience required: Knowledgeable and has great ability with Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign, microsoft PPT, After Effects and Premiere Passion for digital media and the graphic world Creative with illustration abilities Passionate about communication through media and motion graphics design Able to work under strict deadlines Proactive and autonomous, and also enjoys and is able to work in teams An artistic background with a portfolio Having knowledge of 3D software such as Cinema 4D, Blender, etc., is preferred but not essential Native level of Vietnamese and Business level English

Title: Talent Acquisition (Campus Hiring)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Stakeholder management, Project Management, English, Leadership, Business Administration
Description: About the job About the company Hytech is a leading management consulting firm headquartered in Australia and Singapore, specializing in digital transformation for fintech and financial services companies. We provide comprehensive consulting solutions, as well as middle- and back-office support, to empower our clients with streamlined operations and cutting-edge strategies. With a global team of over 2,000 professionals, Hytech has established a strong presence worldwide, with offices in Australia, Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan, Philippines, Thailand, Morocco, Cyprus, and more. About the Role We are seeking a proactive and relationship-driven University Partnerships & Graduate Talent Program Coordinator to support our go-to-market strategy in Vietnam. This individual will play a pivotal role in launching and managing internship and graduate recruitment initiatives by building strong partnerships with local universities and vocational institutions. Job Responsibility Program Development & Implementation Design and implement a comprehensive internship and graduate trainee program aligned with business needs. Define program structure, selection criteria, learning outcomes, and evaluation metrics. Collaborate with internal stakeholders to identify talent needs across departments. University Engagement & Relationship Management Build and manage strategic relationships with key universities, career centers, student clubs, and academic departments. Coordinate and attend career fairs, info sessions, and university events to promote the organization and its talent programs. Negotiate partnership agreements and MOUs with selected institutions. Talent Acquisition & Candidate Experience Drive campus recruitment campaigns including sourcing, screening, interviewing, and onboarding interns and graduate hires. Ensure a seamless and positive candidate experience throughout the process. Coordinate assessments, group exercises, and other selection methodologies. Employer Branding & Marketing Work closely with the marketing team to build a strong employer brand on campus through social media, student ambassadorships, and targeted content. Develop collateral such as brochures, presentations, and promotional materials tailored to Vietnamese student audiences. Program Evaluation & Reporting Track and analyze key metrics (e.g., conversion rates, performance, retention). Provide regular updates and recommendations to leadership on program effectiveness and continuous improvement opportunities. Qualifications & Experience: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Education, or related field. 3+ years of experience in university relations, campus recruitment, talent development, or related roles in Vietnam. Strong understanding of the Vietnamese higher education landscape and student employment trends. Experience in building early-career programs (internships, MT programs, etc.) is highly preferred. Skills & Competencies: Excellent interpersonal and stakeholder management skills. Strong project management and organizational skills. Bilingual in Vietnamese and English (written and spoken) is required. Passion for youth development and early-career talent.

Title: Lead Software Engineer, Flink
Skills: Kafka, Kubernetes, AWS, Java, Scala
Description: About the job Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team The Streaming Data team (a.k.a. "Coban") strives to ensure seamless and secure real-time access to the continuous events or "streams", serving as Grab's unified, common access pattern for real-time data. We build the infrastructure and platform for writing, consuming real-time data, and provide a cost-effective, managed "NoOps" service for all product teams to leverage. We work with our sister teams in DataTech to provide integrated data platforms that ensure everyday opportunities with big data innovation. Get to Know the Role Our Lead Engineers are expected to lead mid to large sized projects across a Tech Family (or vertical) and to be a technical mentor and go-to person in a team of 3 to 5 senior engineers. As a Lead Software Engineer, your role calls for being able to work across our stack, from Flink and Kafka to AWS cloud infrastructure, Kubernetes, observability and SRE, not only in practical hands-on building of systems and code, but also driving higher-level discussions around architecture and design. You will work onsite at Grab Vietnam office, either CMC Creative Space, D7 (HCMC) or PVI Building (Hanoi) and report to Senior Data Engineering Manager, who is based in Singapore. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform Work with a team of cross functional engineers to make Stream Processing easy, reliable, efficient and secure across Grab, through self-served capabilities baked in our platform. Create the abstractions, modules and libraries to lower the barrier of entry to Stream Processing in Grab and shift the maintenance and security toil away from our users. Improve the automation and self-served capabilities that allow our small team to support 1000+ Stream Processing applications in Grab. Weigh in on design questions around platformization, infrastructure, observability and security, and work with (and build over the platforms provided by) our infrastructure team. Drive the adoption of Stream Processing across Grab, by evangelizing for our platform and products, and by directly helping our internal users develop the next game-changing real-time application for Grab. Be responsible for the definition and evolution of platform availability and reliability SLAs (dashboards, compliance), and participate in and evolve on-call and incident response procedures for the team. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need 7+ years leading teams or projects in software engineering, data engineering, or information security disciplines. Worked and operated Stream Processing pipelines in production (Flink or Spark Streaming). Hands-on competencies with Kafka and programming experience with Scala or Java. (This role does involve being able to be in the trenches!). You are excited to learn and apply new technologies. The Nice-to-haves Experience with Kafka Connect, Kubernetes, Go, Gitlab CI, AWS, Terraform. Experience with a data warehouse like Spark Additional Information Life at Grab We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer: We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges. Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours What We Stand For At Grab We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Title: Fresher IT Customer Support (Japanese fluently, up to 30mil gross)
Skills: IT Support, Japanese, English, Microsoft Dynamics 365, Microsoft Azure
Description: About the job COMPANY INTRODUCTION We are, iTechwx, established in mid-2022, with 600 employees across 3 offices within Ho Chi Minh City. iTechwx dedicates the One-Stop Digital Transformation Service to our customers. Renowned for delivering premium IT outsourcing services exclusively tailored for Microsoft clients for 4 products: Microsoft Dynamics 365, Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Windows Commercial, Microsoft Office 365. YOU WILL: ● Reviews issues and contacts customers to understand issues. ● Ensures customers stay informed as to the status/solution of their issue. Utilizes troubleshooting tools (e.g., event logs, and performance traces) to help resolve customer issues. ● Resolves or escalates multiple and varied customer issues. Documents technical work and research. ● Analyzes problems and develops solutions for customer needs using log analysis and other proprietary tools. ● Collaborates on cross-team and cross-product technical issues by working with resources from other groups as needed to resolve moderately complex customer issues. ● Attends readiness training and non-technical training to ensure that they become proficient in support topics. Product/Process Improvement ● Provides feedback to improve products to more senior engineers or technical advisors. ● Identifies potential defects and escalates to more senior engineers to resolve. ● Provides feedback on how to improve automated tools. ● Attends case triage meetings or case discussions to collaborate and share ideas to resolve problems OUR IDEAL CANDIDATES: ● Proficient in Japanese (4 skills) (Advanced level) (N1, N2 cert is preferred) ● Can understand English technical document, and have basic English conversation skills ● Willing to work during Tet and holidays (with a salary up to four times the normal rate) ● Customer service mindset WHY US? ● Salary offer: upto 30million gross ● Salary at 100% during the probationary period ● 90% contribution of the gross salary to social insurance ● 20 days leave (12 days of annual leave and 8 days of sick leave) ● Training will be offered ● Full working equipment will be provided Annual Health Checkup ● Activities: Birthday party, Employee engagement activities.

Title: Software Engineer Intern (Foreign Candidate, Fixed Term)
Location: Đà Nang, Da Nang City, Vietnam
Skills: Software Architecture, English, Testing, Java, Technical Writing
Description: About the job About Sioux Sioux Group was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in the Netherlands. With over 1100 engineers, Sioux supports the R&D activities of leading high-tech companies. Sioux aims to add value to its clients and build innovative solutions that contribute to a smarter, safer, healthier, and more sustainable society. At Sioux, we strive for a Culture of Excellence and grow our employees with challenging projects. As a Software Engineer at Sioux, you’ll have: Challenging projects: work with global clients who are giant tech corporations to build complex high-tech software Growing opportunity: Work with experts from around the world with a quality mindset A Sincere, Open, and Fair culture We are looking for international candidates to join us as Software Engineer Interns in Da Nang - an exciting opportunity to gain hands-on experience and immerse yourself in Vietnamese culture About This Position Sioux Vietnam is looking for going-to-be-employee interns who possess strong logical thinking, love to code-on, and want to make a difference by bringing high-tech to life. By joining this program, you’ll have a chance to work in a young, dynamic professional working environment composed of talented engineers from all levels. You’ll enhance your technical skills by working with advanced technologies, being mentored by fellow Senior Software Engineers, and working on challenging real projects. You will gain tremendous experience in multiple functional areas, setting the stage for a well-rounded Software Engineering career while enjoying authentic company culture. This program is open to 3rd or final year international students or fresh IT graduates who can join a 2-month internship in Da Nang. THE SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE SHALL POSSESS International candidates only 3rd or last year student/ fresh graduates Passion for new technology Candidates who can come to Da Nang, work full-time/part-time within the 2-month period of the program (a least 24 hours/week) Good educational results Good fundamental background & logical thinking Good communication skills Good English (both verbal and written) Proactive and learning mindset THE SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL ENJOY: Training & Development program: We believe that your career is your adventure. So we’ll invest in your development from your first day and make sure you have all the training you need. You can look forward to being mentored by some of our Senior Engineers. The training you’ll receive will be widespread and practical. It will combine sessions that focus on critical soft skills as well as the technical skills you’ll need to develop into a trusted and successful Software Engineer. Reward & Benefits: Because we’re always competing to attract and retain the very best people, we continuously review our rewards strategy to make sure it’s the best it can be. Our internship benefits include: Internship allowance: 5,000,000 VND (:190$) Visa application will be handled by us for your entry into Vietnam Paid leave: 1 day/month Various company activities: Team buildings, Year-End Party, Company Trip, Snack Day, Lunch&Learn, Football Club, etc Free food and drink in the office APPLICATION PROCESS: Your CV will be carefully reviewed and selected for coming rounds (online): Round 1: HR screening We will have a screening session (15-20 minutes) with you after receiving your CV to further check your English and expectations. Round 2: Interview (With HR and Hiring Manager) At this round, we will assess your technical skills, culture fit, and soft skills which are essential to succeed in the role. We are not expecting candidates to be able to complete all tasks correctly but give it your best shot. This will be a good opportunity to find out more about life at Sioux and ask any questions you might have regarding training, projects ad career opportunities. This part is where you will have an opportunity to demonstrate your aptitude, skills, and potential for the role. STAY INFORMED Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/siouxhightechsoftware/ Website: https://www.siouxtechnologies.com/en/ Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sioux-high-tech-software-b49b3977/ CONTACT Email: hr.vn@sioux.asia/ jobs.vn@sioux.asia HR Hotline: +84 236 3 888 756 (8:00 - 17:30 | Mon-Fri)

Title: English Teacher
Skills: English, Technical Writing, Communication, AI, Leadership
Description: About the job Your responsibilities Deliver English training classes following the defined curriculum Assess English skills before learners' enrollment and at the end of the course Coordinate with the Learning & Development Department to organize classes (schedule, admission, assessment, survey, etc.) and other activities such as the speaking club/contest Report to the L&D manager on activities, including: Learning survey Training status Analysis of training effectiveness and proposals for improvement Other statistics and reports as requested Review and correct English texts or documents from other departments, such as newsletters, internal communications, and social media posts (<10% of effort) Develop and continuously improve English training programs for different levels of learners, such as communication, presentation, business writing, etc. Interview candidates for recruitment to assess their English communication skills Your qualifications Native English speaker with a neutral accent (ideally USA) Holder of one of the following certificates or diplomas: CELTA (Certificate in English Language Teaching to Adults - Cambridge) TESOL (Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages) DELTA (Diploma in English Language Teaching to Adults) - advanced, for experienced teachers Skills assessment: assess learners' English skills pre- and post-class to direct them to the appropriate curriculum Curriculum design: collect the goals of learners, assess their needs, and propose tailored classes, such as interviewing for a job, writing a business email, attending online meetings, delivering tech-talks… ESP: experience in teaching Business English or ESP (English for Specific Purposes) Flexibility: adapt training material and schedule to the different populations (Gen-Z, senior, etc.) Digital tools: leverage modern training tools such as GoFluent, AI, podcasts, etc. Passionate about teaching English and improving learners' skills Time management: self-organize and work autonomously Curiosity: Open to learn new skills and trying new teaching methods Others: Support other departments in reviewing English documents Interview candidates to assess their English skills Nice to have Experience in information technology, human resources, or customer service Knowledge of workplace communication: emails, meetings, negotiations, presentations, small talk, etc. Why you'll love working here Professional European-based company Attractive salary Performance bonus of up to 4 months’ salary Opportunities for travel to Europe Hybrid home/office working model Flexible working time Structured training & development roadmap Good work-life balance Premium healthcare insurance Loyalty programs Well-being activities Annual company trips and team-building events

Title: Senior Production Support Engineer
Skills: Hardware Troubleshooting, Linux, Python, Perl, English
Description: About the job NVIDIA’s Networking Silicon Engineering group is looking for a Senior Production Support Engineer . What You'll Be Doing NVIDIA's GPUs，DPUs and SOCs are the world leaders in performance and efficiency, and we are continually innovating in creative and outstanding ways to improve our ability to deliver outstanding solutions in a wide range of sectors. At NVIDIA, we are building the system, hardware, and software technology which enables the highest data transition performance. Our Production Support team is currently searching for an Engineer to help us Monitor the production status at CM and that will be focal point for all production testing issues: The working place base at factory at Bac Ninh Vietnam. Monitor and control the test yield for all stations. Provide onsite tier 1 support for tests, test infrastructures, tests setup and station maintenance. Introduction and training of new tests. Conduct test debugging and failure analysis whenever needed. What We Need To See B.S. Electrical Engineering, or equivalent experience. Familiar with the manufacture processes of electric product. Minimum 5 years of experience in handling manufacturing line issues or Production floor support. Experience in HW problems diagnostic, repairing or in board design. Proficient English speaking and writing. Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd With ICT / JTAG skills. Familiar with Functional Tests. Background with Linux OS and Perl scripts. Experience on reliability test like Burn In, ESS, HASS. We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation. JR1996092

Title: Software Engineer (Python, JavaScript)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Python, FastAPI, Django, JavaScript, HTML
Description: About the job OPSWAT, a global leader in IT, OT, and ICS critical infrastructure cybersecurity, delivers an end-to-end platform that gives public and private sector organizations and enterprises the critical advantage needed to protect their complex networks, secure their devices, and ensure compliance. Over the last 20 years our commitment to innovative technology has earned the trust of more than 1,700 organizations, governments, and institutions globally, solidifying our role in protecting the world’s critical infrastructure and securing our way of life. The Position We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Software Engineer (Fullstack) with deep expertise in Python, specifically with the FastAPI and Django frameworks. You will be a key member of our engineering team, responsible for designing, developing, and deploying robust, scalable, and high-performance web applications. The ideal candidate is a proactive problem-solver who can take ownership of the entire development lifecycle, from conceptualization to deployment and maintenance. What You Will Be Doing Backend Development: Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable Python code using FastAPI for high-performance APIs and Django for complex, data-driven applications Frontend Development: Develop responsive and user-friendly web interfaces using modern JavaScript frameworks (e.g., React, …) System Architecture: Architect and implement scalable and secure full-stack solutions, ensuring seamless integration between frontend and backend components Database Management: Design and manage database schemas (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL) and work with ORMs like Django ORM and SQLAlchemy API Design & Integration: Develop and consume RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints, ensuring they are well-documented and optimized for performance Testing & QA: Write unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure code quality, performance, and reliability DevOps & Deployment: Implement CI/CD pipelines and deploy applications using containerization technologies like Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes What We Need From You Experience: 3+ years of professional experience in full-stack web development Python Expertise: Profound knowledge of Python and its ecosystem Framework Proficiency: Extensive hands-on experience with FastAPI for building high-performance, asynchronous APIs, and microservices-based architecture Strong experience with Django and Django REST Framework (DRF) for building large-scale applications Frontend Skills: Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6+), along with experience in at least one modern frontend framework (React, …). Database Knowledge: Strong experience with relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL) and an understanding of NoSQL databases API Development: Solid understanding of RESTful API design principles Testing: Experience with testing frameworks like pytest Version Control: Proficiency with Git and Git workflows Preferred: Experience working with or integrating external platforms such as Salesforce, Jira, or Databricks Familiarity with Large Language Models (LLMs), OpenAI APIs, or AI prompt engineering Understanding of ETL pipelines and their impact on application performance, with the ability to apply that knowledge to improve data-layer efficiency Cloud Platforms: Experience with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure) Containerization: Hands-on experience with Docker and Kubernetes CI/CD: Experience setting up and maintaining CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions) Asynchronous Programming: Deep understanding of Python's asyncio Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience) OPSWAT is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to providing an environment where equal employment opportunities are extended to all employees and applicants, free of discrimination and harassment of any type. All employment decisions are based on individual qualifications, job requirements, and business needs without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other category protected by federal, state, or local laws. Recruiting Agencies: we do not accept unsolicited resumes from third party agencies for any of our open positions. To submit resumes for our jobs, there must be a recruiting contract approved by our legal team and endorsed by both parties. We are currently not accepting additional 3rd party agencies at this time.

Title: SOFTWARE ENGINEER

Monitor code performance, identify bottlenecks, and implement optimizations. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and QA engineers, to deliver high-quality software. Title: Pioneer Talent Program - Java Engineer (Tech Compliance)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Java, Spring Boot, AWS, Fullstack, Blockchain
Description: About the job Binance is a leading global blockchain ecosystem behind the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume and registered users. We are trusted by over 230 million people in 100+ countries for our industry-leading security, user fund transparency, trading engine speed, deep liquidity, and an unmatched portfolio of digital-asset products. Binance offerings range from trading and finance to education, research, payments, institutional services, Web3 features, and more. We leverage the power of digital assets and blockchain to build an inclusive financial ecosystem to advance the freedom of money and improve financial access for people around the world. About The Pioneer Talent Program Are you an early-career professional ready to kickstart your career in the dynamic world of blockchain? Binance’s Pioneer Talent Program is designed to nurture ambitious individuals like you. The program offers full-time roles where participants will gain hands-on expertise via a tailored training curriculum and personalized 1:1 mentorship from industry leaders. Dive behind the scenes of the world’s leading blockchain ecosystem while building the skills to thrive in Web3. Launch your career with purpose—join us in shaping the future of digital innovation. Who May Apply Candidates with up to 5 years of relevant work experience Job Description We are seeking a talented Java Spring Developer with a minimum of 3 years of professional experience to join our team. This is a remote position, offering the flexibility to work from anywhere in the world. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Java Spring Boot, with a focus on developing Java micro-service applications. Experience with AWS cloud services is considered a bonus, as well as full-stack development expertise and knowledge of blockchain technology. Responsibilities Designing, developing, and maintaining Java micro-service applications using the Spring Boot framework. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement new features. Writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code. Conducting code reviews and providing constructive feedback to team members. Troubleshooting and debugging applications to optimize performance. Staying updated on emerging technologies and best practices in Java development. Working closely with team members across different time zones to ensure effective collaboration and communication. Requirements Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field. 3+ years of professional experience in Java development. Solid experience with Java Spring Boot for developing micro-service applications. Experience with AWS cloud services is a plus. Full-stack development experience is an advantage. Knowledge of blockchain technology is preferred. Strong problem-solving and communication skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a distributed team. Willingness to work time shifts to accommodate collaboration with team members in different geographic locations. Why Binance Shape the future with the world’s leading blockchain ecosystem Collaborate with world-class talent in a user-centric global organization with a flat structure Tackle unique, fast-paced projects with autonomy in an innovative environment Thrive in a results-driven workplace with opportunities for career growth and continuous learning Competitive salary and company benefits Work-from-home arrangement (the arrangement may vary depending on the work nature of the business team) Binance is committed to being an equal opportunity employer. We believe that having a diverse workforce is fundamental to our success. By submitting a job application, you confirm that you have read and agree to our Candidate Privacy Notice .

Title: Data Analyst
Skills: Python, Machine Learning, Data Analysis, ETL, Business Intelligence

This role requires adaptability to switch between tasks swiftly, manipulate data to create and maintain dashboards/reports, use ML models to detect and extract actionable insights for stakeholders, and adapt to internal AI tool implementations. In return, you will have the opportunity to work with big data to extract insights and propose new initiatives. You will develop ETL skills, AI capabilities, statistical understanding, visualization, and problem‑solving … What will you do Develop a deep understanding of the product and its features to perform effective analysis. Requirement: 2-3 years of experience as a hands-on analyst in a tech/product company. Experience in Python or other data handling tools, as well as the ability to learn more advanced data. Business intelligence experience using tools such as Tableau/Power BI.. Fast learner, versatile knowledge of consulting methodologies/frameworks is a plus.
