Title: Quantitative Developer - Java
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Java, Software Architecture, REST, Database, English
Description: About the job Binance is a leading global blockchain ecosystem behind the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume and registered users. We are trusted by over 280 million people in 100+ countries for our industry-leading security, user fund transparency, trading engine speed, deep liquidity, and an unmatched portfolio of digital-asset products. Binance offerings range from trading and finance to education, research, payments, institutional services, Web3 features, and more. We leverage the power of digital assets and blockchain to build an inclusive financial ecosystem to advance the freedom of money and improve financial access for people around the world. This team at Binance delivers a user-friendly interface and seamless trading experiences. We offer great flexibility with a wide range of converted tokens and trade sizes. Our users benefit from various trading services, including guaranteed execution prices with no slippage, the best quotations, algorithm bots, and bespoke assets and products. Join us and be part of a team that enhances the trading journey for millions. Responsibilities Engage in the full life cycle of software development, including requirement gathering, design, coding, testing, and deployment. Possess strong technical skills, enabling the delivery of high-quality production code. Collaborate with the convert team to enhance the effectiveness of trading models. Liaise with trading and operations teams to develop new products and improve existing ones. Establish and improve trading system infrastructure to handle large scale positions and orders. Identify system bottlenecks and bugs, and implement solutions to address these issues. Attending to production emergencies. Requirements: Experience in the full lifecycle of project development for Java applications. Strong understanding of software design, architecture, development, and integration. Solid knowledge of event processing models, multi-threading, enterprise integration patterns, web services, and REST. Experience with algorithmic trading systems, investment banks, hedge funds, trading firms, or brokerages is a strong plus. A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a Mathematics/Algorithm-related field is a bonus. Flexible with working hours to attend to production emergencies. Fluency in English is required to be able to coordinate with overseas partners and stakeholders. Why Binance Shape the future with the world’s leading blockchain ecosystem Collaborate with world-class talent in a user-centric global organization with a flat structure Tackle unique, fast-paced projects with autonomy in an innovative environment Thrive in a results-driven workplace with opportunities for career growth and continuous learning Competitive salary and company benefits Work-from-home arrangement (the arrangement may vary depending on the work nature of the business team) Binance is committed to being an equal opportunity employer. We believe that having a diverse workforce is fundamental to our success. By submitting a job application, you confirm that you have read and agree to our Candidate Privacy Notice .

Title: Senior Data Scienitst - Open to Relocate HCM
Skills: Data Science, Machine Learning, NLP, Python, SQL
Description: About the job Senior Data Scientist General Information As a Data Scientist, you will play a key role in bridging data science with business value by delivering high-impact solutions across diverse industries. You will work end-to-end—from gathering business requirements to developing models, evaluating outcomes, and deploying scalable solutions—while collaborating with cross-functional teams in a fast-paced, innovation-driven environment. Key Responsibilities: Work closely as a project team to lead in the entire lifecycle of data science projects, from gathering business requirements to solution delivery, and deliver project outcomes to internal stakeholders or external customers. Leads discussions with business stakeholders to frame problems, propose solutions, and ensure technical delivery meets business objectives. Leads planning for end-to-end solution delivery within a project, defines workstream tasks for the team, aligns timelines with business priorities, and represents the DS track in PI planning and client milestone reviews. Owns full solution design and delivery for a project or major workstream (e.g., model design, deployment strategy, MLOps considerations). Reviews junior work, manages delivery quality, presents to clients, ensures solution alignment with business goals. Drives applied research by identifying new trends or best practices, validating their effectiveness, and incorporating them into reusable solutions or project-level frameworks. Actively mentors junior and middle Data Scientists, conducts performance feedback, identifies growth areas, and contributes to technical capability uplift across the team or practice. Proactive in leading and contributing to the growth of internal capabilities (e.g., training, knowledge-sharing, framework design). Required Skills & Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Data Science, Computer Science, AI, Engineering, or a highly related field is required. A Master’s degree in any of the above disciplines is preferred. Have at least 5 years and above of experience in one or more data science domains such as machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing (NLP), computer vision (CV), optimization, or statistics. Proven experience leading data science workstreams or projects, and mentoring junior data scientists. Fluent in English with strong communication skills, especially when engaging with non-technical business stakeholders. Experience with MLOps tools and practices (e.g., model packaging, CI/CD for ML, model monitoring, ML pipelines). High proficiency in Python and SQL, along with relevant data science libraries Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (e.g., GCP, AWS, Azure) and containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes). Capable of researching, reading publications, and translating research papers into code. Have excellent problem-solving skills. Be proactive and take full responsibility. Ability to lead the communication of technical concepts and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Ability to engage with business stakeholders to gather domain knowledge and requirements, and to communicate timelines, results, and other relevant matters. Familiarity with agile delivery practices is a plus.

Title: Lead Software Engineer, Backend
Skills: Kubernetes, Go, C++, Python, JavaScript
Description: About the job Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Your Team Come join the team that literally serves Grab - Grab’s Sentry team. The systems we oversee process billions of network messages for Grab's consumers every day, without fail. We work closely with the infrastructure, security, and product teams, and are seeking talented engineers to join our platform team! Your Role You specialize in building, operating and maintaining leading edge solutions that Just Work™. Built on world-class technology stacks, the software you develop brings our unique on-demand services experience to South-East Asia every day — be it transport, payments, food, or "the awesome things to come". Millions of people depend on the stability and efficiency your solutions provide, which is demanding in terms of design and quality but also incredibly rewarding. You will build and own Grab's gateway systems, connecting millions of consumer devices with hundreds of backend services via Grab's service mesh.. work at Grab's Viet Nam headquarters in Ho Chi Minh City, closely integrated with software engineering and product teams to help build rock-solid and secure solutions with the right interface, technology and practices. be at home in a HA cloud environment and build scalable, zero-downtime network traffic routing and analytics solutions for Grab's "public edge", serving billions of daily requests from millions of Grab consumers and partners every day Your Daily Routine Independently drive projects across teams end to end, from inception to rollout Find and troubleshoot issues in Grab's entire infrastructure and code base Develop, maintain, and operate control- and data-plane components, and resolve production incidents Implement quality solutions using Kubernetes, Go and C/C++, and maintain the high bar of standards for code reviews and deployment processes. You mentor peers and promote development and operational excellence best practices while achieving excellent user experience Qualifications Your Experience You are a habitual problem solver, and naturally assume ownership of your team’s systems and software components. You know how to be responsible for mission-critical systems and have a very good understanding of TCP/IP, HTTP and the internet are an expert in at least one of Assembly, C, C#, C++, Go, Java, Pascal know how and had built highly-available distributed systems Front-end experience is the plus. are fluent in Bash, Python, and JavaScript, and have an understanding of common patterns and algorithms to confidently navigate 3rd-party code bases for debugging and troubleshooting Led complex project with multiple technical challenges related to various stakeholders. Proposed and led implementation of impactful projects from end to end. Your Advantage HTTP/2. QUIC, and gRPC expertise Dealing with massive concurrency and designing resilient algorithms Experience with building monitoring and alerting systems Hands-on experience with Terraform and large scale Docker / Kubernetes deployments Experience with Consul and/or Envoy (envoyproxy.io), their code base, and their community Experience in a startup Additional Information Life at Grab We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer our Interns: Attractive Monthly Allowance: Receive a competitive monthly allowance to support your internship journey Work Essentials Provided: A working laptop and necessary software tools will be provided to ensure you have all the resources you need for success. On-the-Job Training: Gain hands-on experience with mentorship and training opportunities from Grab's leaders and senior members Career Opportunities: Explore potential full-time employment opportunities within the company, depending on business needs and intern qualifications What We Stand For At Grab We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique

Title: Associate QA Engineer

Over the last 20 years our commitment to innovative technology has earned the trust of more than 1,700 organizations, governments, and institutions globally, solidifying our role in protecting the world’s critical infrastructure and securing our way of life. The Position The position will play an important role in assuring quality of OPSWAT cyber security technologies and products at the highest level. As a member of the team, you will be involved in every stage of the software development life cycle. What You Will Be Doing Responsible for both manual and automated test. Analyze/review product requirements. Write/review detailed test cases and perform testing based on requirements. Perform different types of testing: API testing, functional testing, integration testing, usability testing, compatibility testing, performance testing, security testing, regression testing, … Utilize and improve the existing test framework to implement automated tests. Handle support escalation such as creating reproducible bug reports or help troubleshoot. Report/manage defects. What We Need From You Experience in software testing with a good QA mindset. Experience in testing software on different Operating Systems (Windows, Linux...) and Browsers. Experience in writing automation using any scripting languages (bash shell, powershell, python, ...), any programming languages such as Java, C/C++, C#… Familiar with working in Agile team. Good at written English communication. It Would Be Nice If You Have Good at verbal English communication. Familiar with JIRA, TeamCity, Git. Experience in leading a QA team. System and/or network administration skills (MCP and/or LPI certificates are welcomed). Cyber security domain experience, including file security, device security, network security etc... OPSWAT is an equal opportunity employer. Title: GenAI Fund Associate (Internship)

Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: AI, Generative AI, English, Stakeholder management, Market research
Description: About the job GenAI Fund Associate (Internship) Help build the future of AI in Southeast Asia. GenAI Fund is the first AI specialist fund in Southeast Asia focused on investing in and supporting Generative AI startups globally. We work closely with founders, enterprises, and investors to accelerate AI innovation through programs like GenAI Open Innovation and the FastTrack AI Accelerator . Together, our team brings deep expertise in startup acceleration, enterprise adoption, venture investing, and AI commercialization to support founders building the next wave of Southeast Asia’s AI-driven companies. We’re looking for a hands-on and driven GenAI Fund Associate (Intern) to help us grow our marketing, events, and operations. If you're passionate about AI, startups, and want to work at the intersection of innovation, investments, and enterprise collaboration—this role is for you! 🌟 What You’ll Work On💡 Marketing & Communications Drive online marketing efforts to promote GenAI Fund’s programs, content, and initiatives. Manage social media, newsletters, and community updates to increase engagement. Support content creation (articles, posts, visuals) to build thought leadership in AI. 🎤 Events & Operations Support the planning and execution of high-impact AI programs and events, including GenAI Open Innovation and FastTrack AI Accelerator . Coordinate with startups, corporate partners, and investors to ensure smooth event logistics. Handle event marketing and communications to maximize visibility and participation. 🤝 Stakeholder Engagement Manage communications with startup founders, corporate partners, and ecosystem leaders. Help coordinate partnerships and outreach to bring in strategic collaborators. Support post-event follow-ups, track engagement, and gather insights for future programs. ✅ What We’re Looking For Must-Have Skills & Characteristics Curious & Fast Learner – Passionate about Generative AI, startups, and innovation. Hustler Attitude & Ownership – Takes initiative, solves problems, and makes things happen. Strong Communication Skills – Can write and articulate ideas clearly and professionally in English. Detail-Oriented & Organized – Can manage multiple tasks and keep track of moving parts. Bonus Skills (Preferred, but Not Required) Experience in event planning and execution. Experience in stakeholder coordination and communications. Experience in online marketing (social media, newsletters, content creation). Experience handling and analyzing data (e.g. Excel, Google Sheets, or basic analytics tools). 🚀 What You’ll Gain 💰 Monthly compensation, with bonus depending on performance. ✈️ Opportunities to travel – Potential to attend events and initiatives across the region. 🎓 Mentorship – Learn directly from experienced ex-AWS executives and industry leaders. 🤝 Exclusive Exposure – Work alongside top AI founders, investors, and enterprise executives in big tech and the AI ecosystem. 📩 How to Apply Send your CV and LinkedIn profile to: general@genaifund.ai by July 25, 2025 . Shortlisted candidates will be required to complete a qualification task before progressing to the next stage.

Title: BA_Fresher
Skills: Business Analysis, Agile, API, Database, English
Description: About the job 1. MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC Thu thập, phân tích và làm rõ yêu cầu từ khách hàng hoặc các bên liên quan. Hỗ trợ xây dựng và cập nhật các tài liệu BA như BRD, SRS, user guide,… Làm việc sâu sát với đội ngũ phát triển phần mềm cũng như khách hàng và các bên liên quan để hỗ trợ quá trình phát triển phần mềm. Chủ động tham gia vào tất cả các bước trong vòng đời của một sản phẩm từ pre-sales, phân tích đến hỗ trợ demo và chuyển giao sản phẩm. Đóng vai trò làm cầu nối trong dự án làm việc với đội ngũ lập trình viên kỹ thuật , đội ngũ thiết kế để đảm bảo phần mềm cuối cùng đáp ứng được yêu cầu đề ra ban đầu của khách hàng. Quản lý và theo dõi các yêu cầu thay đổi (Change Request). Hỗ trợ các công việc khác được yêu cầu từ cấp quản lý. Hỗ trợ xây dựng case study cho dự án. 2. YÊU CẦU Tốt nghiệp đại học chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Hệ thống thông tin quản lý, Kinh tế hoặc các ngành liên quan. Có kiến thức cơ bản về quy trình phát triển phần mềm, các mô hình phát triển Agile/Scrum là một lợi thế. Khả năng tư duy logic, phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề tốt. Kỹ năng giao tiếp, trình bày và viết tài liệu rõ ràng. Có ít nhất 6 tháng kinh nghiệm làm việc về phần mềm ở vị trí phân tích. Tiếng Anh lưu loát (4 kỹ năng : nghe, nói, đọc, viết). Có kiến thức nền tảng về database, API. Có khả năng ứng dụng AI vào công việc và sử dụng thành thạo một số công cụ hỗ trợ liên quan. 3. QUYỀN LỢI Mức lương: Thỏa thuận theo năng lực, lên đến 12M/tháng Cơ hội thăng tiến lên các vị trí BA chuyên nghiệp hoặc Quản lý dự án. Môi trường làm việc trẻ trung, năng động, hỗ trợ phát triển kỹ năng và kiến thức. Các chế độ bảo hiểm, phúc lợi theo quy định của pháp luật. Tham gia các hoạt động thường niên của team và công ty: Du lịch, Team building, Khám sức khỏe, Giao lưu định kỳ, … 4. THÔNG TIN PHỎNG VẤN Thực hiện bài test kỹ thuật (thời gian làm bài - 30 phút) trước vòng phỏng vấn Phỏng vấn 1 vòng trực tiếp với Team Lead & HR Thời gian phản hồi kết quả: 7 ngày làm việc sau buổi phỏng vấn 5. ĐỊA ĐIỂM VÀ THỜI GIAN LÀM VIỆC Địa điểm làm việc: 161 Trương Văn Bang, P. Cát Lái, TP.HCM (địa điểm sau sát nhập). Thời gian làm việc: 8h30-17h30, từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6 và thứ 7 cách tuần.

Title: AI Trainer – Audio (English C1)
Skills: AI, English, Data Analysis, NLP, Machine Learning
Description: About the job About the Role: As an AI Trainer - Audio, you will play a key part in training the large language models that power our AI-native games. Your contributions will fine-tune our models’ audio performance with a specific focus on emotional intelligence, helping to create an immersive user experience within our fictional worlds. 2. Key Responsibilities: Annotate audio-based game content such as dialogues, scripts, and TTS (text-to-speech). Ensure accuracy and consistency in the data to optimize players’ gaming experience. Annotate and evaluate model responses against our internal language & voice style rubrics in an effort to improve audio and overall interactions to achieve the best user experience possible. Collaborate with our research and product teams to develop state-of-the-art large language models and audio and video generation technologies. Qualification Process: Only 1 Round: Online test. Qualifications: Junior Education: Bachelor’s degree student or graduate; good English listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills (CEFR C1 or above). Preferred experience: 0–1 year of experience in audio editing, voice acting, content annotation, etc. Key Competencies: - Sensitive to sound with basic audio processing skills. - Passionate about gaming with a strong understanding of voice content. - Quick learner, able to adapt to technical tools. 2. Mid-Level Education: Bachelor’s degree or above; fluent in English (CEFR C1 or above). Preferred experience: 1–3 years of experience in audio production, TTS content optimization, AI data annotation, etc. Key Competencies: - Familiar with audio technologies such as speech synthesis and emotional expression. - Able to independently complete audio content annotation and quality assessment. - Experience in cross-team collaboration and driving audio content optimization. 3. Senior Education: Master’s degree or above Preferred experience: 3+ years of experience in audio content strategy, AI model training, voice interaction design, etc. Key Competencies: - Deep understanding of speech model training processes and evaluation standards. - Able to lead audio content strategy development and model tuning. - Capable of team guidance and project advancement. Benefits: Salary: Negotiate. 100% salary during the 2-month probation period. 12 days of annual leave and one salary review per year. Social insurance contributions based on 90% of gross salary. Dynamic, youthful, and open-minded working environment. Opportunity to work in a multinational company. Provide working devices.

Become part of our growing community and make an impact supporting the machine learning models of some of the world’s largest brands. This is a new part-time project and your work will be subject to our standard quality assurance checks during the term of this agreement. Basic Requirements Working as a freelancer with excellent communication skills in Chinese Simplified and English. Being a resident in Vietnam for the last 3 consecutive years and having familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media, and cultural affairs in Vietnam. High School Diploma or GED Qualification Active use of Gmail, Google+, and other forms of social media and experience in the use of web browsers to navigate and interact with a variety of content Daily access to a broadband internet connection, a smartphone (Android 5.0, iOS 14 or higher), and a personal computer to work on. Assessment In order to be hired into the program, you’ll take a language assessment and an open book qualification exam that will determine your suitability for the position and complete ID verification. Don’t worry, our team will provide you with guidelines and learning materials before your exam. You will be required to complete the exam in a specific timeframe but at your convenience! Equal Opportunity All qualified applicants will receive consideration for a contractual relationship without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status. At TELUS Digital AI, we are proud to offer equal opportunities and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive community. All aspects of selection are based on applicants’ qualifications, merits, competence, and performance without regard to any characteristic related to diversity. Additional Job Description In this role, you’ll be analyzing and providing feedback on texts, pages, websites, domains, and other types of information, using an online tool through reviewing and rating domain pages quality, you’ll be helping to improve the overall user experience for millions of search engine users, including yourself. Join our team today and start putting your skills to work for one of the world's leading search engines. EEO Statement At TELUS International, we enable customer experience innovation through spirited teamwork, agile thinking, and a caring culture that puts customers first. TELUS International is the global arm of TELUS Corporation, one of the largest telecommunications service providers in Canada. We deliver contact center and business process outsourcing (BPO) solutions to some of the world's largest corporations in the consumer electronics, finance, telecommunications and utilities sectors. With global call center delivery capabilities, our multi-shore, multi-language programs offer safe, secure infrastructure, value-based pricing, skills-based resources and exceptional customer service - all backed by TELUS, our multi-billion dollar telecommunications parent. Equal Opportunity Employer At TELUS International, we are proud to be an equal opportunity employer and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace. All aspects of employment, including the decision to hire and promote, are based on applicants’ qualifications, merits, competence and performance without regard to any characteristic related to diversity.

Title: Data Engineer

Description: About the job Our Company – PLAYSTUDIOS VIETNAM Come join an ambitious mobile entertainment company which committed to leveraging the best technology we can to create fun experiences. We have big plans and would be thrilled for you to consider us. PLAYSTUDIOS Vietnam is a Vietnam subsidiary of the United States based leading mobile & social games company PLAYSTUDIOS Inc. We are backed by dominant, multi-billion-dollar market leaders in the leisure and video game industries and a collection of powerhouse venture capital firms. Our founding team has over a century of collective gaming experience. We are building a best-of-breed development and operations group and are looking for top tier talent who can help us create and optimize high quality games in the rapidly evolving social and mobile gaming markets. Our company has high growth rates, with the stability and financial security of an established company. We guarantee high quality work, AAA-entertainment brand exposure, competitive compensation and great benefits. Responsibilities Build data systems and pipelines Explore ways to enhance data quality and reliability Evaluate business needs and objectives Analyze and organize raw data Prepare data for prescriptive and predictive modeling Combine raw information from different sources Qualifications 3 years of experience writing complex SQL queries 1 year of hands-on experience with Python programming Experience with Data lake, data warehouse ETL build, and design Knowledge of AWS technologies (EMR, EC2, S3, etc.) or other major cloud providers Knowledge of visualization tools like Tableau, Mode Analytics, and Looker Experience with Airflow - advantage Good command of written and spoken English. Benefits & Perks Work directly with a global team of young and talented playMAKERS regardless of gender, age, or experience. Unlimited growth opportunities and continuous improvement with English classes, workshops, and other technical training courses by highly-skilled members from all over the world Bao Viet Premium healthcare coverage is 1.2 billion VND/person/year (including you and ALL your dependents). A company of fulfillment : 100 % salary on probation, 100% covered Social insurance, Health insurance, and Unemployment insurance since probation. Moreover , Compulsory insurance for employees is also filled by the company. You only need to bear PIT. 13 months salary/year. Discretionary bonus. Employee referral bonus program (Very attractive bonus range: from 300USD to 1000USD). Flexible working time: 5 working days/ week - from Monday to Friday (Time won't be your fear, because productivity is what we care about). Annual leave: 15 days in 1st year, 17 days in 2nd year, and 20 days each year thereafter Sick leave: 5 days/year Delicious, fresh, and free meals are served daily! High-end workstation laptop and screens Equipment Allowance: 4,500,000 VND to pick your keyboard/ mouse/ headphone... in your own style. Team building activities, staff trips, and company events across the year. Other benefits: Sickness, funeral: support up to 2,000,000 VND/person ; marriage, childbirth, and public holidays: up to 500,000 VND/person .

Title: AI Leader
Skills: AI, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, Python
Description: About the job Mô tả 1, Xây dựng chiến lược phát triển AI Xây dựng và triển khai chiến lược phát triển AI, đảm bảo mục tiêu phát triển của dự án, phù hợp với mục tiêu kinh doanh và xu hướng công nghệ. Lập kế hoạch phát triển Service AI của dự án theo từng giai đoạn 2, Phát triển mới các service AI của dự án Nghiên cứu để áp dụng các công nghệ AI mới vào sản phẩm thuộc lĩnh vực Tuyển dụng ( domain HR), Đảm bảo các giải pháp AI tuân thủ các quy định pháp lý, quy định về dữ liệu và tiêu chuẩn bảo mật. Thử nghiệm, phát triển mới hoặc cải thiện các mô hình, thuật toán lõi Xây dựng luồng xử lý cho các bài toán khai phá dữ liệu, thị giác máy tính, xử lý ngôn ngữ tự nhiên trên quy mô dữ liệu lớn Phối hợp với bộ phận delivery để đưa AI vào các tính năng của sản phẩm thuộc hệ sinh thái iVIEC Đảm bảo chất lượng các tính năng AI, kịp thời phát hiện và điều chỉnh các lỗi/vấn đề gặp phải trong quá trình phát triển sản phẩm & vận hành hệ thống 3, Quản lý team AI Quản lý, định hướng công việc cho các nhân sự trong team AI Xây dựng và phát triển nhóm AI, bao gồm xây dựng đội ngũ, đào tạo và phát triển năng lực. Đảm bảo tiến độ và chất lượng công việc của từng thành viên & cả team 4, Phối hợp với các bộ phận trong dự án Phối hợp với bộ phận nghiệp vụ để thấu hiểu nhu cầu người dùng về dịch vụ AI Phối hợp với bộ phận phát triển sản phẩm để đảm bảo tiến độ phát triển chung của các sản phẩm trong dự án Báo cáo tới BGD dự án theo yêu cầu Yêu cầu 1. Trình độ & Kiến thức chuyên môn: Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Khoa học máy tính, Trí tuệ nhân tạo hoặc các ngành liên quan. Có kiến thức vững chắc về các lĩnh vực cốt lõi của AI như: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Computer Vision, NLP, Data Science, MLOps. Am hiểu các nền tảng, framework và công cụ AI phổ biến như: TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenAI API, Hugging Face, LangChain, v.v. 2. Kinh nghiệm: Tối thiểu 5 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực AI/ML, trong đó ít nhất 2 năm ở vị trí trưởng nhóm hoặc quản lý kỹ thuật. Có kinh nghiệm triển khai các dự án AI thực tế ở quy mô doanh nghiệp, đặc biệt trong các lĩnh vực như healthcare, fintech, sản xuất, hoặc thương mại điện tử là một lợi thế. Ưu tiên ứng viên từng tham gia phát triển các hệ thống AI tích hợp vào sản phẩm/dịch vụ cốt lõi của công ty. 3. Kỹ năng: Kỹ năng lãnh đạo đội nhóm, xây dựng chiến lược và quản lý lộ trình công nghệ. Khả năng truyền đạt ý tưởng kỹ thuật phức tạp một cách rõ ràng cho cả đội ngũ kỹ thuật lẫn các bên không chuyên môn. Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề, tư duy phản biện và ra quyết định dựa trên dữ liệu. Thành thạo tiếng Anh chuyên ngành (đọc hiểu tài liệu, giao tiếp kỹ thuật). 4. Tố chất cá nhân: Tư duy đổi mới, chủ động cập nhật xu hướng công nghệ mới. Có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao và cam kết với hiệu quả dự án. Có khả năng định hướng chiến lược AI phù hợp với mục tiêu kinh doanh của tổ chức. Quyền lợi và chế độ Gia nhập FPT, bạn sẽ được làm việc tại một trong những môi trường làm việc hàng đầu Việt Nam, chúng tôi sẽ mang đến cho bạn: Được tham gia xây dựng hệ thống và sản phẩm (làm product). Được học tập và ứng dụng các công nghệ mới nhất và là xu hướng hiện tại Training nội bộ và giáo viên ngoài: Các công nghệ mới (AI, Cloud, BigData, IoT,…), kỹ năng mềm, các kiến thức chuyên môn,… Thu nhập hấp dẫn, chế độ khen thưởng phong phú. Các chế độ bảo hiểm theo luật định; Bảo hiểm sức khỏe dành riêng cho người FPT. Cơ hội tiếp cận các công nghệ tiên tiến và hiện đại. Được học hỏi, đào tạo bởi các chuyên gia hàng đầu tại tập đoàn công nghệ số 1 Việt Nam. Cơ hội được đào tạo các chứng chỉ quốc tế. Được trải nghiệm môi trường làm việc năng động, văn hóa công ty đặc sắc và phong phú giúp phát huy tính sáng tạo và khả năng của mỗi cá nhân. Địa chỉ làm việc: • Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội

Title: Blockchain Developer
Skills: Blockchain, Golang, Hyperledger Fabric, Docker, Kubernetes
Description: About the job Key Responsibilities: Blockchain Solution Development: Design, implement, and deploy decentralized applications (dApps) using Hyperledger Fabric . Smart Contract Development: Write and optimize Chaincode in GoLang for smart contract functionality, ensuring the contracts are secure, efficient, and scalable. Network Setup & Configuration: Set up and configure Hyperledger Fabric networks, including configuring peers, ordering services, and channels to suit client needs. Integration: Integrate blockchain solutions with existing legacy systems and external applications using REST APIs, SDKs, and other integration tools. Performance Tuning & Optimization: Identify bottlenecks in performance and implement optimizations to improve scalability and efficiency. Security & Compliance: Ensure that the blockchain solutions adhere to industry best practices in terms of security and compliance, including encryption, data privacy, and access controls. Collaboration: Work closely with product managers, DevOps engineers, and other stakeholders to ensure the successful delivery of projects. Documentation & Code Review: Write comprehensive documentation and conduct code reviews to maintain code quality and ensure adherence to company standards. Research & Development: Stay updated with the latest trends in blockchain technology and contribute to the team’s knowledge base. Required Skills & Qualifications: 5+ years of experience in blockchain development with a focus on Hyperledger Fabric . Strong proficiency in GoLang and experience writing efficient and scalable code. Deep understanding of the Hyperledger Fabric architecture , including peer nodes, chaincode, ledgers, channels , and ordering services . Hands-on experience in developing and deploying smart contracts (Chaincode) on Hyperledger Fabric . Familiarity with Hyperledger Fabric SDKs and related tools for client interaction and network management. Experience with deploying and managing Fabric networks (including local and cloud-based deployments). Understanding of blockchain consensus algorithms , transaction validation , and blockchain security principles . Familiarity with Docker , Kubernetes , and cloud infrastructure for deploying and managing containerized blockchain solutions. Strong experience in version control (Git) , CI/CD pipelines , and Agile methodologies . Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to work autonomously or in a team environment. Strong communication skills with the ability to explain complex blockchain concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Preferred Skills: Experience with other blockchain platforms (e.g., Ethereum , Corda , Quorum ) is a plus. Familiarity with RESTful APIs and integration with backend systems. Experience in developing secure multi-party applications and working with multi-signature or confidential transactions . Knowledge of cryptographic algorithms , PKI , and digital signatures . Exposure to Hyperledger Explorer or other blockchain monitoring tools. Experience with DevOps practices for managing the deployment and monitoring of blockchain solutions.

Title: Business Analyst
Skills: Business Analysis, English, Project Management, Blockchain, Technical Writing
Description: About the job Headquartered in Hanoi, TDT Asia has built a reputation for cutting-edge solutions and customer-centric services. The company has successfully developed a portfolio of standout projects that showcase its expertise and innovation. These include a core lending system with 100% automation capabilities, enabling seamless customization to adapt to different company scales and market demands; an all-in-one trading platform that empowers users to trade U.S. stocks during Asian hours, offering unmatched convenience and accessibility; and an innovative generative AI platform that allows users to create personalized characters and seek expert advice across various industries, such as mental support, finance, and education. JOB DESCRIPTION Gather business and system requirements from partner (Singapore, Japan, Thailand, Hongkong, Indonesia, India...) in finance field. Understand and analyze the requirements from partner in business view and end-user view. Write Basic Design based on analyzed requirements. Work with development team to go over the specification, Q&A, consult the solutions or figure out the problems. Support the project manager in assigning tasks and managing the team to make sure that the project runs smoothly. Support in testing, verifying bugs/issue before handover to Client. REQUIREMENTS Graduated from University in Information Technology, Business, Finance or a related discipline. At least 2-3 year of experience in BA position. Have good logical and flexible thinking. Experience in developing projects related to finance, blockchains is an advantage. Good at English (Proficient all 4 skills). BENEFIT Salary up to 1500$, negotiation based on candidate's capacity; attractive & competitive benefit. Performance Review from 50% to 80% salary increase. 13th month salary bonus Business performance bonus: According to the company's annual business performance results. Make-up allowance for girls 1,000,000 VND/month Project bonus. Be issued with a health insurance card designed specifically for TDTers (Health insurance card AON). For employees at Manager level and above, there is a separate benefit package. As a member of TDT, you will have the opportunity to develop yourself at 2-3 times faster than the common ground: Get exposed to Fintech projects. Working in an international environment: Working with partners from many different countries. Participating in a long-term training program for Core-team according to the development orientation of each individual. COMPANY ACTIVITIES The office is designed in the style of Co-working, with many entertainment facilities such as: coffee machine, treadmill, ping pong table...; dining area with free food and drinks; Hot and cold bathroom, washing machine. Equipped with modern equipment such as high configuration Laptop, Macbook. Be able to join hobby clubs such as football club, running club, happy stock trading club / forex / crypto, game tournaments... 100% support for company trips: Summer Holiday, Year End Party. Receive gifts, participate in events on the occasions of June 1, Mid-Autumn Festival, March 8, October 20, Christmas, Company birthday. ADDRESS Head Office: 5th Floor, PVI Tower, No.1 Pham Van Bach, Cau Giay, Hanoi. HCMC Branch: ROX Tower, 180-192 Nguyen Cong Tru Street, Ben Thanh, Ho Chi Minh City.

Title: (Senior) RPA Developer
Location: Tân Bình, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: RPA, UiPath, Automation, SQL, English
Description: About the job CEVA Logistics provides global supply chain solutions to connect people, products and providers all around the world. Present in 170 countries and with more than 110,000 employees spread over 1,500 sites, we are well on our way to achieving our vision: to be a Top 5 global 3PL. We believe that our employees are the key to our success. We want to engage and empower our diverse, global team to co-create value with our customers through our solutions in contract logistics and air, ocean, ground, and finished vehicle transport. That is why CEVA Logistics offers a dynamic and exceptional work environment that fosters personal growth, innovation, and continuous improvement. CESA Vietnam was founded in 2018; CESA started as a development center in Vietnam,then now became a technology company of CEVA Logistic, specializing in Microsoft .Net technologies (ASP.Net MVC, API, Azure,...), ESB platform (Webmethods, Java...) and delivers projects using Agile methodology. Working with us, you’ll have the opportunity to develop your skills and career in an exciting workplace in touch with an international and innovative environment. DARE TO GROW! Join CESA Vietnam / CEVA Logistics, and you will be part of a team that values imagination, encourages boldness and exemplarity, and is committed to excellence in everything we do. Join us in our mission to shape the future of global logistics as we become a global leader in the logistics industry. As we continue growing at a fast pace, will you “Dare to Grow” with us? Main tasks and activities Analyze business requirements to design and implement automation solutions that align with the architectural, security, and migration needs outlined in the document provided by the business. Follow best practices for automation development across all tools and platforms used. Collaborate closely with the team to deliver complete end-to-end automation projects, including bot development and deployment. Apply the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) methodology throughout the project lifecycle. Create and maintain documentation such as Process Design Documents (PDDs) and Solution Design Documents (SDDs), among others. Participate in delivering automation demonstrations to stakeholders. Continuously update and enhance technical skills through training and certifications in UiPath and Automation Anywhere. Provide regular and accurate status updates to management and internal teams. Conduct technical knowledge-sharing sessions within the team or upon request. Serve as a backup resource for team members when needed to ensure project continuity. Offer operational support to users, including troubleshooting, issue resolution, and implementing preventive measures beyond the core technical role. Reporting line Report directly to the Team Leader based in Ho Chi Minh. Educational background Graduate in Computer Science or a related field from a recognized technical university. Technical skills 3-5 years of hands-on experience in designing and delivering Robotic Process Automation (RPA) solutions, with proven work on UiPath and Automation Anywhere projects. Experience working in a Microsoft environment (Office, SharePoint, Teams) and involvement in related developments. Demonstrated experience across the full Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC). Proficiency in troubleshooting application and system issues to ensure smooth automation functionality. Strong analytical, conceptual, and problem-solving skills with extensive experience in analyzing and mapping business processes in service-based organizations. Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively across diverse teams and interact with stakeholders at all organizational levels. A positive, proactive attitude and strong team player, contributing to a productive work environment. Advantageous to have: Experience with tools such as Power Automate, Python, Optical Character Recognition (OCR), and Intelligent Document Processing (IDP) is advantageous. Experience in writing SQL queries. Basic or advanced knowledge of programming languages such as C#, Java, or others. Ability to work independently as well as in geographically distributed teams. Familiarity with Microsoft Azure DevOps and Git is a plus. Language Fluent in English, both written and spoken. Proficiency in French is a plus. Pay range: up to $1800 Office: Etown 2, 364 Cong Hoa, ward 13, Tan Binh Dist, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam Benefits Being a pioneer in contributing to team development with a long-term vision High-ownership working environment: You will take full responsibility and control of your missions contributing to the team's success in a daily collaboration with Paris teams Continuous skill improvement with new technologies, challenging projects, on-the-job coaching, knowledge exchange with technical experts, and training programs (locally and in Paris) Annual performance review: recognize your efforts and identify development/ improvement needs Be secure in your mind with employee care: private healthcare insurance package, medical check-ups, allowance support... Great-place-to-work activities (company trips, sport clubs...): enhance teamwork spirit and facilitate your work-life balance Opportunity to participate in global events (Hackathon, Seminar, Innovation Factory...) CESA Vietnam/ CEVA Logistics is proud to be an equal opportunity work place and an affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status or any other characteristic. We are an Equal Opportunity Employer of Minorities, Females, Protected Veterans, and Individual with Disabilities.

Location: Hoàng Đạo Thúy, Hanoi, Vietnam Level of management: Middle We are looking for a talented Drupal Developer to create amazing user experiences. The ideal candidate should have an eye for clean and artful web design, superior module development skills and be able to translate high-level requirements into interaction flows and artifacts, and transform them into beautiful, intuitive, and functional websites. Key duties will be Job Requirements Write well-structured and maintainable Drupal modules Ensure high-performance and availability, and manage all technical aspects of the Drupal CMS Implement user interface design within Drupal environment Develop documentation for solutions where necessary Provide technical troubleshooting and solve bugs where necessary General: Proven experience with Drupal development min 1 working years, with PHP min 3 working years Knowledge of PHP, PHP files and theme functions, and Drupal theme layer Experience with Drupal theming and module development (a plus) Experience with e-commerce platforms like Drupal Commerce (a plus) Thorough understanding of the Software Development Lifecycle (e.g. Requirements, Design, Development, Testing) Proficient in the maintenance and administration of Drupal modules and sites Proficiency in English is required . Required Soft Skills Energetic / Pro-active Comfortable working in an Agile environment Challenge oriented with an enthusiastic mindset to learn new technologies Strong verbal and written communication skills Exp in team management min 3 years Constant learner and team player BENEFITS Attractive salary: Negotiate. Performance based award. Young and dynamic working environment. Opportunity to approach newest technology trends. Salary reviews 1 times/year or on excellent performance Company’s labor policy completely pursuant to Vietnamese labor legislation plus other benefits offered by the company (Company trip, Holiday, etc.) CONTACT ASTEK VIETNAM Contact Person: Mrs. Dzung Phone Number : 0969988029 Email: dzungnguyen@groupeastek.vn Website: https://astekgroup.fr/?lang=en

Title: NOC Engineer (System/Network)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: VMware, Active Directory, Windows, English, Troubleshooting
Description: About the job About the job Overall job purpose: Deliver basic technical support for Data Center and Enterprise level infrastructure, including, but not limited to: virtualization (VMware and Hyper-V) , Email service, Active Directory , Anti-Virus, patching tasks, etc. Liaise with other team and follow the processes to complete assigned task on time. Manage incidents and Problem Investigation ensure they will be resolved within SLA Raise and follow up Infrastructure Change Request. Join CAB meetings and represent proposed change…. Review, follow up, and implement requested tasks. Main duties of job: Monitoring and maintaining Infrastructure environments to agreed service levels Managing incidents and problems appropriately within agreed service levels Creating and performing authorized changes to customer environments, attending CABs where necessary Perform root cause analysis on reoccurring incidents Ensure technical documentation is completed and updated to professional standards Scheduled maintenance and patching of Infrastructure environments as necessary Contribute to the continuous improvement programs of all technology platforms across the datacenter Call logging and escalation with third party vendors (such as Microsoft, VMware, Mimecast or Citrix) Contributing to delivering team performance Adhere to all company policies and processes as communicated by line management in accordance with corporate ISO accreditation levels Troubleshooting infrastructure related technologies for Data center customers May be required to occasionally to fill in single shifts on managed services shift roster Skills, Knowledge & Experience: Essential requirements: Able to work as a member of a team but also manage up, across and down where required Ability to troubleshoot technical problems and incidents Ability to use the Service Desk tool to manage incidents/changes/problems tickets Good English communications skills , both oral and written. Ideally, experience of working for an international company with travel to and from Vietnam Basic technical knowledge of virtualization technologies (VMware, Hyper-V) Basic technical Knowledge and hands on experience in the below technologies or variants of in an enterprise level support environment: Microsoft server products Microsoft Active Directory and integrated elements/technologies such as DNS, GPO, DHCP, AD DS Anti-Virus solutions with key products being McAfee Good English communication 🌟 Why Join SCC Vietnam? Competitive salary & performance-based bonus Comprehensive healthcare & family coverage Annual leave, sick leave, and health checkups International UK/French working environment Company trips, team events & year-end parties Travel insurance & onsite opportunities

Title: Thực tập sinh tuyển dụng

Description: About the job MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC Hỗ trợ công việc tuyển dụng Thực hiện các công việc liên quan: Đăng tin, sàng lọc CV, phỏng vấn, gửi thông báo kết quả, quản lý data ứng viên. Thực hiện các công việc khác theo yêu cầu. YÊU CẦU ỨNG VIÊN Sinh viên năm 3,4, các trường Đại học chuyên ngành Quản trị nhân lực, Kinh tế lao động… có định hướng về nghề nhân sự, đặc biệt là tuyển dụng. Năng động, giao tiếp tự tin, nhanh nhẹn, có trách nhiệm với công việc. Thời gian làm việc: Parttime sáng hoặc chiều. Fulltime 8h30 – 5h30 (từ T2 – t6) QUYỀN LỢI Partime: 1.000.000 VNĐ/tháng. Fulltime: 2.000.000/tháng Được hướng dẫn và tiếp xúc dần với công việc tuyển dụng để có nền tảng cơ bản nhất để kiếm việc sau khi ra trường Hỗ trợ dấu thực tập Có cơ hội trở thành nhân viên chính thức LIÊN HỆ Ứng viên vui lòng gửi CV theo địa chỉ: Phòng tuyển dụng Công ty Cổ phần Dịch vụ di động Thế Hệ Mới Trụ sở chính: Tẩng 3A – Mỹ đình Plaza – 138 Trần Bình – Cầu Giấy – HN Người phụ trách : Ms. Phương Quý Số điện thoại : 0912264709 Email : quynp@nms.com.vn

Title: Chuyên viên phụ trách chiến lược tài khoản, Phân khúc Tương tác, Nhóm Giải pháp khách hàng của Google
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Business Analysis, Stakeholder management, English, Data Analysis, CRM
Description: About the job Please visit this Google Careers posting for the English-translated version of this role. Minimum qualifications: Bằng cử nhân hoặc kinh nghiệm thực tế tương đương. 2 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực quảng cáo kỹ thuật số, tư vấn bán hàng, kinh doanh truyền thông kỹ thuật số, phát triển kinh doanh, môi trường truyền thông trực tuyến, hoặc tiếp thị kỹ thuật số. Preferred qualifications: Kinh nghiệm về công nghệ, quản lý khách hàng chiến lược cũng như kinh nghiệm hoàn thành chỉ tiêu để thúc đẩy sự tăng trưởng của khách hàng. Khả năng đánh giá và đáp ứng nhu cầu của khách hàng bằng cách đặt câu hỏi hiệu quả, xử lý phản đối và bán hàng tương tác. Khả năng quản lý nhiều dự án cùng lúc mà vẫn chú trọng đến từng chi tiết nhỏ, cũng như khả năng làm việc độc lập và phối hợp với người khác. Khả năng áp dụng kỹ năng phân tích để khai thác tối đa dữ liệu nhằm tìm ra thông tin chuyên sâu hỗ trợ cho việc đưa ra đề xuất và phân tích tác động. Kỹ năng xuất sắc về thuyết trình và giao tiếp với đồng nghiệp, đội ngũ quản lý, các phòng ban liên ngành và khách hàng. About The Job Doanh nghiệp thuộc mọi loại hình và quy mô tin tưởng vào các giải pháp quảng cáo vượt trội của Google để phát triển trong môi trường tiếp thị năng động hiện nay. Bạn mang trong mình niềm đam mê bán hàng, sự hiểu biết về truyền thông trực tuyến và lòng quyết tâm giúp khách hàng đạt được sự thành công lớn nhất. Bạn hành động với tinh thần làm chủ, nhanh nhạy thích ứng với mọi thay đổi, tìm kiếm những cách thức mới mang tính chiến lược để liên tục đem đến kết quả ấn tượng và ngày một tốt hơn cho cả Google lẫn khách hàng. Bạn xây dựng mối quan hệ đáng tin cậy với khách hàng, tìm hiểu nhu cầu kinh doanh của họ và dựa vào đó để xây dựng các giải pháp hiệu quả giúp khách hàng đạt được những mục tiêu lớn lao nhất. Bạn gặt hái thành công cùng đội ngũ bán hàng, định hình tương lai của ngành quảng cáo trong kỷ nguyên AI và tạo dấu ấn thực sự đối với hàng triệu công ty cũng như hàng tỷ người dùng đặt trọn niềm tin vào Google cho những mục tiêu quan trọng nhất. Đội ngũ bán hàng thuộc Nhóm Giải pháp khách hàng của Google (GCS) gồm các chuyên viên tư vấn đáng tin cậy và đại diện bán hàng cạnh tranh, luôn tập trung vào việc hỗ trợ khách hàng đạt thành công bằng cách mang những dịch vụ tốt nhất của Google đến với các doanh nghiệp vừa và nhỏ (SMB) — một phần không thể thiếu trong cộng đồng của chúng tôi. Là một thành viên trong nhóm, bạn sẽ có cơ hội làm việc với các chủ doanh nghiệp, góp phần tạo nên sự khác biệt thực sự cho doanh nghiệp bằng cách hỗ trợ họ phát triển. Cùng nhau, chúng ta sẽ giúp định hình một tương lai đổi mới cho các khách hàng, đối tác và đại diện bán hàng... cũng như tận hưởng hành trình đó. Responsibilities Quản lý một danh mục gồm những doanh nghiệp quy mô trung bình bằng cách tìm hiểu động lực tăng trưởng, xác định cơ hội tăng trưởng, quản lý rủi ro và xây dựng kế hoạch để đạt được mục tiêu. Cộng tác với các thành viên nhóm bán hàng, thống nhất quy trình làm việc giữa các thành viên trong nhóm để thực thi kế hoạch cũng như đảm bảo trách nhiệm giải trình nhằm đạt hoặc vượt mục tiêu đề ra, đồng thời mang lại trải nghiệm vượt trội cho khách hàng. Thắt chặt quan hệ với khách hàng và đưa ra các đề xuất nâng cao hiệu suất. Gọi điện trao đổi nhằm thiết lập quan hệ và làm việc với các khách hàng hiện có để tạo đà tăng trưởng và giúp khách hàng thành công hơn nữa. Xác định các bên liên quan chính để hỗ trợ khách hàng đạt được mục tiêu kinh doanh mà họ đề ra và định hình kế hoạch tiếp thị kỹ thuật số hằng năm. Đánh giá và giải quyết nhu cầu của khách hàng bằng cách đặt câu hỏi hiệu quả, xử lý phản đối và bán hàng tương tác. Huấn luyện những thành viên trong nhóm còn thiếu kinh nghiệm để đạt được mục tiêu và tương tác hiệu quả với khách hàng. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

Title: Structural Engineer (R&D) - Open for Fresher
Skills: AutoCAD, English, Project Management, Team Management, Technical Writing
Description: About the job YOU You want to be an important member of a strong team of other makers who take pride in their work and support each other. As a Structural Engineer (R&D), you will be working in a collaborative environment of structural design engineers, tool design engineers, and manufacturing experts. Your innovation in product design will be driven by the needs of the customer, changes in building materials and methods, and building code changes. You will recommend alterations and enhancements to improve the quality, performance and cost of products. You will provide technical support and information to branch engineers, designers, customers, and other business units. The Product Development team includes civil engineers, mechanical engineers, and wood and material specialists... If career growth is important to you, we not only know how to help you with that, it’s what we love to do: youtu.be/PUqzuWryYcU WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING • Develop products for the building industry You will participate in developing new structural products for the concrete, light-frame wood, cold-formed steel, and mass timber markets. You will develop experimental test plans, collect, organize, and analyze data, and perform calculations. You will collaborate with US Engineers to manage projects assigned; coordinate with other resources within Engineering Services VN to accomplish assigned projects. Review all projects for completeness to assure work performed meets request prior to delivery. Communicate with project stakeholders; document and report the project status periodically to stakeholders. • Product test programs You will break things. For over 60 years, customers have counted on Simpson Strong-Tie to provide highly engineered products with allowable loads based on physical testing. You will design product tests to determine key features to optimize performance, material use and manufacturing efficiency. You will also develop test plans to evaluate existing connectors in new applications. • Develop technical literature Working with US R&D Engineers, you will develop and maintain product load tables and installation illustrations used in catalogs, technical bulletins, engineering letters and other literature. You will provide technical support for products and develop new applications for products based on customer requests. • Training and support Train and support others who participate in the projects assigned. Provide training or respond to technical questions related to products from Vietnam team JOB REQUIREMENTS If you can do everything listed above, you’ve got what it takes. Perhaps some of the following would be helpful too: If you can do everything listed above, you’ve got what it takes. Perhaps some of the following would be helpful too: Master/Bachelor’s Degree in Civil Engineering or related experience and/or training, equivalent combination of education and experience required. No experience is required. We welcome fresh graduates (from 0-1 year of experience) Sufficient in analysis software such as SAP2000/ETABS Sufficient in AutoCAD drafting/modeling Proficient in VBA for Excel is a plus Proficient in IBC, ACI318, and ASCE 7 codes is a plus Ability to work collaboratively with other members within department and across functions. Analysis / Reasoning: Effective analytical, technical, and problem-solving skills. Ability to apply common sense understanding to carry out instructions furnished in written, oral, or diagram form. Ability to deal with problems involving several concrete variables and solve them independently. Self-Management: Ability to display a high level of initiative, effort, and commitment towards completing assignments in a timely manner. Team Player: Demonstrated ability to motivate and work with team members. Must be able to connect, interface, and communicate well with a variety of internal partners in sales, marketing, and development. English Reading Comprehension / Speaking / Writing: Ability to read and interpret documents such as architectural and structural plans, safety rules, operating and maintenance instructions, and procedure manuals. Ability to write routine reports and correspondence. Ability to speak effectively with engineering team in the US. Ability to present ideas by presenting to a larger group of Engineers and Product Managers from the US HERE IS WHAT WE OFFER Attractive salary with 100% SHUI applied salary during probation 13th month salary, Performance Bonus, Salary review annually Opportunity to be on-site in the USA Chance to collaborate and work with our global stakeholders We provide employee training & and development to enhance skill sets and competencies Internal training: Problem-solving skill, Lean and other online training courses… External training: Soft Skills, …. Premium health care program for you + one of your beloved ones, Annual medical check-up 14 vacation days and Christmas Day (25/12) per year Benefits for special holidays (Birthday, Marriage, Women’s Day, Tet Holidays, Mid-Autumn, Newborn babies, International Children ‘s Day…) Social Activities, Sports Clubs and Team-building events such as Company trip, Year-End party,… are carried out on a regular basis Young, friendly, quality and result-oriented working environment under teamwork spirit Modern working conditions and entertainment facilities at office with tea and coffee all the time Compliance fully with Vietnam Labor Code

Title: Data Engineer
Skills: SQL, Python, Java, C++, NLP
Description: About the job Job Description: Data Engineer / Data Science Engineer (Map Team) Job Brief We are seeking a talented Data Engineer / Data Science Engineer to join our Map Team. You will collaborate closely with Product, Engineering, and Business teams to identify areas for improvement and develop innovative Data/AI-based solutions in the domain of Maps. Responsibilities Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement AI-driven solutions for Maps, location tracking, classification, regression, and recommendation systems. Research, implement, and evaluate applied NLP, computer vision and generative AI models/products. Develop algorithms for location matching, data processing, and detection of duplicate or erroneous location data. Build, deploy, and maintain APIs leveraging cloud infrastructure. Work with specialized databases/tools for location search engines, geocoders, geospatial databases, and geofencing servers. Requirements/Yêu cầu Educational Background :Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or Mathematics. Advanced degrees (MSc or PhD) are a significant advantage. Technical Expertise :Proficiency in at least two programming languages: SQL, Python, Java, or C/C++. Experience with development, training, productionization, and monitoring of Machine Learning (ML) solutions at scale. Hands-on experience with geospatial data and geospatial libraries. Familiarity with data warehouses such as BigQuery, Synapse, or Redshift. Experience in working with data processing pipelines using tools like Airflow, dbt, etc. Familiar with Large Language Models (LLMs) and integrating APIs (ChatGPT/OpenAI). Experience in natural language processing (NLP) is a plus.

Title: Python Developer (experience with C++)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Python, C++, REST API, SQL, NoSQL
Description: About the job OPSWAT, a global leader in IT, OT, and ICS critical infrastructure cybersecurity, delivers an end-to-end platform that gives public and private sector organizations and enterprises the critical advantage needed to protect their complex networks, secure their devices, and ensure compliance. Over the last 20 years our commitment to innovative technology has earned the trust of more than 1,700 organizations, governments, and institutions globally, solidifying our role in protecting the world’s critical infrastructure and securing our way of life. The Position We are looking for Backend Software Engineer to join and develop MetaDefender OT Access solution. If you are the one who likes solving challenges, and not settling down for anything less, then let’s join and build great things together! What You Will Be Doing Design and develop robust The Secure Remote Access software components. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features. Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications. Identify and correct bottlenecks, fix bugs, and help maintain code quality. Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation. Continuously seek opportunities to improve existing processes and systems. What We Need From You Technical Skills: Proficiency in Python, experience with C++ Experience with RESTful API design and implementation. Familiarity with both SQL and NoSQL DB. Experience with socket programming. Familiarity with Linux/Unix systems and shell scripting. Experience with Git, BitBucket, Jira, Confluence, TeamCity (or the equivalent). Network and Security: Familiarity with network protocols and their functionalities. Understanding of secure remote access concepts and technologies. Understanding of OSI, TCP/IP model. Experience with network protocols and security best practices. Understanding of security best practices and standards (e.g., OWASP, NIST). It Would be Nice if You Had Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Technologies and Tools: Familiarity with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, ECS...). Familiarity with AWS cloud services. Understanding of DevOps tools and practices. OPSWAT is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to providing an environment where equal employment opportunities are extended to all employees and applicants, free of discrimination and harassment of any type. All employment decisions are based on individual qualifications, job requirements, and business needs without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other category protected by federal, state, or local laws. Recruiting Agencies: we do not accept unsolicited resumes from third party agencies for any of our open positions. To submit resumes for our jobs, there must be a recruiting contract approved by our legal team and endorsed by both parties. We are currently not accepting additional 3rd party agencies at this time.

Title: Chuyên Viên/Chuyên gia tư vấn giải pháp chuyển đổi số (Khối Chính phủ)
Salary: Thu nhập cạnh tranh theo năng lực ứng viên
Skills: IT Governance, Project Management, English, Business Analysis, Solution Architecture
Description: About the job Trách nhiệm: - Tham gia nghiên cứu đổi mới sáng tạo, công nghệ/giải pháp mới cho Khối chính phủ, cập nhật công nghệ mới và tìm hiểu xu hướng công nghệ cho các lĩnh vực: Ngoại giao, Tư pháp, Thuế, Kho bạc nhà nước, Văn hoá thể thao và du lịch, Y tế ... - Tham gia nghiên cứu, xây dựng đề án về chuyển đổi số cho các nghiệp vụ chuyên môn/các ngành thuộc các lĩnh vực trên. - Đầu mối tìm kiếm, trao đổi, thỏa thuận với đối tác, các hãng về giải pháp, nguồn lực đồng hành giải quyết bài toán khách hàng và xây dựng hợp tác lâu dài các bên. - Đề xuất đầu tư, phát triển năng lực các giải pháp, sản phẩm, dịch vụ phù hợp (thuộc phạm vi của Khối) với yêu cầu kinh doanh và xu hướng phát triển của các khách hàng mục tiêu: Bộ - ban ngành. - Lập kế hoạch thúc đẩy và thực thi việc tư vấn và kinh doanh các giải pháp về chuyển đổi số trong phạm vi của Khối. - Tổ chức thực hiện và triển khai giải pháp cho khách hàng đảm bảo đúng phạm vi, tiến độ công việc của dự án, đảm bảo chất lượng cho khách hàng, mang lại giá trị cụ thể cho khách hàng. - Báo cáo cho Lãnh đạo về thị trường, các hoạt động phối kết hợp với các khối kinh doanh trong công ty, khách hàng, cơ hội bán hàng liên quan đến các giải pháp về chuyển đổi số. Năng lực: - Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên thuộc các lĩnh vực: Công nghệ thông tin, Khoa học tự nhiên, Kinh tế, Tài chính.. - Hiểu biết sâu về các nghiệp vụ/lĩnh vực đầu tư công nghệ thông tin thuộc một trong các lĩnh vực Ngoại giao, Tư pháp, Thuế, Kho bạc nhà nước, Văn hoá thể thao và du lịch, Y tế ... - Có khả năng áp dụng các công nghệ mới vào việc tối ưu hóa, chuyển đổi các qui trình kinh doanh. - Có khả năng đọc tài liệu, giao tiếp, email trao đổi công việc bằng tiếng Anh lĩnh vực chuyên môn. - Có kỹ năng lập kế hoạch và tổ chức thực hiện kế hoạch/sắp xếp công việc; giao tiếp tốt. - Kỹ năng phân tích ứng dụng công nghệ vào cải tiến vào hoạt động nghiệp vụ. - Ưu tiên ứng viên đã có kinh nghiệm nghiên cứu phát triển, đổi mới sáng tạo hoặc chịu trách nhiệm về digital và chuyển đổi số; ứng viên đã giữ vị trí chuyên môn/nghiệp vụ cao cấp tại các Bộ - ban ngành, Vụ - viện… Chế độ: - Thu nhập cạnh tranh theo năng lực ứng viên. Lương tháng 13 và thưởng KPI. - Tham gia đào tạo nâng cao chuyên môn và kỹ năng dành cho công việc. Tham gia thi chứng chỉ chuyên môn quốc tế do Công ty tài trợ. - Tham gia các hoạt động teambuilding, mừng công và nghỉ mát hàng năm. - 15 ngày phép/năm và các ngày nghỉ Lễ theo quy định. - Bảo hiểm sức khỏe FPTCare cho bản thân và cơ hội mua ưu đãi cho người thân. Strong knowledge of Kubernetes (K8s), including container orchestration, scaling, and deployment of microservices in a distributed system. Why You'll Love Working Here Attractive Benefits: 100% salary during probation period Annual Leave: 18 days/ year Five “Recharge Days” – Extra days, in addition to company holidays. Title: Flight Control Engineer
Skills: Embedded, Flight control, C++, English, PX4
Description: About the job We are looking for the Flight Control Engineers to join our Aircraft Department, High-Tech Industry Division at Viettel Group, who would conduct research and development for the Group’s manned aircraft. JOB DESCRIPTION: Design, simulate, integrate, and certify aviation grade flight control systems, including autopilot and fly by wire, from requirements through flight testing while meeting ARP4754A, DO 178C, DO 254, and DO 160 standards. Develop electromechanical flight control systems for research and development helicopters, aiming for automatic stability and reduced pilot workload. Study and develop control dynamics for helicopters and fixed wing aircraft. Research and design flight control systems that use mechanical linkages and electronic computer based automatic control. Develop flight control laws and optimal simulations. Integrate sensors, actuators, and rotor drive systems, providing triple channel redundancy for the fly by wire system. Develop embedded flight control systems on Pixhawk, ModalAI, and similar platforms using autopilot software such as PX4 and Ardupilot. Conduct bench tests, simulations, and flight tests, collect data, and assess performance and stability. REQUIREMENTS: At least 2 to 3 years of control system design experience for specific systems or products, with preference for flight control on helicopters or fixed wing aircraft. Knowledge of and experience in developing dynamic models and control systems, preferably for air vehicles. Experience in developing flight control software, preferably PX4, Ardupilot, and similar platforms. Experience in developing embedded software systems and computational software that integrates flight data. Strong research ability and self learning skills. Systems thinking and cross disciplinary communication. Proficient in reading and analysing technical documents. Education: Bachelor’s degree in Mechatronics, Engineering Mechanics, Aerospace Robotics, Automatic Control, Aeronautical Engineering, or a related field from a regular university program. Language:TOEIC 650 (IELTS 5.0 or equivalent). NICE TO HAVE: Experience working at research institutes, corporations, or companies involved in aircraft design and manufacturing. Applicants holding a Master’s degree in Aerospace, Mechatronics, Engineering Mechanics, or Automatic Control. Applicants who have published papers or research or have participated in and won national or international awards in aerospace. BENEFITS Competitive salary based on market rates, job responsibilities, and individual capabilities Cash gifts during holidays, Tet, and the company’s founding anniversary, along with annual vacation support. Health insurance coverage, annual health check-ups at reputable medical facilities, and the opportunity to purchase health insurance for family members at discounted rates. Opportunities for training and working with experts domestically and internationally. OTHER INFORMATION Workplace: Ton That Thuyet St, Cau Giay Dist, Hanoi. Office hours: 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM, 1:30 PM - 5:30 PM from Monday to Friday. Contact: Ms. Tuyen_0787185656 (Phone/Zalo) Email: tuyendung@viettel.com.vn

We are making this happen by improving our customers’ financial wellbeing so they can achieve incredible things – buying a home, building a business, or saving for big or small things. Ensuring the right data is generated from all applications and sourced at the right velocity with the complete depth and breadth to ensure complete coverage and reuse. What will your day look like: Design Backend services using Python Implement methods for DevOps automation of all parts of the built data pipelines to deploy from development to production Build and run the data processing pipeline on Google Cloud Platform Work with Implementation teams from concept to operations to provide deep technical expertise for successfully deploying large scale data solutions in the enterprise and use modern data/analytics technologies on GCP Formulate business problems as technical data problems while ensuring that key business drivers are captured in collaboration with product management Implement unit test & debugging JOB REQUIREMENTS Must have: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or a related field At least 5 years of experience working on developing backend/ platform applications using Python/ Go/ Java/ Rust (open to switch to Python when joining) Experience in setting up infrastructure, CI/CD workflows, and cloud (public cloud) Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to analyze and resolve complex technical issues. Working proficiency in English, both verbal and writing. Nice to have: Experience in developing big-data pipelines (batch, streaming processing) is a huge plus Experience in developing automation processes and Observability is a huge plus. Interested in working with data platforms / eager to learn more about data is a huge plus. Familiar with Docker, K8S WHY YOU SHOULD JOIN US: Very challenging project with ANZ Bank where latest technology are applied and talented engineers are gathered Attractive package including base salary + 13th month salary Insurance based on full base salary and Medical Benefit (Bao Viet Insurance Package) for Employee and Family 100% of full salary and benefits as an official employee from the 1st day of working 100% salary during probation time Working in a fast paced, flexible, and multinational working environment with opportunity to travel onsite (in 60 countries) Internal Training (Technical & Functional & English) Working with outstanding colleagues coming from top universities and top companies in Vietnam and foreign countries 18 paid leaves per year Hybrid working mode We highly appreciate your interest in this position of HCLTECH Vietnam. After reviewing all applications, only qualified candidates will be contacted for the next steps within 15 days from date of submission.

Strong communication and documentation skills. Able to write clear test cases and defect reports. Familiarity with Excel, Jira, or similar tools. Title: AI/Machine Learning Engineer - Salary upto 60M

Skills: Python, Kubernetes, Docker, Machine Learning, English
Description: About the job We are seeking a software-minded AI/ML Engineer to join our team of AI Engineers (AIEs) who are responsible for deploying, integrating, and wrapping ML models as scalable, production-ready solutions - without developing or training models. The ideal candidate is a strong Python developer who treats ML models as black-box services, with a solid grasp of data workflows and a professional software engineering mindset. When you join with us, you will have many opportunities for yourself: Work in a big project with many senior/expert people. Join training on job if you need more training in project Have chance to onsite short-time (4-6 weeks/trip) Singapore, US, UK,... for training and working Responsibilities Wrap, deploy, and manage pre-built ML models using Python and Kubeflow. Build data preprocessing and postprocessing pipelines to support ML inference. Collaborate with Data Scientists, ML Ops, and Platform Engineers to ensure smooth integration and scalable solutions. Write clean, maintainable, and scalable code adhering to software engineering best practices. Think through edge cases, ensure robustness, and deliver sustainable solutions — not quick fixes. Document processes and contribute to reusability and generalization of AI components. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Minimum of 3 years of experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or in a similar role Proficiency in Python and common development practices (e.g., Clean Code, version control, unit testing). Good understanding of ML/AI workflows and data lifecycle, especially around data preparation, preprocessing, and delivery. Familiarity with containerization tools such as Docker. Good English communication skills (written and verbal) — must. Nice to have (Learnable on the Job) Experience with Kubeflow on Kubernetes for model orchestration. Understanding of CI/CD pipelines (e.g., GitHub Actions). Exposure to AWS cloud services for deployment or data handling. Benefits Attractive Salary Package based on your competence plus Annual Bonus and Project Performance Bonus The opportunity to work onsite in Singapore, EU, US,... “FPT care” health insurance provided by AON and is exclusive for FPT employees Excellent cost-free learning opportunities: Udemy Premium account, English class, sponsor for taking certification such as PMP, AWS, etc. Annual leave according to Labor Law and Company Policy Other allowances: lunch allowance, working on-site allowance, etc. Annual Summer Vacation support from 1 Million VND to 6 Million VND and up to 3 days off work 13th-month Salary Salary review according to Company Policy International, professional, dynamic and friendly working environment and culture CONTACT Interested candidates should submit a completed Curriculum Vitae/ Resume and Cover Letter to email anhntl34@fpt.com Feel free to inbox me for any questions.

(CEH is welcomed) OPSWAT is an equal opportunity employer. Strong documentation and bug-tracking skills Hackathon or competitive coding experience is a plus Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge Benefits Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?
