Description: About the job 💼 Lead Fullstack Developer – Cloud Application Project | SCC Vietnam 📍 Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam | 💻 Hybrid/Remote-friendly 🚀 Join a European tech leader driving cloud innovation in Post Office systems ⸻ 🔍 About the Role We’re looking for a Lead Fullstack Developer to join our Vietnam-based team, working on a large-scale cloud-based system for Post Office (UK). You will lead a team of developers, collaborate with Architects & Product Owners, and deliver robust, scalable, and secure software solutions. This is a senior role ideal for someone ready to own the codebase, remove blockers, and bridge technical conversations between devs and architects. ⸻ 🧠 What You’ll Do • Lead the technical delivery of cloud-native applications. • Design, build, and maintain high-performing services (serverless/microservices). • Collaborate closely with cross-functional Scrum teams across Vietnam, UK, and France. • Implement DevOps best practices, CI/CD pipelines. • Champion code quality, documentation, and innovation. • Troubleshoot and resolve production-level issues. • Stay updated on AI, Data, and emerging cloud tech (yes, we love Co-pilot too). • Promote a culture of continuous improvement and mentoring. ⸻ 🧰 Your Skills & Experience ✅ Must-have: • 5+ years’ experience in software development, preferably in cloud environments. • Strong experience with Python, TypeScript, or C#. • Cloud platform knowledge (AWS, Azure, or GCP) – certification is a plus. • Experience with Agile/Scrum, Git, and DevOps practices. • Excellent problem-solving, team leadership, and communication skills. • Good English – verbal & written – for daily work with UK team. 🪄 Nice-to-have: • Experience with AI/ML concepts, Data Analytics, Data Warehouse. • Familiarity with Webdriver.io or Selenium for automation testing. • Experience with Power BI or cloud dashboards is a bonus. ⸻ 👥 Who You’ll Work With • Report to VN/UK Technical Architect. • Cross-site collaboration with UK, Romania, and France tech teams. ⸻ 🌍 About SCC Vietnam SCC (Specialist Computer Centres) is a UK-based IT leader operating in over 50 countries with 2,500+ enterprise customers. In Vietnam, we build critical software systems, infrastructure support, and digital transformation services for our UK & French clients. ⸻ 🎁 What We Offer • Competitive salary, performance bonus & 13th-month salary. • Premium healthcare (includes dependents), annual health check. • Hybrid working policy & international exposure. • Travel insurance, annual trip, training & certifications support. ⸻ 🚀 Ready to join a team that builds systems powering the UK’s national infrastructure?

Title: Tuyển dụng part-time – Fullstack Developer Next.js, 40 USD/giờ, làm việc tại Hà Nội
Skills: NextJS, ReactJS, TypeScript, Git, API
Description: About the job Mô tả công việc Chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm fullstack developer part-time có kinh nghiệm với Next.js để tham gia phát triển hệ thống web application cùng team coder hiện tại, có khả năng mở rộng và tích hợp công nghệ AI. Trách nhiệm công việc: Phát triển frontend và backend với Next.js (App Router), React 18, TypeScript Thiết kế UI/UX responsive bằng TailwindCSS Quản lý state phức tạp bằng Zustand hoặc Redux Toolkit Xây dựng backend sử dụng Prisma ORM, kết nối với PostgreSQL hoặc MongoDB Tích hợp OAuth 2.0 để đăng nhập với Google, GitHub... Làm việc với các loại API: RESTful API, GraphQL 3rd-party APIs (Google, OpenAI, Firebase, Stripe, v.v.) Internal microservices thông qua API Gateway Tích hợp các tính năng liên quan đến AI (OpenAI API, LangChain, vector search...) Viết test (unit/integration), tối ưu hiệu suất SSR/CSR, caching, lazy loading... Sử dụng Git, thiết lập CI/CD pipelines, code review và làm việc nhóm theo mô hình Agile/Scrum Yêu cầu ứng viên Có ít nhất 1 năm kinh nghiệm thực chiến với Next.js fullstack (ưu tiên App Router) Thành thạo: Next.js + React + TailwindCSS Zustand hoặc Redux Toolkit Prisma ORM + PostgreSQL/MongoDB Tích hợp đăng nhập bằng OAuth 2.0, SSO Làm việc với RESTful API / GraphQL Sử dụng OpenAI API / LangChain là một lợi thế lớn Nắm vững Git, GitHub workflows, quản lý mã nguồn Có kiến thức về bảo mật web (XSS, CSRF, JWT, CORS...) Viết clean code, có tư duy logic và khả năng làm việc độc lập hoặc theo nhóm Làm việc tại Hà Nội | Part-time linh hoạt Quyền lợi Mức lương: 40 USD/giờ, thanh toán theo tuần hoặc milestone rõ ràng Thời gian làm việc linh hoạt, phù hợp với freelancer hoặc người làm thêm Có thể làm remote sau thời gian onboard tại văn phòng Cơ hội hợp tác phát triển lâu dài, ngoài lương bạn sẽ được nhận phần trăm doanh thu dự án triển khai Được miễn phí sử dụng các ứng dụng AI tính phí như cursor.com Cách ứng tuyển Gửi CV và portfolio dự án về email: contact@affiliatecms.com với tiêu đề: Ứng tuyển vị trí part-time – Fullstack Developer Next.js Thời hạn nhận hồ sơ: 31/08/2025.

Title: Java Developer
Skills: Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, PostgreSql, MongoDB
Description: About the job MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC Tham gia phát triển, tối ưu và bảo trì hệ thống phần mềm sử dụng Java Spring Boot Thiết kế, xây dựng các dịch vụ theo kiến trúc Microservice Làm việc với hệ quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu như PostgreSQL, MongoDB Phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan để phân tích yêu cầu và đưa ra giải pháp kỹ thuật phù hợp Xử lý nhanh các tình huống thực tế phát sinh trong quá trình phát triển phần mềm YÊU CẦU Có kinh nghiệm từ 02 năm về lập trình Java (Java Spring Boot) Nắm chắc Java Core, thành thạo Spring Boot, RESTful API Có kinh nghiệm xây dựng và vận hành hệ thống Microservice Thành thạo với PostgreSQL, MongoDB Làm việc với Microservice, Mô hình quản lý team Agile Nhanh nhẹn, quyết tâm học thêm nghiệp vụ mảng banking, chứng khoán Ưu tiên ứng viên có khả năng đọc viết tiếng Anh (cơ bản); nghe nói (nếu có thể) Có kinh nghiệm với 1 trong các công nghệ sau sẽ là lợi thế: Elasticsearch, Redis, Kafka, Node.js, NestJS QUYỀN LỢI Làm việc từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6 Có mức lương hấp dẫn tương xứng với năng lực làm việc Không có thử việc, ký hợp đồng chính thức và đóng BHXH ngay từ đầu Cố định 13 tháng lương Net/ năm + Thưởng Có lộ trình thăng tiến rõ ràng đánh giá theo level từ member => key member => Teamlead Có cơ hội tiếp cận và học hỏi công nghệ mới (AI, Location Tracking, Realtime...) Môi trường công bằng, đảm bảo mọi người đều có thể phát huy hết khả năng Được làm việc với những cá nhân xuất sắc, có nhiều kinh nghiệm Được hưởng Bảo hiểm xã hội, Bảo hiểm y tế, Bảo hiểm thất nghiệp theo chế độ nhà nước Hoạt động thể thao, CLB bóng đá, cầu lông, … Khám sức khỏe định kỳ 1 năm/1 lần Chế độ du lịch hàng năm

Title: Fresher Product Manager
Skills: Business Analysis, Market research, Data Analysis, Project Management, English
Description: About the job MISA Software, đơn vị tiên phong trong lĩnh vực cung cấp giải pháp chuyển đổi số toàn diện SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) tại Việt Nam với gần 60 sản phẩm, phục vụ 350,000 khách hàng doanh nghiệp, cơ quan nhà nước, hộ kinh doanh và 3.5 triệu khách hàng cá nhân, tự hào ra mắt Chương trình Tuyển dụng Associate Product Manager (APM) 2025. Chương trình nhằm tìm kiếm những tài năng trẻ, đam mê công nghệ, có tư duy sáng tạo và khát vọng tạo ra các sản phẩm công nghệ mang giá trị vượt trội, góp phần thúc đẩy chuyển đổi số quốc gia. Mô tả công việc Triển khai công việc theo sự phân công của Product manager phụ trách sản phẩm kế toán-tài chính, bao gồm: Đảm bảo các yêu cầu sản phẩm được rõ ràng, đầy đủ và phù hợp với định hướng của công ty. Duy trì liên lạc và phối hợp hiệu quả giữa các bộ phận liên quan (kỹ thuật, marketing, sales, hỗ trợ khách hàng). Báo cáo kịp thời tiến độ công việc và các vấn đề phát sinh cho Product Manager hoặc cấp trên. Tham gia phân tích cạnh tranh, nghiên cứu thị trường để hỗ trợ đưa ra chiến lược sản phẩm. Phối hợp chặt chẽ với nhóm phát triển trong việc hoàn thiện tính năng mới, nâng cấp sản phẩm. Học hỏi và cập nhật xu hướng sản phẩm mới, công nghệ mới trong lĩnh vực quản lý sản phẩm. Yêu cầu công việc A. Học vấn: Tốt nghiệp đại học chuyên ngành: kế toán, kiểm toán, tài chính, Kinh doanh, Kinh tế, Marketing hoặc các chuyên ngành tương tự từ các trường đại học uy tín trong nước và quốc tế. B. Kinh nghiệm Với ứng viên chưa có kinh nghiệm phát triển sản phẩm, yêu cầu : Từ 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trong các lĩnh vực tương đương chuyên ngành học. Ưu tiên các ứng viên đã có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các phần mềm của MISA hoặc các phần mềm tương tự trên thị trường. Với ứng viên có kinh nghiệm phát triển phần mềm, yêu cầu : Có ít nhất 1 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc tại các vị trí Business Analyst, Product Owner tại các công ty phần mềm uy tín. C. Tố chất và kỹ năng: Có khả năng nghiên cứu và phân tích thị trường, khách hàng một cách bài bản. Kỹ năng giao tiếp, thuyết trình, và đàm phán tốt. Tư duy logic, khả năng phân tích dữ liệu và ra quyết định dựa trên dữ liệu. Đam mê công nghệ, mong muốn phát triển sản phẩm kế toán-tài chính mang lại giá trị cho xã hội. Tiếng Anh tốt (ưu tiên ứng viên có khả năng đọc hiểu tài liệu chuyên ngành và giao tiếp cơ bản). Kỹ năng sử dụng các công cụ quản lý dự án (Trello, Asana, Jira), phân tích dữ liệu (Excel, Power BI, Tableau), hoặc công cụ thu thập dữ liệu (Google Analytics, Mixpanel) là một lợi thế. Quyền lợi Sự nghiệp bứt phá Cơ hội đảm nhiệm vị trí Product Manager của các sản phẩm hàng triệu người dùng Làm việc tại công ty Product chuyên nghiệp và uy tín hàng đầu tại Việt Nam Up-Skill không giới hạn Được hướng dẫn trực tiếp bởi các Product Manager xuất sắc tại tập đoàn hàng đầu Việt Nam Thực chiến dự án quy mô lớn: Tiếp xúc với công nghệ tiên tiến và hàng triệu khách hàng (3.500.000+ cá nhân, 300.000+ doanh nghiệp, 80.000+ đơn vị hành chính sự nghiệp) Đãi ngộ xứng tầm Thu nhập cạnh tranh đầy hấp dẫn Xét duyệt tăng lương 2 lần/năm Thưởng hiệu quả công việc hấp dẫn từ 2-4 tháng lương Cộng đồng trẻ - Tư duy lớn Được học hỏi và làm việc cùng 3500+ nhân tài cùng khát vọng đưa sản phẩm công nghệ “Make In Vietnam” vươn tầm quốc tế Môi trường kiến tạo & đột phá Quy trình mình bạch, rõ ràng, chuyên nghiệp. Văn hóa cởi mở, đề cao sáng tạo, khuyến khích tư duy đột phá Quy trình tuyển dụng: Vòng 1: Sàng lọc hồ sơ Vòng 2: Thử thách tư duy, phỏng vấn cá nhân Vòng 3: Làm bài nghiên cứu, phỏng vấn chuyên môn

Title: AWS Fullstack Developer (Middle/Senior)
Skills: Angular, Java, Python, AWS, DevOps
Description: About the job Who are we? Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success. At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like: Brief Call : Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you! Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities! Case study : Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc. As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience. We look forward to meeting you! Job Description ABOUT THE JOB Design, develop, and maintain end-to-end full stack solutions using Angular for frontend and Java or Python for backend. Architect and implement scalable microservices and expose them via RESTful APIs. Leverage AWS services such as Lambda, API Gateway, RDS, and NoSQL databases to build and manage backend components. Automate infrastructure provisioning with tools like Terraform or AWS CloudFormation. Implement robust authentication and authorization mechanisms aligned with OAuth2 standards and best security practices. Work closely with DevOps and QA teams to deliver quality solutions across the entire software development lifecycle. Troubleshoot performance issues, optimize system reliability, and enhance platform stability. Engage actively in agile rituals, including code reviews, sprint planning, and daily stand-ups. About You Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or a related field. 3.5+ years of experience in full stack development using Angular on the frontend and either Java or Python on the backend. At least 1 year of experience with AWS cloud services, particularly Lambda, API Gateway, RDS, and NoSQL technologies. Solid experience designing scalable microservice architectures and creating RESTful APIs. Skilled in defining infrastructure as code using Terraform or AWS CloudFormation. Fluent in English communication. Strong understanding of secure access control flows, especially using OAuth2 and security best practices. Collaborative mindset with experience working alongside DevOps and QA in agile environments. Ability to monitor, debug, and enhance system performance and uptime. Familiar with agile methodologies and comfortable participating in sprints, code reviews, and team ceremonies. WHY AMARIS? Competitive salary and 13th-month salary. 14+ annual leaves per year. Premium healthcare insurance, starting from your probation period. Project reviews and yearly performance appraisals. Annual company trips. Teambuilding activities: Team lunch/dinner, events, and celebrations, sports clubs (football, yoga, badminton, etc.). International team with flexible working time. Tailor-made career path. Technical workshops and training courses. Mobility: Opportunities to be on-site abroad in our offices in over 60+ countries. Equal Opportunity Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics. Desired Skills and Experience Java, Angular, AWS Operations

Title: Senior Business Analyst-Vietnam
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Business Analysis, Data Analysis, English, SQL, Power BI
Description: About the job Responsibilities About Us The Global Business Solutions (GBS) team is responsible for the revenue growth of the TikTok business, and our teams include Sales, Marketing, Ops, Account Managers, Agency and partnerships, as well as Marketing Science. At TikTok, our Global Business Solutions (GBS) team plays a key role in generating revenue by promoting our advertising solutions, onboarding new clients, driving ad campaigns, and more. As the TikTok community grows at an unprecedented speed around the world, our GBS team leads groundbreaking projects that are changing the landscape of the advertising industry in real time. Responsibilities - Business Analysis and Management: Global Business Solutions business data analysis, develop strategic planning, provide solutions and implementation plans; based on the understanding and analysis of the specific business domains, continuously optimize control rules, product tools and business operations, to provide strong support for the implementation of the strategy - Regular monitoring and data analysis on various business metrics of Outbound E-commerce, and provide corresponding solutions to assist the platform sales team to continuously improve consumer experience - Business puzzle breakdown: familiar with Outbound e-commerce rules, deeply support sales and client solution team leader to do project task break-down, prioritization, monitoring important business progress; able to measure project output and efficiency through quantitative and qualitative analysis Qualifications Minimum Qualifications - Bachelor degree or above, graduate degree is preferred, math, statistics, computer-related majors are preferred, strong capability of data analytics is required - Min 5 years of experience in research and analysis positions in consulting, e-commerce/ads is preferred - Outstanding reasoning capability and logic, with good problem solving methodologies, being able to independently output quality strategic solutions, strong learning and adaptive ability, strategic framework thinking, sensitivity and insight into the business - Strategic thinking capacity, able to quickly understand the business and discover the connection between business and data performance - Excellent verbal and written English communication skill. Preferred Qualifications - Proficiency in BI visualization tools such as Tableau/Power BI is preferred, SQL is a plus - Fast learner, passionate about participating in business, and able to adapt to high intensity and fast growth work environment About TikTok TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and we also have offices in New York City, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. Why Join Us Inspiring creativity is at the core of TikTok's mission. Our innovative product is built to help people authentically express themselves, discover and connect – and our global, diverse teams make that possible. Together, we create value for our communities, inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we work towards every day. We strive to do great things with great people. We lead with curiosity, humility, and a desire to make impact in a rapidly growing tech company. Every challenge is an opportunity to learn and innovate as one team. We're resilient and embrace challenges as they come. By constantly iterating and fostering an "Always Day 1" mindset, we achieve meaningful breakthroughs for ourselves, our company, and our users. When we create and grow together, the possibilities are limitless. Join us. Diversity & Inclusion TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

Title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
Skills: Terraform, Kubernetes, Docker, Python, English
Description: About the job At Optimizely, we're on a mission to help people unlock their digital potential. We do that by reinventing how marketing and product teams work to create and optimize digital experiences across all channels. With Optimizely One, our industry-first operating system for marketers, we offer teams flexibility and choice to build their stack their way with our fully SaaS, fully decoupled, and highly composable solution. We are proud to help more than 10,000 businesses, including H&M, PayPal, Zoom, and Toyota, enrich their customer lifetime value, increase revenue and grow their brands. Our innovation and excellence have earned us numerous recognitions as a leader by industry analysts such as Gartner, Forrester, and IDC, reinforcing our role as a trailblazer in MarTech. At our core, we believe work is about more than just numbers -- it's about the people. Our culture is dynamic and constantly evolving, shaped by every employee, their actions and their stories. With over 1500 Optimizers spread across 12 global locations, our diverse team embodies the "One Optimizely" spirit, emphasizing collaboration and continuous improvement, while fostering a culture where every voice is heard and valued. Hiring Manager: Hoan Le (hoan.le@optimizely.com) Introduction SREs at Optimizely are focused on making us the most reliable, performant, and trustworthy Digital Experience Optimization platform ever. Our engineering teams have built data pipelines that process 10 billion events daily and applications that support powerful experimentation and collaboration workflows at scale. Our platforms are built on AWS and GCP. We use technologies such as Kafka, Samza, HBase, MySQL, and Postgres. We build and manage our systems using TravisCI, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, and Chef. We use a combination of managed and self-hosted approaches. This is a unique opportunity to lead the engineering organization in areas of standardized automated infrastructure and service provisioning and orchestration, service-oriented architectural excellence, and forward-looking planning and execution of large technical project We are looking for a Senior Site Reliability Engineer to help build and scale our CloudOps capabilities. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and operating critical infrastructure and platform services while collaborating closely with engineering, support, and product teams to improve the reliability, scalability, and performance of our systems. This is a hands-on technical role where you will be instrumental in shaping the SRE culture, driving automation, and ensuring high availability across all services. Job Responsibilities Champion a Site Reliability Engineering culture across the organization by sharing best practices, tools, documentation, and code. Identify and automate manual operational tasks using scripting, infrastructure-as-code, and CI/CD pipelines. Build and maintain observability (monitoring, logging, tracing) for all production systems to ensure reliability, availability, and performance. Proactively monitor alerts across all platforms and coordinate with SRE, Operations, Engineering, and Support teams to ensure quick detection and resolution of incidents— minimizing MTTA/MTTR. Lead and manage on-call rotations, driving a blameless incident management and postmortem culture. Collaborate with development teams to define and implement SLOs, SLIs, and error budgets. Ensure uptime SLAs are met through robust automation, testing, monitoring, and operational best practices. Create and maintain runbooks, playbooks, and system documentation to ensure operational readiness and knowledge sharing. Knowledge And Experience Strong experience in Linux Systems Administration in cloud or virtualized environments Proficiency in infrastructure-as-code tools such as Terraform Hands-on experience with configuration management tools like Ansible or SaltStack Skilled in scripting and automation using Python and Bash Experience deploying and maintaining services in public cloud environments (Azure, AWS, or GCP) Solid understanding of observability tooling, especially Datadog, ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana), or similar Experience building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines (e.g., GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, Octopus) Familiarity with Kubernetes and Docker; production experience is a strong plus Experience operating and scaling distributed systems across multiple regions Strong communication and collaboration skills; comfortable working across time zones Passion for learning, continuous improvement, and a strong sense of ownership Fluent in English, both written and spoken. Optimizely is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Optimizely is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

Title: Senior Associate/ Associate Product Owner
Skills: Product Management, Stakeholder management, Agile, Scrum, English
Description: About the job Responsibilities Take ownership and be responsible for the discovery and delivery of software products, evaluating opportunities, and determining what gets built and delivered to customers. Conduct training sessions to relevant teams when introducing a new feature or product to ensure effective adoption and understanding. Manage administrative tasks related to the product and maintain existing products. Work with teams in the Product department to gain a deep understanding of customer/user pain points and experiences to identify product gaps and generate new ideas. Work with business teams and/or business partners to gain a deep understanding of business needs and contexts, driving product adoption. Drive the execution of all or parts of the product lifecycle process, including product research, ideation, design, development, and performance evaluation. Work closely with product designers on product discovery. Collaborate with a cross-functional development team in Agile/Scrum project delivery. Identify opportunities for working process improvements, recommend innovative solutions, and implement best practices. Actively participate in and contribute to knowledge-sharing sessions. Qualification A bachelor degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field is a plus. Minimum 2 years of experience as a Product Owner or Business Analyst. Proven ability to develop products and effectively communicate recommendations to management. Demonstrated domain expertise in a specific business area. Solid technical background with an understanding of, or hands-on experience in, software development. Agile or Scrum certification or related credentials is a plus. Understanding of UX principles to analyze user behavior, preferences, and pain points. Excellent ability to communicate complex business and technical concepts clearly. Stakeholder management experience, ensuring alignment across teams. Strong collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a proactive growth mindset. Tech-savvy, with a passion for exploring new features and tools. Proficiency in English is required.

Title: SOP Intern
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Business Analysis, Technical Writing, English, Team Management, Communication
Description: About the job Position Overview Standard Operation Procedures (SOPs) are clear, step-by-step instructions that help businesses run their processes smoothly, correctly, and the same way every time. As an SOP Intern, your main responsibility is to format and organize SOP documents to ensure they are clear, consistent, professional, and accessible to all employees. You will be able to grasp how our organization operates. It also equips you with a handful of valuable skill sets, namely documentation skills, logical thinking, and teamwork. Living in a different time zone from TRG? No problem. We have a highly flexible work arrangement that allows all of our teams to work from practically anywhere they want. Read on to see our requirements for this position. Please note: This is an unpaid internship. What does a successful SOP Intern look like? SOPs are essential in ensuring all TRG teams and TRGers provide consistently high-quality services and products every time. Thus, you are in charge of collaborating with not only your team members but also other departments to obtain requirements and knowledge and turn them into proper documentation according to TRG’s standard guidelines for SOPs. In short, you will potentially be communicating, organizing, managing, and finetuning SOPs for the following functions: Professional Services Marketing Accounting Human Resources & Administration Sales Customer Support What’s in it for you? Work from ANYWHERE: Yes, you heard that right! You can choose to work practically any day, from anywhere you want: your bedroom, your coffee table, at a coworking space, in the Maldives, or on the moon (if space travel is accessible to the public). And of course, you are always welcome at our TRG office. We believe that, as a professional, you will perform your best regardless of your physical location. Top 1% Arabica coffee beans and other refreshing beverages from our F&B brand downstairs - PJ’s Coffee, just for you, and it’s on the house! No more wasting your money on morning coffee! A modern, green, and open space office with lounge areas and a spacious lunchroom Working with our Diverse and Inclusive TRG community with colleagues WFA from across the globe Strong culture to support your learning development and growth. In other words, you can learn any skills during your internship Multiple (12+) networking/collaboration/learning/training events each month Training and certification support Free access to our library (1000+ books and still counting), multiple online training portals/ universities/ academies Get coached by TRG’s founder and CEO or other experts in our coaching and mentoring network. What You Need Ability to work independently or with minimal supervision Proactive, self-motivated, and detail-oriented A track record of meeting deadlines Comfortable with navigating different systems, platforms, or applications An infinitely curious and open mind to learn and grow Adoption of our core values Excellent verbal and written communication in English Recruitment process Apply via our Career page: https://careers.trginternation... --> Pre-hire assessments (received via email right after your application submission, please complete them within 3 days) --> HR round --> Final round

Title: Account Strategist, Mid-Market Sales, Google Customer Solutions
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Digital Marketing, Google Ads, Data Analysis, Stakeholder management, English
Description: About the job Please visit this Google Careers posting for the Vietnamese-translated version of this role. Minimum qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 2 years of experience in digital advertising, consultative business, digital media business, business development, online media environment, or digital marketing role. Preferred qualifications: Experience with business in a technology, advertising, media business, or internet environment. Experience with Google Ads and YouTube account management, managing advertising or media campaigns. Experience in media across platforms (e.g., TV, radio, print, sponsorship, etc.). Experience in managing multiple accounts with attention to detail. Ability to succeed in a changing environment with excellent problem-solving, thinking, and investigative skills. About The Job Businesses of all shapes and sizes rely on Google’s unparalleled advertising solutions to help them grow in today's dynamic marketing environment. You bring a passion for sales, knowledge of online media, and commitment to maximize customer success. You act like an owner, move with velocity through change, finding innovative and strategic ways to consistently deliver extraordinary and incremental outcomes for both Google and your customers. You build trusted relationships with customers, uncovering their business needs and translating them into powerful solutions to achieve their most ambitious goals. You achieve as a team with sellers, shape the future of advertising in the AI-era, and make a real impact on the millions of companies and billions of users that trust Google with their most important goals. Google Customer Solutions (GCS) sales teams are trusted advisors and competitive sellers who maintain a relentless focus on customer success by bringing the best Google has to offer to small- and medium-sized businesses (SMBs), which are the backbone of our communities. As a member of our team, you’ll have the opportunity to work with company owners and make a real difference in their businesses by helping them grow. Together, we help shape the future of innovation for customers, partners, and sellers...and we have fun doing it. Responsibilities Build and manage relationships with C-level clients and executive partner stakeholders. Develop a understanding of their business tests, marketing objectives, and success metrics. Structure a joint strategy between Google and clients, and lead a cross-functional team within Google to collaborate on projects and drive client success. Plan for, and achieve, growth goals, through the presentation of Google advertising products/solutions that will help clients to meet their marketing objectives. Develop forward thinking, data-motivated analysis and recommendations that align with customer goals, and quantify opportunities with recommendations to present to customers. Build a knowledge of how Google advertising products work and can be used to help meet marketing objectives. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

Title: Developer (Java)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Java, Spring, SQL, Git, Agile
Description: About the job Company Description Technology is our how. And people are our why. For over two decades, we have been harnessing technology to drive meaningful change. By combining world-class engineering, industry expertise and a people-centric mindset, we consult and partner with leading brands from various industries to create dynamic platforms and intelligent digital experiences that drive innovation and transform businesses. From prototype to real-world impact - be part of a global shift by doing work that matters. Job Description Development is the largest discipline at Endava. Our developers design, build, and release software products in multiple programming languages, frameworks, and libraries. Always collaborating with cross-functional project teams, our developers are adaptable problem-solvers with a client-oriented mindset. As a Developer (Java) at Endava, you will work in a professional and cross-functional team for payment gateway services. You'll be involved in the full development lifecycle of a software system. Contribute to delivering new products to the market by meeting customer's requirements and product development programs. Be an integral part of a Scrum team and contribute to Agile processes. Responsibilities: Designs, estimates, and implements technical solutions for medium/high complexity applications. Participates actively in all phases of application development lifecycle. Collaborates with various project stakeholders to provide support for clarifying requirements, processes, architecture, and priorities. Recommends and promotes IT industry standards, tools, practices (DevOps, etc.) to achieve well-engineered software products. Proposes improvements and escalates risks/issues related to development activities. Participates in the review of the work done by development team members. Learns and applies new technologies, practices, and tools as appropriate to the project. Participates in internal and external tech communities, events. Shares experience and knowledge gained from projects. Qualifications 2+ years of experience in software development. Good understanding of different common programming paradigms (OOP, Functional, etc.). Familiar with design/architectural patterns and clean code principles (e.g., SOLID, GoF, MVVM). Proficiency in relevant programming languages, frameworks, and tools such as Java, IntelliJ IDEA, Spring, Hibernate, Maven, Gradle. Nice to have: Kotlin. Practical experience in platform-specific database systems and SQL. Understanding of version control systems like Git or similar. Experience with testing and mocking frameworks. Familiar with communication protocols and standards such as HTTP, REST, JSON, TCP/IP. Basic knowledge of Agile methodologies (e.g., SCRUM, KANBAN). Basic knowledge of CI/CD tools and practices. Good problem-solving skills and analytical thinking. Excellent communication and teamwork abilities. Intermediate English proficiency. Additional Information Discover some of the global benefits that empower our people to become the best version of themselves: Finance: Competitive salary package, referral bonus; Career Development: Career coaching, global career opportunities, non-linear career paths, internal development programmes for management and technical leadership; Learning Opportunities: Complex projects, rotations, internal tech communities, training, certifications, coaching, online learning platforms subscriptions, pass-it-on sessions, workshops, conferences; Work-Life Balance: Hybrid work and flexible working hours, employee assistance programme; Health: Global internal wellbeing programme, access to wellbeing apps; Community: Global internal tech communities, hobby clubs and interest groups, inclusion and diversity programmes, events and celebrations. Annual leave encashment; 13th month salary; Premium annual health check & Extra health & accident insurance; Welcome kit and gift-giving frequency; Attractive benefits of Trade Union; Exciting English programme.

Men’s Day, Women’s Day, Children’s Day, Mid-Autumn Festival and other benefits under the provisions of the company 🎯Dynamic Environment And Open Culture Year-end party, sports day, yearly company trip and quarterly team building,...with a generous budget Socialize with colleagues through monthly Happy Hour Monthly allowance when joining clubs: Soccer, Swimming, Yoga, Music,... Nice & modern working space with young, dynamic & friendly colleagues and free coffee, tea, drinks,... Flat, open and sharing culture with friendly management team; outsourcing company with product mindset 🎯Strong Learning Culture Free training courses for technical and soft skills (presentation skills, communication skills, foreign language courses,...) Account to log in to our online learning system, which contains thousands of valuable lectures (LMS) Participate in workshops, seminars, tech talk,... with sharing from experts inside and outside the company Working opportunities with technical gurus who built and operated world-class applications with millions of users. Desired Skills and Experience English Language, Figma, UI Design, Adobe Illustrator, Web Design, UX Design, Design Thinking, Adobe Photoshop

Title: Back End Developer (Junior)
Skills: Golang, Rust, Linux, Docker, Database
Description: About the job MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC: Phát triển, tối ưu và bảo trì các hệ thống backend đang triển khai. Tham gia xây dựng, phát triển các sản phẩm trong lĩnh vực Crypto/Blockchain theo định hướng của công ty. Đề xuất ý tưởng, cùng đội ngũ kỹ thuật triển khai các giải pháp thành sản phẩm thực tế. YÊU CẦU NĂNG LỰC: *Yêu cầu bắt buộc: Tốt nghiệp đại học chính quy các ngành: CNTT, Khoa học máy tính, Toán – Tin hoặc tương đương. Tối thiểu 1 năm kinh nghiệm phát triển backend với Golang hoặc Rust . Sử dụng tốt Linux và công nghệ container như Docker. Thành thạo ít nhất một trong các hệ quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu: Postgres, MySQL/MariaDB, Redis, ... Khả năng tư duy logic và giải quyết vấn đề tốt. Tinh thần học hỏi và sẵn sàng làm việc với công nghệ/ ngôn ngữ mới. *Ưu tiên (Không bắt buộc) Hiểu biết hoặc đã từng tham gia các dự án blockchain. Đam mê học hỏi và khả năng tự nghiên cứu công nghệ mới. QUYỀN LỢI: Lương: Thỏa thuận theo năng lực (14tr - 25tr), xét tăng lương sau 06 tháng làm việc. Thưởng: Theo kết quả kinh doanh, thưởng nóng cho các đóng góp nổi bật. Thưởng tháng 13 & các dịp Lễ (05 lần/ năm). * Cơ hội phát triển: Được mentor 1-1 cùng lộ trình đào tạo bài bản, giúp nâng cao kỹ năng chuyên môn và công nghệ mới. Làm việc cùng đội ngũ kỹ thuật giàu kinh nghiệm, cởi mở và hỗ trợ phát triển sự nghiệp nhanh chóng. Cơ hội thực chiến với các dự án thực tế, mở rộng mở rộng tư duy sản phẩm và kỹ năng kỹ thuật. *Chế độ phúc lợi: Đầy đủ chế độ theo quy định của pháp luật. Khám sức khỏe định kỳ, Du lịch nghỉ dưỡng, Team building hằng quý. Hỗ trợ gửi xe và đồ ăn nhẹ (Teabreak) hàng ngày miễn phí. Thời gian làm việc hợp lý: Thứ 2 - Thứ 6 (7,5 giờ/ ngày), không OT . Môi trường làm việc: Trẻ, thân thiện, đề cao sự chủ động. ĐỊA CHỈ: Tầng 6, toà Golden Field số 24 Nguyễn Cơ Thạch, p. Từ Liêm, HN

Title: Project Manager

The successful candidate will play a pivotal role in managing project delivery and leading project teams to implement IT solutions that meet our clients' strategic objectives. Role r esponsibilities Lead and manage IT projects from initiation through to successful completion, ensuring delivery within defined scope, timelines, and budget Act as Scrum Master for multiple teams, facilitating Agile ceremonies and promoting the adoption of Agile best practices Collaborate with stakeholders to clearly define project scope, objectives, and deliverables, ensuring alignment with business goals Develop and maintain comprehensive project plans, including timelines, milestones, and resource allocations Monitor project progress, proactively identifying and addressing risks and issues to ensure project success Foster effective communication and collaboration across cross-functional teams and stakeholders Provide regular project status updates and detailed reports to stakeholders and senior management Ensure strict adherence to GFT’s project management methodologies, standards, and best practices Champion continuous improvement initiatives to enhance project delivery processes and team performance. Your Skills and Experience Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration, or a related field Project Management Professional (PMP) or Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) certification is highly desirable A minimum of 12 years of experience in project management and Agile methodologies, ideally within the IT or banking industry Demonstrated success in managing complex projects and delivering high-quality results. Strong leadership and team management skills, with the ability to inspire, motivate, and develop project teams Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a proven ability to build strong relationships with stakeholders at all levels Exceptional problem-solving and decision-making capabilities Proficiency in project management tools such as Microsoft Project, JIRA, or equivalent. Title: [HN] AI Engineer – Pioneering AI Solutions
Skills: AI, NLP, Python, Java, C++
Description: About the job Mô tả công việc About Us Base.vn is a B2B SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) Company providing technology management solutions for SMEs enterprises. Base will bring to your business the smartest, most modern technology products, based on three main components: Data & Artificial Intelligence (Data & AI), Interaction (Interaction), and Platform platform (Open Platform). And imagination knows no bounds: With whatever application you have or need, Base can help you integrate into a common platform. With a strong belief in young Vietnamese engineers, we are looking for talented Engineer for the Platform Team to pursue Base’s mission together: Build great enterprise software for Asia. What You Do Design and develop AI/ML solutions to optimize business management processes, including task management, cash flow, human resources, customer service, etc. Build models in NLP, recommendation systems, predictive analytics, and generative AI to power features such as internal chatbots, cash flow forecasting, performance analysis, and virtual executive assistants. Collaborate closely with product managers, designers, and software engineers to integrate AI models into real-world products and ensure their performance in production environments. Initiate and lead innovative AI initiatives for previously unsolved problems, delivering breakthroughs in user experience and business value. Stay up to date with the latest AI trends and assess their applicability to the current system. Capable of building stable and scalable AI/ML systems. Knowledgeable in cybersecurity and data protection. Who You Are Bachelor‘s degree or higher in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field; At least 2-3 years of experience apply AI with web/app; Proficient in Python, Java, or C++, and familiar with popular AI/ML libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, HuggingFace, LangChain, etc. Hands-on experience deploying AI models in production-grade systems; Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to work independently and make informed decisions; Solid understanding of machine learning, deep learning, NLP models, and large-scale data processing systems. Preferred (Nice To Have) Experience in SaaS, enterprise management systems, or B2B products. Experience working with LLMs or building AI solutions on cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure). Strong product thinking, with the ability to contribute feature ideas based on AI capabilities. Special Benefits WHAT YOU CAN GET Attractive salary package up to 6000$ plus bonus based on performance Flexible evaluation of salary increase (1-2 times/year) commensurate with work results Opportunity to receive ESOP shares (employee stock ownership plan) for outstanding contributors High performance computer and screen Team building, vacation in a year, and other engagement activities Other benefits as prescribed by the Labor Law Personal Development Fast-track career: Join a full cycle of building real products for market and continuously grow with the scalability of products. Unlimited learning opportunities: Enhance your expertise through a comprehensive training program, guidelines from mentors, buddies, and product development challenges. Visible values & impacts: Build world-class and high-performance products that solve pain points for millions of enterprises. Talented colleagues: Work with a team of enthusiastic and professional Product Builders who have already built a highly large-scale system serving 60+ millions of pageviews, hundreds of thousands users each month, and 10,000+ enterprises; and graduated from top universities in Vietnam & the world (Stanford, UCLA, HUST, etc.). GET READY TO BE OUR AI ENGINEER! Round 1: CV Application Round 2: Interview Address Office: 16th floor, HUD Building, 37 Le Van Luong, Thanh Xuan, Hanoi.

Title: ESL Tutor
Skills: AI, English, Technical Writing, Vietnamese, NLP
Description: About the job DataAnnotation is committed to creating quality AI. Join our team to help train AI chatbots while gaining the flexibility of remote work and choosing your own schedule. We are looking for a bilingual professional to join our team and teach AI chatbots. You will have conversations in both Vietnamese and English with chatbots in order to measure their progress, as well as write novel conversations in order to teach them what to say. Benefits: This is a full-time or part-time REMOTE position You’ll be able to choose which projects you want to work on You can work on your own schedule Projects are paid hourly, starting at $20+ USD per hour, with bonuses for high-quality and high-volume work Responsibilities (both in Vietnamese and English): Come up with diverse conversations over a range of topics Write high-quality answers when given specific prompts Compare the performance of different AI models Research and fact-check AI responses Qualifications: Fluent in Vietnamese + English A bachelor's degree (completed or in progress) Excellent writing and grammar skills Strong research and fact-checking skills to ensure accuracy and originality Note: Payment is made via PayPal. We will never ask for any money from you. PayPal will handle any currency conversions from USD.

Title: Medior Java/ BE Engineer- IDG
Skills: Java, API, Microservices, AWS, CI/CD
Description: About the job ABOUT THE JOB We are seeking passionate and results-driven Medior Java/Backend Engineer to join our Integration Design and Governance team . This role is perfect for individuals who thrive on building scalable, maintainable, and innovative solutions in a fast-paced environment. You will have the opportunity to understand the intricacies of our business domains and design microservices and APIs that align with business capabilities while ensuring flexibility and scalability. You will play a key role in designing resource-oriented API s and promoting interoperability across microservices by leveraging modern integration pattern s like REST APIs, event-driven architecture, and queueing patterns. Additionally, you will contribute to advanced initiatives such as microservice consolidatio n, GraphQL platforms (Supergraph and Subgraph ), and guide teams on building cohesive microservice ecosystems that support specific business capabilities . As part of the team, you will oversee the development lifecycle, ensuring technical excellence from design to deployment, while also mentoring and empowering engineers to tackle complex technical challenges and grow within the organization. YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITIES Master the intricacies of business domains and design microservices that align with business capabilities Master the intricacies of business domains and design microservices that align with business capabilities. Design, develop, review, and implement APIs and integration solutions using modern patterns and resource-oriented architecture principles. Tackle cutting-edge projects, including microservice consolidation and building GraphQL platforms leveraging Supergraph and Subgraph approaches. Implement integration patterns (e.g., REST APIs, event-driven architecture, and queueing) to enable seamless communication between services. Drive success using Agile development practices, CI/CD pipelines, and DevOps processes. Mentor and guide engineers by sharing expertise, facilitating knowledge sessions, and providing solutions to architectural challenges. Fully understand customer/business requirements and ensure applications are developed consistently with those needs. Deliver robust, maintainable, and well-documented solutions with solid test coverage. YOUR SKILLS & EXPERIENCE Must-have: Experience as a Medior Java/ BE Engineer in a complex, enterprise-level development environment (minimum of 3+ years). Proficiency in Java or other programming languages (e.g., Python, Groovy, NodeJS, etc.). Strong foundation in Computer Science, particularly with scalable, maintainable systems. Expertise in designing RESTful APIs and complex microservices-based systems, with experience debugging and troubleshooting in microservices architectures. Hands-on experience with cloud computing (AWS or Azure). Proficiency working in containerized environments with FaaS technologies. Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and automation in software delivery. Experience with unit testing, integration testing, and debugging. Strong English communication skills (verbal and written) in a global development environment. Familiarity with Agile methodologies and environments. Ability to write structured, maintainable, and clean code. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. THE BENEFITS AND PERKS We appreciate and reward our colleagues who do great work every day – from excelling for our customers, to taking ownership of an issue to get it resolved. Here’s how we support our people with a range of exclusive benefits. 1. Generous compensation and benefit package Attractive salary 20-day paid annual leave and 7-day paid sick leave 13th month salary and Annual Performance Bonus Premium healthcare for yourself and family members Monthly allowance for team activities Premium welcome kit and occasional gifts of appreciation Extra benefits on your work anniversary 2. Exciting career and development opportunities Large scale products with modern technologies in banking domain Clear roadmap for career advancement in both technical and leadership pathways Access to digital learning platform such as Udemy Consistent and high-quality leadership training through the Distinctive Leadership program (DLP) Specialist capabilities and accreditations in key skill areas such as Cloud Engineering, Digital, Data, Security and SREs (Site reliability engineers) Sponsored English course with native teachers Opportunity for training in Australia 3. Professional and engaging working environment Hybrid working model and excellent work-life balance State-of-the-art & modern Agile office Food and beverages in the office pantry Employee Assistance Program to improve your physical and mental health Annual team activities and company events A solid and talented team behind you – great people who love what they do A DIVERSE AND INCLUSIVE WORKPLACE WORKS BETTER FOR EVERYONE We know that our people make us who we are. That's why we have built a culture of respect – where everyone feels valued and appreciated for being their true authentic selves at NAB. With our focus on inclusion and diversity, and in partnership with our Employee Resource Groups, NAB is a place where First Nations colleagues, colleagues of all genders, sexualities and ages, carers and colleagues with disability, and colleagues from all cultures, races and religions have the opportunity to thrive, connect and grow. We are intent on providing an environment where you can work your way. Ask about our many flexible work options and please let us know if we can provide any adjustments throughout the recruitment process. CLOUD-FIRST NAB is undergoing an exciting "Cloud First" technology transformation by taking advantage of the latest tools and techniques used by leading technology and digital companies globally. But it’s not just about the Tech, we are also investing heavily in our people, so if you have an appetite to learn, grow and elevate others around you, this is the place for you! If this excites you, let's have a chat over a cup of coffee! It's more than just a career at NAB! We believe in people with people and dreams, and we want you to achieve your aspirations. More than just a career, NAB Vietnam offers you a flexibility to balance your work - life, the opportunity to grow as professionals, people and a complete set of well-being offerings. If you have an appetite to learn, grow and elevate others around you, this is the place for you. IT'S MORE THAN MONEY We naturally also provide a very competitive remuneration package but a career with us is about a lot more than money. Title: Software Engineer 2
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Java, SQL, Python, Data Analysis, Prompt Engineering
Description: About the job Would you be excited to drive major changes to a scale service that is critical to the company? Substrate is the data and intelligence platform that enables internal partner teams at Microsoft to build, deploy, and maintain compliant productivity apps and services with reduced effort and faster time to market. We work closely with partners across M365 to enable critical suite-wide scenarios. The Substrate Core Foundation Performance team powers the infrastructure that underpins Microsoft 365’s most critical services. We are a high-impact, forward-looking team focused on building intelligent, scalable, and cost-efficient platforms that enable Microsoft to deliver world-class productivity experiences to billions of users. Our mission is to drive operational excellence and innovation across the M365 fleet by leveraging AI, automation, and deep platform integration. We are looking for a passionate and growth-oriented Software Engineer 2 to join our team in building a unified attribution platform that drives financial accountability and operational efficiency across Microsoft’s shared infrastructure. This role offers an opportunity to work on impactful systems that enable accurate cost attribution, usage transparency, and optimization insights across FinOps platforms. This system aims to improve cost visibility, drive accountability, and incentivize optimization by aligning expenses with actual usage. The initiative is designed to scale through standardized telemetry ingestion, automated reporting, and integration with FinOps systems, enabling sustained savings and operational discipline in future fiscal years. Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond. Responsibilities Contribute to the design and development of a scalable attribution platform that processes usage, cost, and telemetry data. Implement features that support on-behalf billing logic and integrate with FinOps systems. Assist in building dashboards and reporting tools that highlight usage trends and optimization opportunities. Collaborate with senior engineers and cross-functional teams to ensure data accuracy and alignment with platform goals. Support automation of reporting workflows and contribute to budget planning tools for engineering and finance stakeholders. Qualifications Required Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related technical field AND 2+ years technical engineering experience with coding in languages including, but not limited to, C, C++, C#, Java, JavaScript, or Python OR equivalent experience. 2+ years' experience building backend systems in Java for customer-facing web applications, including API design and implementation. Familiarity with cloud platforms and interest in FinOps or cost optimization strategies. Experience writing queries with SQL and using MySQL. Experience working with LLMs and prompt engineering. Understanding distributed systems, data pipelines, or telemetry platforms is a plus. Exposure to data visualization tools (e.g., Power BI, Grafana) is a bonus. Solid communication skills and a collaborative mindset. Other Requirements Ability to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role. These requirements include but are not limited to the following specialized security screenings: Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud background check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter. Preferred Qualifications Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science OR related technical field AND 4+ years technical engineering experience with coding in languages including, but not limited to, C, C++, C#, Java, JavaScript, or Python OR Master's Degree in Computer Science or related technical field AND 2+ years technical engineering experience with coding in languages including, but not limited to, C, C++, C#, Java, JavaScript, or Python OR equivalent experience. Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations .

In Vietnam, we build critical software systems, infrastructure support, and digital transformation services for our UK & French clients. ⸻ 🎁 What We Offer • Competitive salary, performance bonus & 13th-month salary. • Premium healthcare (includes dependents), annual health check. • Hybrid working policy & international exposure. • Travel insurance, annual trip, training & certifications support. ⸻ 🚀 Ready to join a team that builds systems powering the UK’s national infrastructure?

Title: ASO Specialist, Publisher Growth
Salary: Performance Bonus (1 time per year from 0.5-month to 3-month salary amount)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: A/B testing, Data Analysis, Android, iOS, English
Description: About the job We are looking for an experienced ASO Specialist to build and scale our App Store Optimization (ASO) function. You will play a key role in optimizing app visibility, improving conversion rates, and driving organic growth across the App Store and Google Play. As part of the Platform Operations team, you will develop ASO strategies for App Publishing projects and standalone ASO services, conduct A/B testing, and analyze market trends to enhance app rankings. This is a unique opportunity to build ASO from scratch and shape it into a BPaaS model for publishers. The ideal candidate has proven ASO success, with case studies showcasing ranking and conversion improvements, especially for casual, hyper-casual games with global traffic. What You Will Do Be part of a new ASO team from the ground up, shaping its strategy and growth. Develop and implement ASO strategies to increase app visibility and improve conversion rates. Conduct keyword research, optimize metadata (title, description, keywords), and A/B test store assets. Analyze app performance data to refine ASO strategies and drive organic user acquisition. Monitor and report on competitors' ASO strategies and industry trends. Work closely with UAC teams to align ASO efforts with paid user acquisition campaigns. Provide localized ASO strategies for different markets and regions. Test and implement AI-driven ASO tools for efficiency and scalability. Who You Are 2+ years of experience in ASO with a proven track record of successfully improving app rankings (please provide examples). Especially for casual, hyper-casual games with global traffic. Strong knowledge of App Store (iOS) and Google Play (Android) algorithms and ranking factors. Proficiency in keyword research tools (e.g., AppTweak, Sensor Tower, MobileAction, Data.ai). Experience in A/B testing store assets and analyzing conversion impact. Understanding of app localization strategies for different markets. Strong analytical skills with experience using data-driven insights to optimize ASO efforts. Familiarity with performance marketing and how ASO aligns with paid UA. Ability to work independently in a fast-paced, growth-oriented environment. Nice to have: Knowledge of SEO principles and how they apply to ASO. Background in app monetization strategies (e.g., ad revenue, in-app purchases). Why You Will Love It Competitive Salary Performance Review (2 times per year) Performance Bonus (1 time per year from 0.5-month to 3-month salary amount) Annual Leave: 15 days and other leave types Private health Insurance MacBook to be provided Good chance to explore new trends in the digital market Opportunity to learn and work with the most advanced advertising technology platforms Work in professional, active, international and dynamic environment

Title: Project Assistant (Lĩnh vực Truyền thông giải trí)
Salary: 9 triệu -15 triệu + Thưởng + Phụ cấp -> Tổng thu nhập trên từ 13 -18 triệu

Description: About the job I. Mô tả công việc: 1. Giám sát và báo cáo tiến độ các dự án: Lên kế hoạch và phân chia công việc theo chức năng, nhiệm vụ từng vị trí trong dự án Đánh giá, phân tích tiến độ, chất lượng dự án, báo cáo cho Quản lý dự án Kiểm soát các công việc được giao cho Trưởng dự án theo hướng dẫn của GĐ Điều hành 2. Thực hiện công tác quản lý dự án: Hỗ trợ trưởng dự án thực hiện các công tác xây dựng tổ chức cho dự án Quản lý dự án: Theo dõi kế hoạch, nắm bắt thông tin triển khai dự án một cách liên tục để kịp thời báo cáo các cấp quản lý. Quản lý tài liệu: Quản lý tài liệu bao gồm các tài liệu liên quan trực tiếp đến dự án gồm các tài nguyên sản xuất, các văn bản, hồ sơ liên quan đến các cá nhân làm việc cho dự án Cung cấp và hướng dẫn các trưởng dự án các công cụ quản lý tiến độ, chất lượng sản xuất cho hoạt động sản xuất kinh doanh của dự án 3. Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự chỉ đạo của giám đốc: Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của quản lý và ban Giám đốc công ty. Tham gia các chương trình đào tạo của công ty. II. Yêu cầu ứng viên Tiếng Anh tốt Biết lập kế hoạch và tổ chức thực hiện. Tư duy tổng hợp tốt, năng động, cầu tiến, khả năng xử lý & giải quyết vấn đề nhanh nhạy, có kỹ năng làm việc nhóm. Có chuyên môn về quy trình tổ chức sản xuất sản phẩm giải trí nhanh, có kiến thức xây dựng hệ thống và tổ chức sản xuất được ưu tiên , sẽ được hướng dẫn và đào tạo thêm. Hiểu biết về hệ thống công ty về mảng giải trí nhanh ( Youtube-Social media) III. Quyền lợi được hưởng Lương từ 9 triệu -15 triệu + Thưởng + Phụ cấp -> Tổng thu nhập trên từ 13 -18 triệu, thỏa thuận tùy thuộc vào năng lực Thử việc 2 tháng, 100% lương Du lịch: 2 lần/năm (trong nước và nước ngoài) Phụ cấp trang phục: 2.000.000 đồng/2 lần/năm Phụ cấp đi lại: 300.000 đồng/tháng. Phụ cấp ăn trưa: 50.000 đồng/ ngày Phụ cấp nhà ở: 500.000 đồng/tháng Lương tháng thứ 13, thưởng tết âm lịch Các chế độ thưởng phúc lợi: lễ tết, sinh nhật, ốm đau, bệnh tật, hiếu, hỷ.. theo quy định của công ty: 500.000 đồng/ lần Xét tăng lương theo hàng quý Tham gia BHXH đầy đủ theo quy định của nhà nước Môi trường làm việc trẻ trung, năng động, có cơ hội thăng tiến và ổn định lâu dài Cấp đầy đủ trang thiết bị làm việc Thời gian: 8h30-17h30 từ thứ 2 - thứ 6 và 2 thứ 7 cách tuần. Địa chỉ: Victoria Văn Phú, Hà Đông. Liên hệ: 0965 711 796 Email: hr1@futurevn.net

Title: TikTok Shop - Category Lead - Vietnam
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Leadership, Business Analysis, Stakeholder management, English, Project Management
Description: About the job Responsibilities The e-commerce industry has seen tremendous growth in recent years and has become a hotly contested space amongst leading Internet companies, and its future growth cannot be underestimated. With millions of loyal users globally, we believe TikTok is an ideal platform to deliver a brand new and better e-commerce experience to our users. We are looking for passionate and talented people to join our product and operations team, together we can build an e-commerce ecosystem that is innovative, secure and intuitive for our users. In this role, you will be responsible for developing categories and the corresponding sub-categories by building a robust team, conducting prioritization of sub-categories, lead identification, lead generation, acquisition, incubation, and performance improvement & management. Join us as we drive the future of e-commerce here at TikTok. Roles & Responsibilities: - Map category and sub-categories landscape, and define priority on which segment to be developed in collaboration with the merchant and merchandise strategy team - Define a go-to-market strategy for a category/sub-category - Plan, execute, and maintain category performance (from acquisition to incubation and development) - Build a robust team and manage a collaborative and goal-oriented team culture - Work with the Key Account service team and external service vendors to develop key accounts, and work with the Seller Development and Growth team to build a clear roadmap to manage long-tail sellers - Come up with initiatives to continuously improve the competitive advantage Qualifications Minimum Qualifications: - Minimum Bachelor's degree or above - Solid experience in relevant categories, with strong networking to brands and big merchants; social media savvy - Good interpersonal skills, strong logical thinking, and analytical skills - English proficiency Preferred Qualifications: - Collaborative and open to changes and challenges - Well connected to big players within the industry About TikTok TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and we also have offices in New York City, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. Why Join Us Inspiring creativity is at the core of TikTok's mission. Our innovative product is built to help people authentically express themselves, discover and connect – and our global, diverse teams make that possible. Together, we create value for our communities, inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we work towards every day. We strive to do great things with great people. We lead with curiosity, humility, and a desire to make impact in a rapidly growing tech company. Every challenge is an opportunity to learn and innovate as one team. We're resilient and embrace challenges as they come. By constantly iterating and fostering an "Always Day 1" mindset, we achieve meaningful breakthroughs for ourselves, our company, and our users. When we create and grow together, the possibilities are limitless. Join us. Diversity & Inclusion TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
