Description: About the job Job Description Quản lý khách hàng: Trực tiếp giải quyết những vấn đề liên quan đến khách hàng. Tập trung vào việc phát triển các khách hàng được chỉ định và tìm kiếm khách hàng mới. Gặp gỡ và tư vấn cho khách hàng để xây dựng những hợp đồng hợp tác thương mại phù hợp với nhu cầu của khách hàng. Xây dựng và duy trì mối quan hệ bền vững lâu dài với khách hàng. Dự đoán và theo dõi số liệu về tình hình triển khai hợp đồng của khách hàng. Vận hành và Quản lý các hợp đồng: Triển khai, theo dõi, báo cáo hiệu quả các chương trình hợp tác giao hàng và đưa ra giải pháp phù hợp với kế hoạch tiếp theo cho khách hàng – hợp đồng mới. Đảm bảo việc cung cấp dịch vụ và sản phẩm cho khách hàng được thực hiện đúng lúc, đáp ứng được nhu cầu và mục tiêu của khách hàng. Phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan để phát triển và vận hành các hợp đồng hợp tác cho khách hàng. Tối ưu hóa cách thức làm việc giữa các bộ phận liên quan để phục vụ cho lợi ích của khách hàng và sự phát triển của công ty. Requirements Tốt nghiệp Đại học/Cao Đẳng chuyên ngành Quản Trị Kinh Doanh hoặc liên quan. Có kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực F&B hoặc Thương Mại Điện Tử, E-wallet, POS,... Kĩ năng giao tiếp và đàm phán Kiểm soát tốt thời gian công việc và có khả năng làm việc với các khách hàng khó tính/ cửa hàng bán lẻ Thích nghi nhanh với quy trình và thích ứng với việc theo dõi công việc của chính mình một cách có hệ thống và chính xác. Chăm chỉ, Trung thực, Có trách nhiệm, Năng động, Tự tin

Title: Business Data Analyst
Skills: SQL, Python, Data Analysis, Power BI, Statistical Analysis
Description: About the job Responsibilities Collect, clean, and organize large data from diverse sources, employing SQL, Python, and other tools. Apply advanced statistical techniques to analyze large datasets, identifying patterns and correlations. Translate complex findings into clear, actionable insights for non-technical stakeholders. Create reports and analysis data daily and provide deeper insights to stakeholders. Create compelling data visualizations and reports using tools like Tableau or Power BI. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define data requirements and support data-driven projects. Develop predictive models to forecast trends and outcomes based on historical data. Ensure data accuracy and integrity through rigorous validation processes. Identifies problems and presents written solutions ensuring accuracy and validity of information. Analyzing data to identify potential risks/opportunity and trends and work with stakeholders to come up with recommendations to inform decision making. Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Mathematics, Finance, Statistics, Economics is preferable. Open to relocating to Manila City, Philippines. Proficiency in English communication. Strong understanding of statistical techniques, hypothesis testing, and probability. Experience with data visualization tools such as Power BI. Tableau is a plus. Proficiency in programming languages like Python or R for data analysis is a plus. Exceptional problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Excellent communication skills to convey insights to non-technical stakeholders. Benefits Relocation Flight Ticket & Transportation Company Accommodation/Housing Allowance Annual leave: 24 days Medical Leave: 10 days Medical & Insurance Coverage Daily Meals (on-duty) Flight Ticket Online/Onsite Trainings & Career Development

Title: Ingenium Consultant
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: SQL, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, English
Description: About the job Role: This position will be working with INGENIUM product that support current user business operations and develop new applications based on customer needs Responsibilities: • Understand business, technical, and program requirements • Analyzes existing program logic, determine best method of accomplishing required changes or cause of program malfunction in INGENIUM, and develop application program logic from customer-defined specifications • Performs maintenance and modification of programs currently in production to keep them responsive to user needs and to assure efficient operation in the production environment • Develop functional & technical specifications, diagrams, and logic flowcharts • Follow project coding standards & quality process • Write complex SQL queries, Stored Procedures & worked on Database tools • Interact with customer on UT, ST & UAT, understand customer issues and resolve it on-time. • Prepare, review, execute test cases. Debug, support and maintain application programs for customers in a variety of business areas and environments • Set up products Requirements: • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or related field • Good knowledge in Life and Wealth insurance programs • Working experience with INGENIUM, ProductXpress, PathFinder, COBOL/Mainframe, DB2/ORACLE/SQL, Webservices, HTML, CSS and Java Script • On-line & batch programming skills are mandatory • Experience in developing functional, technical specification and solution • Experience in all aspects of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills • Good English communication skills • Good interpersonal and collaboration skills, strong team working abilit

Title: QA Automation Engineer
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Automation Test, Selenium, C#, Java, JavaScript
Description: About the job At OPSWAT , we’re on a mission to protect the world’s most critical infrastructure. As a U.S.-based cybersecurity leader, we’re expanding our R&D footprint in Vietnam — and we’re looking for a passionate, hands-on Software Development Engineer in Test/ QA Automation Engineer for one of our most strategic solutions: MetaDefender Managed File Transfer . MetaDefender Secure MFT empowers enterprises to securely transfer sensitive files across systems, networks, and borders. Trusted by governments and global organizations, we are at the heart of secure data movement — and we’re expanding its future in Ho Chi Minh City . What You Will Be Doing: Dedicated for test automation Working with product teams to understand assigned products and identify automation opportunities for the products Identify automation tools and technologies suitable for our products Build new automation framework or enhance existing framework Identify automation test cases and implement the test cases Work with product teams to measure automation coverage What We Need From You At least 2 years of relevant experience Software testing with a good QA mindset Experience in building automation framework for different test levels such as UI, API, Integration, and End-to-end Experience in applying automation framework and tools such as: JUnit, TestNG, Selenium, Cypress, Playwright or other automation frameworks Proficient in using any scripting languages such as: Python , Groovy, JavaScript Proficient in using any programming languages such as: C/ C++ , C# , Java Experience with GIT or other source control systems Intermediate or higher English communication It Would Be Nice If You Have Background in software development and used to work as a developer Have knowledge about Networking Familiar with CI/CD technologies such as Jenkin, TeamCity Used to work in Agile software development team Cybersecurity domain experience, including file security , device security , network security and etc.. (CEH is welcomed) Protecting the World’s Critical Infrastructure OPSWAT, a global leader in IT, OT, and ICS critical infrastructure cybersecurity , delivers an end-to-end platform that gives public and private sector organizations and enterprises the critical advantage needed to protect their complex networks, secure their devices, and ensure compliance. Over the last 20 years our commitment to innovative technology has earned the trust of more than 1,700 organizations, governments , and institutions globally, solidifying our role in protecting the world’s critical infrastructure and securing our way of life. Why you'll love working here Meaningful work with passionate colleagues International working environment in global leading cyber security product company Attractive compensation, regular assessments, and salary reviews 13-month bonus & performance bonus 100% salary, full insurances on probationary period Extra-health care program (PVI) for employee and family members 15 to 20+ paid day off per year Recognition best employees awards quarterly, yearly and special President Club award every year Stock options for employees Attractive benefits for team activities (team building, team outing, sport, trade union activities) Nice open office on the top of a building in District 3 with full of accessories for active recreation, sport, fruits, coffee, and tea.

Title: ML Engineer with C++
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: AI, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, Python
Description: About the job Our company We’re Hitachi Digital Services, a global digital solutions and transformation business. Our expertise, innovation and technology unlocks potential – we take theme park fans on magical rides, conserve natural resources, protect rainforests, and save lives. We automate, modernize, optimize, and accelerate. Our people are trusted transformers, with deep engineering expertise, focused on a sustainable future for all. Imagine the sheer breadth of talent it takes to inspire the future. We don’t expect you to ‘fit’ every requirement – your life experience, character, perspective, and passion for achieving great things in the world are equally important to us. Meet our Team Hitachi Digital Services Vietnam is part of a 300 strong global delivery network, supporting Hitachi Digital Services around the globe. Our employees collaborate with teams in India, Portugal, and the US, servicing customers worldwide and working on a huge variety of projects. From cloud migration to digital modernization and advanced analytics, offering operational excellence, agile delivery, and plenty of energy to work on huge transformation projects for our customers. The role Design, develop, and deploy AI models using machine learning (ML), deep learning, and natural language processing (NLP) techniques. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into AI solutions. Collect, preprocess, and analyze large datasets to train and evaluate models. Optimize and fine-tune algorithms for performance and scalability. Integrate AI models into existing applications or develop new AI-powered systems. Monitor and maintain AI systems in production to ensure reliability and accuracy. What you’ll bring Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics Proven experience in building and deploying machine learning or deep learning models. Proficiency in computer vision, YOLO, OWL, CVAT, Triton Proficiency in Python and ML libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, etc. Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and ML services. Experience with C++, MLOps/DevOps Championing diversity, equity, and inclusion Diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are integral to our culture and identity. Diverse thinking, a commitment to allyship, and a culture of empowerment help us achieve powerful results. We want you to be you, with all the ideas, lived experience, and fresh perspective that brings. We support your uniqueness and encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our team. How We Look After You We help take care of your today and tomorrow with industry-leading benefits, support, and services that look after your holistic health and wellbeing. We’re also champions of life balance and offer flexible arrangements that work for you (role and location dependent). We’re always looking for new ways of working that bring out our best, which leads to unexpected ideas. So here, you’ll experience a sense of belonging, and discover autonomy, freedom, and ownership as you work alongside talented people you enjoy sharing knowledge with. We’re proud to say we’re an equal opportunity employer and welcome all applicants for employment without attention to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, age, disability status or any other protected characteristic. Should you need reasonable accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know so that we can do our best to set you up for success.

Title: Backend Platform Engineer (HCL x ANZ)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Python, DevOps, GCP, CI/CD, English
Description: About the job JOB TITLE: Backend Platform Engineer LOCATION : District 1, HCMC DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES: Our purpose is to shape a world where people and communities thrive. We are making this happen by improving our customers’ financial wellbeing so they can achieve incredible things – buying a home, building a business, or saving for big or small things. We are looking for people who are passionate about transformational change and to help us redefine banking for the future. Be a part of building the ideal data ecosystem from scratch. Ensuring the right data is generated from all applications and sourced at the right velocity with the complete depth and breadth to ensure complete coverage and reuse. This is your opportunity to build new, not fix old. What will your day look like: Design Backend services using Python Implement methods for DevOps automation of all parts of the built data pipelines to deploy from development to production Build and run the data processing pipeline on Google Cloud Platform Work with Implementation teams from concept to operations to provide deep technical expertise for successfully deploying large scale data solutions in the enterprise and use modern data/analytics technologies on GCP Formulate business problems as technical data problems while ensuring that key business drivers are captured in collaboration with product management Implement unit test & debugging JOB REQUIREMENTS Must have: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or a related field At least 5 years of experience working on developing backend/ platform applications using Python/ Go/ Java/ Rust (open to switch to Python when joining) Experience in setting up infrastructure, CI/CD workflows, and cloud (public cloud) Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to analyze and resolve complex technical issues. Working proficiency in English, both verbal and writing. Nice to have: Experience in developing big-data pipelines (batch, streaming processing) is a huge plus Experience in developing automation processes and Observability is a huge plus. Interested in working with data platforms / eager to learn more about data is a huge plus. Familiar with Docker, K8S WHY YOU SHOULD JOIN US: Very challenging project with ANZ Bank where latest technology are applied and talented engineers are gathered Attractive package including base salary + 13th month salary Insurance based on full base salary and Medical Benefit (Bao Viet Insurance Package) for Employee and Family 100% of full salary and benefits as an official employee from the 1st day of working 100% salary during probation time Working in a fast paced, flexible, and multinational working environment with opportunity to travel onsite (in 60 countries) Internal Training (Technical & Functional & English) Working with outstanding colleagues coming from top universities and top companies in Vietnam and foreign countries 18 paid leaves per year Hybrid working mode We highly appreciate your interest in this position of HCLTECH Vietnam. After reviewing all applications, only qualified candidates will be contacted for the next steps within 15 days from date of submission.

Title: Lead Consultant, Software Development
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: C#, Java, JavaScript, Agile, Cloud
Description: About the job Lead Developers act as the primary point of contact for our clients, ensuring that teams are successful in their delivery. In this role, you will bring a strategic mindset to projects and spend time negotiating with clients to bring a technical vision to life. Having a balance of high-level and tactical mindsets is a must, as you will spend time both with clients and your teammates. Job responsibilities You will oversee or take part in the entire cycle of software consulting and delivery from ideation to deployment and everything in between You will design solutions and choose technologies that solve clients' problems while staying within constraints You will use continuous delivery practices to improve software delivery speed You will work in collaborative, product-focused teams to build innovative customer experiences and create meaningful change for a variety of clients Utilize the latest technology thinking from our Technology Radar in your work Apply a variety of languages to your work and continue to code alongside Developers; you will never go post-technical in this role Job qualifications Technical skills You're well-versed in two or more languages (with C# as the primary language, and Java, Javascript, etc.) and are comfortable with the latest Object-Oriented technology You have led software development teams using Agile, Lean and/or Continuous Delivery approaches such as TDD, continuous integration, pairing and infrastructure automation We would love it if you're up to speed on functional programming paradigms and languages like Clojure, Scala, etc. Bonus points if you have knowledge of cloud technology such as AWS, Docker or Kubernetes Professional skills You have experience influencing others and always advocate for technical excellence while being open to change when needed The ability to develop and execute a technical vision with a focus on business value You will act as a mentor for less experienced peers through both your technical knowledge and ability to inspire a team to deliver extraordinary impact together You're resilient in ambiguous situations and can approach challenges from multiple perspectives Other things to know Learning & Development There is no one-size-fits-all career path at Thoughtworks: however you want to develop your career is entirely up to you. But we also balance autonomy with the strength of our cultivation culture. This means your career is supported by interactive tools, numerous development programs and teammates who want to help you grow. We see value in helping each other be our best and that extends to empowering our employees in their career journeys. About Thoughtworks Thoughtworks is a global technology consultancy that integrates strategy, design and engineering to drive digital innovation. For 30+ years, our clients have trusted our autonomous teams to build solutions that look past the obvious. Here, computer science grads come together with seasoned technologists, self-taught developers, midlife career changers and more to learn from and challenge each other. Career journeys flourish with the strength of our cultivation culture, which has won numerous awards around the world. Join Thoughtworks and thrive. Together, our extra curiosity, innovation, passion and dedication overcomes ordinary.

Title: Data Engineer
Skills: Data Engineer, Python, SQL, ETL, Apache Airflow
Description: About the job Viettel Software - Công ty Đầu tư Công nghệ Viettel là một đơn vị thuộc tập đoàn Viettel, được thành với mục tiêu góp phần giúp Viettel đẩy mạnh chuyển đổi số và thực hiện Sứ mệnh tiên phong kiến tạo Xã hội số tại Việt Nam. Lĩnh vực hoạt động chính của Viettel Software: Cung cấp dịch vụ gia công phần mềm, dịch vụ nhân sự Công nghệ Thông tin chất lượng cao, cung cấp các sản phẩm CNTT theo nhu cầu khách hàng, thị trường,… Về mục tiêu, mục tiêu của Viettel Software là Sáng tạo vì con người, lấy con người làm nền tảng cho sự phát triển, với mục tiêu trở thành Công ty cung cấp dịch vụ Công nghệ Thông tin hàng đầu Việt Nam. 1. Mô tả công việc Tham gia thiết kế và phát triển các data pipeline xử lý dữ liệu phục vụ nhu cầu phân tích, báo cáo và các hệ thống dữ liệu nội bộ của công ty Phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan(Business Analyst, DevOps, Stakeholder…) để triển khai, vận hành và tối ưu hệ thống dữ liệu trên môi trường thực tế. Chuẩn hoá chất lượng, độ tin cậy và tính bảo mật của dữ liệu. Thiết kế và triển khai các mô hình dữ liệu theo kiến trúc Dimensional Modeling Nghiên cứu và ứng dụng các công nghệ mới trong xử lý dữ liệu như streaming, data lake house, distributed system, ... Thực hiện các công việc chuyên môn khác theo yêu cầu của quản lý. 2. Yêu cầu Ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm Data Engineer, đã thiết kế và triển khai ít nhất 1 dự án Data Warehouse từ đầu đến cuối. Thiết kế cấu trúc dữ liệu theo mô hình Dimensional Modeling (bắt buộc) Thành thạo Python & SQL trong xử lý và chuyển đổi dữ liệu. Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các hệ thống phân tán trên hạ tầng on-prems như: Apache Spark, Hadoop, … Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ Orchestration như: Airflow, Mage, Dragster,... Hiểu rõ và có kinh nghiệm làm việc thực tế với các hệ thống OLTP và OLAP. Có kinh nghiệm thiết kế, triển khai và bảo trì các luồng ETL. Có khả năng nắm bắt các kiến thức nghiệp vụ nhanh chóng. Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các công cụ BI (Power BI, Tableau,...) 3. Chế độ Chế độ lương, thưởng, thu nhập: Thu nhập cạnh tranh, thỏa thuận theo năng lực. Phúc lợi: Tối thiểu 13 tháng lương/năm; Thưởng Bonus, Hỗ trợ ăn trưa, điện thoại, nghỉ mát, thưởng ngày lễ và các ngày chỉ có ở Viettel như Ngày Sáng Tạo - 1/6, 22/12, quà Tết Dương, Tết Âm tri ân Gia đình, người sinh thành (PACKAGE 20-30M/năm). Nghỉ phép năm: 16 ngày/năm Đánh giá xét tăng lương 2 lần/năm Được đóng đầy đủ bảo hiểm xã hội, bảo hiểm y tế + bảo hiểm sức khỏe Pjico Happytime: 15 phút các buổi chiều trong tuần Môi trường làm việc Được làm việc trong Tập đoàn toàn cầu, tiên phong thực hiện sứ mệnh kiến tạo xã hội số. Môi trường mở, trẻ trung, năng động, trân trọng, yêu thương, tương hỗ & lắng nghe mỗi người từ những ý tưởng nhỏ nhất. Không gian làm việc xanh, mở, hiện đại. Cơ hội phát triển bản thân Có cơ hội thử sức trong lĩnh vực công nghệ tiên tiến, hiện đại nhất. Được thử sức với các dự án hấp dẫn, thử thách đủ lớn trong và ngoài nước để trưởng thành. Được trao quyền sáng tạo với đam mê của tuổi trẻ. Cơ hội học hỏi từ các chuyên gia hàng đầu, lãnh đạo và đồng nghiệp ưu tú. Cơ hội được đào tạo, trau dồi kỹ năng, chuyên môn để phát triển toàn diện. 4. Liên hệ Mail: trangnth80@viettel.com.vn Tel: +84398195353 (Zalo)

Title: Quality Assurance Automation Engineer
Skills: Automation Test, Python, TypeScript, Cypress, Playwright
Description: About the job Are you looking for an opportunity to put your software craftsmanship skills to good use? Do you have a passion for improving development, automation, and testing practices to promote a quality-first culture? Working as a QA Automation Engineer, at Outpost24 means more than participating in a testing phase in the development pipeline. In addition to the traditional requirement verification function, the Quality Assurance team works with test automation, process governance, culture development, and more. If you join us as a QA Automation Engineer, you will be participating in activities such as Requirements verification/validation Expectation management on quality assurance activities for DEV Manual test strategies Test automation Establishing new ways of working within our development process What do we want from you? Outpost24 is a place to learn, develop, and find a good place to fit in a broader software development culture. QA Automation Engineers are traditionally quite senior, but we are open to having juniors grow in the Quality Assurance team. If you are not sure you fit the bill, give it a try. However, based on our current way of working, the following are merits we are looking for: Programming skills with TypeScript, Python3, Golang, or Java Test automation with Python3 UI Automation with Cypress or Playwright Experience working with agile development teams Excellent communication Cyber security knowledge would be ideal, but is not a requirement The Outpost24 Quality Assurance team is a quite technical team, so we are looking for someone who is interested in challenging themselves beyond what traditional software testing generally allows. What’s in it for you? In return for your efforts, we offer you: Opportunity to work alongside skilled, experienced, and pleasant colleagues from whom you can learn and develop your skills in an international environment A powerful set of tools to drive your career, training, and coaching on the job A varied set of challenges, technologies, and solutions without end A workplace culture where your opinions and ideas are welcomed, valued, and respected Want to learn more about this exciting opportunity? Then apply today! As part of the recruitment process, you must be able to pass a background check to qualify for this position.

Title: Test Engineer (Full Time) - Vietnam
Skills: C language, C++, C#, Python, English
Description: About the job Location: Hanoi Start date: August 2025 Why You’ll Love Cisco Everything is converging on the Internet, making networked connections more relevant than ever before in our lives. Our employees' revolutionary ideas impact everything imaginable - from entertainment, retail, healthcare, and education, to public and private sectors, smart cities, smart cars, and everyday devices in our homes. Here, that means you’ll take creative ideas from the drawing board to powerful solutions that have real world impact. You’ll interface with Cisco leaders, partner with experienced mentors, and develop incredible relationships with colleagues who share your interest in connecting the unconnected. You’ll be part a team that cares about its customers, enjoys having fun, and you’ll take part in changing the lives of those in our local communities. Come prepared to be inspired. Team Description Collaborate with peers on projects that have a real world impact as part of Cisco's Supply Chain Operations. From our processes to manufacturing, you'll deliver an unrivaled customer experience of Cisco products and services. Take your creative ideas from the drawing board to deliver powerful solutions. You'll interface with with cross functional teams to determine our infrastructural needs and product specifications. What You’ll Do Design, develop, troubleshoot and debug test programs and tools for enhancements and for new products Plan and manage for test capacity (including budget management) and oversees delivery to be on schedule. Determine hardware compatibility and/or influences on hardware design Collaborate with product teams to design, develop, implement and deploy test strategies, test plans and test processes for a group of products. Engage with the CDO (Cisco Design Org) product team prior to concept commit to influence Df(x) and provide inputs on DFT. Provides technical support and drive solution for all manufacturing test operations and Line Stops/Purges/Quality issues. Model ECOs/deviation, new products, software and diagnostics, all test enhancements and releases prior to release to manufacturing. Support on any site enablement or transfers of test operations to and from various Manufacturing Partners (MPa) Qualifications Recent graduate or on your final year of studies toward a bachelor’s or master’s degree in Electronic Science and Technology, Electronic Information Engineering, Computer Science and Technology / Big data, Computer Network Science and Technology or Automation and Testing Technology. Software Programming skills / High level language proficiency (ex: C, C++, C#, Python, LabVIEW), basic program experience. Experience in software operating systems (Windows, Unix, Linux) and applications (MS Office, Tableau, etc.) Good written, verbal, and communication skills in English Good learning ability, and ability to work on multitask with direction/oversight from manager. Why Cisco #WeAreCisco, where each person is unique, but we bring our talents to work as a team and make a difference powering an inclusive future for all. We embrace digital, and help our customers implement change in their digital businesses. Some may think we’re “old” (36 years strong) and only about hardware, but we’re also a software company. And a security company. We even invented an intuitive network that adapts, predicts, learns and protects. No other company can do what we do – you can’t put us in a box! But “Digital Transformation” is an empty buzz phrase without a culture that allows for innovation, creativity, and yes, even failure (if you learn from it.) Day to day, we focus on the give and take. We give our best, give our egos a break, and give of ourselves (because giving back is built into our DNA.) We take accountability, bold steps, and take difference to heart. Because without diversity of thought and a dedication to equality for all, there is no moving forward. So, you have colorful hair? Don’t care. Tattoos? Show off your ink. Like polka dots? That’s cool. Pop culture geek? Many of us are. Passion for technology and world changing? Be you, with us!

Title: AI/ML Architect - Vietnam Remotely
Skills: AI, Machine Learning, AWS, DevOps, CI/CD
Description: About the job Job Title: AI/ML Architect (AWS) About the Role: We are on the lookout for a seasoned AI/ML Architect to enhance our talented team. The role demands an individual with significant expertise in both traditional Machine Learning & newer Artificial Intelligence engineering and infrastructure, with an emphasis on Generative AI based systems. A thorough knowledge of public cloud platforms, specifically AWS, is crucial. This remote position calls for exceptional communication skills and a knack for independently tackling complex challenges with innovative solutions. What You Will Be Doing What you will be doing Develop and implement automation and DevOps methodologies, including CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and containerization, to establish a scalable Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence infrastructure. Design and execute automation strategies, encompassing DevOps pipelines, scripting, and Terraform-based Infrastructure as Code. Engage actively in client sessions to understand and address their needs. Prepare and maintain detailed technical documentation. Requirements: Experienced with machine learning frameworks(TensorFlow, PyTorch) and libraries (e.g., scikit-learn). Experience with AWS managed services and understanding of cloud-based messaging/stream processing systems are critical. Must Have AWS/ Azure Cloud Professional level certification in AI/ML, Architecture and Data. 10+ years of experience in customer-facing software/technology or consulting 5+ years of experience with “on-premises to cloud” migrations or IT transformations 5+ years of experience building, and operating solutions built on AWS (ideally) or Azure/GCP Technical degree: Computer Science, software engineering or related

Title: Growth Hacker - Remote Position
Skills: A/B testing, Data Analysis, Data-driven, English, Vietnamese
Description: About the job Location: Remote (Vietnam-based preferred) Employment Type: Full-time Department: Growth & Product Reports to: COO 🚀 About Locuno Locuno is Vietnam's first comprehensive family safety platform, with superior trust verification. We're connecting 40 million urban Vietnamese families through intelligent emergency response and hyperlocal community networks. 🎯 Role Overview We're seeking a Growth Hacker who lives and breathes viral growth mechanics, data-driven experimentation, and creative user acquisition strategies. You'll be responsible for designing and executing our 3-tier viral growth loops: Family → Neighbor → Community, targeting 35% monthly growth rate. Mission: Scale Locuno to 35K+ active families through innovative growth hacking, viral mechanics, and community-driven acquisition strategies. 🔥 What You'll DoViral Growth Engineering (40%) Design Viral Loops: Build and optimize our 3-tier growth system (Family K=0.8, Neighbor K=0.6, Community K=0.4) Referral Systems: Create sophisticated referral mechanisms with cultural incentives and gamification Network Effects: Engineer product features that naturally drive user-to-user invitations Viral Coefficient Optimization: Achieve target 0.8+ overall viral coefficient through systematic testing Community Growth: Design building-by-building expansion strategies with 60% penetration targets Growth Experimentation (30%) A/B Testing: Run 10+ growth experiments monthly across acquisition, activation, and retention Conversion Optimization: Optimize onboarding flows to achieve 85% completion rates Retention Hacking: Implement strategies to reach 35% D7 and 20% D30 retention rates Product-Led Growth: Embed growth mechanics directly into product features and user experience Data Analysis: Analyze user behavior patterns to identify growth opportunities and friction points Creative Acquisition (20%) Growth Hacking Campaigns: Design unconventional marketing campaigns that achieve viral spread Community Infiltration: Develop strategies to organically penetrate parent groups, building communities Influencer Growth: Create micro-influencer programs with parents and community leaders Content Virality: Design shareable content that drives organic user acquisition Partnership Hacks: Identify and execute creative partnership opportunities for user growth Analytics & Optimization (10%) Growth Metrics: Track and optimize North Star metrics (Active Families, Family Completion Rate, Community Penetration) Cohort Analysis: Analyze user cohorts to identify high-value segments and optimize targeting Predictive Modeling: Build models to predict user lifetime value and optimize acquisition spend Dashboard Creation: Build real-time growth dashboards for team visibility and decision-making 🎯 What We're Looking ForEssential Requirements 3+ years of growth hacking experience with proven viral growth results Mobile app growth expertise with demonstrated success in consumer apps Data-driven mindset with strong analytical skills and experience with growth analytics tools Viral mechanics expertise including referral systems, network effects, and viral coefficient optimization A/B testing proficiency with statistical significance understanding and experimentation frameworks Vietnamese market knowledge with deep understanding of social behavior and family dynamics Preferred Qualifications Community app experience in social, family, or neighborhood platforms Product-led growth experience with feature-driven acquisition strategies Startup growth experience scaling from early stage to significant user base Technical skills including SQL, Python/R for data analysis, and basic coding abilities Psychology background understanding user motivation, behavioral triggers, and social dynamics Agency or consulting experience with multiple growth projects and diverse testing approaches Personal Attributes Obsessed with growth metrics and constantly thinking about optimization opportunities Creative problem solver who finds unconventional solutions to growth challenges Experimental mindset comfortable with failure and rapid iteration Data storyteller who can translate complex analytics into actionable insights Collaborative team player who works closely with product, marketing, and engineering teams Vietnamese culture expert who understands family dynamics and community relationships 📊 Success Metrics & KPIsPrimary Growth KPIs (First 6 Months) User Growth Rate: Achieve 35% monthly active user growth Viral Coefficient: Reach 0.8+ overall viral coefficient across all loops Family Completion: Drive 55%+ complete family setups (≥2 active members) Community Penetration: Achieve 60% penetration in target buildings Organic Growth: 70%+ of new users from referrals and viral channels Specific Viral Loop Metrics Family Loop: K=0.8 (4 invites × 30% conversion × 67% activation) Neighbor Loop: K=0.6 (3 invites × 25% conversion × 80% activation) Community Loop: K=0.4 (2 invites × 20% conversion × 100% activation) Building Penetration: 25+ buildings with >10 active families each Referral Rate: 30%+ of users actively referring others Retention & Engagement KPIs D7 Retention: Improve from current baseline to 35%+ D30 Retention: Achieve 20%+ monthly retention rate Feature Adoption: 85%+ onboarding completion rate Community Engagement: 80%+ daily active users in beta communities App Store Rating: Maintain 4.0+ rating with growth in reviews 🚀 Growth OpportunitiesCareer Progression 12 months: Senior Growth Hacker with expanded experimentation budget 18 months: Head of Growth with team leadership and strategy ownership 24 months: VP of Growth with cross-functional team management Long-term: Chief Growth Officer role as company scales to Series A Learning & Impact Direct CEO/COO mentorship from experienced tech leaders Full growth stack ownership from viral mechanics to retention optimization Product influence with direct input on growth-driven feature development Market expansion opportunity to scale growth strategies across Southeast Asia Industry recognition potential to become known growth expert in Vietnamese startup ecosystem 🎯 Application ProcessHow to Apply Send your application to: careers@locuno.com Subject line: "Growth Hacker - [Your Name] - Viral Growth Expert" Include: Updated CV highlighting specific growth achievements with metrics Cover letter explaining your growth hacking philosophy and approach Growth Portfolio: 3-5 case studies of viral growth campaigns you've led Experiment Examples: Detailed A/B tests with methodology and results What to Highlight Specific viral growth results with viral coefficients, growth rates, and user numbers Creative growth hacks you've designed and executed successfully A/B testing experience with statistical methodology and significant wins Vietnamese market understanding and cultural insights for growth Technical skills in analytics, experimentation tools, and data analysis Growth Challenge (Optional but Recommended) Design a viral growth strategy for Locuno's family referral loop: Analyze our current 8.5K user base and propose 3 specific growth hacks Design an A/B testing framework for optimizing family invitations Create a 90-day plan to achieve 0.8 viral coefficient in family loop Present your strategy in a 5-slide deck with expected metrics Interview Process Initial Screening: 30-minute growth philosophy and experience discussion Growth Challenge Presentation: Present your viral growth strategy (if submitted) Technical Interview: Analytics case study and A/B testing methodology Team Interview: Meet with COO, product team, and key stakeholders Final Interview: Culture fit, compensation, and growth vision alignment 🌟 Why Join Locuno as Growth Hacker?Unique Growth Opportunity Untapped Viral Potential: Family safety creates natural sharing motivations Cultural Advantage: Vietnamese community dynamics perfect for viral growth Network Effects: Building-by-building expansion creates compounding growth Data-Rich Environment: Detailed user behavior data for optimization Growth Hacker Paradise Full Experimentation Freedom: Run unlimited A/B tests with dedicated budget Direct Product Influence: Growth insights directly shape product roadmap Viral Mechanics Playground: Design sophisticated referral and viral systems Community Growth Lab: Test community-driven growth strategies at scale Analytics Heaven: Rich data sets for deep behavioral analysis and optimization Impact & Recognition Market-Defining Role: Help create the family safety category in Vietnam Viral Growth Pioneer: Become known expert in Vietnamese viral growth strategies Community Impact: Protect millions of families through growth-driven adoption Industry Leadership: Speak at conferences about Vietnamese growth hacking Startup Success Story: Be part of the team that scales to Series A and beyond Ready to hack growth for Vietnam's most important family safety platform? Join us in building viral growth loops that will protect millions of Vietnamese families. This is your opportunity to apply cutting-edge growth hacking techniques to a mission-critical product with proven traction and unlimited potential. Apply now and let's create viral growth magic together!

Title: Automation Test Engineer - Vietnam
Skills: Automation Test, SQL, .NET, C#, Agile
Description: About the job At Globant, we are working to make the world a better place, one step at a time. We enhance business development and enterprise solutions to prepare them for a digital future. With a diverse and talented team present in more than 30 countries, we are strategic partners to leading global companies in their business process transformation. We seek a Automation Test Engineer who shares our passion for innovation and change. This role is critical to helping our business partners evolve and adapt to consumers' personalized expectations in this new technological era. You will get the chance to: Take a proactive role in enabling the continuous improvement of the quality and reliability of solutions delivered by the development team. Liaise Collaborate with internal teams (e.g. developers, Scrum masters, product owners and business stakeholders) to identify system requirements. Review requirements, specifications and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback. Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases. Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities. Design, develop and execute test automation scripts using Visual Studio Team Services Azure DevOps and related tools. Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs including bug triage. Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved. Actively participate in the release process. Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs. Investigate the causes of software quality and reliability issues and work together with architects and developers to help address them in the long term. Design and monitor quality assurance metrics, like defect densities, open defect counts and test coverage. Build QA reports and KPIsKPIs (Key Performance Indicators) for visibility on health and quality of the products. Stay up-to-date with new testing tools and test strategies. Help define, document and evolve quality assurance processes and practices. What will help you succeed: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent Minimum 5 years of experience in Software Development and Software Quality Assurance Excellent analytical, problem-solving and interpersonal skills. Strong knowledge of Software QA methodologies, tools and processes. Experience with .NET, SQL Server and the Microsoft development stack. Experience with integrated project management, build, release and documentation tools (e.g. Visual Studio Team ServicesAzure DevOps, JIRA, TeamCity). Experience with automated Web UI testing (e.g. Selenium, Coded UI Test, Katalon, TestComplete, Cypress, Robot). Some hands-on experience with programming and scripting (preferably in C# and/or JavaScript). Experience in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases. Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process. Experience with performance and/or security testing is an asset (e.g. JMeter). Experience in a DevOps environment is an asset. Good at English skills, both verbal and written This job can be filled in Hanoi/Danang or Ho Chi Minh Create with us digital products that people love. We will bring businesses and consumers together through AI technology and creativity, driving digital transformation to impact the world positively. We may use AI and machine learning technologies in our recruitment process. Globant is an Equal Opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state, or local law. Globant is also committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities in our job application procedures. If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, please let your recruiter know. Final compensation offered is based on multiple factors such as the specific role, hiring location, as well as individual skills, experience, and qualifications. In addition to competitive salaries, we offer a comprehensive benefits package. Learn more about life at Globant here: Globant Experience Guide .

Title: Systems Support Engineer
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Java, ReactJS, AWS, CI/CD, Agile
Description: About the job As a Consultant Systems Support Engineer in DAMO service line, you will play a vital role in supporting the day-to-day operations of application systems. This role involves actively contributing to incident management and gaining exposure to DevOps practices. Your efforts will contribute to the smooth functioning of systems and you'll have the opportunity to learn and grow while assisting in the delivery of solutions to our clients. Job responsibilities You will work with incident management process and tools. You will use complex application systems and find your way through them to debug a business impacting issue. You will follow standards and best practices to bring operational efficiencies, stability and availability of the system. You will use continuous delivery practices to evolve, support and deliver high-quality software, as well as value to end customers, as early as possible while working in collaborative, value-driven teams to build innovative customer experiences for our clients. You will leverage your knowledge regarding different logging techniques (various levels) and use them for alerting, monitoring and identifying the root cause of incidents. You will derive meaningful reports/key performance indicators and set up alerting and monitoring mechanisms for quicker identification of incidents and response. You will apply the latest technology thinking from our Technology Radar to solve client problems. Job Qualifications Technical Skills You have experience working with Java and React, with AWS being a plus. You are open and adaptable to learning new technologies based on project needs. You understand how to use debugging tools and how to troubleshoot issues with the code. You have experience working with relational or non-relational databases. You have experience working with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins or Azure pipelines. You have an exposure to application monitoring tools such as DataDog, Prometheus or Grafana. You are comfortable with Agile methods such Scrum and/or Kanban. You have the ability to ensure that the deliverables, namely bug fixes and enhancements to the existing codebase, are of high quality and well-tested. Professional Skills You have strong communication and articulation skills, are proficient in English and able to confidently hold a Q&A discussion with senior stakeholders. You have good communication and articulation skills. You have a presence in the external tech community and willingly share your expertise with others via speaking engagements, contributions to open source, blogs and more. You are resilient in ambiguous situations and can approach challenges from multiple perspectives. You are willing to be part of a rotation- and need-based 24x7 team and are able to handle multiple engagements. Other things to know About DAMO At DAMO™ Managed Services , we go beyond routine maintenance - we focus on continuous evolution to help organizations achieve extraordinary impact. Here, you’ll work on proactive improvements rather than reactive fixes. We're at the forefront of cost optimization, automation, and scalable solutions. Your expertise will play a key role in streamlining operations, boosting efficiency, and ensuring our systems grow with our clients’ needs. Join and be part of a team that thrives on curiosity, innovation, and purpose. About Thoughtworks Thoughtworks is a dynamic and inclusive community of bright and supportive colleagues who are revolutionizing tech. As a leading technology consultancy, we’re pushing boundaries through our purposeful and impactful work. For 30+ years, we’ve delivered extraordinary impact together with our clients by helping them solve complex business problems with technology as the differentiator. Bring your brilliant expertise and commitment for continuous learning to Thoughtworks. Together, let’s be extraordinary. See here our AI policy.

Title: Product Owner
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Product Owner, Agile, Stakeholder management, Project Management, English
Description: About the job PURPOSE The Product Owner represents the voice of the customer and delivers the vision and roadmap for the Merchant services experience, working closely with the Head of and Product consultant to prioritise the squad backlog. Contribute to and lead the discovery and delivery of new initiatives based on customer needs, business value and regulatory requirements, balanced with technical do-ability and risk (desirability, feasibility, viability). Keep the team focus on the highest priority work and liaises with stakeholders to descope work for the team that extends beyond their velocity for the sprint. You are a trusted servant leader for your squad, supporting members to understand the squad mission and foster accountability for the work to be done, to collectively deliver on commitments. You utilise your strong communication and ability to influence others when coordinating and engaging with stakeholders and teams to achieve end to end outcomes. You represent the voice of the Customer and Colleague when developing the product roadmap. You also keep this voice front of mind to prioritise, balancing what is realistic with what will make a difference and challenge the status quo. You are responsible for managing stakeholders on behalf of the squad and provide both sides with the transparency and visibility required. You are comfortable with being uncomfortable, continuously learning and improving; valuing progress over perfection. MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES You are accountable for the ultimate success of your squad’s outcomes You work with the other members of the squad to elaborate features and stories, defining acceptance criteria and definition of done Make effective day to day decisions to enable the squad to progress the work Work collaboratively with Scrum Master and the squad to deliver backlog, and attend all relevant agile ceremonies Communication and engagement with stakeholders outside of the squad, protecting the squad members to enable focus on their work and avoid context-switching You ensure that the customer and colleague experience is protected and complete UAT/ BVT when required. Fulfil other tasks as assigned by your People Leader and/or authorized representative of NAB Vietnam from time to time. YOUR SKILLS & EXPERIENCE Experience 5-7+ years experience in Banking including at least 2+ years Product Owner experience Detailed knowledge of financial services and the Credit Card lifecycle from both a consumer, merchant, issuing and acquiring stand point 7-8 years of experience mobilising and supporting cross functional and self managing teams across multiple providers to accomplish outcomes Experience working with agile ways or working and familiarity with human centred design techniques Ability to create and convey a vision to key stakeholders and teams, developing it into a shaped backlog of key features, user stories and goals in line with domain cadence Comfortable playing a leadership role, including leading workshops through the discovery, development and operational usage stages of development Ability to innovate, adapt and grasp new skills and content Proven analytical skills and evidence based decision making Project delivery and knowledge of the software development cycle Essential capabilities Leadership of a high performing squad Strong business acumen, critical thinking, analytical and data driven decision making skills Structured problem solving mindset focusing on a test and learn approach Product over project mindset Ideation and Design: Own the vision/direction of an experience including definition of product roadmap (strategy), research industry & technology trends to create new value propositions, prioritise & maintain Product Backlog, work closely with the team to define what needs to built in the form of initiatives and features Planning and Engagement: Agree the customer and commercial outcomes to be delivered by cycle, establish the cycle plan based on capacity and technology sequencing, set sprint goals, determine/establish optimal resource mix, and build senior leader relationships to ensure alignment and engagement Delivery and measurement: Enable delivery through responding to key questions, make decisions, review work items, plan, track & report progress, measure success/learnings Other capabilities Experience with human centred design, product story telling and product leadership Familiar with tooling such as Clarity, Grace, Confluence, Figma, Fiserv product suite and frontline banking systems Qualification Requirements Tertiary qualified with a Degree in Finance or Business and preference to post graduate qualifications THE BENEFITS AND PERKS 1. Generous compensation and benefit package Attractive salary and benefits 20-day annual leave and 7-day sick leave, etc. 13th month salary and Annual Performance Bonus Premium healthcare for yourself and family members Monthly allowance for team activities Premium welcome kit and frequent appreciation gifts Extra benefits for long-term employees 2. Exciting career and development opportunities Large scale products with modern technologies in banking domain Clear roadmap for career advancement in both technical and leadership pathways Well-structured learning and development programs (technical and soft skills) Sponsored certificates in both IT and banking/finance Premium accounts on Udemy/A Cloud Guru/Coursera/LinkedIn, etc. English learning with native teachers Opportunity for traveling & training in Australia 3. Professional and engaging working environment Hybrid working model and excellent work-life balance Well-equipped & modern Agile office with fully stocked pantry Special programs to improve your physical and mental health Annual company trip and events A solid talented team behind you – great people who love what they do A DIVERSE AND INCLUSIVE WORKPLACE WORKS BETTER FOR EVERYONE We know that our people make us who we are. That's why we have built a culture of respect – where everyone feels valued and appreciated for being their true authentic selves at NAB. With our focus on inclusion and diversity, and in partnership with our Employee Resource Groups, NAB is a place where First Nations colleagues, colleagues of all genders, sexualities and ages, carers and colleagues with disability, and colleagues from all cultures, races and religions have the opportunity to thrive, connect and grow. We are intent on providing an environment where you can work your way. Ask about our many flexible work options and please let us know if we can provide any adjustments throughout the recruitment process. CLOUD-FIRST NAB is undergoing an exciting "Cloud First" technology transformation by taking advantage of the latest tools and techniques used by leading technology and digital companies globally. But it’s not just about the Tech, we are also investing heavily in our people, so if you have an appetite to learn, grow and elevate others around you, this is the place for you! If this excites you, let's have a chat over a cup of coffee!

Title: Chuyên gia sản phẩm đo lường
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Data Analysis, CRM, SQL, Stakeholder management, English
Description: About the job Nếu bạn là ứng viên nước ngoài được chọn vào vòng cuối cho vị trí này tại Philippines và cần giấy phép lao động, vui lòng lưu ý rằng luật lao động của Philippines yêu cầu công bố tên và quốc tịch của bạn trên một tờ báo quốc gia và cổng thông tin chính phủ địa phương được chỉ định, theo quy trình tuân thủ luật nhập cư. Đây là bước bắt buộc để hoàn tất hồ sơ ứng tuyển cho vị trí này, xin giấy phép lao động và làm việc tại quốc gia này. Google sẽ ưu tiên những ứng viên có quyền làm việc hợp lệ ở Thái Lan và không cần Google bảo lãnh thị thực. Please visit this Google Careers posting for the English-translated version of this role. Note: By applying to this position you will have an opportunity to share your preferred working location from the following: Jakarta, Indonesia; Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia; Taguig, Metro Manila, Philippines; Bangkok, Thailand; Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam . Minimum qualifications: Bằng cử nhân hoặc kinh nghiệm thực tế tương đương. 5 năm kinh nghiệm trong mảng kinh doanh quảng cáo, tiếp thị, tư vấn hoặc truyền thông (ví dụ: tìm kiếm, mạng xã hội, thiết bị di động, quảng cáo hiển thị và video). 5 năm kinh nghiệm biên soạn và trình bày các nội dung hướng đến khách hàng (ví dụ: bài thuyết trình chào hàng, câu chuyện hoặc tài liệu tóm tắt) cho các nhóm kinh doanh. 5 năm kinh nghiệm trong mảng Thông tin chuyên sâu về người tiêu dùng và thị trường, đo lường truyền thông và bối cảnh bảo mật. 5 năm kinh nghiệm khai thác các nền tảng đo lường, số liệu phân tích và lập mô hình phân bổ. Preferred qualifications: Kinh nghiệm triển khai/điều chỉnh Chiến lược đo lường, phân tích web hoặc chiến lược phân bổ theo lượt nhấp không phải lần cuối cùng, đo lường trên nhiều thiết bị, theo dõi lượt chuyển đổi, thử nghiệm theo địa lý, mức tăng/mức gia tăng, đo lường từ trực tuyến đến ngoại tuyến, nhập dữ liệu ngoại tuyến. Kinh nghiệm về các hệ thống đo lường, phân tích trang web, quản lý quan hệ khách hàng (CRM) và hệ thống dữ liệu hàng đầu của bên thứ ba. Kinh nghiệm về các nền tảng phân bổ ứng dụng như Appsflyer, theo dõi trên Meta/Tiktok bằng các nền tảng lắng nghe cộng đồng mạng xã hội (ví dụ: Sprinklr, Traackr hoặc CreatorIQ). Kinh nghiệm làm việc và cộng tác với những người có quyền quyết định tại công ty dịch vụ quảng cáo/công ty khách hàng mua quảng cáo. Kiến thức về hệ sinh thái quảng cáo kỹ thuật số và những thay đổi về quyền riêng tư. Kiến thức về các chức năng đo lường của Google trên các nền tảng quảng cáo và truyền thông, bao gồm cả Google Ads, Search Ads 360 và Google Analytics. About the job Doanh nghiệp thuộc mọi loại hình và quy mô tin tưởng vào các giải pháp quảng cáo vượt trội của Google để phát triển trong môi trường tiếp thị không ngừng biến động ngày nay. Bạn mang trong mình niềm đam mê bán hàng, sự hiểu biết về truyền thông trực tuyến và lòng quyết tâm giúp khách hàng đạt được sự thành công lớn nhất. Bạn hành động với tinh thần làm chủ, nhanh nhạy thích ứng với mọi thay đổi, tìm kiếm những cách thức mới mang tính chiến lược để liên tục đem đến kết quả ấn tượng và ngày một tốt hơn cho cả Google lẫn khách hàng. Bạn xây dựng mối quan hệ đáng tin cậy với khách hàng, tìm hiểu nhu cầu kinh doanh của họ và dựa vào đó để xây dựng các giải pháp hiệu quả giúp khách hàng đạt được những mục tiêu lớn lao nhất. Bạn gặt hái thành công cùng đội ngũ bán hàng, định hình tương lai của ngành quảng cáo trong kỷ nguyên AI và tạo dấu ấn thực sự đối với hàng triệu công ty cũng như hàng tỷ người dùng đặt trọn niềm tin vào Google cho những mục tiêu quan trọng nhất. Trong vai trò này, bạn sẽ giúp các nhà quảng cáo mở rộng phạm vi sử dụng các giải pháp đo lường và phân bổ của Google để thúc đẩy mức độ trưởng thành của hoạt động đo lường. Bạn sở hữu kiến thức chuyên môn về sản phẩm thuộc các giải pháp đo lường cụ thể của Google và đưa ra giải pháp dựa trên thông tin chuyên sâu thu thập được. Bạn sẽ làm việc với Khối Khách hàng chiến lược (LCS) và giúp các nhà quảng cáo triển khai những công nghệ đo lường mới nhất để thúc đẩy mức độ trưởng thành của hoạt động đo lường tại khu vực Đông Nam Á (SEA). Bạn sẽ vận dụng kiến thức về các phương pháp trong ngành, xu hướng truyền thông kỹ thuật số, khả năng giải quyết vấn đề và kỹ năng cộng tác để thuyết phục nhà quảng cáo thực hiện các biện pháp cần thiết, nhằm thúc đẩy Lợi tức đầu tư (ROI) cho hoạt động truyền thông bằng cách tích hợp dữ liệu và đưa ra quyết định về mặt phân bổ. Bạn sẽ làm việc theo sự điều phối của lãnh đạo cấp quốc gia và có thể sẽ phát triển các kế hoạch đo lường cho tập hợp các khách hàng, phát triển các kế hoạch kích hoạt và theo dõi tiến độ thực hiện các kế hoạch đó. Các nhóm thuộc khối Khách hàng chiến lược (LCS) của Google là các đối tác chiến lược và cố vấn đầu ngành, đồng hành cùng các thương hiệu và công ty quảng cáo hàng đầu thế giới. Chúng tôi không ngừng khuyến khích khách hàng tư duy về hoạt động kinh doanh của họ, đồng thời thúc đẩy cách Google có thể hỗ trợ họ tăng trưởng. Chúng tôi tập trung vào việc giúp các khách hàng này thích ứng với những thay đổi lớn trong ngành và thúc đẩy hiệu suất kinh doanh vượt trội bằng cách cung cấp trọn bộ giải pháp quảng cáo của Google ở mức giá cạnh tranh trên Google Tìm kiếm, YouTube, Đo lường, và nhiều nền tảng khác. Là một thành viên của khối LCS, bạn sẽ có cơ hội đặc biệt để kinh doanh những công nghệ tiên tiến nhất, làm việc với các quản lý cấp cao, tác động đến các chiến lược định hình thị trường và tạo ra kết quả thực tế, có ảnh hưởng đáng kể đến các doanh nghiệp lớn trên toàn cầu, cũng như thúc đẩy sự tăng trưởng của Google. Responsibilities Khai thác hoạt động sử dụng sản phẩm và tính năng trong Analytics, đồng thời hỗ trợ các chuyên gia sản phẩm khác trong các trường hợp phân bổ. Trao đổi với khách hàng về tính năng đo lường nâng cao hoặc đo lường toàn phễu. Phối hợp với các nhóm thâm nhập thị trường để điều chỉnh sản phẩm cho phù hợp với các chương trình tài trợ và thu hút khách hàng. Triển khai chiến lược cho khu vực Đông Nam Á (SEA) bằng cách tư vấn cho khách hàng và ra mắt sản phẩm, tăng mức độ sử dụng các sản phẩm nền tảng quyền riêng tư và mức độ tích hợp dữ liệu của bên thứ nhất. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

Title: Vietnamese to English Translator
Skills: AI, English, NLP, Prompt Engineering, Vietnamese
Description: About the job DataAnnotation is committed to creating quality AI. Join our team to help train AI chatbots while gaining the flexibility of remote work and choosing your own schedule. We are looking for a bilingual professional to join our team and teach AI chatbots. You will have conversations in both Vietnamese and English with chatbots in order to measure their progress, as well as write novel conversations in order to teach them what to say. Benefits: This is a full-time or part-time REMOTE position You’ll be able to choose which projects you want to work on You can work on your own schedule Projects are paid hourly, starting at $20+ USD per hour, with bonuses for high-quality and high-volume work Responsibilities (both in Vietnamese and English): Come up with diverse conversations over a range of topics Write high-quality answers when given specific prompts Compare the performance of different AI models Research and fact-check AI responses Qualifications: Fluent in Vietnamese + English A bachelor's degree (completed or in progress) Excellent writing and grammar skills Strong research and fact-checking skills to ensure accuracy and originality Note: Payment is made via PayPal. We will never ask for any money from you. PayPal will handle any currency conversions from USD. #vietnamese

Title: Manual Tester (Domain Banking)
Skills: Tester, API, Database, Mobile Apps, English
Description: About the job Về VMO Được thành lập vào năm 2012, VMO Holdings (VMO) là công ty cung cấp dịch vụ CNTT chuyên nghiệp hàng đầu có trụ sở tại Việt Nam. Trải qua 13 năm hoạt động trong lĩnh vực tư vấn và phát triển phần mềm, VMO đã mở rộng quy mô với hơn 1.200 nhân sự, sở hữu 7 văn phòng tại Việt Nam và các chi nhánh quốc tế tại Mỹ, Nhật Bản, Hàn Quốc, Thái Lan. Năm 2025, VMO chính thức gia nhập Alten Group - tập đoàn hiện diện tại 30 quốc gia trong lĩnh vực Dịch vụ Kỹ thuật và Công nghệ thông tin. VMO đang đẩy mạnh phát triển nhân sự ở các dự án mảng IT Outsourcing trong và ngoài nước. Hướng tới việc hoàn thiện hệ sinh thái VMO và duy trì những giá trị cốt lõi trong mọi hoạt động, chúng tôi tự tin trao quyền và gửi gắm niềm tin vào thế hệ kế cận. VMO luôn sẵn sàng chào đón. Trách nhiệm công việc Tham gia phát triển dự án Khách hàng Bank Đọc hiểu tài liệu đặc tả, viết các tài liệu theo mẫu của dự án: test case, test report, hướng dẫn sử dụng phần mềm Lập kế hoạch test, xây dựng kịch bản test cho các sản phẩm API, Web, Mobile app,... Smoke test trên môi trường UAT trước khi bàn giao môi trường UAT cho người dùng. Hỗ trợ người dùng nghiệp vụ tạo UAT scenarios và test trong quá trình UAT, log bugs UAT nhận được từ người dùng lên tool quản lý dự án và theo dõi các bug đã log/được assign. Hỗ trợ bộ phận HelpDesk trong việc nhận diện lỗi và đào tạo người dùng Thực thi kiểm thử và báo cáo Nghiên cứu và cập nhật các công cụ và kiến thức mới hỗ trợ cho công việc. Yêu cầu công việc Có từ 4 năm trở lên kinh nghiệm Tester hoặc vai trò tương đương Có kinh nghiệm làm việc trong các dự án domain Banking/Finance . Có kinh nghiệm test API và Mobile tốt Thành thạo về quy trình kiểm thử phần mềm và các kỹ thuật thiết kế testcase... Nắm vững cách làm việc với API, Database Tiếng Anh đọc hiểu tài liệu Ưu tiên các ứng viên có chứng chỉ chứng chỉ kiểm thử phần mềm ISTQB Nắm vững kiến thức về kiểm thử, hiểu về các cấu phần trong hệ thống Có khả năng phân tích tốt Hiểu sâu về các dự án đã từng tham gia Có khả năng tự xây dựng test design, test case độc lập Khả năng đánh giá vấn đề tôt. Chủ động trong công việc. Chế độ đãi ngộ CƠ HỘI VÀ THỬ THÁCH Cơ hội được làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, hiện đại và năng động. Thử sức với các dự án hấp dẫn, thử thách đủ lớn trong nước. Môi trường khuyến khích trao đổi ý tưởng, trao quyền, cho phép bạn làm việc, sáng tạo theo cách riêng. Tài năng và thành tích của từng nhân viên được trân trọng, nhân viên xuất sắc được khen thưởng hàng năm. Cơ hội phát triển năng lực, được hỗ trợ phụ cấp chứng chỉ chuyên môn phục vụ công việc. Một số chứng chỉ cấp cao sẽ được chi trả toàn bộ chi phí từ học và thi. Dự án khủng với domain hot-trend, liên tục cập nhật những công nghệ xu hướng. CHÍNH SÁCH ĐÃI NGỘ Review lương 1-2 lần/năm, có khả năng được tăng lương đột xuất không giới hạn số lần tùy theo năng lực. Chính sách thưởng tháng lương 13, Thưởng Performance, Thưởng lễ tết theo quy chế của công ty Chế độ du lịch nghỉ mát (gói 5 triệu/ người), teambuilding hàng tháng Tham gia BHXH đầy đủ, thăm khám sức khỏe định kỳ tối thiểu 1 lần/năm tại các bệnh viện hàng đầu Chính sách thăm hỏi toàn diện cho nhân sự và người thân: sinh nhật, kết hôn, sinh con, ốm đau,… Cung cấp máy móc, thiết bị làm việc đầy đủ Các hoạt động thể thao, văn hóa đa dạng và phong phú: CLB đá bóng, đạp xe, cầu lông,… Phụ cấp đứng lớp, cùng các giải thưởng Đào tạo: Ngôi sao học tập tháng, Gương mặt giảng viên tiêu biểu, gương mặt học tập năm, nhuận bút,… Địa điểm: Giang Văn Minh, Ba Đình, Hà Nội Thời gian làm việc: 8h30 - 18h00, từ Thứ 2 - Thứ 6. Thông tin liên hệ và ứng tuyển Nếu thấy phù hợp ứng viên vui lòng apply qua địa chỉ mail hoặc contact qua DM/SĐT bên dưới để được hỗ trợ thêm các thông tin về job nha: Email: lienttb2@vmogroup.com Phone (Zalo/Tele/WhatsApp): 0981108599 (Phương Liên) VMO chờ bạn!

Title: Back End Developer (Java, Springboot, SQL)
Skills: Java, Spring Boot, SQL, Python, Git
Description: About the job Job Description LG CNS is looking for qualified Back-end developerto join the group. Mission:Ensure the best possible performance, quality and responsiveness of applications on the back-end side.Stay up to date on emerging technologies.Exchange details when interviewingManage and training members in your PART (if you were chosen as Part leader) Requirement[Required]Have at least 2 years of experience in JAVA (Highly preferred)Have experience developing web applications.Have Java programming experience.Developed based on Spring, Spring Boot F/W, Spring MVC...API Development (REST API)RDBMS (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle) & SQL, PL/SQLHave knowledge Python language.Git, Jira, ConfluenceUnderstand and apply CI/CDGood at communicate in English at an average level (TOEIC 550 or higher)Be proactive and responsible at work.[Nice-to-have]Experience working in Kubernetes and Cloud environments (AWS, GCP)Experience in SQL optimization.Able to communicate in Korean. OpportunityAttractive salary and bonus will be discussed after going through CV & InterviewReview capacity annually and adjust salary increases according to work performance.Korean language certificate bonus (TOPIK)Health care: Premium health insurance, Annual health check-upYoung working environmentGood career development opportunities with interesting and challenging projects.English, Korean, technical, soft skills training courses.Opportunity to learn special courses from LG CNS, new technology and security.Gifts on holidays (April 30th - May 1st, September 2nd, Tet, etc.)Outdoor activities with company support: sports clubs, team building, happy hour parties, birthdays, travel, employee and family events, etc.Working hours: 8 hours from Monday - Friday (8:00 - 12:00 - 13:00 - 17:00) Location15th Floor, Keangnam Landmark 72, Me Tri, Nam Tu Liem, Hanoi

Title: Product Consultant
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Product Owner, Agile, Stakeholder management, Business Analysis, English
Description: About the job MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES Engage business stakeholders to gather feedback, inform strategic transformation & advocate for meaningful experiential change Collaborate with PO in establishing and monitoring success measures in line with innovation and experience goals Balance Cost of acquisition and Cost of Servicing to achieve a higher Addressable market and NPS across Merchant services Understand process flow for customer-facing and internal processes, and the linked supporting technology Identify interdependencies across the Merchant Services domain structure, and work with the Head of Customer Innovation and Experience to deliver business outcomes Provide input to feature elaboration, acceptance criteria and definition of done Collaborate with squads and attend relevant agile ceremonies Communication and engagement with business stakeholders outside of the squad to ensure alignment and avoid context-switching Conducts problem resolution, creates product collateral and monitors results and feedback Drive innovation by identifying market trends, understanding competitors and tying them to business goals Fulfil other tasks as assigned by your People Leader and/or authorized representative of NAB Vietnam from time to time. YOUR SKILLS & EXPERIENCE Experience 5-7+ years experience in Banking including at least 2+ years Product Owner experience Detailed knowledge of financial services and the Credit Card lifecycle from both a consumer, merchant, issuing and acquiring stand point Detailed understanding of Merchant Acquiring/EFTPOS Terminal solutions or related business products ,along with product and operational activities required to deliver business outcomes such a new capability launch or customer migration from a business perspective Experience working with agile ways or working and familiarity with human centred design techniques Ability convey a vision to key stakeholders and teams, developing it into a shaped backlog of key features, user stories and goals in line with Domain cadence Comfortable supporting a leadership role, including leading workshops through the discovery, development and operational usage stages of development Ability to innovate, adapt and grasp new skills Proven analytical skills and evidence-based decision making Essential capabilities Ability to develop strategic product plans, based on industry trends, market analysis/research and customer insights Structured problem solving mindset focusing on a test and learn approach Product over project mindset Strong business acumen, critical thinking, analytical and data driven decision making skills Other capabilities Experience with human centred design, product story telling and product leadership Familiar with tooling such as Clarity, Grace, Confluence, Figma, Fiserv product suite and frontline banking systems Qualification Requirements Tertiary qualified, preference to post graduate qualifications. THE BENEFITS AND PERKS 1. Generous compensation and benefit package Attractive salary and benefits 20-day annual leave and 7-day sick leave, etc. 13th month salary and Annual Performance Bonus Premium healthcare for yourself and family members Monthly allowance for team activities Premium welcome kit and frequent appreciation gifts Extra benefits for long-term employees 2. Title: Windows Application Deployment
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: PowerShell, English, Windows, MSI, App-V
Description: About the job 🧑‍💻 Software Application Packaging Engineer 📍 Location: District 7 and Hybrid | 🌐 Type: Full-time Join a fast-growing IT services company delivering high-quality enterprise software packaging solutions to global clients. 🔧 Your Role As a Software Application Packaging Engineer, you will be responsible for end-to-end software packaging and deployment across enterprise environments. You’ll work closely with global stakeholders to deliver stable, secure, and optimized application packages that meet industry standards and client-specific requirements. 🛠️ What You’ll Do • Package enterprise software using MSI, App-V, and MSIX technologies. • Test and validate packages for functionality, compliance, and compatibility. • Troubleshoot packaging and deployment issues using tools like Procmon, Regshot, etc. • Deploy packages via Microsoft Endpoint Configuration Manager (MECM) and Intune. • Create documentation and ensure traceability throughout the software packaging lifecycle. • Collaborate with internal and external teams to gather requirements and deliver updates. 📌 What We’re Looking For • 4+ years of IT experience, with 2+ years in application packaging. • Strong expertise in Windows 10/11 OS, Windows Registry, services, and permissions. • Proficient in MSI, App-V, MSIX formats and tools (Orca, Admin Studio, etc.). • Experience deploying packages via MECM and Intune. • Comfortable scripting in PowerShell, VBScript, or Batch. • Fluent in English (written & spoken). • Microsoft certifications are a plus. 💡 Nice to Have • Familiarity with driver packages, UAC behavior, and redirection techniques. • Experience using TMEditX, Package Support Framework, or similar tools.

Title: Lead QA Engineer
Skills: Agile, Automation Test, Java, JavaScript, English
Description: About the job ABOUT THE JOB You will be part of our delivery team and will be responsible for providing technical leadership throughout all phases of the software delivery life cycle as we initiate a transformation of NAB technology. MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES Manage the quality practices and mindset across two or more Agile teams, dealing with both automation and exploratory testing in terms of quality assurance; Define Test Plans (Test strategy and Test logistics) and applying Testing methodologies and techniques to design test cases and prepare test data; Create test strategy and approach, setting-up testing tools and testing frameworks that can be used inside teams or cross-teams; Apply Test monitoring and controls, including managing test effort and bug leaks; Perform Test evaluation and make quality reports for each delivery (making the decision “go”/”no-go”); Drive an Automation first approach for Unit, System and Integrated System testing across the development team, and contribute to platform integration and performance tests to play a key role in driving product quality to keep users satisfied; Solve defects, driving investigations into problems and correction actions relating to recurring problems; Code automated tests for the Feature, System and Integrated Systems Testing Phases; Contribute to Agile practices and Automation for stories in sprint delivery, CI/CD pipeline design, and build and maintenance, to support Quality Engineering practices; Fulfil other tasks as assigned by your People Leader and/or authorized representative of NAB Vietnam from time to time YOUR SKILLS & EXPERIENCE Solid programming experience in Java and JavaScript / Typescript (Preferred) or any programming language Good English communication skills (both verbal & written) with experience working across countries; 7+ years’ experience in the design and execution of Manual & Automation testing with a minimum of 2+ years of hands-on experience in leading & training Quality Engineering Practices across multiple teams. People leadership and coaching of Quality Engineers from junior to senior QAs; Able to create testing proposals (Test strategies, estimation, automation test solutions, performance test solution, etc.); Good at reading and understanding of Functional and Non-functional requirements, and provide feedback and enrich requirements efficiently; Solid knowledge of testing methodologies and techniques: Functional, Non-Functional, back-box and exploratory testing; Experience in strategic development and implementation of Quality Engineering solutions (Automation Frameworks, Performance Validation); THE BENEFITS AND PERKS We appreciate and reward our colleagues who do great work every day – from excelling for our customers, to taking ownership of an issue to get it resolved.
