You will define content strategy, craft clear and engaging interface copy, and collaborate closely with product designers, researchers, and engineers to ensure every word enhances usability and aligns with our brand voice. 🤖 What you will do Develop and implement content strategies for product features across mobile and web platforms. Write intuitive, concise, and user-friendly UX copy — from onboarding to error messages to feature microscopy Collaborate with Product Designers, Product Managers, and Engineers throughout the product development cycle to ensure clarity and consistency Champion the use of plain language and accessible content that meets user needs and business goals. Conduct content audits and collaborate on usability testing to validate copy decisions. Help define and maintain content guidelines, voice and tone standards for Zalo products. Provide mentorship and guidance to junior writers when needed. 👾 What you will need 3+ years of experience in UX writing, content design, product content strategy, or related fields. Portfolio showcasing impactful UX writing across web/mobile products. Excellent command of Vietnamese and English, with an eye for detail and tone. Experience working in cross-functional product teams. Strong understanding of UX principles, design thinking, and user psychology. Ability to advocate for content best practices and influence product decisions through words. Nice-to-have Experience working on products at scale, especially with messaging, social, or platform-based services. Familiarity with localization workflows, content design systems, or Figma. Knowledge of accessibility and inclusive design.

Title: Head of People & Culture for Vietnam
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Leadership, Stakeholder management, English, SAP, Risk Management
Description: About the job We help the world run better At SAP, we enable you to bring out your best. Our company culture is focused on collaboration and a shared passion to help the world run better. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from. PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES The Head of People and Culture in Vietnam is accountable for all people and culture topics in scope in Vietnam and another country in SEA, including strategy rollout, driving high employee engagement, creating a consistent, high-performance and growth culture environment. The Head of People & Culture in Vietnam orchestrates global people and culture services, policies, and programs for local and regional adoption, positioning SAP as a top employer in the market and supporting its business growth. EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS Drive local people and location strategies aligned with SAP’s global vision while addressing Vietnam’s unique market dynamics. Act as a strategic partner and trusted advisor to senior leadership, and cross-functional stakeholders, promoting synergy, transparency, and shared goals. Orchestrates all People & Culture functions and topics locally, to ensure alignment with business strategy and local and legal requirements. Cultivate and amplify a vibrant corporate culture rooted in our values. Promote employee engagement, cohesion, and a sense of belonging that aligns with SAP’s identity. Act as the primary liaison with social partners, government authorities, and compliance bodies, ensuring our practices meet local labor laws and standards. Ensure all People & Culture initiatives, policies, policies and practices align with local regulations, maintaining operational excellence and mitigating risks. Drive local leadership culture and development in line with SAP's global framework while serving as a member of the local Executive Leadership Team. Elevate SAP’s employer brand by leading internal and external communications, leveraging social media and other platforms to showcase our vibrant culture and attract top talent. Partners with multiple teams to foster health and safety environment. Manage escalations and implement compliant solutions to people- related challenges YOUR PROFILE A dynamic leader with proven experience in HR, People Relations, well-versed in Vietnamese labor laws and social partner relations, preferably within the tech or multinational sectors A strategic thinker with the ability to translate global objectives into impactful local practices. An excellent communicator and influencer, capable of building strong relationships across diverse stakeholders. Fluent in Vietnamese and English, with a passion for creating an engaging and inclusive work environment. Loves using data insights for advising business and decision making Ideally has experience with other countries in SEA Bring out your best SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best. We win with inclusion SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world. SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy . Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training. EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability. Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor. Requisition ID: 407936 | Work Area: Human Resources | Expected Travel: 0 - 10% | Career Status: Professional | Employment Type: Regular Full Time | Additional Locations: .

Title: Thực tập sinh Đào tạo
Skills: Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Technical Writing, English
Description: About the job Thu nhập: 0 - 1 triệu Ngành nghề: Nhân sự Địa điểm: Hà Nội Thời gian ứng tuyển: 02/08/2025 Sapo là công ty Công nghệ. Với khả năng và hướng đi rõ ràng, Sapo nhanh chóng khẳng định được vị trí hàng đầu trong việc xây dựng nền tảng công nghệ hỗ trợ lĩnh vực bán lẻ và TMĐT. Với hơn 230.000 khách hàng trên toàn quốc tin tưởng sử dụng, Sapo đang là doanh nghiệp có nền tảng quản lý và bán hàng đa kênh từ Online đến Offline được sử dụng nhiều nhất tại Việt Nam. Đội ngũ nhân viên Sapo hiện có hơn 1000 nhân sự có trình độ chuyên môn cao, luôn làm việc với tất cả sự nhiệt huyết và sức sáng tạo của tuổi trẻ đã xây dựng nên 1 văn hoá vô cùng trẻ trung và năng động. Đến với Sapo, bạn sẽ được trải nghiệm môi trường tuyệt vời, với chế độ đãi ngộ xứng đáng và đạt được thành công vượt mong đợi! Mô tả công việc Hỗ trợ soạn thảo tài liệu đào tạo, slide Vận hành chương trình đào tạo: gửi/rep email, tổ chức lớp đào tạo, phản hồi điểm đánh giá. Đăng tải nội dung các khóa học lên cổng đào tạo E-learning Yêu cầu công việc Sinh viên năm 3, năm 4 hoặc mới tốt nghiệp. Thành thạo tin học văn phòng (Word, Excel, PowerPoint). Cẩn thận, tỷ mỉ, chi tiết trong công việc, chủ động, ham học hỏi. Làm việc tối thiểu 5 buổi/tuần (2.5 buổi fulltime), bắt buộc lịch cố định sáng thứ 2 và 5. Quyền lợi Được đào tạo, hướng dẫn công việc và tham gia các lớp đào tạo nội bộ miễn phí. Được tham gia các hoạt động gắn kết nội bộ của công ty. Cơ hội học hỏi, tích lũy kinh nghiệm thực tế trong mảng đào tạo – phát triển. Liên hệ Để tìm hiểu thêm chi tiết, vui lòng liên hệ: SĐT: 0913 198 910 (Ms Linh) Email: tuyendung@sapo.vn Website công ty: https://www.sapo.vn/ Fanpage TD: https://www.facebook.com/tuyendungsapo/ Zalo OA: Tuyển Dụng Sapo Địa chỉ văn phòng: Tòa Ladeco, số 266 Đội Cấn, Ba Đình, Hà Nội Ứng tuyển vị trí: Thực tập sinh Đào tạo Click để tải lên CV của bạn Bạn có thể tải CV mẫu tại đây

Title: Java Developer
Company: Eastgate Software - We Drive Digital Transformation
Skills: Java, Spring Boot, RESTful API, MySQL, Kubernetes
Description: About the job Founded in 2014, Eastgate Software is a software development company that builds custom business solutions and applications. We are proud of our high-qualified staff who has more than 20 years of experience in software development including web, mobile and desktop applications. We put quality and customer satisfactions at the top priority in every project we carry. Therefore, our German and US senior experts offer local consultancy for European and US clients. As a member of Eastgate, you will be emerged in a professional and flexible environment where you have opportunities to express your own ideas and improve your skill set through many interesting full-cycle projects. Your responsibilities: • Development of cloud-based microservices for: • Traffic Analytics (247 system) • Supplying data for traffic light controllers The ideal candidate: • At least 4 years of software development experiences • Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Information Technology or equivalent • Good knowledge about Java Core, OOP, Design Pattern • Good/Basic understanding about multi-threading • Good experience with: - Spring Framework (Spring Boot, Spring Security, Spring Data... ) - RESTful API - ORM: Hibernate or EclipseLink - Testing: JUnit 5, Mockito - Maven Build - Relational Databases (such as MySQL, PostgreSQL,...), optimizing SQL queries. • Having experience with microservices architecture and cloud technologies is a plus, but not required ( will be provided training materials): - Deployment: Docker, Kubernetes, Helm - Message Queue: Kafka, RabbitMQ - Cache: Redis - Logging/Monitoring: Grafana, Prometheus, ELK or Loki - IAM: Keycloak (OAuth2, OpenID Connect) - Code quality: SonarQube • Familiar with Agile development methodologies • English proficiency is a plus. Why you’ll love working at Eastgate: • Attractive salary package • Eastgate Software is a Global Fortune 500 Preferred Vendor, so you will have an opportunity to work with many IT Experts around Europe and USA • Be emerged in a professional and motivating environment where you have opportunities to express your own ideas and improve your skill set through many interesting full-cycle projects • Flexible working time: 9:30 a.m. to 6:30 p.m., Monday to Friday, No Overtime (Only 8 working hours) • Performance review and appropriate gratification: twice a year • 13th month salary + Project bonus + 02 probationary months with full salary • Extra health check package per year • 16 leave days/year (will be added an extra day each year and maximum 20 days for annual leave) • Free snacks, video gaming & movie nights, team social and sport activities Send us your CV and portfolio to: Email: thuy.nguyen@eastgate-software.com Địa điểm làm việc:Tòa VCCI, số 9 Đào Duy Anh, Đống Đa, Hà Nội

Title: Bridge Software Engineer
Skills: Japanese, English, IT Support, Project Management, Communication
Description: About the job We are looking for a Bridge System Engineer (BrSE) to support our projects by facilitating communication between our development team and Japanese clients. Responsibilities: Assist the Project Manager (PM) and other BrSEs in direct client interactions, including requirement negotiations with Japanese clients. Act as a bridge between the development team and Japanese clients, ensuring smooth communication and understanding of project requirements. Translate project documents and specifications between Japanese and the development team. Support the development team in preparing reports and tracking project progress. Assist the Project Manager or Team Leader with management tasks. Skills & Experience General Requirements: Japanese proficiency at N2 level or higher. Strong understanding of IT workflows with the ability to adapt flexibly. Creative, proactive, and willing to take on challenges. Able to work under high pressure. Willingness to travel for business trips when required. Technical & Communication Skills: Experience in real-world communication using Japanese. Basic knowledge of IT software development. Prior experience working in Japanese IT companies is preferred. Background as a software engineer (in any role) is a plus. Strong logical thinking, problem summarization, and communication skills. Recruitment Process: 1st interview with the BrSE team → 2nd interview with the PM team → 3rd interview with the CEO (Japan site) → Offer CV Language Requirement: Japanese/ English Compensation & Benefits Competitive salary & attractive benefits with biannual salary reviews (twice per year). 100% salary-based insurance. Year-end bonus based on performance. Annual health check-ups for all employees. MacBook or personal laptop provided for work. Work-Life Balance & Culture Engaging team activities:Monthly Gathering, Company Trips, Team-building events, and other exciting celebrations. Free foreign language training: English and Japanese courses to enhance your skills. Opportunities to work in Japan for career growth. Special gifts & allowances for weddings, childbirth, Women's Day, and Children's Day. Professional, friendly, and open working environment with a supportive team. Monthly birthday celebrations for employees. Working Hours & Location Working schedule: Monday – Friday and the last Saturday of the month, from 8:30 AM – 5:30 PM (8 hours/day). Public holidays follow state regulations. Office location: Floors 3-5, Waseco Building, No. 10 Pho Quang, Ward 02, Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City.

Title: Automation Tester (Junior, Middle)
Skills: Automation Test, Selenium, JMeter, Postman, SQL
Description: About the job Location: Hà Nội Employment Type: Onsite, Full-time Onbroad: ASAP Level: Junior, Middle Domain : Banking Mô tả: Xây dựng kế hoạch và kịch bản kiểm thử tự động cho phần mềm và các tính năng sản phẩm. Phát triển, tối ưu và bảo trì các script kiểm thử tự động cho hệ thống web/app hoặc cơ sở dữ liệu. Thực hiện kiểm thử tự động để kiểm tra hiệu năng, chức năng và độ ổn định của hệ thống. Phát hiện lỗi, ghi log và quản lý lỗi trên hệ thống quản lý lỗi (Bug Tracking System). Phối hợp với nhóm phát triển phần mềm để xác minh, theo dõi và hỗ trợ khắc phục lỗi. Viết báo cáo kiểm thử và đề xuất cải tiến quy trình kiểm thử. Hỗ trợ triển khai hệ thống, xây dựng tài liệu đào tạo và tham gia đào tạo theo yêu cầu. Yêu cầu chung: 1. Trình độ học vấn & kỹ năng Tốt nghiệp Cao đẳng/Đại học các ngành: Công nghệ thông tin, Kinh tế, Ngân hàng, Ngoại thương,... Sử dụng thành thạo vi tính văn phòng và các công cụ hỗ trợ công việc. 2. Kinh nghiệm Tối thiểu 02 năm kinh nghiệm kiểm thử phần mềm, ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm kiểm thử tự động hóa cho các hệ thống tài chính, ngân hàng. Có kinh nghiệm kiểm thử, thành thạo Appium API (thông qua các công cụ như Postman, JMeter) Database (truy vấn và kiểm thử dữ liệu) 3. Kiến thức và công cụ Thành thạo các công cụ kiểm thử tự động: Selenium, JMeter, Postman, TestNG, hoặc tương đương Thành thạo truy vấn SQL, kiểm thử, dữ liệu. Nắm vững quy trình phát triển phần mềm (Agile/Scrum là một lợi thế). Có tư duy logic, kỹ năng phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề tốt. Quyền lợi: Lương thương lượng theo năng lực upto 24m, xét tăng lương định kỳ dựa theo performance Tham gia vào các dự án công nghệ lớn, hiện đại của ngân hàng. Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, năng động, có cơ hội phát triển sự nghiệp trong ngành tài chính – ngân hàng. Được đào tạo, nâng cao kỹ năng chuyên môn liên tục. Môi trường làm việc: Thân thiện, năng động và có cơ hội/lộ trình thăng tiến rõ ràng.. Hoạt động teambuilding, Summer holiday, Year-end -party ,… Chính sách bảo hiểm, lương, thưởng đầy đủ theo quy định pháp luật Contact: AnhHNL@ltsgroup.tech

Title: Software Engineer
Skills: C++, C#, Microsoft Windows, English, Software Engineering
Description: About the job Job Description As a member of our global engineering department based in Mexico City, you will be responsible for creating a wide array of new and innovative products, while working in collaboration with customers, partners and colleagues from our other global offices including Verona, Sydney, Cincinnati, Chennai, Mumbai, Mexico City, Bucharest, Dublin and Edinburgh. Skills and experience required Must be educated to degree level in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or other related engineering degrees Must have 2+ years of experience in similar role Good knowledge of Microsoft Windows High proficiency in C++ and/or C# Willingness to travel internationally Fluency in English is essential, as English is our working language. Other languages are highly desirable Must currently have the legal right to live and work in Vietnam Core responsibilities Dealing with multiple tasks and projects Solving problems quickly and accurately Showing creativity and interest in coming up with new ideas that improve our service and move our solutions forward Interacting with a team of experienced and motivated people, offering guidance and recommendations for technical decision making, collaborating with the test team to validate and verify the quality of the solutions, preparing status reports and updating your managers Showing continuing commitment to a quality approach to software development by keeping track of the latest technology and design concepts About Us At KAL, specialise in providing cutting-edge solutions and services in the ATM industry. Our team is composed of talented professionals who are passionate about technology and innovation. If you’re an experienced software engineer with a solid foundation in various programming languages and a knack for solving complex problems, we want to hear from you! Please submit your CV and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and salary history to Careers@kal.com

Title: Business Analyst (English)
Skills: Business Analysis, SRS, Agile, SQL, English
Description: About the job MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC Làm việc với dự án phát triển phần mềm (web/app) cho khách hàng Nhật Bản Dự án có thể thuộc nhiều lĩnh vực: Mạng xã hội, ERP, eCommerce, IoT, ... Làm việc theo quy trình Agile hoặc Waterfall tùy dự án. Tham gia các giai đoạn từ kick-off, phân tích, thiết kế, test, đến go-live. Làm việc với team đa chức năng: khách hàng, designer, PM, Dev, QA. YÊU CẦU Đã từng làm BA IT ít nhất 4 năm. Từng tham gia ít nhất 2 dự án phần mềm thực tế (web/app) Có kinh nghiệm viết tài liệu SRS Biết sử dụng công cũ hỗ trợ phân tích: Draw.io, Figma hoặc tương đương Biết cách mô hình hóa nghiệp vụ (process flow, use case, data flow). Kỹ năng giao tiếp, tổng hợp thông tin và giải quyết vấn đề tốt. Tiếng anh giao tiếp, đọc viết tốt Nice to have: Có chứng chỉ BA như: CCBA, CBAP, PMI-PBA hoặc tương đương Có hiểu biết hoặc kinh nghiệm trong các lĩnh vực : Mạng xã hội, ứng dụng call/chat, ERP, IoT Từng làm việc trực tiếp với khách hàng Nhật Biết SQL cơ bản, có thể truy vấn dữ liệu phục vụ phân tích Có kinh nghiệm làm việc trong các dự án Agile/Scrum Có kiến thức về UX/UI hoặc Product Design. QUYỀN LỢI Mức lương cạnh tranh, có xem xét tăng lương dựa trên năng lực và hiệu quả công việc Chương trình và chế độ ghi nhận đặc biệt cho nhân sự gắn bó lâu dài Chương trình NTQ Ranking giúp định hình lộ trình phát triển rõ ràng cho nhân sự khi gia nhập Được định hướng phát triển công nghệ chuyên sâu, tham gia nhiều dự án lớn và áp dụng công nghệ mới nhất. Cân bằng cuộc sống và công việc với các CLB ngoại khóa, hoạt động Teambuilding, nghỉ mát hàng năm, khu vực làm việc Open Space, Pantry và Board game Được đóng bảo hiểm theo quy định, kèm theo bảo hiểm sức khỏe cá nhân, bảo hiểm sức khỏe cho người thân, và chế độ thai sản tương đương 75% mức lương, khám sức khỏe 1 năm/1 lần. Văn hóa học tập & nghiên cứu: Hỗ trợ chi phí thi các chứng chỉ chuyên môn, tham gia các khóa học nội bộ up skills, khóa học phát triển lên quản lý cùng các chuyên gia có 15 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực phần mềm. THỜI GIAN VÀ ĐỊA ĐIỂM LÀM VIỆC Thời gian làm việc: Linh hoạt, check in từ 8h-9h, check out từ 17h15-18h15, từ T2-T6 Tòa nhà sông Đà, đường Phạm Hùng, Mỹ Đình, Nam Từ Liêm, Hà Nội CONTACT Email: binh.do1.rc@ntq-solution.com.vn Zalo: 0386.333.625 (Ms Thảo Bình) Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/tuyendung.ntqsolution Website: https://career.ntq.com.vn/

Title: Marketing Intern (SEO Youtube) Full-time
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, English
Description: About the job I. Mô tả công việc: Quản trị hệ thống kênh Youtube của công ty, phối hợp với biên kịch, dựng phim, diễn viên để đảm bảo tiến độ sản xuất. Đăng tải video lên hệ thống kênh quản lý theo kế hoạch, phân tích các chỉ số quan trọng trong quản trị kênh. Thực hiện Promote tăng tiếp cận, tương tác cho video. Cập nhật tổng quan thị trường. Phân tích và đánh giá hoạt động Promote thị trường. Chăm sóc kênh: Comment tương tác với người xem. Công việc khác theo sự phân công của Trưởng bộ phận. II. Yêu cầu: Khả năng ngoại ngữ (tiếng Anh Nghe - Đọc - Viết). Biết sử dụng Photoshop, Premiere là lợi thế (nếu không biết sẽ được đào tạo). Kỹ năng tìm hiểu, phân tích logic. III. Quyền lợi được hưởng Lương từ 8 - 10 triệu + Thưởng + Phụ cấp -> Tổng thu nhập từ 10 – 15 triệu /tháng. Thử việc 100% lương, cấp thiết bị làm việc. Du lịch: 2 lần/năm (trong nước và nước ngoài). Phụ cấp trang phục: 2.000.000 đồng/2 lần/năm. Phụ cấp đi lại: 300.000 đồng/tháng. Phụ cấp ăn trưa: 50.000 đồng/ ngày. Phụ cấp nhà ở: 500.000 đồng/tháng. Lương tháng thứ 13, thưởng tết âm lịch. Chế độ tăng lương theo quý. Các chế độ thưởng phúc lợi: lễ tết, sinh nhật, ốm đau, bệnh tật, hiếu, hỷ.. theo quy định của công ty: 500.000 đồng/ lần. Tham gia BHXH đầy đủ theo quy định của nhà nước. Môi trường làm việc trẻ trung, năng động. Thời gian: 8h30-17h30 từ thứ 2 - thứ 6 và 2 thứ 7 cách tuần. Địa chỉ: Victoria Văn Phú, Hà Đông. Liên hệ: 0965 711 796 Email: hr1@futurevn.net

Title: Manual QA/Tester (Tiếng Anh)
Skills: Tester, QA QC, SQL, Agile, Japanese
Description: About the job Mô Tả Công Việc Viết testcase, tạo test data chi tiết cho các dự án nhằm kiểm soát chất lượng của tất cả các ứng dụng sản phẩm trước khi chuyển giao cho khách hàng Thực hiện test chức năng, hoạt động, tính ứng dụng của các sản phẩm Report và xác nhận bug phát sinh Report kết quả test cho Test leader Yêu cầu Từ 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc vị trí Tester/QA. Có kinh nghiệm test web, desktop app, native app, api, batch. Có hiểu biết về kiểm thử phần mềm như các giai đoạn kiểm thử (Unit test, Integration test, Functional test, System test, Acceptance test,…) và các kỹ thuật kiểm thử. Có khả năng tạo các tài liệu liên quan như (test plan, test cases, test procedures, test scripts, test reports) Có khả năng sử dụng câu lệnh truy vấn SQL, có kinh nghiệm thao tác với các CSDL. Có khả năng đọc hiểu và xác nhận Specification của dự án. Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các test tools phụ vụ cho hoạt động test. Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với Agile là 1 lợi thế. Có khả năng tự tìm hiểu, nghiên cứu hệ thống mới. Có khả năng làm việc dưới áp lực và keep deadline. Có khả năng mở rộng công việc khác khi test leader yêu cầu. Có khả năng estimate công việc, tự quản lý công việc của bản thân. Có kinh nghiệm làm dự án thương mại điện tử Có thể giao tiếp Tiếng Anh thành thạo Ưu tiên ứng viên có Tiếng Nhật từ N3 Đãi ngộ và quyền lợi cho CO-WELLers Thưởng và review tăng lương 2 lần/năm Thử việc hưởng 100% lương Ca làm việc linh hoạt: 8h-17h; 8h30 – 17h30; 9h – 18h Ngày phép: 14+ ngày/năm Bảo hiểm sức khỏe cao cấp cho toàn bộ nhân viên. Kiểm tra sức khỏe định kỳ 1 năm/lần BHXH, BHYT, BHTN mức cao, đảm bảo quyền lợi người lao động. Trợ cấp hoạt động teambuilding hàng tháng, du lịch công ty 1 năm/lần Dành riêng cho nhân viên nữ: Nghỉ sinh lý 2,5h/tháng Hưởng 100% lương trong thời gian thai sản Thêm 5 ngày nghỉ khám thai trong thai kì Môi trường làm việc tuyệt vời Trang bị thiết bị làm việc trọn bộ, hiện đại, đáp ứng yêu cầu dự án. Làm việc và hướng dẫn bởi các chuyên gia/Senior nhiều kinh nghiệm thực tế. Trợ cấp hàng tháng cho các hoạt động của CLB thể thao (Yoga, Zumba, bóng đá…) Thông tin chính sách mới/cải tiến được cập nhật đều đặn tới nhân viên. Có riêng khu vực thư giãn phục vụ hoạt động giải trí, ẩm thực. Không gian làm việc mở, tiện nghi. Cơ hội đào tạo và phát triển bản thân Thường xuyên tổ chức các buổi đào tạo, seminar cập nhật xu hướng công nghệ. Đào tạo kiến thức chuyên môn, kĩ năng quản lý, kỹ năng mềm,… theo định hướng công ty và nhu cầu khảo sát nhân viên. Các lớp đào tạo tiếng Nhật (sơ cấp – cao cấp) với giáo viên bản ngữ trong giờ hành chính. Cơ hội làm việc tại Nhật Bản với các nhân sự có tiếng Nhật. Cách thức ứng tuyển : CV apply gửi về email : huyenttk@co-well.vn

Title: QA Manager
Skills: Automation Test, Java, JavaScript, Python, CI/CD
Description: About the job MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES 1. Quality Management Accountable for all quality aspects in multiple squads or multiple sub-domains. Define and align with stakeholders (Head Engineering, Engineering Manager) on the testing strategy and approach. Participate in the strategic delivery planning of the squads and domain. Promote and implement Shift-Left testing and Automation first. Maintain and enforce testing approach, best practices, align/adapt to the global processes. Understanding the testing challenges/blockers, be an escalation point for quality issues and help to resolve them. Participate in software development process including fixing complex production code, reviewing code, and contributing to software design, if required. Drive the design, implementation, maintenance of automation frameworks and CI/CD integration. Manage all the stages of testing (ST, ST +1, SIT) and the SIT environment. Define, monitor and report the quality metrics. Manage release testing activities. review, sign-off testing results. Fulfil other tasks as assigned by your People Leader and/or authorized representative of NAB Vietnam from time to time 2. Talent Management Recruit and make QE hiring decision. Participate in planning and allocating QEs across multiple squads. Build a strong team culture and foster employee engagement. 3. Performance Management Define the QE goals based on the domain and QE center’s priorities. Have development/career plans and 1-1 for team members. Provide feedback and assess the performance on a quarter/annual basis. 4. Capability Building Identify gaps, organize training for upskilling the QE capabilities. Train and enable senior QEs to take leadership roles. Contribute to building cross-domain capabilities for NAB. Innovation Drive, contribute towards innovation in QE processes/tools and domain’s innovations. Support the QE colleagues to stay on top of the latest testing technology trends. YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCES 10+ years of quality engineering experience along with people leadership experience of medium-large teams (10+ members) with excellent leadership and organizational skills to simultaneously direct, inspire, coach, and lead multiple quality teams in a dynamically changing environment. Strong quality mindset and familiar with implementing shift-left testing approach. Expert in testing methodologies and techniques, extensive experience with the quality engineering practices of end-to-end enterprise grade systems. Ability to implement domain level strategies to improve the quality of application. Knowledge of software development, software design, and overall system architecture. Strong programming skills in any programming language. (such as Java, JavaScript, Python) Expert in automation architect and framework development from scratch using specific domain testing stack. (Such as Selenium, Appium, Espresso, WDIO, Playwright, Rest Assured, Solid Cloud and CI/CD Experience - Knowledge of AWS, Azure, Docker & Kubernetes, Jenkins Ability to learn and become an SME in a banking domain or subdomain (s) THE BENEFITS AND PERKS We appreciate and reward our colleagues who do great work every day – from excelling for our customers, to taking ownership of an issue to get it resolved. Here’s how we support our people with a range of exclusive benefits. 1. Generous compensation and benefit package Attractive salary 20-day paid annual leave and 7-day paid sick leave 13th month salary and Annual Performance Bonus Premium healthcare for yourself and family members Monthly allowance for team activities Premium welcome kit and occasional gifts of appreciation Extra benefits on your work anniversary 2. Exciting career and development opportunities Large scale products with modern technologies in banking domain Clear roadmap for career advancement in both technical and leadership pathways Access to digital learning platform such as Udemy Consistent and high-quality leadership training through the Distinctive Leadership program (DLP) Specialist capabilities and accreditations in key skill areas such as Cloud Engineering, Digital, Data, Security and SREs (Site reliability engineers) Sponsored English course with native teachers Opportunity for training in Australia 3. Professional and engaging working environment Hybrid working model and excellent work-life balance State-of-the-art & modern Agile office Food and beverages in the office pantry Employee Assistance Program to improve your physical and mental health Annual team activities and company events A solid and talented team behind you – great people who love what they do A DIVERSE AND INCLUSIVE WORKPLACE WORKS BETTER FOR EVERYONE We know that our people make us who we are. That's why we have built a culture of respect – where everyone feels valued and appreciated for being their true authentic selves at NAB. With our focus on inclusion and diversity, and in partnership with our Employee Resource Groups, NAB is a place where First Nations colleagues, colleagues of all genders, sexualities and ages, carers and colleagues with disability, and colleagues from all cultures, races and religions have the opportunity to thrive, connect and grow. We are intent on providing an environment where you can work your way. Ask about our many flexible work options and please let us know if we can provide any adjustments throughout the recruitment process. CLOUD-FIRST NAB is undergoing an exciting "Cloud First" technology transformation by taking advantage of the latest tools and techniques used by leading technology and digital companies globally. But it’s not just about the Tech, we are also investing heavily in our people, so if you have an appetite to learn, grow and elevate others around you, this is the place for you! If this excites you, let's have a chat over a cup of coffee!

Title: DevOps Engineer (AWS, English required)
Location: Quận 11, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: AWS, DevOps, Cloud, CI/CD, English
Description: About the job Job Summary An AWS DevOps Engineer with expertise in cloud infrastructure, automation, and security. Responsibilities include designing, implementing, and maintaining scalable and secure AWS-based solutions, ensuring high availability and performance, and optimizing costs. The ability to collaborate effectively in a fast-paced environment is essential. Job Description Cloud Infrastructure: manage AWS services (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda) with IaC tools (AWS CDK, Terraform CDK, Ansible, Chef, CloudFormation). Automation and CI/CD: develop CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD) and automate deployments (Ansible, Puppet, Chef). Performance and Scalability: optimize resources, implement auto-scaling, and conduct performance monitoring. Security and Compliance: ensure security best practices and compliance (GDPR, HIPAA), manage encryption and DLP. Backup and Disaster Recovery: design and test disaster recovery plans, ensuring business continuity with backups and high availability. Monitoring and Incident Management: implement monitoring (ELK, Prometheus, Grafana) and manage incidents and system health. Documentation and Communication: create technical documentation and SOPs; communicate updates to stakeholders. Collaboration and Teamwork: work with cross-functional teams, mentor members, and participate in Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban). Desired Skills And Experience Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field Proven experience with AWS services and DevOps tools. Hands-on experience with IaC tools (AWS CloudFormation, AWS CDK, TFCDK). Experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD) Capability in one or more of Python, Ruby, Groovy, and shell scripting Knowledge of containerization and orchestration tools Experience with performance tuning, scalability, and high availability architectures Good communication in English Problem-solving skills Communication and collaboration skills: able to work independently and in a team environment. Nice-to-have skills: Preferred Qualifications: Certifications in AWS (AWS Certified DevOps Engineer, AWS Certified Solutions Architect) or similar. Why Ekino? High-ownership working environment: You will take full responsibility and control of your missions contributing to the team's success Continuous skill improvement with new technologies, challenging projects, on-the-job coaching, and training programs Annual performance review & bonus: recognize your efforts and identify development/ improvement needs Clear career path: define your career development with long-term vision Be secured in your mind with employee’s care: private healthcare insurance package, medical check-up, support allowance... Great-place-to-work activities (company trip, sport clubs...): enhance teamwork spirit and facilitate your work-life harmony. Thank you for your time and enthusiasm in our career opportunities. Please kindly note that shortlisted candidates will be contacted within 3 weeks of application. Alternatively, we will reach out to you when another suitable chance arises in the future.

Title: Head of Quality Engineering (Strong Engineering background)
Skills: Leadership, Team Management, Agile, Cloud, English
Description: About the job You will be part of our delivery team and will be responsible for providing technical leadership throughout all phases of the software delivery life cycle as we initiate a transformation of NAB technology. MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES: This role provides direction and leadership to the Quality Engineering (“QE”) delivery team of 500+ engineers and testers located at Nab Vietnam. The team delivers all software testing globally across Nab The role is accountable to drive a cultural shift in testing practices that supports Nab’s Expert Engineering agenda, which includes attracting and hiring the best engineers, using the best test tools and frameworks to deliver a consistent and market leading testing service to the enterprise The department is accountable for the final implemented quality of complex, cross-domain software Ensure a suitable workforce strategy is in place to manage a significant change budget of $10m+ Managing the relationship with the quality engineering teams (vendors and NAB staff) across all locations where Nab operates The QE brand should characterise the NAB core values, and build advocacy with internal colleagues and external customers, driving a positive and measurable change for the benefit of customers, communities, employees and NAB. Fulfil other tasks as assigned by your People Leader and/or authorized representative of NAB Vietnam from time to time. YOUR SKILLS & EXPERIENCE Experience in scaling and leading a large team of technical engineers across Australia, India and Vietnam, with 30+ direct report Encourage and promote diversity in the team, and act as a role model to enable, engage and motivate the team to perform at their highest level The role works closely with stakeholders across domains including Innovation Executive, as well as the broader NAB technology teams Coach and develop your leadership team to succeed in all aspects of their role Strong experience to navigate and manage in change process Execute the QE strategy and roadmap that uplifts the technical QE capability across NAB Innovate and embed QE practices that deliver customer value , whilst monitoring and tracking the effectiveness of the test delivery teams Make informed commercial decisions that meet organisational QE needs Work closely with the “Head of Technology Engineering, Quality” located in other Nab location to provide input and evaluate and select the best tools to meet testing delivery needs Establish strong working relationships with the senior leaders and owners of technical services across the enterprise, and ensure that the right people, processes, and tools are available to meet the highest level of service and support their roadmap Work closely with the “Head of Technology, Delivery Enablement” to ensure that test environments and test data are available to meet the needs of the testers THE BENEFITS AND PERKS We appreciate and reward our colleagues who do great work every day – from excelling for our customers, to taking ownership of an issue to get it resolved. Here’s how we support our people with a range of exclusive benefits. 1. Generous compensation and benefit package Attractive salary 20-day paid annual leave and 7-day paid sick leave 13th month salary and Annual Performance Bonus Premium healthcare for yourself and family members Monthly allowance for team activities Premium welcome kit and occasional gifts of appreciation Extra benefits on your work anniversary 2. Exciting career and development opportunities Large scale products with modern technologies in banking domain Clear roadmap for career advancement in both technical and leadership pathways Access to digital learning platform such as Udemy Consistent and high-quality leadership training through the Distinctive Leadership program (DLP) Specialist capabilities and accreditations in key skill areas such as Cloud Engineering, Digital, Data, Security and SREs (Site reliability engineers) Sponsored English course with native teachers Opportunity for training in Australia 3. Professional and engaging working environment Hybrid working model and excellent work-life balance State-of-the-art & modern Agile office Food and beverages in the office pantry Employee Assistance Program to improve your physical and mental health Annual team activities and company events A solid and talented team behind you – great people who love what they do A DIVERSE AND INCLUSIVE WORKPLACE WORKS BETTER FOR EVERYONE We know that our people make us who we are. That's why we have built a culture of respect – where everyone feels valued and appreciated for being their true authentic selves at NAB. With our focus on inclusion and diversity, and in partnership with our Employee Resource Groups, NAB is a place where First Nations colleagues, colleagues of all genders, sexualities and ages, carers and colleagues with disability, and colleagues from all cultures, races and religions have the opportunity to thrive, connect and grow. We are intent on providing an environment where you can work your way. Ask about our many flexible work options and please let us know if we can provide any adjustments throughout the recruitment process. CLOUD-FIRST NAB is undergoing an exciting "Cloud First" technology transformation by taking advantage of the latest tools and techniques used by leading technology and digital companies globally. But it’s not just about the Tech, we are also investing heavily in our people, so if you have an appetite to learn, grow and elevate others around you, this is the place for you! If this excites you, let's have a chat over a cup of coffee!

Title: Supply Chain Operation Team Lead (1 - 1.5 B VND/year)
Skills: Supply Chain, Project Management, Data Analysis, Leadership, English
Description: About the job ABOUT THE ROLE Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach a cumulative average growth rate of over 900% in just under 4 years. Our mission now is to build direct-to-consumer brands and increase customer LTV. As the Supply Chain Operation Team Lead, you will lead and grow a team responsible for managing end-to-end supply chain operations — from manufacturing management to order fulfillment and profit optimization. You will play a key role in driving operational efficiency and supporting the development of technology solutions that scale our business. We are looking for leaders who are experienced in supply chain management, software development and comfortable with data-driven decision-making. WHAT YOU WILL DO Supply Chain Operations Own and lead the end-to-end supply chain operations , including production & inventory management, and order fulfillment. Work with partners to optimize production lead time and ensure production capacity meets business needs. Develop and execute inventory optimization strategies to maintain healthy stock levels while minimizing holding costs and risks. Manage fulfillment operations, ensuring on-time delivery performance and resolving fulfillment issues with internal teams and 3PL partners. Partner with Technical Designers and the partner management team to ensure product readiness for production and the highest product quality during the product life cycle. System Development (As Business Owner) Act as Business Owner (BO) for supply chain-related software/system features. Collaborate with the Product and Tech teams to define requirements and validate solutions. Profit Optimization Enhance product quality in collaboration with Technical Designers and manufacturers to increase customer satisfaction and reduce returns or complaints. Lead initiatives to mitigate Risk and Loss (RAL) across the entire supply chain, contributing to sustainable profitability. Lead the operation team in collaboration with the partner management team to reduce product cost through better sourcing, efficient production planning, and supplier negotiations. Team Leadership & Growth Manage, mentor, and grow the Supply Chain Operation team. Drive recruitment efforts and create a development path for team members. Process Optimization Identify operational inefficiencies and lead continuous improvement projects. WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR 3–6+ years of work experience in supply chain operations, project management, or software product development, preferably in e-commerce or tech-driven businesses. Related experience in Software Development is a competitive advantage. Strong Project Management Skills (planning, execution, follow-up). Experience in Software Development (product owner, project manager, or BO). Data Analytics & Visualization Skills (Excel/Sheets, BI tools, etc.). Proven Data-Driven Decision-Making Mindset. Experience in Manufacturing or Production Operations (Nice to have). Experience in Fulfillment/Logistics Operations (Nice to have). Strong Leadership & People Management Capabilities. Excellent communication, problem-solving, and collaboration skills. Software Product Owners/Managers with proven track records are very welcome to apply . WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package (TCP) that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include: Total Compensation Package: 1 - 1.5B VND per year Full salary during probation Guaranteed 13th month salary 12 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave Global health insurance package for yourself and direct family members A Pantry & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, ready to serve Lots of other company benefits including 5-star annual company trip, budget for frequent team building activities and other monthly / quarterly / annual company events General company T&D Program + dedicated T&D budget for managers Other benefits in accordance to Company's Policy and Vietnam Labor Laws Please note, we thank all applicants for their interest, however, only those candidates selected for interviews will be contacted.

Title: Solution Architect (Data & AI)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: AI, Data Science, Data Engineering, Data Governance, Python
Description: About the job Job description: What do we do As a pioneer for digital transformation GFT develops sustainable solutions across new technologies – from cloud engineering and artificial intelligence to blockchain/DLT. With its deep technological expertise, strong partnerships, and comprehensive market know-how GFT offers advice to the financial and insurance sectors, as well as in the manufacturing industry. Through the intelligent use of IT solutions GFT increases productivity and creates added value for clients. Companies gain easy and safe access to scalable IT-applications and innovative business models. Who are we Having started in Germany in 1987, GFT Technologies has grown to become a trusted Software Engineering and Consulting specialist for the international financial industry, counting many of the world’s largest and best-known Banks as our clients. We are an organization that empowers you to not only explore but raise your potential and seek out opportunities that add value. At GFT, diversity, equality, and inclusion are at the core of who we are. Ensuring a diverse and inclusive working environment for all communities is one of the main pillars of our diversity strategy, based on our core values and culture. We have been certified for 2022/23 as a ‘Great place to work’ in the APAC region. So, if you want to have the opportunity to work with an outstanding and progressive organization this position could be right for you. Role Summary We are seeking an experienced Solutions Architect (Data & AI) to lead technical pre-sales engagements in Data and AI. You will act as an advisor to clients, design modern data and AI platforms, and guide internal teams through technical solutioning and POC efforts, especially around Data and Generative AI use cases on cloud-native architectures. Key Activities Lead technical sales and work with enterprise clients on Data and AI strategies and building use cases Architect and design modern data platforms (data lakes, warehouses, pipelines, delta lakes, streaming, analytics) using Spark, Flink, Kafka, Databricks, Snowflake across AWS, Azure, or GCP Define and implement data governance policies, data quality frameworks, and compliance standards to ensure secure, and well-managed data assets based on DAMA-DMBOK principles Architect and design MLOps and LLMOps pipelines to support scalable AI/ML model lifecycle management Contribute to pre-sales assets (example, solution patterns, demos, estimations) and support go-to-market initiatives Coordinate and manage cross-functional technical teams to ensure successful delivery of robust, scalable, and secure solutions Travel to customer locations up to 25% as needed Required Skills 10 - 12 years of total experience in Data & AI roles, including at least: 4+ years focused on AI/ML, including recent GenAI/LLM exposure 5+ years in data governance, data engineering, and data platforms Experience with GenAI technologies like MCP, A2A, Langgraph, LlamaIndex, Pydantic AI, OpenAI APIs and SDKs Proven experience working with an object-oriented programming language (Python, Go, etc.) A Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, similar field of study or equivalent work experience An understanding of Computer Science fundamentals such as data structures and algorithms Strong problem-solving mindset with a collaborative and transparent approach Fluent and proficient in English Ability to work collaboratively and effectively with global teams Nice to have: Strong experience in the banking domain or working with financial institutions. What we offer you You will be working with some of the brightest people in business and technology on challenging and rewarding projects in a team of like-minded individuals. GFT prides itself on its international environment that promotes professional and cultural exchange and encourages further individual development with the benefits below: Competitive salary 13th-month salary guarantee Performance bonus Professional English course for employees Premium health insurance Extensive annual leave (Due to the high volume of applications we receive, we are unable to respond to every candidate individually. If you have not received a response from GFT regarding your application within 10 workdays, please consider that we have decided to proceed with other candidates. We truly appreciate your interest in GFT and thank you for your understanding.)

Title: Bilingual Tutor
Skills: AI, English, Technical Writing, Vietnamese, NLP
Description: About the job DataAnnotation is committed to creating quality AI. Join our team to help train AI chatbots while gaining the flexibility of remote work and choosing your own schedule. We are looking for a bilingual professional to join our team and teach AI chatbots. You will have conversations in both Vietnamese and English with chatbots in order to measure their progress, as well as write novel conversations in order to teach them what to say. Benefits: This is a full-time or part-time REMOTE position You’ll be able to choose which projects you want to work on You can work on your own schedule Projects are paid hourly, starting at $20+ USD per hour, with bonuses for high-quality and high-volume work Responsibilities (both in Vietnamese and English): Come up with diverse conversations over a range of topics Write high-quality answers when given specific prompts Compare the performance of different AI models Research and fact-check AI responses Qualifications: Fluent in Vietnamese + English A bachelor's degree (completed or in progress) Excellent writing and grammar skills Strong research and fact-checking skills to ensure accuracy and originality Note: Payment is made via PayPal. We will never ask for any money from you. PayPal will handle any currency conversions from USD.

Title: Chuyên gia phân tích
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: SQL, Data Analysis, Stakeholder management, English, Database
Description: About the job Google sẽ ưu tiên những ứng viên có quyền làm việc hợp lệ ở Thái Lan và không cần Google bảo lãnh thị thực. Please visit this Google Careers posting for the English-translated version of this role. Note: By applying to this position you will have an opportunity to share your preferred working location from the following: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam; Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia; Bangkok, Thailand; Jakarta, Indonesia; Taguig, Metro Manila, Philippines . Minimum qualifications: Bằng cử nhân hoặc kinh nghiệm thực tế tương đương. 5 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực phân tích truyền thông, kinh doanh quảng cáo, tiếp thị và truyền thông kỹ thuật số, tư vấn hoặc phân tích tài chính. Preferred qualifications: 1 năm kinh nghiệm về các kỹ thuật đo lường và phân bổ tiếp thị (ví dụ: đo lường ngoại tuyến, MMM, MTA, phân bổ) và các sản phẩm quảng cáo của Google (ví dụ: Google Ads, Google Analytics, Google Marketing Platform cùng nhiều sản phẩm khác). 1 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trực tiếp với khách hàng, có thành tích nổi bật trong việc tạo ảnh hưởng đến nhiều cấp bậc. Có kiến thức về SQL, cơ sở dữ liệu và các kỹ thuật tự động hoá cơ bản (ví dụ: trang tổng quan, tự động hoá báo cáo tuỳ chỉnh, vật chất hoá các bảng). Khả năng phân tích các tập dữ liệu, từ đó rút ra thông tin có giá trị Kỹ năng giao tiếp xuất sắc, có thể truyền tải thông điệp đơn giản đến nhiều đối tượng ở mọi cấp bậc. About The Job Ở vai trò này, bạn sẽ là một cố vấn và chuyên gia tư vấn đáng tin cậy, phối hợp với cả các nhóm nội bộ lẫn khách hàng bên ngoài để xây dựng và triển khai các chiến lược. Bạn sẽ khai thác dữ liệu và công nghệ của Google để cung cấp thông tin chuyên sâu giúp cải thiện hoạt động quảng cáo và thúc đẩy kết quả kinh doanh. Các nhóm thuộc Khối Khách hàng chiến lược (LCS) của Google là đối tác chiến lược và chuyên gia dẫn đầu ngành cho các thương hiệu và công ty quảng cáo hàng đầu thế giới. Chúng tôi không ngừng khuyến khích khách hàng nhìn nhận lại hoạt động kinh doanh của họ và khám phá những cách Google có thể hỗ trợ họ tăng trưởng. Chúng tôi tập trung vào việc giúp các khách hàng này thích ứng với những thay đổi lớn trong ngành và thúc đẩy hiệu suất kinh doanh vượt trội bằng cách cung cấp trọn bộ giải pháp quảng cáo của Google ở mức giá cạnh tranh trên Google Tìm kiếm, YouTube, Đo lường, và nhiều nền tảng khác. Là một thành viên của nhóm LCS, bạn sẽ có cơ hội đặc biệt để bán những công nghệ tiên tiến nhất, làm việc với các quản lý cấp cao, tác động đến các chiến lược định hình thị trường và tạo ra những kết quả thực tế, có ảnh hưởng đáng kể đến các doanh nghiệp lớn trên toàn cầu, cũng như thúc đẩy sự tăng trưởng của Google. Responsibilities Hỗ trợ và tư vấn về chiến lược của khách hàng/đối tác trong các lĩnh vực kinh doanh, tiếp thị hoặc phát triển sản phẩm, đồng thời phân tích dữ liệu để đưa ra câu trả lời cho các câu hỏi của doanh nghiệp, hoặc tạo thông tin chuyên sâu giúp doanh nghiệp dễ dàng đưa ra quyết định kinh doanh. Phát triển và chịu trách nhiệm về mô hình phân tích cho các dự án của khách hàng/đối tác, áp dụng hoặc tuỳ chỉnh các công cụ (ví dụ: trang tổng quan) và khung giải quyết vấn đề nhằm xác định cơ hội, đồng thời phát triển các giải pháp giúp tối ưu hoá hoạt động kinh doanh của khách hàng/đối tác và tối đa hoá việc sử dụng các sản phẩm của Google. Phối hợp với các nhóm bán hàng để thúc đẩy tăng trưởng kinh doanh với khách hàng/đối tác, tiến hành phân tích, xác định cơ hội kinh doanh, và giúp lập bản thuyết trình kinh doanh cũng như tài liệu hỗ trợ tiếp thị phục vụ việc tiếp cận thị trường. Xây dựng và quản lý mối quan hệ với các bên liên quan của khách hàng/đối tác ở nhiều phòng ban chức năng và cấp bậc, đồng thời phụ trách mối quan hệ với các bên liên quan về dữ liệu ở phía khách hàng/đối tác. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

Title: Intune Engineer or Windows Engineer
Skills: Microsoft Intune, Windows, Troubleshooting, IT Support, English
Description: About the job About Us: At Tech Mahindra ( Tech Mahindra | Connected World, Connected Experiences ), we live the philosophy of connected world and connected experiences. We thrive on change that is powered by the intelligent symphony of technology and humans designing meaningful and sustainable experiences. Consumer ‘experiences’ are driving and disrupting industries like never before. Businesses must build seamless yet simple enterprises that collaborate, synergize, and drive the change. Change that connects us all and empowers us to deliver experiences that span across the digital, the physical, the convergent, and everything in between. That’s when truly connected experiences manifest. Extraordinary is when experiences come together – a continuous convergence of digital technologies, touchpoints, and most importantly people. It’s time to reimagine, reinvent, and revolutionize business models & operations as well as to transform enterprises into living, breathing, and connected businesses. We are the Digital Change makers who strive to change the way the world, communities, businesses, and humans interact digitally. We are harnessing the power of change, brought in by technologies, that makes it the most exciting time to be alive in the human history. Our universe, as we build it, disrupt it, and redesign it, is powering the digital change. Tech Mahindra represents the connected world, offering innovative and customer-centric information technology experiences, enabling Enterprises, Associates, and the Society to Rise. It has 150,000+ professionals working for 1000+ Global Customers (including Fortune 500 companies) in 90 Countries. We’re part of the esteemed Mahindra group, headquartered in Ind ia. U nder a new CEO, Tech Mahindra is committed to a transformative journey with 'Scale @ Speed' as our guiding principle. About the role: Intune Engineer / Windows Engineer Windows Support Engineer (Level 1 & Level 2) will play a crucial role in providing frontline support, device provisioning, and technical troubleshooting for Windows-based environments during the Intune provisioning of devices. This position is responsible for ensuring seamless end-user experiences by efficiently managing device lifecycles, policy implementation, and incident resolution, assisting users in onboarding devices to Microsoft Intune Key Responsibilities Provision, configure, and deploy Windows devices (laptops, desktops, tablets) for end users using established organizational standards. Provide onsite support for end users, assisting users in safe onboarding of devices to Microsoft Intune. Install, upgrade, and troubleshoot Windows operating systems, ensuring devices are compliant with security baselines and company policies. Support devices using Microsoft Intune, including enrollment, configuration profiles, compliance policies, and application deployment. Provide L1 and L2 support to end users, resolving hardware, software, connectivity, and access issues both remotely and onsite as required. Assist in onboarding and offboarding users, including device setup, data migration, and profile management. Document troubleshooting steps, resolutions, and device histories in the ticketing system, maintaining accurate records for future reference. Escalate unresolved issues to higher-level support or engineering teams while maintaining ownership until closure. Collaborate with other IT teams to deliver seamless project rollouts, migrations, and policy updates. Stay updated on evolving Microsoft technologies, Windows feature updates, and Intune developments. Skills & Qualifications Strong proficiency in provisioning and managing Windows 10/11 operating systems. Hands-on experience with Microsoft Intune for device enrollment, policy management, and application deployment. Understanding of Active Directory, Group Policy, and device compliance mechanisms. Ability to troubleshoot hardware, OS, application, and connectivity issues methodically. Excellent communication skills and a customer-focused approach to problem-solving. Organizational and documentation skills for clear record-keeping and process adherence. Industry certifications such as Microsoft Certified: Modern Desktop Administrator Associate (MD-100/MD-101) or equivalent are a plus. Primary Skills Windows device management and OS provisioning Microsoft Intune (Endpoint Manager) End user support and troubleshooting “Tech Mahindra is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. We promote and support a diverse workforce at all levels of the company. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, color, sex, age, national origin or disability. All applicants will be evaluated solely on the basis of their ability, competence, and performance of the essential functions of their positions with or without reasonable accommodations. Reasonable accommodations also are available in the hiring process for applicants with disabilities.

Title: Assistant Project Manager
Company: IIJ Global Solutions Vietnam Company Ltd.
Skills: Project Management, Stakeholder management, Technical Writing, Security, English
Description: About the job We are looking for “ Assistant PM ” who are having more than 2 years of experience in similar role from a system integrated company or a telecom industry and who would be able to support and manage various of projects not only post-sales phase but also pre-sales phase together with sales executive and engineering staff members, either on-site at clients’ premises and/or remote from IIJ office. Job Description: [Assistant PM works in post-sales activities] Day-to-day assistance of assigned projects i.e. Chair project meetings, taking minutes, liaison among project stakeholders Producing/updating project plans including project management documents i.e. WBS, Task (To Do List), drawing or diagram of basic or high-level system design, project formation etc. Assisting in managing system documents i.e. network diagram, rack layouts, configuration sheets, test scenario etc., those that usually being created by engineers. Multilingual communication support and assistance for clients under SE support contract. [Pre-sales activities] Assisting sales executive staff members to produce proposal documents. Assisting preparation of responses to Requests for Information (RFI) and Requests for Proposals (RFP). Working with Sales personnel (IIJ Vietnam as well as other members of IIJ Group) and partner companies as in Vietnam. [Internal/external security & system auditing works] Managing information security improvement activities of IIJ Vietnam as well as other IIJ’s overseas offices based on the pre-defined framework. Assisting system and security audit as well as site survey work together with engineering staff members for clients according to their requirements.

Title: Java Developer
Salary: Good salary and a bonus if things work well
Skills: Java, JavaScript, Spring, SQL, Git
Description: About the job JOB DESCRIPTION: Work with international customers and colleagues from Germany, France, the Czech Republic, and the US Independent conception and implementation of new functions in complex application landscapes Coding in the frontend and backend, mainly with Java and JavaScript Creation of technical documentation **Working location: 7 Phan Chau Trinh & 71 Quang Trung, Hai Chau 1 Ward, Hai Chau District, Da Nang** This job is open to both Vietnamese citizens and foreigners living in Vietnam. YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE General qualifications Strong English communication skills (both verbal & written) 2+ years of professional experience in international software projects ( flexible depending on how fast your learning and technical developing capabilities are) Degree in engineering or natural sciences (university or technical college) Technical skills **Must have Understanding of software development tools, processes, and architecture Experience with multi-tier or service-oriented web applications Experience with Java/Kotlin and J2EE frameworks such as Spring Experience with relational databases, SQL, and ORM technologies **Nice to have Experience in agile software development Experience in build tools: Gradle, Maven Experience in search engines such as Lucence, Solr, Elasticsearch .. Experience with testing practices and tools ( JUnit, Mockito ...) Experience in microservices architect Proficient understanding of code versioning tools ( Git is preferred) Soft skills Sense of responsibility , communication skills, and team spirit Willingness to learn and build a deep understanding Be able to work independently and under pressure A passion for software development, new trends, and technologies in IT Please send us your application in English. WHY YOU'LL LOVE WORKING HERE Good salary and a bonus if things work well Working & growing with an international team Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in Europe 18 days off allowance per year Premium insurance for you and your family member (spouse/ parent/ children) & yearly check-up Loyalty program after three years and five years Flexible working time (40h/week) and Hybrid working policy: open for good reasons and subject to prior requesting. Highly professional equipment (Mac/Thinkpad, 2 screens, adjustable desks) Intense English course for the first 3 months by our native English teachers and Optional English seminars during the work time Training sponsored by mgm An amazing company trip once a year, team-building with the project team and month-end with the whole company, covered by mgm Free in-house entertainment facilities (darts, piano, climbing wall), drinks (coffee, beer, soft drinks,…) and food (cookies, fruit,…) and out-house company-funded sport clubs (football, swimming, badminton...) APPLY NOW!!!

Title: Software Engineer, AI (Go)
Skills: Golang, AI, Git, Software Architecture, English
Description: About the job Software Engineer, AI — Code Evaluation & Training (Remote) List of accepted countries and locations Help train large-language models (LLMs) to write production-grade code across a wide range of programming languages: Compare & rank multiple code snippets , explaining which is best and why. Repair & refactor AI-generated code for correctness, efficiency, and style. Inject feedback (ratings, edits, test results) into the RLHF pipeline and keep it running smoothly. End result: the model learns to propose, critique, and improve code the way you do. RLHF in one line Generate code ➜ expert engineers rank, edit, and justify ➜ convert that feedback into reward signals ➜ reinforcement learning tunes the model toward code you’d actually ship. What You’ll Need 3+ years of professional software engineering experience in Go (Constraint programming experience is a bonus, but not required) Strong code-review instincts —you can spot logic errors, performance traps, and security issues quickly. Extreme attention to detail and excellent written communication skills. Much of this role involves explaining why one approach is better than another. This cannot be overstated. You enjoy reading documentation and language specs and thrive in an asynchronous, low-oversight environment. What You Don’t Need No prior RLHF (Reinforcement Learning with Human Feedback) or AI training experience. No deep machine learning knowledge. If you can review and critique code clearly, we’ll teach you the rest. Tech Stack We are looking for engineers with a strong command of Go . Logistics Location: Fully remote — work from anywhere Compensation: From $30/hr to $70/hr, depending on location and seniority Hours: Minimum 15 hrs/week, up to 40 hrs/week available Engagement: 1099 contract Straightforward impact, zero fluff. If this sounds like a fit, apply here!

Title: BIM Designer
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Revit, Python, C#, English, Chinese
Description: About the job Arup is a global firm of designers, engineers, architects, planners, consultants and technical specialist with more than 14,000 people in 88 offices across 33 countries. The firm is the creative force behind many of the world’s most innovative and sustainable projects. Our Asia offices employ approximately 2,800 staff and are engaged in prestigious multi-disciplinary projects covering buildings, infrastructure, advisory services, planning and technical consulting areas. We embrace equality, diversity and inclusion in all aspects including individual differences and open-mindedness. Currently we are looking for a capable and independent individual for the following position as part of the multi-disciplinary team in our Vietnam office. Role Liaise with structural engineers in order to create BIM model and drawing generation using Revit. Working with International teams based in Hong Kong and Singapore on a daily basis. Capable to create BIM model for routine works independently and supervise others Ensure that the quality of deliverables produced is in accordance with project and corporate requirements. Keep following up with team members and project managers informed of workload and deadlines of deliverables. Requirements - Fluency in Structure Revit - Be able worked as a BIM Coordinator is a plus (Understand Platform BIM360 or Autodesk Construction Cloud & Naviswork) - 2~8 years of experience in Complex Projects (Highrise & Steel projects). - At least have College or University degree on civil/structure/infrastructure engineering. - Programming skills using Python, C#, Dynamo or Rhino.inside. Revit will be an advantage - Good command in both written and spoken English and Vietnamese. Speaking in Chinese is a plus - Experiences in complex projects from Top Asia country as Hongkong, Singapore is a plus

Title: Talent Acquisition Intern
Skills: Recruitment, English, Time Management, Stakeholder management
Description: About the job HRS AS A COMPANY HRS is transforming the future of corporate travel through innovative technology. In a $600 billion global lodging and meetings market, inefficiencies are rampant—from frustrating traveler experiences caused by outdated check-in and payment systems to millions lost annually due to missing or non-compliant invoices that block VAT reclaim. With travel increasingly complex and fragmented, the opportunity for innovation is enormous—and HRS is leading the charge. HRS offers an unparalleled end-to-end solution for managing corporate lodging, group travel, long stay, and meetings—all within a single, unified platform. With HRS Connect, companies gain access to a sleek, consumer-grade booking interface that consolidates fragmented travel spend and delivers full visibility across all travel categories. This is paired with HRS’s proprietary AI Copilot, which enables travel and procurement leaders to steer their programs strategically with real-time data, actionable insights, and one-click implementation of optimizations. Together, these solutions empower organizations to drive measurable cost savings, boost policy compliance, and radically improve the traveler experience. The HRS platform enables customers to achieve up to 3x return on investment, achieve 100% invoice compliance, and increase corporate program adoption by over 20%—particularly in unmanaged spend areas like meetings and groups. With over two decades of proprietary data, market-leading AI, and deep integration across the travel and expense ecosystem, HRS powers travel programs for 35% of the Fortune 500. From seamless payment to VAT-compliant e-invoicing and real-time reconciliation with SAP Concur and other ERP platforms, HRS offers unmatched transparency, governance, and performance—turning travel into a data-driven advantage with a sharp focus on customer excellence, compliance, and automation. RESPONSIBILITIES Steer and monitor approved job postings across various online channels. Coordinate with candidates and the hiring team for test and interview arrangements. Actively search for and approach potential candidates to build a strong talent pipeline, under the guidance of the team. Timely and accurately update recruitment status and candidate data in HRS’s Applicant Tracking System (ATS). WHAT MAKES YOU A GREAT FIT Undergraduate background in Human Resources, Economics, Business, or related fields Full-time availability (5 days a week) Good English communication skills Ability to make initial recruiting/screening calls to support the recruitment team Ability to handle end-to-end recruitment coordination Eagerness to learn and grow in the field of recruitment Good time management skills Eyes for details, heart for improvement and motivation to conquer all difficulties. WHAT WE OFFER Attractive allowances. Flexible working hours. Various training on hot-trend technologies, best practices and soft skills. Free in-house entertainment facilities, coffee, and snack (instant noodles, cookies, milks, soft drinks...). Have great hands-on experience in decentralized ledger technology. Growth opportunity by learning and working with professional mentors and amazing buddies.

Title: Vietnamese to English Translator
Skills: AI, English, Vietnamese, Technical Writing, Research
Description: About the job DataAnnotation is committed to creating quality AI. Join our team to help train AI chatbots while gaining the flexibility of remote work and choosing your own schedule. We are looking for a bilingual professional to join our team and teach AI chatbots. You will have conversations in both Vietnamese and English with chatbots in order to measure their progress, as well as write novel conversations in order to teach them what to say. Benefits: This is a full-time or part-time REMOTE position You’ll be able to choose which projects you want to work on You can work on your own schedule Projects are paid hourly, starting at $20+ USD per hour, with bonuses for high-quality and high-volume work Responsibilities (both in Vietnamese and English): Come up with diverse conversations over a range of topics Write high-quality answers when given specific prompts Compare the performance of different AI models Research and fact-check AI responses Qualifications: Fluent in Vietnamese + English A bachelor's degree (completed or in progress) Excellent writing and grammar skills Strong research and fact-checking skills to ensure accuracy and originality Note: Payment is made via PayPal. We will never ask for any money from you. PayPal will handle any currency conversions from USD. #vietnamese

Source candidates and manage driver registration data for recruitment activities, including outreach via call surveys, email, SMS, and Zalo ZNS. Execute online recruitment activities, including job postings, social media seeding, and promotion of driver schemes and operational policies via Zalo OA. Ensure compliance with driver recruitment procedures in accordance with company guidelines. Coordinate with relevant teams and support other tasks as assigned by management. Preference for candidates with long-term commitment. Detail-oriented and well-organized; strong communication and problem-solving skills.
