Strong communication and collaboration skills are a must Strong problem-solving and analytical skills Fluent in English is a must, any additional language is a bonus Why join us? Competitive Salary with attractive compensation package Flexible Hybrid working options International environment

Title: Quản lý Khách hàng Chiến lược, Ngành Game, Khối Khách hàng chiến lược (tiếng Anh, tiếng Việt)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Stakeholder management, Project Management, Data Analysis, English, Business Analysis
Description: About the job Please visit this Google Careers posting for the English-translated version of this role. Minimum qualifications: Bằng cử nhân hoặc kinh nghiệm thực tế tương đương. 2 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực quản lý khách hàng ở mảng truyền thông hoặc ngành quảng cáo. Khả năng giao tiếp thông thạo bằng cả tiếng Anh và tiếng Việt để hỗ trợ khách hàng nói tiếng Việt. Preferred qualifications: 6 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực truyền thông kỹ thuật số. Kinh nghiệm sử dụng phần mềm phân tích và bảng tính. Kinh nghiệm làm việc tại các công ty khách hàng, công ty quảng cáo hoặc nền tảng kỹ thuật số quảng bá các giải pháp truyền thông kỹ thuật số. Kinh nghiệm làm việc trong môi trường kinh doanh, quảng bá các giải pháp truyền thông kỹ thuật số hoặc sử dụng các sản phẩm của Google để đạt được kết quả. Kiến thức về các sản phẩm quảng cáo của Google trên Ứng dụng, Video, Mạng Hiển thị và Tìm kiếm. Khả năng phát triển giải pháp dựa trên dữ liệu. About The Job Những doanh nghiệp hợp tác với Google thuộc đủ loại hình, quy mô và giá trị vốn hoá thị trường, trong khi không có một giải pháp quảng cáo nào của Google phù hợp với mọi doanh nghiệp. Kiến thức về truyền thông trực tuyến kết hợp với các kỹ năng giao tiếp và năng lực phân tích của bạn sẽ giúp định hình đường hướng phát triển cho cả doanh nghiệp mới lẫn doanh nghiệp hiện hữu. Bằng kỹ năng tạo dựng mối quan hệ, bạn sẽ thực hiện những công việc tầm cỡ Google về mảng dịch vụ khách hàng, nghiên cứu và phân tích thị trường. Bạn sẽ dự đoán về cách đưa ra quyết định, không ngừng tìm tòi và khám phá nhu cầu kinh doanh từ phía các khách hàng quan trọng của Google, đồng thời tìm hiểu xem các sản phẩm của chúng tôi có thể giúp họ phát triển hoạt động kinh doanh ra sao. Trong quá trình làm việc với khách hàng, bạn sẽ đưa ra tầm nhìn và chiến lược để quảng cáo của họ có thể tiếp cận hàng nghìn người dùng. Khi đảm nhiệm vai trò này, bạn sẽ là chuyên gia sản phẩm cung cấp các giải pháp của Google giúp giải quyết những vấn đề của khách hàng về mặt tiếp thị và kinh doanh. Bạn sẽ phát triển các mối quan hệ và đưa ra góc nhìn đa chiều cho khách hàng tại Việt Nam. Bạn sẽ đóng vai trò một chuyên gia tiếp thị kỹ thuật số dựa trên hiệu suất, có kinh nghiệm về các giải pháp cho Tìm kiếm, Mạng Hiển thị/Video, Ứng dụng và có thể cung cấp dịch vụ khách hàng. Bạn sẽ làm việc với các bên liên quan, cả nội bộ lẫn đối tác bên ngoài, để thể hiện năng lực quản lý dự án cũng như điều phối hoạt động triển khai, thực hiện và khắc phục sự cố liên quan đến các giải pháp của Google. Khối Khách hàng chiến lược của chúng tôi hợp tác chặt chẽ với nhiều nhà quảng cáo và công ty quảng cáo lớn nhất thế giới nhằm phát triển những giải pháp kỹ thuật số giúp xây dựng doanh nghiệp và thương hiệu. Chúng tôi sở hữu góc nhìn toàn cảnh về sự chuyển đổi mạnh mẽ trong bối cảnh hoạt động quảng cáo chuyển dịch sang các nền tảng di động và trực tuyến. Chúng tôi ở một vị thế đặc biệt, có thể giúp định hình cách các công ty phát triển trong thời đại số. Chúng tôi tư vấn cho khách hàng về hàng loạt sản phẩm của Google trên các kênh tìm kiếm, nền tảng video và thiết bị di động để giúp họ kết nối tức thì, liền mạch với các đối tượng người dùng. Responsibilities Trở thành chuyên gia sản phẩm, hướng dẫn khách hàng và công ty quảng cáo sử dụng những sản phẩm và giải pháp chính của Google để đạt được mục tiêu tiếp thị và kinh doanh của họ. Đóng vai trò là đầu mối liên hệ chính cho việc khắc phục sự cố, hướng dẫn qua email, giải đáp thắc mắc về các sản phẩm, chính sách mới cũng như hoạt động đào tạo và quá trình triển khai. Xây dựng hoạt động lập kế hoạch/thực thi cho tài khoản theo chiến thuật, triển khai chiến lược khách hàng, đồng thời vun đắp và phát triển những mối quan hệ quan trọng với các nhóm thực thi của khách hàng và công ty quảng cáo, nhằm hướng dẫn họ triển khai sản phẩm và xử lý sự cố. Quản lý hoạt động phân phối chiến dịch và hiệu suất của tài khoản. Hỗ trợ một quy trình phản hồi ngắn gọn, cung cấp thông tin chi tiết về sản phẩm, phát triển kế hoạch truyền thông và cộng tác với Quản lý ngành hàng chiến lược để phản hồi bản tóm tắt yêu cầu của công ty quảng cáo và khách hàng. Cung cấp thông tin và vận động sự ủng hộ cho Google khi trình bày trước khách hàng và công ty quảng cáo về các sản phẩm mới, hiệu suất và kết quả của chiến dịch. Phát triển mối quan hệ với các đối tác nói tiếng Việt và tiếng Anh mới, hiện hữu trong khu vực hoặc đang hoạt động kinh doanh tại Việt Nam. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

Title: Engineering Manager (Open for Expat)
Skills: Agile, Scrum, DevOps, Security, English
Description: About the job TOP 3 REASONS TO JOIN US Perks you will love: Hybrid working; 17 - 24 paid days off; Top modern & sufficient devices Solid global business: No.1 market - 13.7 million B2C users in Japan; 140,000+ paying business customers; Listed in the prime market of Tokyo Stock Exchange Hub of growth support: Fintech industry; Tailored L&D programs for individual growth RESPONSIBILITIES Manage multi-product teams to build and deliver products on engineering standards and ensure code quality. Evaluate multiple technical solutions, balancing performance, scalability, maintainability, and cost. Ability to create and maintain relationships with a wide range of stakeholders. Be the voice of reason between speed and quality. People management(1:1 meeting, personal development & training plan, career path, probation reviews, and performance reviews). Coach teams in applying Scrum and DevOps and be responsible for continuous improvement of the teams. Lead initiatives for implementing efficient development and delivery processes. JOB REQUIREMENTS Must-have: Background in Information Technology, Software Engineering, or Information System 10+ years of experience in software development 8+ years of experience in managing web projects or product development Have worked as a senior software engineer or higher Experience in handling/building an engineering team (direct or indirect) of 10-20+ members, organizational agility Excellent problem-solving skills, especially in dealing with escalated or critical issues Good experience in people management: employee satisfaction, career growth, performance review, coaching, mentoring, 1:1 meeting Good experience in Agile: Methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, LeSS) and practices Strong knowledge of security and robust high-performance system Good experience in micro-services, micro-frontend, and multi-tenant architecture design/implementation Experience in solving complex requirements/problems both business and technology such as: Finance System, Accounting System, Banking System, Distributed System, Scalable web applications English skills (professional working proficiency) Nice-to-have: Japanese

Title: Full Stack AI Engineer
Skills: Fullstack, AI, Python, JavaScript, API
Description: About the job 📍 Working arrangement: Remote — remote in Vietnam Build Intelligent Systems from Model to UI — and Everything in Between At BJAK, we’re using AI to reinvent how financial services work across Southeast Asia — making them smarter, simpler, and more inclusive. As a Full Stack AI Engineer, you’ll bridge machine learning and software engineering to bring intelligent features directly into users’ hands. You’ll operate across the stack — from backend systems and ML model integration to frontend delivery — and help shape how millions of users experience intelligent financial services. This is a hybrid role based in Malaysia, working closely with teams across product, data, and engineering. Why This Role Matters You’ll be the critical link between AI models and user-facing features Your work will define how intelligence is delivered to millions of users You’ll build end-to-end systems that combine backend, ML, and frontend engineering You’ll thrive in a lean, fast-moving team that values bold execution and real-world impact What You’ll Do Build and deploy full-stack applications that leverage machine learning models Collaborate with ML engineers and data scientists to integrate models into production Develop backend services, APIs, and pipelines to power intelligent features Build intuitive and performant UIs that surface AI insights clearly and meaningfully Own the full development lifecycle — architecture, implementation, testing, deployment, and monitoring Work with product, design, and engineering teams to deliver seamless user experiences Continuously improve the performance, scalability, and reliability of AI-integrated systems You’ll Thrive Here If You... Love shipping fast — you’d rather launch V1 this week than perfect V3 six months later Treat every problem as your own, regardless of scope or title Enjoy switching hats — builder, debugger, architect, and product thinker when needed Believe clarity comes from action — prototype, test, and iterate without waiting for perfect plans Stay calm and effective in startup chaos — shifting priorities and building from zero doesn’t faze you See feedback and failure as part of growth — you're here to level up Believe “done” beats “perfect,” but still care deeply about UX and code quality Show up with humility, hunger, and hustle — and lift up others as you go Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field 2–4 years of experience in full stack development (frontend + backend) Strong coding skills in Python and JavaScript (Node.js, React), or similar stacks Experience integrating machine learning models into production applications Solid understanding of API development, RESTful services, and cloud deployment Comfortable working with SQL/NoSQL databases and scalable system architecture Proficient in debugging, testing, and modern software design best practices Must be based in Vietnam and open to working remotely while collaborating with our Malaysia team Nice to Have Experience with tools like FastAPI, Flask, TensorFlow Serving for ML model deployment Familiarity with frontend frameworks like Next.js, Vue, or TypeScript Exposure to ML lifecycle and ops tools (MLflow, Airflow, Docker, GCP/AWS) Experience in high-growth startup or agile product development teams Understanding of AI explainability and data visualization in user interfaces What You’ll Get Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses Hybrid flexibility — work from home and collaborate in-office at HQ High-impact role with visibility across product, data, and engineering Flat structure — your work is seen, your ideas are heard Fast learning curve and accelerated growth in a mission-driven company Regional exposure across Southeast Asian markets About BJAK BJAK is Southeast Asia’s largest digital insurance platform. Headquartered in Malaysia with operations in Thailand, Taiwan, and Japan, we help millions of users access affordable, transparent financial protection. We use AI, automation, and APIs to simplify complex financial products — making them accessible, faster, and fairer. If you're excited to bring AI to life through full stack engineering and want to build products that reach millions — we’d love to hear from you.

Title: Frontend Engineer
Location: Quận 3, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: JavaScript, CSS, HTML, VueJS, REST API
Description: About the job Description Responsibilities and Duties Once You Join Our Team, You Will Collaborate with other team members (PM, UI, backend engineer, QA) to provide a seamless freight experience for our customer; Participating design the front end architecture, collaborate with backend engineers to develop and deliver elegant product solutions; Propose innovative technical solutions to hard business problems; Curiosity and passion, understanding of LLM and AI Agent framework; Lean and grow constantly, improve yourself and make the team member around you better Requirements Minimum Qualifications Bachelor degree in Computer science or related field; At least 3+ years of working experience in related field; Fluent in JavaScript, CSS, HTML; Fluent in Vue frameworks, MVC, MVVM architecture Experience with at least one modern JavaScript framework (React, Vue ) Fluent in REST APIs in web context, GraphQL experience is plus Good engineering habits with maintaining codebase, familiarity with Git, Webpack; Clear understanding of division between front end and back end; Build products that delight the user, paying close attention to detail of UI elements; Sensitivity to front-end architecture and components, preferably with experience working on large scale engineering projects; A commitment and drive for quality, excellence and results balanced with a creative mindset; Raise the quality and speed bar of the entire team and yourself into a position of maximum leverage; be familiar with AWS and amplify is a plus Good communication skills, with fluent verbal English.

Title: Recruitment Consultant
Salary: Competitive salary and life-changing earning potential
Skills: Recruitment, Stakeholder management, English, Networking, Leadership
Description: About the job We’re Hiring: Recruitment Consultant (International Markets) Hanoi, Vietnam (Hybrid – 3 days in-office) Full-time | Immediate Start Experience: 2-10 years Join Ethea Solutions – GTM Talent. Fast. Anywhere. We’re a high-performance executive search firm helping some of the world’s most exciting tech companies expand across Asia-Pacific. From Series A rocket ships to global giants, our clients trust us to find the people that drive revenue and scale operations. Now, we’re growing; and we’re looking for an experienced Recruitment Consultant to join our team in Hanoi. We're open to someone with 1-2 years of experience that's on an upward trajectory with talent we can nurture, or someone that's already at a high-level that wants to step into international executive search. You'll be working directly with the founder as one of the pioneer team at Ethea, located in the Asia HQ; Hanoi. As one of the founding members, you'll have the opportunity to help scale the business in real-time, earn huge commission cheques and have the chance to earn equity in the company. What You’ll Be Doing: Own end-to-end candidate sourcing and engagement across GTM roles (Sales, Pre-Sales, Customer Success etc.). Run outreach campaigns, screen candidates, and help manage hiring processes for fast-scaling tech clients. Work on roles across Southeast Asia, Australia, and other APAC markets. Collaborate directly with the founder on strategy, delivery, and client success. Help shape how we grow, from tools and systems to process improvements and research. Working to become an authority on GTM hiring across the region. Attending in-person meetings, events and conferences across Asia when needed. What We’re Looking For: 2+ years of recruitment experience (agency or internal). Proven sourcing ability — LinkedIn Recruiter, ATS, in-person networking. Confidence to communicate with senior-level candidates anywhere in the world. A proactive, self-starting mindset — we move fast and work smart Fluent in English; strong written and spoken communication. Based in Hanoi, or open to relocating, with the ability to work in-office 3 days/week. What You’ll Get: Founder-level mentorship and exposure to global tech hiring. Clear runway for growth and responsibility. Competitive salary and life-changing earning potential. An opportunity to shape something from the ground up, with shares in the company available for high-achievers. A fun, fast-moving environment with a high standard of excellence. Ability to work internationally; not just working local, low-value deals. If you’re ambitious, curious, and want to help build something special, we'd love to hear from you. Let’s build the future of GTM hiring. Together.

Title: Data Engineer
Salary: Attractive compensation package: 14-month salary scheme plus annual bonus and additional allowances
Skills: Apache Spark, Kafka, Kubernetes, CI/CD, Python
Description: About the job Job Description Architect and implement enterprise-scale data platforms in on-premise environments Lead technical design decisions for data infrastructure and processing workflows Implement and optimize data solutions using Spark, Hadoop, Kafka, and OpenMetadata,… Lead DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines for data platform deployment Provide technical mentorship and guidance to the data engineering team Collaborate with stakeholders to align technical solutions with business needs Troubleshoot complex system issues and implement performance optimizations Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field; Master’s degree preferred 4-8+ years of experience in data engineering or software development, with at least 3 years in technical leadership roles Proven experience implementing and managing data platforms in on-premise environments. Experience with real-time data processing and streaming architectures. Advanced knowledge of Kubernetes architecture, including custom resource definitions, operators, networking, and storage configurations In-depth understanding of networking concepts including TCP/IP, load balancing, DNS, and network security for distributed systems Strong expertise in DevOps practices including infrastructure as code, configuration management, and container orchestration Extensive experience with CI/CD tools and methodologies (Jenkins, GitLab CI, Argo CD, etc.) for automated testing and deployment pipelines Comprehensive knowledge of big data technologies including Apache Spark, Hadoop ecosystem, Apache Hive, Apache Hudi and Kafka. Strong programming skills in at least one language (Python, Java, or Scala) Excellent system design capabilities with focus on scalability, performance, and reliability Fluent English communication skills, both written and verbal Preferred Qualifications Experience with cloud-based data platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) in addition to on-premise implementations Kubernetes certifications such as CKA (Certified Kubernetes Administrator), CKAD (Certified Kubernetes Application Developer), or CKS (Certified Kubernetes Security Specialist) Working knowledge of metadata management frameworks like OpenMetadata Benefits Attractive compensation package: 14-month salary scheme plus annual bonus and additional allowances Annual bonus package tailored based on performance and contribution Young, open, and dynamic working environment that promotes innovation and creativity Ongoing learning and development with regular professional training and opportunities to enhance both technical and soft skills Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and diverse real-world enterprise projects Vibrant company culture with regular team-building activities, sports tournaments, arts events, Family Day, and more Full compliance with Vietnamese labor laws, plus additional internal perks such as annual company trips, special holidays, and other corporate benefits 4+ years Please send your application via email: recruitment@cmcglobal.vn Years of Experience Required Required Education Level Bachelor’s Degree Job Level Middle/Senior Work Form Full-time Email: recruitment@cmcglobal.vn

Title: Engineering Manager
Skills: Agile, Java, JavaScript, DevOps, English
Description: About the job ABOUT THE JOB As an Engineer Manager, you will be accountable for the leadership of one or more engineering scrum teams to plan, deliver and support service features that deliver customer value and/or mature service capability. The position is also accountable for executing the people leader fundamentals in line with NAB Policies, driving a learning-based culture with an ability to set and gain agreement for realistic and stretching objectives for the team. MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES Manage multi Agile teams to deliver on engineering standards, sprint backlogs, and plans, engineers’ responsibilities and performance management, code quality, adherence to development, and testing guardrails. Manage milestones, deliverables, risks, and dependencies of the engineering teams. Educate the engineering teams and ensure the release of features to production comply with NAB risk management frameworks. Ability to create and maintain relationships with a wide range of stakeholders. Be the voice of reason between speed and quality. Evangelist of the T-shaped working model; coach engineers to be T-shaped, versatile, and take responsibility outside their core disciplines. Line management (1:1 meeting, personal development & training plan, career path, probation reviews, and performance reviews). Coach teams in applying Scrum and DevOps. Be responsible for continuous improvement of the teams. Lead initiatives for implementing efficient development and delivery processes. Drive a learning-based culture with an ability to set and gain agreement for realistic and stretching objectives for the team. Fulfill other tasks as assigned by your People Leader and/or authorized representative of NAB Vietnam from time to time. Technical environment: Microservices architecture system Programming –Java, Python, JavaScript, MV* patterns, Nodejs, ReactJS (including Redux) Databases – Postgres, MongoDB DevOps – Jenkins, Artifactory, SonarQube, GitHub, CloudFormation Cloud: Multi-Cloud, AWS (Lambda, Postgres, S3, API Gateway, CLI, SNS/SQS), Azure YOUR SKILL AND EXPERIENCE Must have: 10+ years working experience in Software Development ; 5+ years experience in leading cross-functional Agile teams. Solid understanding of Software Quality, DevOps environments. Excellent experience in SDLC methodologies – Scrum, Kanban, Waterfall. Proven ability to manage and deliver complex technology projects involving multiple engineering teams both onshore and offshore. Real-world experience with large-scale Agile adoption, not just theoretical knowledge. Strong stakeholder management experience. Proven people leadership, team building, motivation, and coaching skills. Experience in managing code and change management processes. Experience with IT Service Management (e.g. Release Management) and experience with using Service Now or similar. Strong ability to communicate at both strategic and operational level internally and externally, making effective decisions balancing business and stakeholder needs. Fluent English skills. Nice to have: Agile – Certified Scrum Master (preferred) Experience in the Banking or Financial Services industry; (preferred) Fluent in English communication skills (both verbal & written) THE BENEFITS AND PERKS We appreciate and reward our colleagues who do great work every day – from excelling for our customers, to taking ownership of an issue to get it resolved. Here’s how we support our people with a range of exclusive benefits. 1. Generous compensation and benefit package Attractive salary 20-day paid annual leave and 7-day paid sick leave 13th month salary and Annual Performance Bonus Premium healthcare for yourself and family members Monthly allowance for team activities Premium welcome kit and occasional gifts of appreciation Extra benefits on your work anniversary 2. Exciting career and development opportunities Large scale products with modern technologies in banking domain Clear roadmap for career advancement in both technical and leadership pathways Access to digital learning platform such as Udemy Consistent and high-quality leadership training through the Distinctive Leadership program (DLP) Specialist capabilities and accreditations in key skill areas such as Cloud Engineering, Digital, Data, Security and SREs (Site reliability engineers) Professional banking qualifications through the Career Qualified in Banking (CQiB) program accredited by FINSIA. Sponsored English course with native teachers Opportunity for training in Australia 3. Professional and engaging working environment Hybrid working model and excellent work-life balance State-of-the-art & modern Agile office Food and beverages in the office pantry Employee Assistance Program to improve your physical and mental health Annual team activities and company events A solid and talented team behind you – great people who love what they do A DIVERSE AND INCLUSIVE WORKPLACE WORKS BETTER FOR EVERYONE We know that our people make us who we are. That's why we have built a culture of respect – where everyone feels valued and appreciated for being their true authentic selves at NAB. With our focus on inclusion and diversity, and in partnership with our Employee Resource Groups, NAB is a place where First Nations colleagues, colleagues of all genders, sexualities and ages, carers and colleagues with disability, and colleagues from all cultures, races and religions have the opportunity to thrive, connect and grow. We are intent on providing an environment where you can work your way. Ask about our many flexible work options and please let us know if we can provide any adjustments throughout the recruitment process. CLOUD-FIRST NAB is undergoing an exciting "Cloud First" technology transformation by taking advantage of the latest tools and techniques used by leading technology and digital companies globally. But it’s not just about the Tech, we are also investing heavily in our people, so if you have an appetite to learn, grow and elevate others around you, this is the place for you! If this excites you, let's have a chat over a cup of coffee!

Title: Lead Software Engineer, Flink
Skills: Kafka, Kubernetes, AWS, Java, Scala
Description: About the job Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team The Streaming Data team (a.k.a. "Coban") strives to ensure seamless and secure real-time access to the continuous events or "streams", serving as Grab's unified, common access pattern for real-time data. We build the infrastructure and platform for writing, consuming real-time data, and provide a cost-effective, managed "NoOps" service for all product teams to leverage. We work with our sister teams in DataTech to provide integrated data platforms that ensure everyday opportunities with big data innovation. Get to Know the Role Our Lead Engineers are expected to lead mid to large sized projects across a Tech Family (or vertical) and to be a technical mentor and go-to person in a team of 3 to 5 senior engineers. As a Lead Software Engineer, your role calls for being able to work across our stack, from Flink and Kafka to AWS cloud infrastructure, Kubernetes, observability and SRE, not only in practical hands-on building of systems and code, but also driving higher-level discussions around architecture and design. You will work onsite at Grab Vietnam office, either CMC Creative Space, D7 (HCMC) or PVI Building (Hanoi) and report to Senior Data Engineering Manager, who is based in Singapore. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform Work with a team of cross functional engineers to make Stream Processing easy, reliable, efficient and secure across Grab, through self-served capabilities baked in our platform. Create the abstractions, modules and libraries to lower the barrier of entry to Stream Processing in Grab and shift the maintenance and security toil away from our users. Improve the automation and self-served capabilities that allow our small team to support 1000+ Stream Processing applications in Grab. Weigh in on design questions around platformization, infrastructure, observability and security, and work with (and build over the platforms provided by) our infrastructure team. Drive the adoption of Stream Processing across Grab, by evangelizing for our platform and products, and by directly helping our internal users develop the next game-changing real-time application for Grab. Be responsible for the definition and evolution of platform availability and reliability SLAs (dashboards, compliance), and participate in and evolve on-call and incident response procedures for the team. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need 7+ years leading teams or projects in software engineering, data engineering, or information security disciplines. Worked and operated Stream Processing pipelines in production (Flink or Spark Streaming). Hands-on competencies with Kafka and programming experience with Scala or Java. (This role does involve being able to be in the trenches!). You are excited to learn and apply new technologies. The Nice-to-haves Experience with Kafka Connect, Kubernetes, Go, Gitlab CI, AWS, Terraform. Experience with a data warehouse like Spark Additional Information Life at Grab We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer: We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges. Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours What We Stand For At Grab We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Title: Business Analyst
Location: Hai Bà Trưng district, Hanoi, Vietnam
Skills: Business Analysis, CRM, SQL, Agile, Figma
Description: About the job Phân tích yêu cầu nghiệp vụ từ Lãnh đạo, các phòng ban, đối tác và người dùng để làm rõ, hệ thống hóa và truyền đạt cho team phát triển, Tester. Đảm bảo các giải pháp phần mềm thanh toán và quản lý nội bộ (CRM, đối soát, quản lý đơn hàng, ví điện tử…) được triển khai hiệu quả, đúng mục tiêu kinh doanh. Mô tả công việc Làm việc trực tiếp với các bên liên quan (Người ra yêu cầu/ Khách hàng, PM, Sale, Dev, Tester...) để thu thập, phân tích và làm rõ yêu cầu nghiệp vụ. Viết tài liệu: BRD (Business Requirement Document), SRS (Software Requirement Specification), Use Case, Flowchart, Wireframe/UI Mockup (sơ lược). Phối hợp với team UI/UX để đề xuất giải pháp tối ưu trải nghiệm người dùng. Phân tích quy trình nghiệp vụ hiện tại, đề xuất cải tiến hoặc tái thiết kế quy trình mới (BPMN). Giao tiếp thường xuyên với đội phát triển và kiểm thử để làm rõ yêu cầu và hỗ trợ trong quá trình triển khai. Quản lý thay đổi yêu cầu (Change Request), đảm bảo tài liệu cập nhật liên tục. Tham gia kiểm tra chức năng (UAT), hỗ trợ user test và chuyển giao tài liệu cho các bộ phận. Theo dõi hiệu quả của sản phẩm sau triển khai, đề xuất cải tiến theo feedback người dùng. Yêu cầu ứng viên Tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm BA, ưu tiên trong lĩnh vực Fintech, thanh toán, CRM nội bộ, hệ thống liên kết ngân hàng. Thành thạo kỹ năng viết tài liệu phân tích nghiệp vụ và luồng xử lý. Có kiến thức tốt về quy trình giao dịch thanh toán điện tử, POS, QR Code, hoặc đối soát dòng tiền. Hiểu mô hình dữ liệu, có thể làm việc với các bảng DB cơ bản (SQL là lợi thế). Kỹ năng giao tiếp, tư duy phản biện và trình bày logic tốt. Kỹ năng sử dụng thành thạo AI trong quá trình làm việc. Từng làm việc trong môi trường Agile/Scrum hoặc mô hình phát triển phần mềm thực tế. Ưu tiên Có kinh nghiệm làm BA cho các sản phẩm: ví điện tử, hệ thống đối soát, CRM, báo cáo BI nội bộ... Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ: Draw.io, Figma, Balsamiq, Jira, Confluence, Notion... Có kỹ năng quản lý backlog, product roadmap là một lợi thế. Có khả năng mentor BA junior. Quyền lợi Lương tháng 13, thưởng dự án, thưởng lễ tết,... Được hưởng Bảo hiểm xã hội, Bảo hiểm y tế, Bảo hiểm thất nghiệp theo quy định của Pháp Luật Cơ hội thăng tiến không giới hạn Được làm việc cùng các chuyên gia hàng đầu Việt Nam, chuyên gia nước ngoài trong lĩnh vực Tài chính điện tử, ví điện tử Được làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, trẻ trung và năng động Được tham gia các Câu lạc bộ của Công ty: CLB Bóng đá, các CLB Bi-a, CLB Yoga, CLB Tiếng Anh Chế độ du lịch hàng năm và tham gia các hoạt động teambuilding thường xuyên Công ty tham gia gói bảo hiểm sức khỏe toàn diện cho CBNV, khám sức khỏe định kỳ tối thiểu 1 lần/năm Review lương tối thiểu 1 lần/năm.

Title: Graphic Design Associate (Focus on Illustration) - Shopee
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Visual Design, English
Description: About the job About The Team Responsible for the day-to-day activities associated with Graphic Design. Coordinate with the Design Lead and other members in the Creative team to produce creative, high-quality artwork in a timely manner. Job Description Transform ideas and design requests into clear, creative illustrations and graphic designs. Support managing design projects from ideation to completion, ensuring adherence to timelines and deliverables. Participate in developing and executing a forward-looking design strategy that aligns with our marketing objectives and brand identity. Collaborate seamlessly with cross-functional teams to ensure design assets resonate with our users. Support other tasks or creative requests as assigned by the manager. Requirements Fresh graduates or candidates with less than one year of relevant experience Proficiency in illustration, Adobe Photoshop; knowledge of AI is a plus The ability to do both illustration and visual design is a plus Ability to conceptualize and deliver visually engaging artwork from briefs Strong time management skills and ability to handle multiple projects under tight deadlines Attention to detail and consistency with brand guidelines Previous E-commerce knowledge is preferable A keen sense of exploring new things. Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for the next steps within three weeks.

Title: Quality Assurance Automation Lead
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Automation Test, CI/CD, Selenium, Cypress, Playwright
Description: About the job PropertyGuru is Southeast Asia’s leading PropTech company, and the preferred destination for over 31 million property seekers to connect with over 50,000 agents monthly to find their dream home. PropertyGuru empowers property seekers with more than 2.1 million real estate listings , in-depth insights, and solutions that enable them to make confident property decisions across Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Vietnam. PropertyGuru.com.sg was launched in Singapore in 2007 and since then, PropertyGuru Group has made the property journey a transparent one for property seekers in Southeast Asia. In the last 17 years, PropertyGuru has grown into a high-growth PropTech company with a robust portfolio including leading property marketplaces and award-winning mobile apps across its core markets; mortgage marketplace, PropertyGuru Finance; home services platform, Sendhelper; a host of proprietary enterprise solutions under PropertyGuru For Business, including DataSense, ValueNet, Awards, events and publications across Asia. For more information, please visit: PropertyGuruGroup.com ; PropertyGuru Group on LinkedIn About the Role: We’re evolving our engineering practices to make quality and operational reliability a core part of how our product teams build software . We’re looking for a technical Engineering Lead to drive this transformation, taking ownership of our test automation strategy, CI/CD health, and system observability practices . You’ll work closely with engineering squads to ensure quality is built into the development process from day one and foster a culture of operational excellence and continuous improvement . This is a hands-on technical leadership role where you’ll help stabilize and enhance our test automation frameworks , coach developers on testing and operational best practices, and improve the overall health and reliability of our platform. Key Responsibilities: Lead the strategy and implementation of automated testing frameworks for UI, API, and integration tests. Define and implement testing standards, guidelines, and best practices across engineering squads. Partner with tech leads and developers to integrate automated quality checks into CI/CD pipelines and ensure strong coverage for new and existing features. Act as a technical mentor and coach for engineers and the junior SDET, supporting test automation, incident resolution, and system monitoring. Champion operational excellence initiatives : improve CI/CD pipeline stability, production monitoring, incident handling, and system observability. Track, report, and act on key quality and operational KPIs (test coverage, CI reliability, deployment success rates, defect rates, etc.). Continuously improve deployment and release processes to minimize risk and improve delivery speed. What You Bring: 8+ years of experience in software engineering, test automation, or quality engineering roles. Strong practical experience with automated testing frameworks (Playwright, Cypress, Selenium, or similar) and integrating them into CI/CD pipelines. Proven ability to lead technical initiatives focused on test automation, platform reliability, and engineering process improvement . Solid understanding of observability, monitoring tools, production debugging, and incident management workflows . Experience working in continuous delivery or agile product development environments . Passion for operational excellence , clean engineering processes, and building reliable, scalable systems. Excellent collaboration, technical leadership, and mentoring skills. Bonus: Experience in marketplace, proptech, or consumer-facing product companies . Why Join Us? You’ll play a critical role in shaping how our engineering teams build, test, and ship software — driving better quality, faster delivery, and stronger platform reliability . You’ll have the autonomy to design technical solutions, coach teams, and raise the operational bar across the organization. Our commitment to you: Hybrid flexible working that focuses on outcomes over hours. Holistic rewards package covering your financial, physical & mental health. Multi-directional career development across all levels. Inclusive benefits like equal paternity leave, supporting all employees in work-life balance.

Title: Youtube Growth Analyst
Skills: YouTube, Content Strategy, Data Analysis, Team Management, English
Description: About the job TheSoul Publishing is an award-winning digital studio that produces entertaining, positive, and original content for a global audience: we shoot videos, write articles, make animations, and publish them on social media (Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, etc.). We're a fast-moving, creative and international business: 100+ videos and articles per day in 19 languages, 2 billion+ subscribers worldwide, 40+ projects, including 5-Minute Crafts, Bright Side, 123GO!, Slick Slime Sam, and Avocado Couple, 2,000+ teammates in 70+ countries. Hey there! We're on the lookout for a strategic and creative leader to drive our YouTube content strategies for animated content. If you're passionate about amplifying impact through innovative content distribution, localization, and team leadership—this role is for you! ✨ Key Responsibilities: Develop and implement a comprehensive YouTube strategy for animated content across English and localized channels. Ensure content initiatives align with overall business objectives and key performance indicators (KPIs). Drive the growth and performance of our content portfolio across various markets and audience segments. Conduct ongoing market and competitor analysis to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for optimization. Design and execute experiments on existing channels to validate new formats, distribution tactics, and audience engagement strategies. Effectively communicate insights, learnings, and best practices across teams to elevate content performance company-wide. Lead and manage a team of Lead Development Managers, offering clear guidance, support, and constructive feedback. 🛠️ Requirements: Profound understanding of the YouTube platform, including trends, algorithms, and content strategy. Proven strategic thinking and problem-solving skills. Strong analytical capabilities with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions. Results-oriented mindset with a focus on achieving measurable outcomes. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. At least 1 year of experience in a similar role within a digital media or content-driven environment. Demonstrated success in scaling content strategies and optimizing performance on YouTube. Skilled in creating detailed, actionable performance reports and insights. Proactive approach with a willingness to propose and lead new initiatives and experimentation. Comfortable working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. Experience working with MFK content on YouTube is highly preferred. Experience working with animation content is a strong plus. Intermediate or higher level of English proficiency. 🎁 What We Offer: 💰 Competitive salary (negotiated individually) + performance-based bonuses. 🌍 Remote flexibility — work from anywhere! 📚 Growth and development through access to 800+ internal courses and learning sessions. 🛠️ A tech-savvy, structured, and transparent environment (fewer meetings, more meaningful work!). 🎨 A creative, friendly international team at TheSoul Publishing — where new ideas are always welcome! We appreciate your interest in our job vacancies and the company. Your CV will be reviewed carefully by our team, and if we are ready to move forward with your application, one of our recruiters will contact you and explain the subsequent steps.TheSoul Publishing is an equal opportunity employer and we are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and we do not discriminate based upon race, color, religion, gender, gender identity, national origin, citizenship, age, disability, sexual orientation, marital status, or any other characteristic protected by law. We care for the privacy of our candidates and all the data you provide to us is maintained, protected, and confidential.

Title: CS Workforce Planning & Budget Strategist, Shopee
Skills: Data Analysis, English, Business Analysis, Strategy planning, Stakeholder management
Description: About the job About team: As our CS Workforce Planning & Budget Strategist, you will be pivotal in shaping the future of our Customer Service (CS) and Returns & Refund (RR) operations. You will act as both a strategic forecaster and a performance guardian. By anticipating future needs and monitoring current performance, you will ensure we achieve our goals efficiently and within budget. Your core focus will be on meticulous headcount planning and proactive cost management. Job description: Develop, maintain, and continuously improve headcount and cost models. Integrate upcoming initiatives and business activities into the models to accurately assess their impact on resource requirements and expenses. Regularly communicate with CS and RR leaders to understand how their strategies and actions influence headcount projections and budget adherence. Analyze model outputs to provide data-driven recommendations and structured solutions to optimize workforce planning and cost efficiency. Conduct in-depth analysis and simulations to identify opportunities for operational streamlining and resource optimization. Other tasks assigned. (If any) Job requirement: Skills: Exceptional problem-solving, data analysis, and logical thinking abilities, coupled with strong verbal and written communication skills. Technical Proficiency: Mastery of Excel and proficiency in PowerPoint are essential. Work Ethic & Personal Attributes: A proactive "can-do" attitude, ability to excel under pressure, a strong aptitude for learning, excellent interpersonal skills, independent thinking, and flexibility regarding work location (Shopee or BPO office). Experience: Proven experience in roles involving financial modeling, workforce planning, or related analytical functions.

Title: Sales Manager - Fintech & Banking Solutions (Independent, English fluent)

Description: About the job Our client is a Singaporean technology company to find a talented Sales Manager to join their team in Cau Giay, Hanoi. This is a fantastic chance to work independently, driving sales for specialized IT solutions within the Fintech and Banking sectors. Our client offers cutting-edge solutions like SWIFT, RTGS, and is a trusted distributor of network security solutions. 🔹 Key Responsibilities: ✅ Develop & execute winning sales strategies ✅ Identify & close new business opportunities ✅ Build strong client relationships in banking & fintech ✅ Negotiate & finalize high-value contracts ✅ Achieve and exceed sales targets 🔹 Who We’re Looking For: ✔️ Proven track record of exceeding sales targets ✔️ 5+ years in Financial IT / Banking Solutions sales ✔️ Strong industry network & expertise in Vietnam’s IT market ✔️ Excellent Negotiation & Closing Skills ✔️ Fluent in English & Vietnamese (interviews will be 100% in English) ✔️ Independent, results-driven, and resilient

Title: Kỹ Sư Phần Mềm (N3/N2 Tiếng Nhật)
Skills: Java, Spring, HTML5, CSS3, Japanese
Description: About the job DXC Technology là tập đoàn Công nghệ Thông tin độc lập hàng đầu thế giới, đi đầu trong lĩnh vực cung cấp các giải pháp IT toàn diện cho hơn 6,000 khách hàng toàn cầu tại hơn 70 quốc gia trên toàn thế giới. DXC Việt Nam là chi nhánh thuộc tập đoàn DXC Technology - trong 30 năm hoạt động tại Việt Nam với đội ngũ kỹ sư 1,200 nhân viên năng động, trình độ chuyên môn cao, DXC Việt Nam được xem như một hình ảnh xuất sắc của một trung tâm chất lượng cao cung cấp những giải pháp thế hệ mới cho khách hàng toàn cầu trong các lĩnh vực như Ứng dụng Di động, Trí tuệ nhân tạo, tự động hóa, hiện đại hóa các ứng dụng, tư vấn và triển khai SAP ERP cho các ngành công nghiệp khác nhau như Thương mại, Bảo hiểm, Ngân hàng, Sản xuất, Giáo dục, Chăm sóc Sức khỏe và Khoa học Đời sống… Trách nhiệm chính: Phân tích và chuyển đổi các yêu cầu nghiệp vụ thành các ứng dụng phần mềm chức năng. Tham gia vào toàn bộ vòng đời phát triển phần mềm: thiết kế, phát triển, kiểm thử và triển khai. Thiết kế, xây dựng và bảo trì mã nguồn Java hiệu quả, có khả năng tái sử dụng và dễ bảo trì. Đảm bảo hiệu suất, chất lượng và khả năng phản hồi tối ưu cho các ứng dụng. Phát hiện và xử lý các lỗi, điểm nghẽn trong hệ thống. Duy trì chất lượng mã nguồn thông qua tổ chức hợp lý và áp dụng các quy trình tự động hóa. Nghiên cứu và đề xuất các công nghệ, giải pháp mới nhằm cải tiến hệ thống. Báo cáo công việc hàng ngày cho Quản lý dự án hoặc Trưởng nhóm. Yêu cầu công việc: Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Công nghệ Thông tin hoặc có kinh nghiệm tương đương. Tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm phát triển ứng dụng Java. Thành thạo Core Java, Servlet/JSP, JDBC, SOAP/RESTful, Hibernate, Spring, Spring MVC/Struts/JSF, Web Service, Oracle, MSSQL. Hiểu rõ về lập trình hướng đối tượng (OOP), các mẫu thiết kế phần mềm và kiến trúc hệ thống. Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm với thiết kế web đáp ứng (Responsive Web Design), HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap. Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm với các framework JavaScript như AngularJS, React, BackboneJS hoặc KnockoutJS. Quen thuộc với các framework giao diện Java như Swing, SWT, AWT. Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các máy chủ ứng dụng như Apache Tomcat, JBOSS, IBM WebSphere. Có khả năng viết unit test và sử dụng các nền tảng kiểm thử tự động. Thành thạo công cụ quản lý mã nguồn như Git. Quen thuộc với các công cụ build như Ant, Maven, Gradle. Trình độ tiếng Nhật từ N3 trở lên, có khả năng làm việc nhóm và phối hợp hiệu quả.

Title: Senior Software Engineer, Full-Stack
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: ReactJS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, CI/CD
Description: About the job Company Description About Grab and Our Workplace Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility. Job Description Get to Know the Team As a Front-End Engineer in the Chroma team, you'll be part of Grab's Web Platform group, responsible for building the core infrastructure and modern micro-frontend architecture that powers internal web applications across the company. Your Work Will Span Two Key Areas Platform Engineering: You'll help design and build CI/CD-ready frameworks, frontend infrastructure, and reusable UI components that enable other teams to efficiently develop high-quality web applications. Application Development: You'll also use these platform tools and technologies to develop scalable, user-focused web portals used across Grab. You'll be involved throughout the entire development lifecycle, from architecture and design to deployment and performance optimization, playing a key role in shaping the future of web development at Grab Get to Know the Role As a Front-End Engineer in the Chroma team, you will report to the Engineering Manager and work on multiple internal web portals and UI components that are used across Grab. You will be involved in the entire development lifecycle, from design to deployment, ensuring high-quality code, performance and contribute to the web-kit tool, which is an important enabler for rapid web development at Grab. You will work onsite at Grab office, CMC Creative Space, District 7, HCMC. The Critical Tasks You Will Perform You will develop the front-end of Grab internal portals and reusable UI components built by the Chroma team. You will develop the web-kit tool that is used for building react applications at Grab. You will integrate the Chroma components with multiple internal portals. You will collect and analyze user feedback, identifying areas for improvement and prioritizing feature development accordingly. You will implement best practices for web development, ensuring high-quality code and observing performance, security, and accessibility standards. You will maintain documentation of portal design and features, You will assess new technologies and techniques to enhance the engineering capabilities of the team. You will identify issues, implement fixes, and ensure portal stability and performance. Qualifications What Essential Skills You Will Need At least 4 years of experience working with modern frontend frameworks such as ReactJS (preferred), Ant Design, Micro Frontends, and Webpack. Strong communication skills in English, with the ability to effectively provide updates and resolutions to customers and cross-functional partners. Solid experience in web development, along with a willingness to engage in continuous learning to stay up to date with industry trends and emerging technologies. Familiarity with CI/CD processes and tools, with hands-on experience integrating frontend applications into automated build and deployment pipelines. Comfortable working across the stack, with familiarity in building APIs, implementing Backend-for-Frontend (BFF) layers, and working with databases when needed to support frontend functionality. Experience with a relational database such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or Oracle Experience deploying code in AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud environments Additional Information Life at Grab We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer: We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance. With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations. Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges. Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours What We Stand For At Grab We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Title: Software Engineer (TYPESCRIPT) (copy)
Skills: javascript, nodejs, aws, typescript, angular
Description: About the job Keyloop bridges the gap between dealers, manufacturers, technology suppliers and car buyers. We empower car dealers and manufacturers to fully embrace digital transformation. How? By creating innovative technology that makes selling cars better for our customers, and buying and owning cars better for theirs. We use cutting-edge technology to link our clients’ systems, departments and sites. We provide an open technology platform that’s shaping the industry for the future. We use data to help clients become more efficient, increase profitability and give more customers an amazing experience. Want to be part of it? The Role As a Software Engineer at ATG you are responsible for the delivery of specific packages of development for software applications within and alongside our Agile Product Teams. Working with both internal and third-party Software Engineers, Product Managers, Product Owners, Test Engineers, Scrum Masters, and Product Architects, you will need a rich understanding of development principles appropriate to the team’s technology stack. You are required to work collaboratively within an agile product team taking responsibility for developing high quality code, adopting, and ensuring best practice, while looking for new and improved approaches to technical challenges. The Software Engineer provides feedback from peer reviews and, where appropriate, code reviews to help aid the growth of the whole team. Key Responsibilities Designing and developing enhancements to the platform in line with the business requirements and the overall Product strategy Applying specialist technical knowledge to identify improvements and opportunities for automation Developing code, adhering to ATG and team standards utilising Agile principles Adhering to best practice principles for development, including source control, build, testing, and deployment Working with Senior Software Engineers, Tester Engineers, and Product Architects to provide solution designs which are consistent with the strategies of ATG on both Greenfield and Brownfield projects Providing input for planning and estimating work within the Agile Product Team. Collaborating with Software and Test Engineers to ensure that the test plan and cases are targeted effectively at the critical business and technical areas of a solution. Providing 3rd line support for production software systems Working independently, managing day to day workload and priorities, and taking accountability for direction and output. Mentoring new members of the team, sharing technical knowledge, and providing guidance and support Contributing to a team environment that rewards collaboration, sharing of knowledge and excellent relationship building. Communicating effectively with all roles within the Agile Product Team, including complex information and concepts to both technical and non-technical colleagues Taking ownership of ensuring applications run efficiently, providing a balance between user experience and cost. Driving own technical and career development, creating appropriate goals, and seeking learning opportunities within the company and the wider software engineering community Actively contributing to build a culture of support, creativity and learning within your Agile Product Team and the wider Engineering department. Being responsible for information security and data protection, and supporting the business in complying with any legal obligations imposed upon it through positive actions Person Specification (Essential Skills, Knowledge and Experience Required): Technical Competencies: Possess a high level of technical literacy Object Orientated Programming (OOP) Awareness of Amazon Web Services (AWS) EC2, RDS, S3 Memcached/Redis (ElastiCache) CloudFront CDN Cloudformation Serverless (Lambda, API Gateway) DynamoDB AWS CDK Relevant Language(s) Typescript JavaScript NodeJS Python Data Formats JSON XML YAML Relevant Frameworks Angular2 Vue.js Relevant Databases DynamoDb MySQL Version Control: GIT Docker (Incl. Docker Compose) API Principles Service Oriented Architecture Living Documentation Documentation first approach (OpenAPI 3.0) Authentication patterns (JWT / Bearer Auth / OAuth) Protocols (SOAP / REST / HATEOS / GraphQL) Continuous Integration / Delivery Code Quality Tools (SonarQube, CodeClimate) Testing frameworks (Codeception, Cyrpress, PyUnit, Rspec, Jest) Unit Testing Functional Testing Acceptance Testing TDD CI Tools (TeamCity, Jenkins, CodePipeline, CodeBuild, Azure DevOps ) Tools IDE (Proficient) Standards/Principles Adherence: Coding Standards Networking - HTTP/HTTPS Misc Microsoft Office Jira Confluence Web conferencing (Zoom / Microsoft Teams / Google Meet) Behavioural & Personality Competencies: Good interpersonal skills Effective communication skills Engineering mindset Organized & self-sufficient Proactive with taking ownership & responsibility Logical, methodical approach to problem and issue solving Collaborative Innovative Development Opportunities: Senior Software Engineer Principle Software Engineer Lead Software Engineer Product Architect Cloud Engineer Why join us? We’re on a journey to become market leaders in our space – and with that comes some incredible opportunities. Collaborate and learn from industry experts from all over the globe. Work with game-changing products and services. Get the training and support you need to try new things, adapt to quick changes and explore different paths. Join Keyloop and progress your career, your way. An inclusive environment to thrive We’re committed to fostering an inclusive work environment. One that respects all dimensions of diversity. We promote an inclusive culture within our business, and we celebrate different employees and lifestyles – not just on key days, but every day. Be rewarded for your efforts We believe people should be paid based on their performance so our pay and benefits reflect this and are designed to attract the very best talent. We encourage everyone in our organisation to explore opportunities which enable them to grow their career through investment in their development but equally by working in a culture which fosters support and unbridled collaboration. Keyloop doesn’t require academic qualifications for this position. We select based on experience and potential, not credentials. We are also an equal opportunity employer committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. We value diversity and encourage candidates of all backgrounds to apply .

Title: Fresher Comtor

Description: About the job MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC Biên – phiên dịch trong các dự án phát triển phần mềm, đảm bảo truyền đạt chính xác và kịp thời thông tin giữa khách hàng Nhật Bản và đội ngũ phát triển. Dịch các tài liệu dự án, email, Q&A, tin nhắn trao đổi từ tiếng Nhật sang tiếng Việt và ngược lại. Hỗ trợ giao tiếp trong các buổi họp dự án (online/offline), đóng vai trò cầu nối ngôn ngữ và văn hóa giữa hai bên. Hỗ trợ giao tiếp và kết nối giữa team phát triển và khách hàng Nhật. YÊU CẦU Trình độ tiếng Nhật: JLPT N2 trở lên. Kỹ Năng & Thái Độ Khả năng diễn đạt, giao tiếp rõ ràng, mạch lạc. Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ văn phòng như MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint. Khả năng research tốt, làm việc nhóm hiệu quả. Cẩn thận, trách nhiệm, làm việc tập trung. Chủ động, cầu tiến, sẵn sàng tiếp nhận các nội dung công việc mới. Lợi Thế Nếu Bạn Có Đã học/tìm hiểu trước để nắm được về quy trình dự án phần mềm. Kinh nghiệm du học hoặc làm việc tại Nhật Bản. Chứng chỉ BJT hoặc khả năng giao tiếp tiếng Anh. ĐÃI NGỘ Tối thiểu 13 tháng lương 1 năm - chưa tính các khoản thưởng khác trong quá trình làm việc như thưởng theo KPI hiệu quả công việc, thưởng dự án và thưởng theo doanh thu. Được khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm và được đóng BHXH, BHYT, BHTN đầy đủ theo luật quy định Hưởng chế độ nghỉ mát, teambuilding 4 lần/ 1 năm, và các hoạt động thể thao, giải trí phong phú bao gồm: các CLB Bơi, Yoga, Zumba, Kendo, yêu cầu bài hát qua radio nội bộ. 02 nhân viên xuất sắc nhất năm sẽ được thưởng một chuyến du lịch miễn phí đến các quốc gia như Nhật Bản, Đài Loan, Singapore..v.v. Cơ hội thăng tiến, nâng cao thu nhập cho người có năng lực, tâm huyết và gắn bó lâu dài. Được đào tạo tiếng Nhật miễn phí tại công ty. Cơ hội được đào tạo để nâng cao nghiệp vụ chuyên môn. Cơ hội hỗ trợ thi các chứng chỉ về Cloud, AWS, PMF, PMP. Giờ làm việc: từ 8h30 đến 17h30, từ thứ Hai đến thứ Sáu hàng tuần. Ngày hết hạn: 31 tháng 7, 2025 Chi tiết công việc Số Lượng 1 Địa Điểm Hà Nội Kinh Nghiệm 6 tháng Trình Độ Fresher Hình Thức Toàn thời gian Kỹ Năng Comtor

Title: Bilingual Tutor
Skills: AI, English, Vietnamese, Technical Writing, NLP
Description: About the job DataAnnotation is committed to creating quality AI. Join our team to help train AI chatbots while gaining the flexibility of remote work and choosing your own schedule. We are looking for a bilingual professional to join our team and teach AI chatbots. You will have conversations in both Vietnamese and English with chatbots in order to measure their progress, as well as write novel conversations in order to teach them what to say. Benefits: This is a full-time or part-time REMOTE position You’ll be able to choose which projects you want to work on You can work on your own schedule Projects are paid hourly, starting at $20+ USD per hour, with bonuses for high-quality and high-volume work Responsibilities (both in Vietnamese and English): Come up with diverse conversations over a range of topics Write high-quality answers when given specific prompts Compare the performance of different AI models Research and fact-check AI responses Qualifications: Fluent in Vietnamese + English A bachelor's degree (completed or in progress) Excellent writing and grammar skills Strong research and fact-checking skills to ensure accuracy and originality Note: Payment is made via PayPal. We will never ask for any money from you. PayPal will handle any currency conversions from USD. #vietnamese

Title: DevOps Engineer (Cloud)
Salary: 13, 14 salary months + Project bonus + Extra package: 16 Mil /employee/year

Title: Software Engineer II (Front End)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: ReactJS, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, API
Description: About the job About Us Wati is the world's leading WhatsApp-first conversational growth platform, empowering businesses to build deeper customer relationships and accelerate revenue growth. Trusted and loved by over 14,000 customers across 100+ countries, Wati has established itself as the premier choice for businesses leveraging WhatsApp and other messaging channels to connect with customers on their platform of choice. In a world where real-time interactions drive growth, Wati's story is all about business growth through conversations. At Wati, we believe that every conversation matters, whether it's engaging a first-time prospect, nurturing a qualified lead, or deepening relationships with loyal clients. We transform these conversations into opportunities for building relationships, and strong relationships lead to increased revenue. Our Platform The AI-native platform simplifies complex business operations by bringing all customer interactions under one intelligent roof. Designed for scalability and ease of use, our solution delivers a measurable ROI while adapting to businesses of all sizes, from emerging startups to established enterprises. Our Backing & Partnerships Wati is proudly backed by world-class investors including Tiger Global, Sequoia Capital, DST Global, and Shopify. As a Premium-tier Partner of Meta, Google, and WhatsApp, we maintain the highest standards of integration and platform excellence. As Wati continues to scale rapidly, we're looking for a Software Engineer II (Front End) to work closely with Development, QA, DevOps, Support and Product. You are a leader that will participate in senior technology strategy discussions, drive ideation across a distributed software team, develop implementation roadmaps and work with technical individuals to transform this into software products and solutions. What you'll do: Develop, test, and maintain web applications using React, with a focus on creating clean, efficient, and reusable code Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including design, product, and QA, to deliver a seamless and engaging user experience Participate in the entire software development lifecycle, including planning, development, testing, and deployment Implement front-end solutions that integrate with backend APIs and services in a secure and scalable manner Optimize applications for performance, scalability, and accessibility Participate in code reviews, contribute to technical discussions, and uphold high standards of code quality Troubleshoot and resolve front-end issues, ensuring the best possible user experience Requirements Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field, or equivalent practical experience 3+ years of hands-on experience with React development Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and front-end development principles Familiarity with state management libraries (e.g., Redux or Context API) Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) Understanding of RESTful APIs and integrating front-end code with back-end services What will make you stand out: Experience developing or contributing to SaaS applications Familiarity with component libraries and design systems to build consistent user interfaces Understanding of cloud platforms and module federation is a big plus

Title: Blockchain Lead
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: blockchain, cryptography, java, rust, golang
Description: About the job Job description: Role Summary: As the Blockchain Lead , you will guide the design, development, and evolution of the core blockchain protocol. You will lead a team of protocol engineers, drive architectural decisions, and collaborate closely with stakeholders to align the protocol’s direction with business goals. Your leadership will be pivotal in scaling our infrastructure for enterprise-grade applications and ensuring compliance with the highest security standards. Key Responsibilities: Lead the technical design and evolution of the blockchain protocol, ensuring scalability, performance, and privacy Manage and mentor a team of protocol engineers, fostering a culture of innovation and excellence Conduct deep analysis of blockchain networks and contribute strategic insights to improve the protocol stack Spearhead the development of privacy-preserving features using zero-knowledge proofs, state channels, and advanced cryptographic techniques Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Product, Security, Compliance) to ensure alignment on protocol requirements Oversee code reviews, security audits, and performance benchmarking Contribute to open-source projects and represent Partior in technical forums and consortia Maintain documentation and ensure best practices in version control, testing, and CI/CD pipelines Required Skills: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field 7+ years of experience in software development, with at least 2 years in a technical leadership role Strong background in blockchain Solid understanding of core blockchain components including consensus, P2P, networking, and state management Expertise in cryptography, including digital signatures, encryption, and key management Knowledge of Merkle Trees, zero-knowledge proofs, and group signatures Proficient in back-end development with Go, Rust, or Java Experience in architecting distributed systems at scale Preferred Qualifications: Hands-on experience developing and deploying EVM smart contracts Knowledge of consensus algorithms (Raft, Paxos, QBFT) and P2P protocols (gossiping, DHTs, NAT traversal) Experience leading Agile teams and managing project delivery Familiarity with Node.js, Typescript, and JavaScript Prior contributions to blockchain-related open-source projects in the Ethereum ecosystem What Can We Offer You? Competitive salary 13th-month salary guarantee Performance bonus Professional English courses for employees Premium health insurance Note: Due to the high volume of applications we receive, we are unable to respond to every candidate individually. If you have not received a response from GFT regarding your application within 10 workdays, please consider that we have decided to proceed with other candidates. We truly appreciate your interest in GFT and thank you for your understanding.
