Title: Project Manager
Skills: Agile, Scrum, Project Management, English, Stakeholder management
Description: About the job Project Manager 【Core Responsibilities】 1. Manage overall defect inflow/outflow, identify defect severity and impact to the user, create clear targets, track development and testing progress and lead/guide the team members with the best and clear directions 2. Manage overall change requests, lead the requirement analysis, technical proposal creation, presentation to the client, create clear targets, track the development and testing progress 3. Manage overall software release cadence and internal release preparation, communicate with 3rd party external teams and teams on the client's side, create clear targets and track the progress 4. Drive weekly/daily meetings with the client's core team, take meeting minutes and close loops of remaining actions items 5. Lead the quarterly performance review and presentation slides preparation for the management teams at the client's side 6. Manage the project account balance sheet, control the cost and labor hours, achieve project revenue margin goals, report monthly revenue and other internal financial/operational control metrics required by the PMO team 7. Log labor hours of the team members into the internal system 8. Review and approve team members' time-off requests, supplemental clock-in/out request, business travel requests, expense reimbursement requests, etc. 9. Open and close the project and follow all internal processes 【Required Qualifications】 1. In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience in agile software development and scrum, preferrably with more than 4 years of exprience as the primary project manager in agile/scrum software development projects 2. In-depth understanding and knowledge of automotive software quality assurance and quality control, preferrably with proven success of software quality improvement operations and data analytical activities 3. In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience of MS Powerpoint, Excel, Word, Outlook and proven success in public speech and presentation slides creation 4. In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience of cost-down operations and financial management 5. Absolutely fluent in English, preferrably with college or post-graduate technical/engineering education degrees awarded in countries where English is a native language 6. A natural leader, problem solver and team player with a strong sense of priority, risk and key client's concerns 7. Outstanding interpersonal skills, be able to seamlessly communicate with all internal and external stake holders 8. Great understanding and knowledge of "V" development model in automotive embedded software development 9. Familiar with overall automotive EE infrastructure, in-cabin infotainment system architecture and Android/Linux software design, development and testing basics 10. Ability to think out-of-the-box and make tough decisions in an ambiguous situation

Title: [HN/ HCM] Fresher/ Junior AI Engineer
Skills: AI, Python, Azure, NLP, OCR
Description: About the job Location: Hanoi/ Hochiminh City HN Office: 174 Thai Ha, Ward Dong Da, Hanoi HCM Office: 18E Cong Hoa, Ward Tan Son Nhat, HCM ---------------------------- About us Established in 2012 and headquartered in Tokyo, Cinnamon AI is a global enterprise specializing in intelligent document processing technology. Our cutting-edge solutions automate the extraction of knowledge from unstructured documents, primarily serving Insurance, Manufacturing & Logistic industries . We are fundamentally reshaping the way businesses operate, offering unprecedented efficiency and performance improvements. To date, we have effectively implemented our solutions for over 100 clients , securing an annual total contract value of around USD 10 million . Our reputation is growing steadily, as demonstrated by our selection as one of the ' Global 100 Most Potential AI Startups ' by CB Insights in 2021, and made it to the list of 'Top 100 AI Fintech Companies ' in the 2023 & 2024 report by FinTech Global and Investor Networks. Position Description We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented AI Engineer to join our AI Document Reader team. You will work on maintaining and enhancing our production-grade AI systems that extract and interpret information from unstructured documents such as PDFs, scanned images, and forms. Our platform leverages a combination of custom AI models, external LLM APIs (e.g., OpenAI), and Azure Document Intelligence (AzureDI), all deployed within a scalable microservices architecture. This role offers hands-on experience with real-world AI systems, cloud services, and continuous learning in a fast-paced environment. Responsibilities and Performance Objectives Maintain and monitor AI microservices for document parsing, OCR, and semantic extraction Integrate and optimize custom models and external APIs (OpenAI, AzureDI) for document understanding tasks Troubleshoot production issues and ensure high availability of AI services Assist in updating models, refining prompts, and deploying new features with minimal downtime Collaborate with DevOps and engineering teams to ensure system scalability and reliability Support logging, alerting, and performance tracking across AI components Contribute to documentation, testing, and internal best practices Stay updated on emerging trends in document AI, LLMs, and cloud-based AI services Skills and Experience Required Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, AI, Data Science, or related field Proficiency in Python and familiarity with ML frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow) Exposure to cloud platforms (especially Azure) and containerization tools (e.g., Docker) Basic knowledge of NLP, OCR, and LLMs through coursework or projects Strong debugging, problem-solving, and communication skills Plus : Understanding of RESTful APIs and microservices architecture Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and monitoring tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana) Knowledge of FastAPI, Flask, or similar frameworks for service deployment Experience working with OpenAI APIs or Azure Document Intelligence Academic or personal projects involving document AI or production ML systems Interest in MLOps and scalable AI infrastructure What we will return A high-tech spaceship with a laptop provided. GPU and AWS all are ready for model training. A hybrid work schedule: 02 remote working days per week. A wide range of internal community events to promote connections, collaboration, and a healthy work-life balance, including Happy Monday, Company Trip, and 10++ Health Clubs. Talent development and innovation encouragement through our internal programs. A great opportunity to access and acquire top expert knowledge and experiences internally and externally. A competitive salary range, private healthcare insurance, annual health check. Our Cinnamon Values #Collaboration with Humanity: We prioritize “The happiness of interacting with people” throughout the entire organization, going beyond ‘Transactional Interaction’ and strive for the ultimate comfort in collaboration with others. This makes our workplace become the driving force towards achieving high goals. #Impact at Scale : By keeping technical scalability at core of our innovation, we do not stop at “Making things slightly better”. We aim to “Create huge impacts” by transforming large companies’ operations with versatile and scalable technology. #Ultimate Value for Partners: By understanding partners’ unique needs, complex challenges, and ambitious vision, we go beyond fulfilling contractual obligations to exceed expectations, co-creating solutions that deliver true sustainable value for their long-term growth. **For more information Website: https://cinnamon.ai/ Facebook Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/cinnamonai/

Title: Site Reliability Engineer
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Kubernetes, AWS, Linux, English, Terraform
Description: About the job Global Fashion Group is the leading fashion and lifestyle destination in growth markets across LATAM, SEA and ANZ. From our people to our customers and partners, we exist to empower everyone to express their true selves through fashion. Our three e-commerce platforms: Dafiti, ZALORA and THE ICONIC connect an assortment of international, local and own brands to over 800 million consumers from diverse cultures and lifestyles. GFG’s platforms provide seamless and inspiring customer experiences from discovery to delivery, powered by art & science that is infused with unparalleled local knowledge. As part of the Group’s vision is to be the #1 online destination for fashion & lifestyle in growth markets, we are committed to doing this responsibly by being people and planet positive across everything we do. THE TEAM At GFG, Technology is core to long-term success and is a crucial enabler of a great Customer Experience. We are a mix of experts in fashion, logistics, data analytics, marketing, and design, guided by business consultants and tech geniuses – everyone contributes to the success of GFG. In this role as DevOps Engineer/Site Reliability Engineer you will work on our cutting edge infrastructure. You will be exposed to a polyglot architecture, modern development workflows and a forward-thinking, intelligent team dedicated to solving the big-picture problems in e-commerce. ABOUT THE ROLE You will be a part of a lean team, working alongside our software engineers and product managers to build a reliable and highly scalable infrastructure. We have built most of our systems on open source technology. Our stack features with multiple AWS EKS cluster, AWS OpenSearch, multiple type of Ingress Kong, ALB Ingress, Nginx Ingress, RDS Aurora, Datadog, Prometheus, Grafana, Dynamic Scaling Strategy from Horizontal Pods AutoScale, Vertical Pods AutoScale, Cluster Autoscale to KEDA and more all in production. We believe in choosing the best tool for the job, and part of your responsibility will be to identify the tools to help us grow at GFG. WHAT WILL YOU DO Improve and maintain our kubernetes clusters Designing and implementing infrastructure components from proof-of-concept to production Identify opportunities to improve the overall platform and monitoring Troubleshoot issues in production environment Share your knowledge with other members in the team WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR You have hands-on knowledge of the k8s eco-system You have expert knowledge on AWS (we are fully on AWS) Good Linux background Excellent written and verbal English language skills Ability to make independent decisions and take ownership Passion in developing infrastructure-as-code and automated testing You want to automate everything Big plus if you have worked with Terraform before WHAT WE OFFER YOU The unique opportunity to have a serious impact on a growing organisation A dynamic working environment shaping the face of fashion e-commerce in growth markets Work closely with a global talent pool with international mindset #1 IT company to work for in Vietnam in 2021 Best practice scaled agile engineering Amazing office and great culture! Massage chairs, table tennis, video game room, quarterly team events, yearly company trip, end of the year party Hybrid working environment and work from home set up allowance Clear career progression plan and support English classes Macbook or laptop when you start Social insurance, medical insurance & health insurance 13th month salary 15 days of annual leave, 30 days of sick leave/mental health, 1 day of occasion leave Support for Gym membership Apply today and join GFG in this exciting role shaping the face of fashion e-commerce! Global Fashion Group embraces diversity and equality of opportunity. We are committed to building an inclusive and diverse team representing all backgrounds, with as wide a range of perspectives as possible, and harnessing industry-leading skills. We believe that the more inclusive we are, the better our work will be. We welcome and consider applications to join our team from all qualified candidates, regardless of their characteristics. We comply with all applicable laws and regulations on non-discrimination in employment (and recruitment), as well as work authorization and employment eligibility verification requirements.

Title: Scrum Master
Skills: Agile, Scrum, Leadership, Project Management, English
Description: About the job ABOUT THE JOB Act as a Scrum Master for multiple teams, facilitating all Scrum ceremonies (Daily Standups, Sprint Planning, Reviews, Retrospectives, etc.) Guide and coach teams on Agile principles and best practices to ensure high performance and continuous improvement Collaborate closely with Product Owners, Development Teams, and other stakeholders to deliver high-value increments Identify and eliminate obstacles to the team's progress Ensure teams maintain focus on delivering value and meeting sprint goals Promote a culture of trust, ownership, and collaboration Mentor junior Scrum Masters and contribute to scaling Agile across the organization Track and report team metrics to support continuous improvement Facilitate communication and alignment across technical and non-technical teams ABOUT YOU Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related discipline. At least 3 years of professional experience in a Scrum Master role. Experience in Agile and Scrum frameworks & familiarity with Agile methodologies Certification as a Certified Scrum Practitioner (CSP) or Certified Scrum Coach (CSC) is advantageous. Capacity to mentor various roles within a Scrum team and build constructive relationships across the organization. A strong leader with excellent communication skills, problem-solving abilities, and an assertive, energetic mindset that fosters team cohesion and supports Agile principles while building trust in a collaborative environment. Experience as part of an Agile Delivery Team is a plus WHY AMARIS? Competitive salary and 13th-month salary 14+ annual leaves per year Premium healthcare insurance, starting from your probation period Project reviews and yearly performance appraisals Annual company trips Teambuilding activities: Team lunch/dinner, events, and celebrations, sports clubs (football, yoga, badminton, etc.) International team with flexible working time + hybrid working Tailor-made career path Technical workshops and training courses Mobility: Opportunities to be on-site abroad in our offices in over 60+ countries Equal Opportunity Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.

Description: About the job Mô tả công việc Bạn sẽ làm việc với các dữ liệu (văn bản, video) Tiếng Nhật gồm nhiều chủ đề khác nhau. Bạn sẽ đánh giá và gán nhãn mức độ liên quan giữa các dữ liệu (văn bản, video) và các tiêu đề quảng cáo. Dựa vào yêu cầu và hướng dẫn của dự án, bạn sẽ chấm điểm tổng về mức độ liên quan của các từ khóa và dữ liệu được cung cấp trên các công cụ và phần mềm theo yêu cầu. Trình độ Tiếng Nhật tốt tương đương level N2 - N1 (không yêu cầu chứng chỉ) và tiếng Anh đọc hiểu cơ bản. Nhanh nhẹn, có trách nhiệm và tỉ mỉ trong công việc. Tinh thần cam kết với mục tiêu và tiến độ của dự án. Kỹ năng giao tiếp và làm việc nhóm. Duy trì tính bảo mật và tuân thủ các quy tắc và hướng dẫn về quyền riêng tư dữ liệu. Quyền lợi Mức thu nhập hấp dẫn từ 19.000.000 – 21.000.000 VND/tháng. T rong đó, lương cơ bản chiếm 90% thu nhập, lương hiệu suất chiếm 10% thu nhập. Phụ cấp đi lại: 1.000.000 VND/tháng. 2 tháng thử việc nhận 100% lương cơ bản, lương hiệu suất đánh giá theo kết quả. 12 ngày phép năm. Tham gia công đoàn. Khám sức khỏe định kỳ. Đóng BHXH toàn bộ lương cơ bản. Môi trường trẻ trung, năng động, nhiệt tình, trang phục thoải mái. Lương các ngày cuối tuần, các ngày Lễ, Tết được trả theo đúng quy định Pháp luật. Tham gia các hoạt động ngày lễ, Tết của công ty. Được trau dồi khả năng ngoại ngữ trong công việc. Địa điểm làm việc Hà Nội: Tòa nhà Việt Á, Số 9 Duy Tân, Dịch Vọng Hậu, Cầu Giấy Thời gian làm việc Thứ 2 - Thứ 6 (từ 08:00 đến 17:00)

Title: Senior Data Analyst/ BI Analyst (Power BI, SQL)
Skills: Power BI, SQL, Excel, Data Analysis, English
Description: About the job OPSWAT is seeking a Power BI-focused analyst to support the Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A) team in transforming financial data into actionable insights. The role centers on developing and maintaining advanced Power BI dashboards and reports that enable strategic, data-informed decision-making. Based in Vietnam and reporting to the FP&A Manager , this position works closely with global teams, including those in San Francisco and Tampa . The ideal candidate demonstrates strong attention to detail, experience with business analytics, and the ability to manage large datasets within a fast-paced, high-growth environment . With OPSWAT’s rapid growth in the cybersecurity industry , this is an exciting opportunity to make a direct impact through data . What You Will Be Doing Design and maintain advanced Power BI dashboards to visualize key financial and operational metrics. Build automated reporting tools and financial models in Power BI and Excel to support strategic analysis. Identify opportunities to optimize FP&A processes through data automation and scalable analytics solutions. Translate large and complex datasets into clear, actionable insights that support financial and business strategy. Collaborate with teams across Finance, Sales, Marketing, and Commercial Operations to deliver a holistic performance view . Develop and monitor KPIs that align with business priorities and financial objectives . Contribute to monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reviews by delivering accurate, data-driven insights to stakeholders What We Need from You At least 5 years of working experience 3–7 years of hands-on experience with BI and analytics tools , especially Power BI (plus SQL, Python, and Excel). Experience in a dynamic, data-driven environment. Proven ability to build financial models and insightful dashboards using Power BI and Excel . Strong analytical mindset—skilled at transforming complex datasets into clear, business-ready insights . Strong English proficiency It Would Be Nice if You Had Minimum 1 years of experience in FP&A or financial analytics , preferably Experience using CRM platforms (preferably Salesforce). Previous experience as an Analyst supporting Revenue Operations or FP&A . Advanced MS Excel abilities , including financial modeling and automation. Experience in Salesforce (SFDC) Reporting and Dashboards . Strong MS PowerPoint skills to visualize financial insights with charts and graphs. A growth mindset—open to coaching and development to enhance your skills and career. Why you'll love working here Meaningful work with passionate colleagues International working environment in Global leading Cybersecurity Product company Attractive compensation, regular assessments, and salary reviews 13-month bonus & performance bonus 100% salary, full insurances on probationary period Extra-health care program (PVI) for employee and family members 15 to 20+ paid day off per year Recognition best employees awards quarterly, yearly and special President Club award every year Stock options for employees Attractive benefits for team activities (team building, team outing, sport, trade union activities) Nice open office on the top of a building in District 3 with full of accessories for active recreation, sport, fruits, coffee, and tea. About OPSWAT OPSWAT, a global leader in IT, OT, and ICS critical infrastructure cybersecurity, delivers an end-to-end platform that gives public and private sector organizations and enterprises the critical advantage needed to protect their complex networks, secure their devices, and ensure compliance. Over the last 20 years our commitment to innovative technology has earned the trust of more than 1,700 organizations, governments, and institutions globally, solidifying our role in protecting the world’s critical infrastructure and securing our way of life.

Description: About the job Looking for a freelance opportunity where you can make an impact on technology from the comfort of your home? If you are dynamic and always online to learn more, this part-time flexible project is the perfect fit for you! A Day in the Life of an Internet Domain Assessor: In this role, you’ll be analyzing and providing feedback on texts, pages, websites, domains, and other types of information, using an online tool through reviewing and rating domain pages quality, you’ll be helping to improve the overall user experience for millions of search engine users, including yourself. Join our team today and start putting your skills to work for one of the world's leading search engines. The estimated hourly earnings for this role are $7.25. Payment is based on completed tasks, with the potential for higher earnings based on productivity. TELUS Digital AI Community Our global AI Community is a vibrant network of 1 million+ contributors from diverse backgrounds who help our customers collect, enhance, train, translate, and localize content to build better AI models. Become part of our growing community and make an impact supporting the machine learning models of some of the world’s largest brands. Qualification path No previous professional experience is required to apply to this role, however, working on this project will require you to pass the basic requirements and go through a standard assessment process. This is a new part-time project and your work will be subject to our standard quality assurance checks during the term of this agreement. Basic Requirements Working as a freelancer with excellent communication skills in Chinese Simplified and English Being a resident in Vietnam for the last 3 consecutive years and having familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media, and cultural affairs in Vietnam High School Diploma or GED Qualification Active use of Gmail, Google+, and other forms of social media and experience in the use of web browsers to navigate and interact with a variety of content Daily access to a broadband internet connection, a smartphone (Android 5.0, iOS 14 or higher), and a personal computer to work on. Assessment In order to be hired into the program, you’ll take a language assessment and an open book qualification exam that will determine your suitability for the position and complete ID verification. Don’t worry, our team will provide you with guidelines and learning materials before your exam. You will be required to complete the exam in a specific timeframe but at your convenience! What’s next? If this sounds like a role you’d be interested in taking on, please apply below. https://www.telusinternational.ai/cmp/contributor/jobs/available/127102?utm_source=Linkedin&utm_medium=Ads&utm_campaign=SHTArianne_APAC_Paid+Site_Linkedin_Ads_127102 Once you’ve completed your application through the link, kindly notify us by emailing tip_ai_crowdsourcing_apac@telusinternational.com so we can assist in tracking the progress of your application.

Title: Safety Labelling Quality Assurance
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: Quality Assurance, English, Data Analysis, Content Moderation, Team Management
Description: About the job Responsibilities About Team Our Safety Labeling Operations team supports our efforts to address objectionable or disturbing content which could include images of violence, animal cruelty, hate speech, violent extremism, or content that exploits or endangers children. The team plays a vital role in performing audits and identifying errors, and swiftly addressing them in time to ensure excellence in our moderation efforts. Content that Safety Labelling Quality Assurance interacts with includes images, video, and text related to every-day life, but it can also include (but is not limited to) bullying; hate speech; child safety; depictions of harm to self and others, and harm to animals What will I be doing? 1. Perform daily audit on internal system; 2. Provide analysis of errors and feedback to respective team; 3. Work with training team to align policy understanding of QA and labelers; 4. Provide support on Policy/Quality related questions on ad-hoc basis; 5. Responsible in guiding new joiners in order to achieve ramp up target; 6. Work closely with Safety Specialist in order to provide feedback on quality; 7. Identify potential errors in policy and correct them in time; 8. Conduct quality meeting with the team to analyze errors; 9. Please note that this position involves exposure to sensitive content, including but not limited to vulgar content, violence, pornography, and fake news. Qualifications Minimum Qualifications: 1. Bachelor's Degree or equivalent education/experience, advanced degree is preferred; 2. Minimum 1 year working experience as Quality Assurance Analyst; 3. Possesses good interpersonal skills; Good English is a must. 4. Strong attention to details and ability to work independently; 5. Experience in Content Moderation/Content Quality/Content Safety/Labeling will be an added advantage; About TikTok TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and we also have offices in New York City, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. Why Join Us Inspiring creativity is at the core of TikTok's mission. Our innovative product is built to help people authentically express themselves, discover and connect – and our global, diverse teams make that possible. Together, we create value for our communities, inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we work towards every day. We strive to do great things with great people. We lead with curiosity, humility, and a desire to make impact in a rapidly growing tech company. Every challenge is an opportunity to learn and innovate as one team. We're resilient and embrace challenges as they come. By constantly iterating and fostering an "Always Day 1" mindset, we achieve meaningful breakthroughs for ourselves, our company, and our users. When we create and grow together, the possibilities are limitless. Join us. Diversity & Inclusion TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too. Trust & Safety TikTok recognises that keeping our platform safe for the TikTok communities is no ordinary job which can be both rewarding and psychologically demanding and emotionally taxing for some. This is why we are sharing the potential hazards, risks and implications in this unique line of work from the start, so our candidates are well informed before joining. We are committed to the wellbeing of all our employees and promise to provide comprehensive and evidence-based programs, to promote and support physical and mental wellbeing throughout each employee's journey with us. We believe that wellbeing is a relationship and that everyone has a part to play, so we work in collaboration and consultation with our employees and across our functions in order to ensure a truly person-centred, innovative and integrated approach.

Title: Business Consultant (Junior Management Consulting)
Skills: CRM, Business Analysis, Product Management, Salesforce, English
Description: About the job Business Consultant – Tư vấn Quản Trị Doanh Nghiệp Base.vn Base.vn - Nền tảng Quản Trị Doanh Nghiệp SaaS tiên phong giúp doanh nghiệp vận hành hiệu quả đang tìm kiếm Business Consultant (BC) những anh em Tư vấn chuyên sâu, thực chiến và muốn gắn bó với nghề Sales, Consulting B2B một cách chuyên nghiệp. Vai trò Business Consultant bạn sẽ làm gì? - Tư vấn và bán các sản phẩm phần mềm quản trị Base (cả 5 trục giải pháp HRM+, Infor+, Work+, Finance+, CRM+) cho doanh nghiệp SMEs tại Việt Nam - Gặp gỡ khách hàng, tìm hiểu nhu cầu vận hành – từ đó đưa ra giải pháp phù hợp và chiến lược triển khai thực tế (Từ gọi điện, email, meeting, demo, pitching,…) - Làm việc với đội ngũ leaders thực chiến, học từ kinh nghiệm thực chiến với bài toán doanh nghiệp hàng ngày từ chính khách hàng của mình. - Học cũng là nhiệm vụ: Từ chủ động khám phá, học hỏi đến việc tham gia học tập trong những chương trình đào tạo chuyên sâu cho Sales B2B (dành riêng cho từng level Fresher - Senior), nâng cấp tư duy tư vấn bán hàng thực chiến. => KPI: Doanh thu hàng tháng (Min 50M/Tháng với level 1 - Starter). Chân dung của Business Consultant: - Từng làm Sales, Tư vấn ít nhất 1 năm, có kết quả chứng minh được năng lực làm sales (đo lường được bằng số liệu thực tế: doanh thu, khách hàng, tỉ lệ chốt,...) - Mong muốn phát triển sự nghiệp trong ngành B2B Sales, nơi bạn không chỉ bán hàng, mà còn tư vấn giải pháp có tính phức tạp cao về hàm lượng tri thức, chuyên môn cho đối tượng khách hàng doanh nghiệp. - Thích công nghệ, quan tâm đến các công nghệ, giải pháp phần mềm, apps hỗ trợ tối ưu trong công việc lẫn đời sống. - Là người tham vọng, thích mạo hiểm, thích cảm giác hoàn thành được những mục tiêu lớn mà hầu hết mọi người đều bỏ cuộc. Thu nhập & Quyền lợi: 1. Thu nhập & Quyền lợi chung: - Thu nhập = Lương cứng (8M - 10M) + Commission (4% - 12%: Nguồn Inbound; 8% - 19%: Nguồn outbound) + Thưởng KPI (Theo tháng) + Phụ cấp. - Lộ trình phát triển/ thăng tiến rõ ràng, review performance định kỳ 3 tháng/lần, Level up 6 tháng/ 1 lần. (Vị trí này có 9 level chuyên môn, bạn được chủ động đề xuất level up nếu performance đạt được next level liên tục trong 3 tháng) - Company Trip, Lương tháng 13, Sinh nhật, Happy Hour, Lễ, 8/3, 20/10, Thưởng, Bảo hiểm, Phụ cấp,... theo Luật Lao Động và chính sách Công ty. 2. Vì sao nên chọn Base? Văn hóa trao quyền tự chủ: Bạn được tự do đứng trên đôi chân của mình để định hình lộ trình phát triển của bản thân. Từ việc học tập, xử lý vấn đề đến việc được chịu trách nhiệm cho việc mình làm, cho lựa chọn của mình. "1 năm làm ở Base bằng 3 năm làm ở ngoài": Tốc độ làm việc ở đây Base khiến bản thân giãn nỡ vùng an toàn liên tục, sự trưởng thành được tôi luyện ngay cả trong kỹ năng, tư duy và bản lĩnh. Được đào tạo liên tục bởi đội ngũ Business Consultant thực chiến: + Onboarding Program: Từng checkpoint thực chiến được lên kế hoạch cụ thể trong 60 ngày. + Coaching bởi Leaders giàu kinh nghiệm, đội ngũ trực tiếp tư vấn thực chiến trên thị trường hàng ngày. 3. Vì sao nên làm Business Consultant ở Base? - Trở thành người tạo ảnh hưởng thực sự: Cơ hội hiếm có để trực tiếp đồng hành cùng 20–30 C-Levels, Manager mỗi tháng, mang đến giá trị thật cho doanh nghiệp ở đa dạng lĩnh vực bằng chính những tri thức mà bạn tư vấn. - Làm chủ lộ trình nghề nghiệp: Thăng tiến dựa trên năng lực, không giới hạn tuổi tác hay thâm niên. Lộ trình review Level Up hàng quý với hệ thống 9 cấp bậc chuyên môn dành riêng cho chiến binh Business Consultant. - Thu nhập theo kết quả: Thu nhập được trả theo mô hình On-Target Earning đảm bảo bạn được trả công xứng đáng với thành quả. Hoa hồng tăng dần theo doanh thu cộng dồn, mở ra cơ hội bứt phá thu nhập không còn mức trần. - Tôi luyện sự bản lĩnh: Chỉ những người có tinh thần mạnh mẽ, kỷ luật cao và ý chí vươn lên không ngừng mới thật sự phù hợp. Áp lực ở đây đủ để rèn nên một phiên bản xuất sắc mà chính bạn cũng ngưỡng mộ, tự hào. Quy trình phỏng vấn: Vòng 1: Call interview with Talent Acquisition (Google Meet) Vòng 2: Competency & Culture-Fit Interview with Deputy Director & Manager (Onsite) Địa chỉ làm việc: Lầu 2, Jasmine 1, Hado Centrosa, Phường Hòa Hưng, Quận 10. Thời gian làm việc: Thứ 2 - Thứ 6: 8h30 - 12h00; 13h30 - 18h00. Thứ 7: 8h30 - 12h00.

Title: Business Analyst
Skills: Business Analysis, Project Management, Stakeholder management, English, ITIL Foundation
Description: About the job Make an impact with NTT DATA Join a company that is pushing the boundaries of what is possible. We are renowned for our technical excellence and leading innovations, and for making a difference to our clients and society. Our workplace embraces diversity and inclusion – it’s a place where you can grow, belong and thrive. Your day at NTT DATA The Business Analyst is a seasoned subject matter expert, responsible for working with internal and external clients to determine requirements and to define solutions to address complex business, process and systems problems, and improvements in the organization. This role acts as a liaison among stakeholders in order to understand the structure, policies, and operations of an organization, and to recommend solutions that enable the organization to achieve its goals. Key responsibilities: Acts as a bridge between the business problems and the technology solutions. Analyzes, transforms and ultimately resolves the business problems with the help of technology. Works with internal clients and apply best practice methodologies to determine business requirements and to define solutions to address business, process, information and system problems, improvements or change. Delivers business projects in line with sponsor requirements and enterprise architecture. Proactively develops and deploys enhanced services and platforms, covering all the functional aspects from service/product definition through to build and deployment. Ensures the identification and documentation of operational gaps including user guides, templates, test cases and related user training. Assists with the resolution of issues pertaining to the service. Adheres to and follows the relevant development and support processes. Communicates and escalates if any issues arise or deliverables cannot be met and request assistance to ensure closure of issues. Takes responsibility for delivery of project elements with minimal supervision. Performs any other related task as required. To thrive in this role, you need to have: Seasoned understanding of business practices and processes. Excellent team player who displays good client service orientation with well-developed administrative and organization skills. Seasoned expertise in specific systems, processes and technologies that they will be required to analyze. Meticulous attention to detail whilst working under pressure. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Seasoned process mapping technology knowledge. Ability to build rapport and engage effectively with a variety of stakeholders. Seasoned knowledge of project management methodology. Excellent analytical skills with the ability to convert business requirements into operational deliverables (functional requirements) to meet business objectives. Excellent documentation skills, in particular, functional requirements, test cases, system user documentation, processes and procedures and presentations. Seasoned working knowledge of Microsoft Exchange, Word, Excel Project, PowerPoint and Visio Good understanding of systems generally used in a services organization, for example ServiceNow, Siebel, Remedy, SAP, EMS would be advantageous. Seasoned understanding of and experience with ITIL (IT Infrastructure Library) and the application of ITIL tools within a service integrator. Academic qualifications and certifications: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Business or Information Technology or a related field. Project management certification would be advantageous. Professional in Business Analysis certification is preferred. IIBA Membership required. Relevant technology certification(s) required, such as ITIL. Required experience: Fluent in English, with the ability to communicate effectively in both written and verbal forms in a professional business environment. Seasoned experience as a Business Analyst gained within a technology services environment. Seasoned experience as a system administrator or developer would be advantageous. Seasoned experience in and with all operational aspects of a Services business, preferably with a Systems Integrator. Seasoned experience in the business requirement gathering, use case definition, process mapping and implementing new services and systems. Workplace type: About NTT DATA NTT DATA is a $30+ billion trusted global innovator of business and technology services. We serve 75% of the Fortune Global 100 and are committed to helping clients innovate, optimize and transform for long-term success. We invest over $3.6 billion each year in R&D to help organizations and society move confidently and sustainably into the digital future. As a Global Top Employer, we have diverse experts in more than 50 countries and a robust partner ecosystem of established and start-up companies. Our services include business and technology consulting, data and artificial intelligence, industry solutions, as well as the development, implementation and management of applications, infrastructure, and connectivity. We are also one of the leading providers of digital and AI infrastructure in the world. NTT DATA is part of NTT Group and headquartered in Tokyo. Equal Opportunity Employer NTT DATA is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer with a global culture that embraces diversity. We are committed to providing an environment free of unfair discrimination and harassment. We do not discriminate based on age, race, colour, gender, sexual orientation, religion, nationality, disability, pregnancy, marital status, veteran status, or any other protected category. Join our growing global team and accelerate your career with us. Apply today.

Skills: CRM, English, Vietnamese, Salesforce, Communication Skills
Description: About the job Full job description Responsibilities Answer customer inquiries over the phone, chat, and/or email Log customer interactions in our system for proper documentation Follow-up with customers as appropriate Review customer’s account to identify and offer products that will benefit the customers (Sales Representative) Participate in team meetings and strategize on team performance improvement Participate in one-on-one coaching sessions with direct manager to strategize on individual performance improvement Qualifications Bachelor’s degree or Diploma in any discipline Fluency in written and spoken English and Vietnamese Experienced or interest in a BPO, Customer Service, and/or Sales Willing to relocate to Penang, Malaysia (Relocation provided) Willing to work rotational shift Job Types: Full-time, New-Grad, Permanent Pay: RM4000 - RM4500 per month Language: Vietnamese (Required)

Company: Công Ty TNHH Tư Vấn James

Title: Fresher Software Developer (Low code platform)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: C#, .NET, Java, Python, English
Description: About the job Company Description KMS Technology was established in 2009 as a U.S.-based software services company. With development centers in Vietnam and Mexico, we have been trusted globally for the superlative quality of our software consulting & development services, technology solutions, and engineers' expertise. We pride ourselves on creating brilliant solutions for our clients by leveraging deep expertise, advanced technologies, and delivery excellence—achieving a shared success where everyone can reach their fullest potential. We believe that the business success we contribute to reflects our commitment to making a difference for our community, providing solutions that create long-lasting impacts within 3 main business sectors: Enterprise software development services: Leverage software domain expertise to help clients make better business decisions in technology platforms, increase speed-to-market, and gain critical development support through innovative technology solutions Healthcare technology solutions: Build transformative next-gen technologies to solve healthcare’s most challenging problems, providing innovative tools and expertise to providers, payers, life sciences, and medical technology vendors Banking, Financial Services & Insurance (BFSI) technology solutions: Empower BFSI businesses to embrace the digital finance revolution and expedite clients’ journey towards complete digitalization, technology consulting, data analytics, software development, and software quality Job Description Your key responsibilities: The Fresher Software Developer will be responsible for developing and maintaining applications using a low-code development platform, setting up and configuring systems for each customer's unique requirements. If you are naturally drawn to technology and understanding it, and if you are looking for an opportunity in a fast-paced software development environment where you can develop your technical skills and soft skills in parallel, then you might be a match Qualifications General requirements: Good IT background, GPA 7.5+ (Please attach transcripts when submitting your CV) Problem-solving skills and solution-oriented attitude Ability to work independently and in a team setting Good English skills Ready to work full-time Technical requirements: Having experience with one programming language (C#, .NET, Java, Python) and a drive to learn and work with C# Theoretical knowledge of software development good practices and basic software design patterns Additional Information Perks You'll Enjoy Working in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam Building large-scale & global software products Working & growing with Passionate & Talented Team Diverse careers opportunities with Software Outsourcing, Software Product Development, IT Solutions & Consulting Attractive Salary and Benefits Two performance appraisals every year and performance bonus Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in North American (U.S, Canada), Europe, Asia. Flexible working time Various training on hot-trend technologies, best practices and soft skills Premium healthcare insurance for you and your loved ones Company trip, big annual year-end party every year, team building, etc. Fitness & sport activities: football, tennis, table-tennis, badminton, yoga, swimming… Joining community development activities: 1% Pledge, charity every quarter, blood donation, public seminars, career orientation talks,… Free in-house entertainment facilities (foosball, ping pong, gym…), coffee, and snack (instant noodles, cookies, candies…) And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!

Title: Python Backend Developer
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Python, Flask, Django, SQL, NoSQL
Description: About the job Our Company We’re Hitachi Digital Services, a global digital solutions and transformation business with a bold vision of our world’s potential. We’re people-centric and here to power good. Every day, we future-proof urban spaces, conserve natural resources, protect rainforests, and save lives. This is a world where innovation, technology, and deep expertise come together to take our company and customers from what’s now to what’s next. We make it happen through the power of acceleration. Imagine the sheer breadth of talent it takes to bring a better tomorrow closer to today. We don’t expect you to ‘fit’ every requirement – your life experience, character, perspective, and passion for achieving great things in the world are equally as important to us. Requirements & Skills‍ Advanced proficiency in Python and related technologies. With an understanding of software engineering principles, software architects can more effectively design applications. Experience with web frameworks such as Flask or Django Working knowledge of both SQL and NoSQL databases. Relevant experience in cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure Must acquire Basic understanding of front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript Good understanding of RESTful APIs Possess strong problem-solving and analytical abilities Excellent communication and collaboration abilities About Us We’re a global, team of innovators. Together, we harness engineering excellence and passion to co-create meaningful solutions to complex challenges. We turn organizations into data-driven leaders that can make a positive impact on their industries and society. If you believe that innovation can bring a better tomorrow closer to today, this is the place for you. Championing diversity, equity, and inclusion Diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are integral to our culture and identity. Diverse thinking, a commitment to allyship, and a culture of empowerment help us achieve powerful results. We want you to be you, with all the ideas, lived experience, and fresh perspective that brings. We support your uniqueness and encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our team. How We Look After You We help take care of your today and tomorrow with industry-leading benefits, support, and services that look after your holistic health and wellbeing. We’re also champions of life balance and offer flexible arrangements that work for you (role and location dependent). We’re always looking for new ways of working that bring out our best, which leads to unexpected ideas. So here, you’ll experience a sense of belonging, and discover autonomy, freedom, and ownership as you work alongside talented people you enjoy sharing knowledge with. We’re proud to say we’re an equal opportunity employer and welcome all applicants for employment without attention to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, age, disability status or any other protected characteristic. Should you need reasonable accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know so that we can do our best to set you up for success.

Title: Tech Pre-sales Consultant Assistant
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Market research, English, CRM, HTML, CSS
Description: About the job Tech Pre-sales Consultant Assistant - 6-month Internship About ITC Join ITC, a trailblazing force with offices in Shanghai, Singapore, Saigon and Melbourne. We are a hub of innovation for Fortune 500 companies and industry leaders, guiding them through the complexities of the Chinese and APAC markets. At ITC, you'll play a pivotal role in transforming their business landscapes using cutting-edge MarTech, e-Commerce, and Omnichannel solutions. As part of our team, you'll not only witness but also contribute to significant ROI achievements and market successes. We're not just navigating the future of digital commerce; we're creating it. Be a part of our journey to redefine industry standards and elevate market experiences across Asia. With a talented team of 60 professionals across APAC, our 2023 milestones include: Delivering 30+ digital transformation workshops for global and local leadership boards like Coty, LOreal, Unilever Prestige Executing comprehensive client-telling roadmaps, enhancing customer engagement and loyalty like Moncler, Margiela, Moschino, Christies. In the process ITC trained more than 2,000 Sales Associates Pioneering Salesforce projects for luxury brands in China, notably with LVMH and other fashion groups Contributing to significant eCommerce growth through bespoke website revamps for prominent clients for the top luxury and fashion brands in China and APAC Facilitating remarkable visibility and revenue growth in private traffic areas for top-tier brands. Helping some Fast Fashion Brands growing above 10,000 orders a day Helping brands like Hublot, Omega, Fred drive sales in China through best-in-Class Mini Program Expanding The Hour Glass's presence across 9 APAC markets. Developing and maintaining successful Mini Programs, enhancing brand reach and customer experience. About This Position This position is requiring a high level of proactivity and a self-driven mindset . In this role, your main goal is uniquely integrated between Pre-Sales, Production & Strategy Consulting delivering on our digital transformation services and communicating directly with the clients mainly in English. In addition, you will also help our Consulting team on their strategy proposals to win more deals. We are a team of highly-proactive individuals that work seamlessly as a team, supporting one another for continuous growth and knowledge building. We place strong emphasis on investing in our teammates progression over time. And such, we are looking for an A-player that can really contribute to the team with innovative ideas and strategic value. Our services target APAC as the key market and other Asian markets such as Vietnam, Singapore, Hong Kong. Therefore, the channels that were targeting can be different, but with a global outreach. Responsibilities Build highly tailor-made & illustrative technical proposals to showcase our products and services to win the clients Conduct market research to gather information and insights that strengthen proposal content Monitor the progress of proposals and bids, and adjust as needed to increase the likelihood of winning deals. Follow up with clients to address any concerns, answer questions, and provide tailored solutions based on their specific needs. Other ad-hoc requests assigned by management, contributing to the overall success of the sales team and company. Requirements As an A-player, you will be/have: Great command of English (speaking, writing, listening, reading) to facilitate cross-border interactions and discussions Current studying or final year in IT / Digital or relevant fields Excellent attention to details / detailed-oriented Ability to translate complex technology process / concepts into meaningful solutions that address business needs Ability to efficiently create Keynote/PowerPoint presentations that are both visually pleasing and directly on-point. Quick learner, adaptive to difficult digital concepts and workflows Strong logical thinking, analytical and problem-solving skills Versatile and open to different tasks & roles depending on the teams needs Great team player, positive attitude with eagerness to learn in a fast-paced digital industry Nice to have: Basic understanding of: Software development life cycle (SDLC). Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Alibaba Cloud). Web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and backend concepts. APIs and basic database knowledge (e.g., MySQL, MongoDB). IT infrastructure fundamentals, including networking and servers. Experienced with analytics tools (Excel, Advanced Excel, PowerBI, etc.) Experienced with CRM tools (Insightly, Salesforces, SAP, etc.) Experienced with diagram tools (Freeform, Lucidchart, Miro, or Visio) Experienced with CMS platform (Drupal, WordPress, etc.) Efficiency in visualization tools (Keynote, MS Powerpoint, Figma, Adobe Ecosystem, etc.) The package For all incoming interns : Paid internship with competitive allowance we are highly invested in our teammates individual and professional growth, and thus we also expect high commitment, excellent work ethics and value delivered from you NO fingerprint timekeeping culture. We believe in effective self-governance and work efficiency in all our teammates Multi-cultural teammates with 14+ nationalities. Youll be able to meet different people and learn more about different cultures every day ENGLISH is the main daily communication language The office has available tea, coffee, juices and snacks

Yêu cầu công việc Tối thiểu 3 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc thực tế tại các công ty, dự án về vị trí tuyển dụng Có hiểu biết về các kỹ thuật lập trình (biết đợc cấu trúc và giải thuật) Có kinh nghiệm làm ETL job trên Cloud Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng công cụ Spark để xử lý và phân tích dữ liệu trong quá trình xây dựng, quản lý và vận hành các hệ thống dữ liệu lớn Đã từng làm việc trên AWS/Databrick là một điểm cộng Có hiểu biết về Database Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực tài chính/ngân hàng Có khả năng đọc viết tiếng Anh (cơ bản) nghe nói (nếu có thể). Ưu tiên ứng viên có chứng chỉ Tiếng Anh quốc tế Khả năng làm việc độc lập cũng như làm việc nhóm. Chịu được áp lực công việc 3. Quyền lợi Mức lương phù hợp với năng lực Khám sức khỏe hàng năm Du lịch 1 lần/năm (chưa tính nhưng lần teambuilding nhỏ) Thưởng các ngày lễ, tết, ngày đặc biệt của cá nhân Hỗ trợ gửi xe hàng tháng Trà, cafe, bánh kẹo miễn phí Có cơ hội trở thành “Gương mặt xuất sắc” của Công ty nếu hoàn thành xuất sắc nhiệm vụ; Hưởng đầy đủ các chính sách và chế độ như: BHYT, BHXH, BHTN,.. theo đúng quy định của Bộ Luật Lao động và của Công ty; Tham gia các hoạt động nghỉ mát, team building Làm việc trong môi trường cởi mở, năng động, khuyến khích sự sáng tạo.

Title: Web Designer
Salary: Competitive salary with commission and bonuses
Skills: UI-UX, Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, HTML
Description: About the job We are looking for a Web Designer who is passionate about creating user-centered, visually appealing, and conversion-optimized websites. In this role, you will work closely with Project Managers and Developers to deliver high-quality websites and digital experiences for our clients. You will be involved from initial concept through to final delivery — ensuring both design excellence and technical feasibility. Key Responsibilities: Collaborate with PMs and clients to understand business goals, user needs, and project requirements. Design responsive website layouts, UI components, and visual systems that align with client branding and performance goals. Create wireframes, mockups, prototypes, and high-fidelity UI designs using tools like Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch. Work closely with developers to ensure accurate implementation of designs and consistent user experience across platforms. Participate in feedback loops and iterate designs based on stakeholder input and data insights (e.g., heatmaps, analytics). Maintain and improve design quality and consistency across projects by following design system standards. Effectively manage a high volume of projects, balancing speed and quality while meeting tight deadlines in a fast-paced, collaborative environment. Stay updated with the latest design trends, tools, and front-end technologies. Requirements: 3+ years of experience as a Web or UI/UX Designer in an agency, product, or freelance setting. Strong portfolio showcasing responsive website designs and attention to user experience. Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, XD) and Figma. Knowledge of WordPress, Webflow, or basic HTML/CSS is a plus. Have UX/UI understanding and attention to detail. Experience collaborating in cross-functional teams (designers, developers, PMs). Ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines. Strong communication skills in English (written and verbal). Offered: Competitive salary with commission and bonuses. Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement within the company. Chance to work in an international team and professional working environment Supportive team environment with a focus on shared success. Lunch allowance and free drinks (coffee, tea, snack …) Premium health insurance package Vacation leave up to 22 days per year 13th-month salary bonus

Title: Chuyên viên Tuyển dụng IT (Outsourcing)HCM
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: IT Support, English, Team Management
Description: About the job Chuyên viên Tuyển dụng IT (Outsourcing) Thỏa thuận Hồ Chí Minh 31/03/2025 File CV mẫu MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC Làm việc với đội ngũ kỹ thuật & kinh doanh để xác định nhu cầu tuyển dụng, ưu tiên dự án và hoàn thiện JD cho từng vị trí. Xây dựng và triển khai các chiến lược tuyển dụng thông qua đăng tin, networking, headhunting,… Lọc hồ sơ, sàng lọc và đánh giá ứng viên phù hợp với yêu cầu tuyển dụng. Tổ chức, tham gia vào các vòng phỏng vấn và đánh giá ứng viên. Xây dựng cơ sở dữ liệu ứng viên và các công cụ hỗ trợ tuyển dụng. Phân tích thị trường lao động, cập nhật xu hướng để tư vấn và tối ưu hoạt động tuyển dụng. Các công việc admin khác theo yêu cầu của quản lý. YÊU CẦU ỨNG VIÊN Tốt nghiệp Cao đẳng/Đại học các ngành Quản trị Nhân sự, Kinh tế,… hoặc các lĩnh vực liên quan. Ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm tuyển dụng IT (nội bộ hoặc dịch vụ headhunting, ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm tuyển dụng mảng Outsourcing) Hiểu biết về các vị trí, thị trường Công nghệ thông tin Tiếng Anh giao tiếp khá Kỹ năng tìm kiếm, đánh giá và phỏng vấn ứng viên. Chủ động, trách nhiệm Khả năng làm việc độc lập, khả năng làm việc ở cường độ cao và chịu áp lực tốt QUYỀN LỢI Được đánh giá bằng chương trình đánh giá hiệu quả công việc theo KPI, được ghi nhận công bằng và khách quan về đóng góp cá nhân Review lương theo năng lực và kết quả công việc định kỳ hàng năm Thưởng vinh danh nhân viên xuất sắc hàng quý, năm Thưởng vào các dịp Lễ/Tết hàng năm Tài trợ 100% chi phí tham gia các khóa học, thi chứng chỉ phục vụ cho công việc Có nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến và phát triển nghề nghiệp Được trang bị laptop làm việc hiện đại Tổ chức nhiều hoạt động teambuilding, nghỉ hè hàng năm hấp dẫn THÔNG TIN LIÊN HỆ Các ứng viên quan tâm và mong muốn làm việc tại Công ty HPT vui lòng gửi hồ sơ ứng tuyển qua email: tuyendung@hpt.vn hoặc trực tiếp nộp đơn tại: Tp. Hồ Chí Minh: Lô E2a-3 đường D1, Khu Công nghệ cao, P. Long Thạnh Mỹ, TP. Thủ Đức, TP. Hồ Chí Minh

Title: HN - Java Developer (Onsite Project)
Skills: Java, Spring Boot, SQL, NoSQL, Git
Description: About the job AHT TECH là công ty đa quốc gia cung cấp giải pháp tư vấn công nghệ toàn diện tập trung vào ngành Thương mại và Trải nghiệm Số hàng đầu Việt Nam. Thành lập từ 2007, chúng tôi hiện có nhiều chi nhánh và văn phòng đại diện ở Việt Nam, Malaysia, Thái Lan, Nhật Bản, Mỹ, Đức, Singaprore & Úc. Tự hào là môi trường làm việc năng động có nhiều cơ hội phát triển, hiện tại AHT Tech đã trở thành mái nhà của hơn 300 nhân sự trên khắp thế giới. Chúng tôi hy vọng bạn sẽ gia nhập AHT Tech để cùng làm việc và gắn bó lâu dài, góp phần vào sự phát triển của công ty và cũng kỳ vọng bạn sẽ trở thành những thành viên trụ cột của công ty trong tương lai. MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC Tham gia phát triển và bảo trì hệ thống backend sử dụng Java Spring Boot. Phối hợp với team phân tích yêu cầu, thiết kế chức năng và triển khai các module mới. Làm việc với cơ sở dữ liệu Oracle: viết truy vấn, tối ưu hiệu năng SQL. Tích hợp hệ thống với Redis, Kafka, và các dịch vụ khác. Đọc hiểu tài liệu kỹ thuật bằng tiếng Anh để nắm rõ yêu cầu nghiệp vụ và kỹ thuật. Phối hợp với các thành viên QA, BA, DevOps trong quá trình phát triển và triển khai hệ thống. YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC Có từ 1.5 năm kinh nghiệm lập trình Java Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với cơ sở dữ liệu SQL/NoSQL (Oracle, MongoDB) Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng hoặc hiểu biết về Redis, Apache Kafka Có kinh nghiệm với các API RESTful Biết sử dụng công cụ quản lý mã nguồn như Git Có kinh nghiệm làm việc trong các dự án apply CI/CD, microservices là lợi thế Có khả năng đọc hiểu tài liệu tiếng Anh kỹ thuật Tinh thần học hỏi, trách nhiệm, có khả năng làm việc nhóm tốt QUYỀN LỢI CỦA BẠN Bạn sẽ được Mức lương cạnh tranh theo năng lực Review performance theo lộ trình công ty 2 lần/năm Được tư vấn, định hướng về career-path rõ ràng Tham gia các chương trình đào tạo nội bộ nâng cao năng lực tại công ty Môi trường làm việc cởi mở, trẻ trung, thân thiện, nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến trong công việc, cùng học hỏi với đồng nghiệp trẻ trung, tài tăng Cùng với chế độ Hưởng đầy đủ các chế độ BHXH, BHYT, BHTN cho CBNV theo quy định của Pháp luật Khám sức khỏe định kỳ 1 lần/năm tại các bệnh viện quốc tế 12 ngày nghỉ phép nguyên lương/năm và 1 ngày nghỉ phép sinh nhật Tham gia nhiều hoạt động được tổ chức trong năm: New Year/Year End Party, Company trip, Sinh nhật công ty, Happy hour,... Tham gia nhiều hoạt động thiện nguyện, hoạt động tập thể sáng tạo, các giải phong trào nội bộ (Giải games, giải chạy, đá bóng, cầu lông,...) Có cơ hội training nội bộ nâng cao kỹ năng chuyên môn, kỹ năng mềm và ngoại ngữ (Anh/Nhật/...) Có cơ hội học và thi các chứng chỉ chuyên môn do công ty tài trợ ĐỊA ĐIỂM LÀM VIỆC: Văn phòng đối tác (Onsite) Tòa nhà Keangnam Landmark 72, Hà Nội Đường Huỳnh Thúc Kháng, Hà Nội THỜI GIAN LÀM VIỆC: Thời gian làm việc: Thứ 2 - Thứ 6, 8h00 - 17h30 (theo lịch làm việc của đối tác) LƯU Ý: Ứng viên vui lòng gửi CV ứng tuyển bằng Tiếng Việt (theo yêu cầu của đối tác)

Title: Senior Data Analyst (Tableau + SQL)
Skills: Data Analysis, Tableau, SQL, Google BigQuery, English
Description: About the job Through proprietary software and AI, along with a focus on customer delight, Sleek makes the back-office easy for micro SMEs. We give Entrepreneurs time back to focus on what they love doing - growing their business and being with customers. With a surging number of Entrepreneurs globally, we are innovating in a highly lucrative space. We operate 3 business segments: Corporate Secretary: Automating the company incorporation, secretarial, filing, Nominee Director, mailroom and immigration processes via custom online robots and SleekSign. We are the market leaders in Singapore with :5% market share of all new business incorporations Accounting & Bookkeeping: Redefining what it means to do Accounting, Bookkeeping, Tax and Payroll thanks to our proprietary SleekBooks ledger, AI tools and exceptional customer service FinTech payments: Overcoming a key challenge for Entrepreneurs by offering digital banking services to new businesses Sleek launched in 2017 and now has around 15,000 customers across our offices in Singapore, Hong Kong, Australia and the UK. We have around 500 staff with an intact startup mindset. We have recently raised Series B financing off the back of >70% compound annual growth in Revenue over the last 5 years. Sleek has been recognised by The Financial Times, The Straits Times, Forbes and LinkedIn as one of the fastest growing companies in Asia. Backed by world-class investors, we are on track to be one of the few cash flow positive, tech-enabled unicorns based out of Singapore. Requirements We are looking for a Senior Data Analyst that is excited about the below Mission and Outcomes. Mission: Drive informed decision making within the COO's organization by turning data from our Accounting, Corporate Secretary, FinTech and Compliance operations into actionable insights that improve the robustness and profitability of Sleek's operations. Outcomes: 1/ Data reliability Ensuring that your analysis is at least 90% accurate, with clear understanding and explanation of what causes the 10% gap. 2/ Dashboard creation and management Visualizing data in Looker Studio or Tableau, in a way that is clear and concise Calculation of metrics are to be consistent with existing dashboards Dashboards are to be prototyped with the end user in Google Sheets before created Efficient/ scalable solutions to be proposed to ensure long-term sustainability of dashboards Dashboard usage is to be reviewed every quarter those with low utilization are to be archived 3/ Documentation Ensure all key metrics and calculations are clearly documented in Google Docs and pinned/ linked in our internal Wiki or Slack channels. Language should be accessible to other Data Analysts and non-technical stakeholders. 4/ Data quality recommendations Work with Tech, Product and Data Engineers to ensure data pipelines are robust and efficient, so that Big Query is maintained as best as possible. 5/ Collaborate With Other Data Analysts Even though you'll be embedded within the functional team and working independently, you'll need to contribute to an inclusive, friendly, knowledge sharing culture with other DAs, so that everyone is aware of each other's workstreams/ sprints, challenges and learnings. To do this, you will have a minimum of 5 years experience as a Data Analyst. The interview process The successful candidate will participate in the below interview stages (note that the order might be different to what you read below). We anticipate the process to last no more than 3 weeks from start to finish. Whether the interviews are held over video call or in person will depend on your location and the role. Case study A :60 minute chat with the Hiring Manager (COO) or CFO and 1-2 other Data Analysts, where they will give you some real-life challenges that this role faces, and will ask for your approach to solving them. Career deep dive A :60 minute chat with the Hiring Manager (COO). They'll discuss your last 1-2 roles to understand your experience in more detail. Behavioural fit assessment A :60 minute chat with our Head of HR or the CFO, where they will dive into some of your recent work situations to understand how you think and work. Offer + reference interviews We'll make a non-binding offer verbally or over email, followed by a couple of short phone or video calls with references that you provide to us Requirement for background screening Please be aware that Sleek is a regulated entity and as such is required to perform different levels of background checks on staff depending on their role. This may include using external vendors to verify the below: Your education Any criminal history Any political exposure Any bankruptcy or adverse credit history We will ask for your consent before conducting these checks. Depending on your role at Sleek, an adverse result on one of these checks may prohibit you from passing probation. By submitting a job application, you confirm that you have read and agree to our Data Privacy Statement for Candidates, found at sleek.com. Benefits Some other great things about working at Sleek... Humility and kindness: Humility is a core attribute we hire for, which means we have a culture of not taking ourselves too seriously and being able to laugh. Kindness is also incredibly important. We are committed to creating and nurturing a diverse and inclusive environment. Flexibility: You'll be able to work from home 2-3 days per week if you live in Singapore or Hong Kong, or 5 days per week if you're fully remote. If you need to start early or start late to cater to your family or other needs, we don't mind, so long as you get your work done and proactively communicate. You can also work fully remote from anywhere in the world for 1 month each year Financial benefits: We pay competitive market salaries and provide staff with generous paid time off and holiday schedules. Additionally, you'll be able to access our flexi benefits scheme for home office equipment or health and fitness expenditure. Certain staff at Sleek are also eligible for our employee share ownership plan and can share in the upside of our stellar growth trajectory as we work toward listing on a prominent stock exchange in the Asia Pacific region. Personal growth : You'll get a lot of responsibility and autonomy at Sleek - we move at a fast pace so you'll be making decisions, making mistakes and learning. There's also a range of internal and external facing training programmes we run. We're also at the forefront of utilizing AI in our space and are developing a regional center of AI excellence. It is our intention that if you leave Sleek, you leave as a more well-rounded person and professional. Sleek is also a proudly certified B Corp: Since we started our journey in 2017, we've been committed to building Sleek as a force for good. In just over 5 years, we've joined a community of industry leaders like Patagonia, Ben & Jerry's, and P&G who are building an inclusive, equitable, and a regenerative economy. We have planted over 29,271 trees to reforest our ecosystem and saved 7 tons of paper from landfills by processing over 1.4M pages through Sleek Sign. We aim to be Carbon Neutral by 2030.

Title: Tester
Skills: SQL, Agile, Tester, Jira, Android
Description: About the job MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC Tham gia vào các dự án phần mềm của Công ty Đọc hiểu các tài liệu BA Viết test case, test report. Thực hiện công việc kiểm thử (manual test) để kiểm tra chất lượng sản phẩm trước khi chuyển cho khách hàng. Cập nhật thông tin chi tiết về các lỗi của phần mềm tìm thấy lên công cụ quản lý dự án (Redmine, Jira…) Theo dõi trạng thái sửa lỗi và kiểm tra lại việc sửa lỗi trước khi đóng lỗi Thực hiện báo cáo chất lượng dự án phần mềm. Phối hợp với đối tác/khách hàng trong quá trình test, fix bugs Viết các tài liệu hướng dẫn sử dụng phần mềm theo phân công của quản lý YÊU CẦU Khả năng phân tích, tư duy logic tốt. Kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt Tốt nghiệp Đại học / Cao đẳng (hoặc tương đương) các chuyên ngành CNTT, Điện tử – Viễn thông Có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng SQL để phục vụ cho việc test phần mềm Ưu tiên các ứng viên có các yếu tố sau: Đã có kinh nghiệm test website và ứng dụng mobile (Android, iOS) Khả năng sử dụng tiếng Anh trong công việc Có kiến thức hoặc kinh nghiệm phát triển phần mềm theo mô hình Agile (Scrum) QUYỀN LỢI Mức thu nhập cạnh tranh: upto 18M, Thỏa thuận theo năng lực “NMS care” bảo hiểm dành riêng cho nhân viên NMS. Nghỉ mát: Theo chính sách của công ty Có cơ hội được xem xét nâng lương hàng năm tùy vào kết quả công việc. Môi trường làm việc hiện đại, thân thiện. Chính sách cho người lao động tuân theo “Bộ luật lao động” tại Việt Nam.
Experience_Requirements: Có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương

Title: DevOps Engineer (HCM/DN/HN)
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Skills: DevOps, GCP, Azure, AWS, CI/CD
Description: About the job We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to join our team. You will be in charge of handling a wide range of web and AI applications. Having a fundamental understanding of DevOps challenges such as performance, scalability, and availability will be key to succeed in this role. Besides, you will have a chance to work on MLOps especially LLMOps to gain valuable experience in this exciting space. Locations: Ho Chi Minh, Da Nang, Ha Noi Requirements Must Have Minimum 2 years of experience with GCP/Azure/AWS. Experience setting up CI and CD systems for both web and mobile applications Experience with Infrastructure as Code tools such as CloudFormation, Terraform, and Ansible Experience with CI/CD tools like GitHub Actions Hands-on experience with deployment, scaling, monitoring, and performance tuning Experience with command-line tools such as Shell, Bash, ZShell for Linux/macOS and CMD, PowerShell for Windows Ability to assess system requirements and setup a new environment in a timely manner Git, Github, Gitlab, and Pull Request knowledge Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English Nice to Have Familiar with Azure or AWS Cloud Familiar with Docker and Kubernetes Familiar with MLOps: model evaluation, fine-tuning, deployment, and monitoring Familiar with Cloud Services Certificate Familiar with Microservices architecture Familiar with System Design and multi-component Architecture experience Familiar with Agile process and scrum methodologies Benefits Three days remote every week and four full remote weeks per year Gold level Health Insurance coverage from Bao Viet Insurance, a yearly complete Health Check and social insurance All office benefits and full salary during probation Flexible working time starting anytime up to 10 AM working Monday - Friday with no overtime and a long lunch break Allowance for everything: meals, parking, petrol, along with unlimited snacks and nice coffee every day Choose from a brand-new Mac or PC device Salary review twice a year with opportunities for promotions and spot awards 12 days annual leave per year, with all days not taken paid out in cash, plus 2 sick leave days Yearly Training Budget up to 5 million VND per staff. Title: Enterprise/Solution Architect - Retail Banking
Location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
Skills: Enterprise Architecture, Solution Architecture, Cloud, Security, English
Description: About the job About the Job: We are seeking a dedicated Enterprise Architect who will initially contribute to delivering new Telling experiences for NAB Bankers. This role involves overseeing the delivery of multiple epics within a complex program aimed at transitioning from legacy technology to a modern micro-frontend architecture built upon microservices. Moreover this exciting opportunity will not only manage complex Telling policies and facilitate brokering within the broader NAB ecosystem but also take responsibility for change delivery by defining multiple components within end-to-end technical architectures. As a trusted advisor, you will influence business delivery and ensuring alignment with target technologies. Main Responsibilities: Meeting with your Product Owners, Project Managers and Engineering to produce End to end architectures that align to the Technology Roadmap. Producing Option’s analysis and provide recommendations of which solution to move forward with balancing speed to value, cost, alignment to target state, data and security requirements. This could involve conducting research into a COTS product, best way to structure a microservices or what Public Cloud services to use as part of your architecture. Consultation with other architects within NAB in order to move forward with your architecture, this includes Enterprise Architects to understand the target state, Security architects and Data architects to understand Security and Data requirements and patterns. Fulfil other tasks as assigned by your People Leader and/or authorized representative of NAB Vietnam from time to time. You will bring the following skills and experience 10+ years in Technology generally and 5+ years in Solution / Enterprise architecture, ideally in large organisations with regulatory and legacy constraints. Excellent verbal and written English language skills. Strong negotiation and influencing skills to help shape business and tech strategy. Understand the trade-off involved in technology change while simultaneously delivering business benefits. Ie Choosing to use an off- target state platform to as a tactical solution in order to meet regulatory requirements whilst the target state platform is being built. Experience driving end-to-end solutions in complex organisations with regulatory and legacy constraints. Highly desirable: Retail Customer / Contact Centre Banking / financial; services industry experience will be an advantage. Architecture or technology-related certifications/cloud will be an advantage. THE BENEFITS AND PERKS We appreciate and reward our colleagues who do great work every day – from excelling for our customers, to taking ownership of an issue to get it resolved. Here’s how we support our people with a range of exclusive benefits. 1. Generous compensation and benefit package Attractive salary 20-day paid annual leave and 7-day paid sick leave 13th month salary and Annual Performance Bonus Premium healthcare for yourself and family members Monthly allowance for team activities Premium welcome kit and occasional gifts of appreciation Extra benefits on your work anniversary 2. Exciting career and development opportunities Large scale products with modern technologies in banking domain Clear roadmap for career advancement in both technical and leadership pathways Access to digital learning platform such as Udemy Consistent and high-quality leadership training through the Distinctive Leadership program (DLP) Specialist capabilities and accreditations in key skill areas such as Cloud Engineering, Digital, Data, Security and SREs (Site reliability engineers) Sponsored English course with native teachers Opportunity for training in Australia 3.
